Summary Heading: Great location a walk away from Disneyland
Summary: A good hotel a short walk from Disneyland (and by clocking the guests Star Wars attire during our stay, handy  for the Anaheim Convention Centre too). Our guest room on an upper floor was quiet and we both had a good nights sleep - much needed after the parks! Included breakfast was plentiful and staff more than happy to serve it 'to go' for those enthusiastic to hit rope drop at Disneyland.  Didn't get a chance to use the pool but looked nice - don't expect a sprawling lagoon - but that is fairly standard for Anaheim hotels.  Free parking a bonus (and hard to come by in this part of the world).
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a great staying in this hotel. I like it. I love my staying. Free parking underground. Gated and private. Close to anything. Great front desk people. Friendly staff. I love my room. Everything organized on its place . Very very clean. Great and friendly housekeeping. The cleaning lady's ready to help you . Great housekeeping and friendly with the guess.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we go to disney I stay in this great hotel indigo. This is my favorite and the best. Great staff. Couteos people. Friendly.  The hotel looks great. Great housekeeping. Friendly. Courteous. Happy personnel. Room very clean and all the things in place. If I need something I ask housekeeping and they help. I love my room.
Manager Response: Dear carlos B:  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are so glad to hear that we are your favorite Hotel in Anaheim and thank you for keep coming back to see us. Have a great rest of your week  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: In Aniheim for MD&M trade Show
Summary: I have been a loyal IHG Spire Member for some time and an Intercontinental Ambassador.. Erica who greeted me at the front desk the  mid morning of Feb 6 2023  Was by far heads above in terms of attitude, caring and service! All and any requests where handles with aplomb, confidence and understanding!  Erica means Excellence Every Time, Every Day!
Manager Response: Dear DAronovitz:  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are happy to hear that Erica made your stay even better, we hope to see you again soon.  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our visit and the free parking ...great location
Summary: Enjoyed our visit and different from the DTLA but cant complain as one of the only Disneyland properties to offer free parking. Staff incredibly helpful and friendly. Sad that Disneyland was such a letdown...too many let in...poor militant customer service personnel ....you can tell that the overcrowding is affecting them too
Manager Response: Dear Q7940TPrichardm:  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We are happy to know that your stay with us was good but sad because your Disney experience was not good. Hopefully in the future is not so crowded. Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed at Hotel Indigo Jan 17, 2023 and loved how close it is to Disney! If you turn left at the light, you are right there to the Shuttle parking to Disney. Down the road are restaurants such as, Cheesecake Factory, McDonalds, Panera Bread, etc. The staff was amazing, Jeremy who works the late/overnight shift, was very attentive and friendly! Before checkout, we ran into a billing issue, and the front desk staff (didn't catch her name) she was able to assist with resolving it, FAST and easy! The room was 2 queens and a pull out sofa bed, still plenty of space to move around. The room had a fridge, no microwave, cold AC and soft beds. The room was clean and everything was in working order. Jeremy also allowed us to eat dinner at one of their tables when the dining lounge was
Manager Response: Dear schh912: Thank you for taking the time to write us a great review. We are happy to know that JOHN made your stay better. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week! Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Ideal spot with awesome service for Convention Center!
Summary: WOW!!  I can't say enough good stuff about this property. Our family was heading to the Anaheim Convention Center for a vball tournament, & looking for a clean, quiet, reasonable spot w/in walking distance to avoid the parking mess. While it's always nice to stay right on-site, the Hotel Indigo received better reviews than properties adjacent to the Convention Center, & from the get-go did not disappoint. Before we even arrived, I called to book/request an extra adjoining room to accommodate our crew...Erica (front desk manager) was not only super-receptive & helpful, but also efficient: upon arrival, we found she had put us in quiet, connecting rooms off the street side. These rooms (232 & 233) were incredibly clean & well-maintained, with great amenities. The beds were
Room tip: Rooms 232 (2 queens) & 233 (king) are great for families who need connecting rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review. We are happy to know that your stay with us was a great one and that Erica and our housekeeping team did a great job on making your stay even better. We hope to see you again in the near future! Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: The beds are comfy, rooms are clean, location is perfect, and most of all the staff were incredible!!! Special thank you to Erica at the front desk and Jose at the restaurant for making this our best Disney stay yet!
Manager Response: Dear meagans795: Thank you for the review, We are glad to hear that Erica and Jose made your stay even better, come back again soon! Happy Holidays! Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Good stay for 2 couples gonna to Disneyland. The staff was very welcoming. They were able to hold our luggage until it was time to check in. The place is clean and trendy-looking, with big wall murals in the rooms, and cool changing-color lights in the hallways. Great location close to Disneyland main gate (about  15 min walk, 0.7 mile). Shower is spacious and has both a shower head and a handheld shower. Comfortable beds. Room 315 faces Katella Avenue but the street noise is not really that noticeable, especially after about 10 pm.  One notable thing - the floors are wood-patterned tile, not carpeted. Our room had some rugs over some sections. (Our room also had a sofa bed, which we didn’t use.). Be REALLY careful walking on the floors. They can be super slippery, especially
Room tip: Watch out for slippery floors in the rooms - wear your shoes!
Manager Response: Dear qaxalot: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review, we are glad you had a good stay and thank you for giving us your feedback on our floors, I will pass this along to the general manager, we hope to see you again in the near future and Happy Holidays! Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: I really love staying here! Whenever we go to Disney or a convention we choose to stay at Indigo! Many great food spots around here and their restaurant is amazing too! Just around the corner from Disney and garden walk. Clean rooms and nice employees!
Manager Response: Dear E6011WZsamanthap: Thank you so much for the great review. We are happy to know that your stay with us was a great one and we will let our housekeeping team your comments about their great job with the rooms . We hope to see you again in the near future! Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Perfectly located by Disney but also close to other Anaheim attractions. Check in was simple and had no issues at all. Rooms were modern and comfortable. Bed was comfortable and room was very quiet. They were very clean! Hospitality was great too!
Manager Response: Dear Juan N: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad you had a good stay with us and that you enjoy your stay.  Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: We found this place after having an awful experience with Air BNB. The walkability to Disney but also all the food in the area was great. We really liked how we got greeted every time we came through the lobby and the staff was incredibly friendly. Omar and Erika especially took great care of us and they’re pet friendly. I can’t recommend them enough.
Manager Response: Dear xadamx23987: Thank you so much for your lovely review and your kind words, it was a pleasure have you with us, we hope to see you soon!  Best wishes, Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Just finished a five night stay at the Hotel Indigo in Anaheim and wanted to share a few thoughts while they were fresh in my mind.   If you are looking for a clean, quiet and “reasonably” priced hotel near the parks, I could not recommend this property more.   The hotel itself lacks many of the amenities that those with small children may be looking for, eg the on-site restaurant is only open for breakfast and the hotel only has a hot tub without a swimming pool - but, if you are the typical Disney visitor and plan to be at the parks and eating corn dogs all day long, this is likely not a deal breaker.   The hotel and its rooms (at least the one we stayed in) was more than adequate for our needs, and it’s location to the parks was a plus (10-15 min walk down Harbour from the
Manager Response: Dear TBBell:  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a very detail and funny review, we appreciate every word, fyi we do have a pool, its right next to the hot-tub :)  ...we hope you visit us soon!  Best regards, Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Indigo for our trip to Disneyland. It’s relatively close, comfortable and clean- BUT on the second day of our stay, some sort of chlorine smelling water started coming up out of the drain in our bathroom sink. Maintenance/housekeeping were great and responded quickly. Antonio and Solidad were very courteous and  helpful. The hotel manager(I don’t remember her name) was not. She immediately talked about compensation and asked if we wanted a new room(the chlorine smell was so bad the room had to be aired out overnight). We moved rooms and except for the overwhelming presence of cleaning people filling the halls at all hours the rest of our stay was fine. “compensation” proved to be a complementary breakfast which we didn’t get because they closed the restaurant
Manager Response: Dear Catdaddeh: Thank you for taking the time to review our Hotel, we apologized if you stay was not a great one and we will do our best to prevent issues like this to happen again, have a great week!  Sincerely, Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: I Arrived close to 10pm on a Thursday for my 3 night stay with my family 2 little kids  ages 8 and 9 and I was greeted by Warm and Friendly Gentleman by the name of Anthony who was very patient by my millions of questions and answered all of them with a warm smile even though it was late. Room was was great. Great job to the Maids. We didn't request Maid service but, I encountered Beatriz who I asked Extra Bath Towels and washcloths and she was very nice and asked if I needed anything else to let her know.  On Saturday I didn't have my Room Key and Erica at The Front Desk was kind enough to give me a key and also answered some questions I had. Sunday Morning we had Breakfast in the Hotel. José was our waiter and very attentive to our needs and our littles as well. Great Job
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review. I'm glad you and your kids had a wonderful stay in our Hotel, and our staff delivered great service all around. We hope that you and your family visit us again soon! Have a great week! Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Like this hotel because its close to everythingdisney park. Restaurants  car rentals. Free parking underground. I like the most is the perfection inside the rooms. How clean it is.  All organize in the rooms. Clean rooms. Very clean.  Friendly staff. Housekeeping. Very helpfull. Very friendly. Courteous.  I love this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. I'm glad you had a good stay with us, I hope you visit us again soon! Have a great week!  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: They granted all of our requests so we were very happy with our stay. The hotel was clean and there is gated parking . We walked back and forth  Disney parks since it’s very close and safe. There are restaurants in the neighborhood but not right next to the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Karina C: Thank you so much for the review. We are happy to know that you had a good stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week! Best wishes Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: It's a 10-15 minute walk to Disney which you will enjoy. Follow the crowds as they head towards the Kingdom of the Mouse. On the way, you can stop in for breakfast at a number of places - IHOP, Starbucks, Denny's, etc. For convenience goods, CVS and Walgreens are on the next corner. For nearby dining, the Anaheim Garden Walk has great options like PF Changs and the Cheesecake Factory. Finally, the rental car offices are very close by - Avis was just across the street. Did I mention the hotel has free parking for its' guests? Coming from LA, which was charging $45 min per night, I thought this was awesome. Has their own pool and spa - perfect for chilling after a hot Anaheim day. Reasonable gym facility to work out, if you haven't done enough steps around the theme parks. Room
Manager Response: Dear thedjlee:: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad you enjoy the free parking and thank you the tip. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Staff make the difference for this location
Summary: We have stayed at a lot of hotels around Disneyland through out the years, from the  high end resort hotels to the smaller boutiques. We had forgotten how nice is this little gem.   An older hotel the owners have kept up the maintenance. It is a very clean hotel.   Our stay did have some noise, but having stayed in so many different hotels around the resort, that is pretty normal. Kids returned hyped upped at late hours and families rush to get to the rope drop in the early morning.   This is one of the few hotels that doesn't charge extra for parking.   Ultimately it is the staff at this hotel that makes the difference. They are all exceptional nice and accommodating... even under the onslaught of some pretty demanding vacationers.   We did stay with a service dog, which they
Manager Response: Dear John: Thank you so much for the lovely review. We are happy to know that you had a good stay with your service doggy! We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Anthony from the front desk was very accommodating, welcoming and kind ! I will be definitely coming back, he’s the best !! The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. I will recommend this hotel 100%.
Manager Response: Dear Isabella: Thank you so much for the review. We will Anthony know about your kind words. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A bit different to the norm and good value
Summary: Had an excellent stay at this Hotel Indigo which is an IHG brand that is a bit different to the normal chains and the better for it. Rooms were nicely decorated, parking was convenient and the location is great. I would have given the hotel 5 stars but took one off as the decor is getting a little tired and the reception at checkin was pretty poor - it felt like I was an inconvenience. That said the front desk was great at other times so perhaps it was just the late shift…
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. I'm glad you had a good stay in our Hotel and we apologized for your experience at check-in. We hope that you visit us again soon! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Room not perfect, but great location/service.
Summary: If I could’ve done, I would’ve given the stay 3.5/5, rather than 4, as there were a couple of things that made the stay less than perfect, however, they’re primarily down to the design/build of the hotel.  Firstly, the room we were in felt slightly damp, all the time, we were there - I couldn’t work out why, but towels and clothes, etc that had become wet, through swimming and Splash Mountain rides, didn’t really dry, at all; not something I’ve ever experienced before, in an air-conditioned room.  Secondly, much of the floor area of the rooms has laminate on it, so the noise from the room above, as well as from others around, really travelled. There are signs in the room, asking guests to be respectful of others, but walking round your room, is something that’s a necessity and,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. I'm glad most of your stay in our Hotel was pleasant and we value your feedback. We thank you for staying with us, have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Excellent service by Anthony Delgado and Erika. I love staying here because the staff are truly efficient and courteous. It’s also the perfect location from Disneyland. We could even watch the fireworks from our room. What made this trip special was the awesome service I got from Anthony who personally inspected and made sure our rooms were clean and who even went out of his way to ship my sunglasses which I left behind. Love this place
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review. I'm glad  you had a wonderful stay at our Hotel, and our staff delivered great service all around. We hope that you and your family visit us again soon! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Recently stayed for 4 nights as a family of 6 in a suite booked through Booking.com and paid an extra for £200 for breakfast rate.  When checking in I was informed by the lady on the front desk that breakfast was only for 2 people per day! No where in the booking conditions did it state that breakfast wasn’t for whole party. That is one of the main reasons I booked this hotel.  I found the receptionist to be a little rude and patronising about it.  Having said that the hotel itself was clean and the pool was lovely. Also only a 15/20 walk from Disney so I would of given higher rating if the breakfast issue had been sorted out or made clear before booking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was well kept and staff were fabulous as usual. We have been to this hotel several times. This time we had some housekeeping challenges. While it wasn’t fixed immediately hotel staff eventually made it right.  We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear TiggerTrainer: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience. I'm sorry you had issues with the room service but I'm glad the rest of your stay was great. We hope that you visit us again soon! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: I have been at the top level of IHG rewards for over 15 years and this is the best and friendlinest IHG hotel staff I have encountered .  The amenities are nice. The restaurant is excellent and the location is unbelievable . It’s walking distance from so many things!  I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Emeraldpond: First of all we like to thank you again for being a loyal IHG Rewards member and for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We are pleased to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We hope to see you again in the near future!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights & it was a great hotel. One issue we had though was that the “included” breakfast only covered the 2 adults & not the 4 children. When we booked, we specifically looked for a place where breakfast was included as it is obviously a large added expense to feed 6 people 3 meals out per day for a week.   Jose at the hotel restaurant was amazing. Had our coffees ready for us as soon as he saw us walking in.
Manager Response: Dear V9171NKkarend: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I'm sorry that you had a issue with the breakfast package, all our breakfast packages only included 2 breakfast vouchers per day, regardless of how many people are in a a room, I'm sorry that Booking.com misled you on that part. Next time I suggest using another company to book a room or you can always book directly with the Hotel. Have a great week!  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Our stay at Hotel Indigo was everything we could have have asked for and more, we arrived early at the property and thanks to the friendly FD Agent Samuel were able to check in early and get some rest before heading to the park we were able to also grab some amazing breakfast and had exceptional service from Karin throughout our stay Samuel also checked in with us every morning before we left to the park to make sure our stay was going well and took our housekeeping requests Rooms were super clean and the beds were just like sleeping at home. I usually don’t leave reviews but this hotel definitely deserved it. Thank you Hotel Indigo We will definitely be coming back
Manager Response: Dear melindad929: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your Hotel experience. We are glad we were able to accommodate you early and that Karin and Samuel made your stay a great one. We hope that you and your family visit us again soon! Have a great week! Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Everything at this hotel was fantastic, friendly front desk staff, clean, daily room refresh, restaurant breakfast service and food were A plus.  So many stores and restaurants within a minutes walk. Disneyland was a 13 minute walk away.  Always felt safe in the area.  The bed is the bed of my dreams, staff went out of their way to let me know it’s a Simmons beauty rest mattress.
Manager Response: Dear Trp262049: Thank you so much for the great review. I'm glad you had an enjoyable and comfortable stay with us We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great day!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: My husband and I were lucky enough to find this place on our first trip to Disneyland together and we will never stay anywhere else. It’s less than a 15 minute walk to the park and the staff absolutely makes our stay as easy as possible. Comfortable beds and a slightly retro feel. Lots of great restaurants in the area for delivery or pick up. What more could you want! See you next time, Indigo!
Manager Response: Dear Trip26022368817:  We like to thank you for the wonderful review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at our Hotel. We hope to see you and your husband soon in the near future!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: The property seems to be on the newer end, clean and quiet rooms. Easy check in and check in. Cleofe  Anthony at the desk were welcoming and helpful. Leticia the housekeeper did a great job with the room. Laundry facility available $3 for washer $3 for dryer.
Manager Response: Dear 839var:  Thank you so much for the review. We are happy to know that your stay with us was a comfortable one and we will let our housekeeping and front office team know about your comments. Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Room and property is clean and well maintained. Professional and courteous staff. Cleofe, Anthony and Omar are always happy to help which made the stay welcoming. Complimentary parking was a plus and only 10-15mins walk from Disney!
Manager Response: Dear 329lemuelm:  Thank you so much for the great review. We are glad you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland. I've stayed three times this past year and love it! Samuel and Anthony are both amazing employees. They're gracious, helpful, and always go the extra mile. I truly enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Dear LauraBarks:  We are happy to know that our staff made your stay more enjoyable, thank you for your kind review. We hope to see you again in the near future!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: You can tell the difference in service!!
Summary: From John who over the phone helped me with getting two beds and from the front desk staff Anthony and Ericka I believe - it’s such a difference of properties- I loved the service they were kind and so sweet!!!! They truly made our stay there enjoyable!
Manager Response: Dear Kityboxx: Thank you the great review! We are happy to know that your stay with us was a great one and we will let our Front Office Team know about your kind comments. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: The customer service at the front desk was so above and beyond -- thank you Samuel A. for all of your help! The hotel itself was excellent as well and exactly what we needed for a trip to Disneyland. A huge thank you to the staff for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Hello BarbaraJ1084  Thank you for the great review. We are happy to know that you had an excellent stay and we will let Samuel know about your positive comments. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: We travel to Disneyland about 4 to 5 times per year.  We stay at IHG properties because I accrue points for my business travel. We usually have stayed at a nearby Holiday Inn Express.  Well...not anymore.  This time staying at the Indigo Suites they have totally blown Holiday Inn Express out of the water.  The customer service at this hotel is simply amazing.  Anthony at the front desk checked us in, he greeted me as a Diamond Elite member and made sure that all of our requests were met to the letter.  We checked in and in our room was a handwritten note welcoming us and a nice stainless steel water bottle.  It is really the little things that matter and Indigo Suites has nailed it across the board.  This is our new favorite place to stay near Disneyland and...they don't charge
Manager Response: Dear Cindy F.  First of all we like to thank you again for being a loyal IHG Rewards Diamond Elite member and for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We are pleased to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We hope to see you again in the near future! Have a great rest of your week  Best wishes  Omar Ballon Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Pretty sub-par compared to other hotels in the area
Summary: Very inconsistent front desk staff... some are friendly whilst others can't be bothered to say a basic welcome. The rooms are old and the showers in particular are in dire need of renovations. To make matters worse, IHG benefits at this property are ridiculous, mainly consisting of complimentary water even for top tier members. The only great aspect of this hotel is the breakfast cafe where the staff is super nice and attentive and the food is tasty.
Manager Response: Dear Private G.  I'm sorry to see you encountered some issues during your stay and the condition of the room was not up to your standards. I have notified our management team, and we will be using your review to improve our rooms and the quality of service.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for our property.  Best wishes  Omar Ballon Front Office Manager

Summary: As a family, 5 of us, we stayed in a family studio suite. The room was very nice, updated, clean and comfortable. I like that you don’t hear the neighbors through the walls! Every encounter we had with any staff member was positive …from the room service ladies to the waiter at breakfast to the front desk staff. A few people I can specifically remember making our experience a positive one was Ericka and Jaime at check in and Jose at breakfast. Thank you guys very much. My sons and myself appreciated your kindness. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello BoymomX3_529  Thank you so much for the lovely review. I'm glad  you and your kids had a wonderful stay in our most popular suite, and our staff delivered great service all around. We hope that you and your family visit us again soon! Have a great week!  Best wishes  Omar Ballon - Front Office Manager

Summary: We requested a crib at the time of booking. We checked in at 3:30 and again asked for a crib to be sent up to the room. They said fine but after waiting for 20 minutes without anyone coming I had to call down.   Turns out they were out of cribs. Excuse given was that it was first come first serve. I wouldn’t have known if I hadn’t called again. So I asked how many people checked in before us since we checked in soon after the allowable time. They said it was from people staying from the night before. Turns out they have only five cribs. For a hotel near Disneyland, that is woefully unprepared.   There was zero effort to try to find a solution. We
Manager Response: Hi dagongster,  I'm sorry to see you encountered some issues during your stay. I have notified our management, and we will be using your review to improve our quality of service.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for our property. We can't wait to host you again and show you all the improvements. I have also sent you a private message in case you wish to add any details or need additional support.  Alejandro G. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Our family has stayed at quite a few hotels over the years but the staff at Indigo Anaheim, we're outstanding.  Mrs. Erica, went above and beyond in accommodating all our needs before and after check-in. Well worth the price, and the distance to Disney was only a 13 minute walk! We will be staying here from now on for any trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are spacious and the staff are super friendly and helpful! It's also super close to Disneyland - within walking distance. I've stayed here before and I would highly recommend it to everyone!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: IHG Should use this team as the Model for ALL their properties
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel on many occasions and each time I have been blown away with staff service and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure my stay was perfect. Danny the GM & Erica @ front desk are genuine and caring and their assistance and attentiveness can not be understated.  I have stayed with family for leisure and Disney is a 10 minute stroll. I have also stayed when in town for business and the rooms are always clean & well supplied. I highly reccomend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My check-in Date was Wednesday Feb 2nd  at 3pm, but I had tickets for California Adventure. I had called the hotel the day before and asked if I could park my car there while I went to Disney CA adventure. They said yes! I would be doing a pre-check in. I thought that was so convenient that way I didn't have to pay for Disney parking else where. I probably could have left leave my luggage there at the hotel, I probably could have if I'd ask, but I had no problem leaving my things in my car. Parking is under a parking garage and you needed a key to get into the underground parking garage, I felt my car was safe. I really thought I would have to leave the park at 3pm to check in, but they said when I was done with my visit at California Adventure that I would just come to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying at this property.  It’s clean, staff are professional, and a great price.  Close proximity to Disneyland.  We walked back and forth with no problems.  Each way took 15 minutes or so.   The only hang up we has was the water temperature in the shower.  The hottest we could get it was luke warm.  I saw reviews about this, but brushed them off.  However it did bug me a bit.  Overall it was a good stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel indigo has great managers! We had a problem that was making our stay difficult, I talked with john who was working the front desk that night and he took care of us then and there.  It made our visit to Disneyland that much more enjoyable thanks to his help.  Thanks John!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing stay here at hotel indigo! Staff was very friendly and rooms were very clean! Super close drive to Honda center and also right around the corner from Disney! All amenities were thought out and the rooms were clean and quiet. Housekeeping was very helpful in attending anything I needed. Definitely recommend this hotel and will be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love this Hotel because is close to anything you want. You can walk to Disneyland if you are going there. Has a nice restaurant. And the staff, is friendly . My room was nice , very very clean. Everything on its place. Great housekeeping. Friendly and respectfull. Ready to help. With a smile at you. If you need something they will help you . Great hotel.  I will come back. Free parking, free wife. Great job all of you. Thank you hotel Indigo Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: My family and I stayed at Hotel Indigo Anaheim our last trip to Disney. So close to the parks we could walk. The staff here was super friendly and went above and beyond to make our stay perfect.  At check in the hotel staff noticed we were celebrating my birthday and even wrote a birthday greeting in our key card. Loved that the hotel offers free parking! I am not aware of any other hotels in Anaheim that do that. Our room was spacious, clean and had nice products in the room. Beds were comfortable and pillows had one soft and one firm pillow for each person. I would stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I have stayed at Hotel Indigo a number of times over the past few years. As avid Disney fans, you can’t beat the proximity to the parks. Add that to the amazing staff and comfortable rooms and you absolutely cannot beat it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are frequent Disneyland travelers and we try many different hotels in the area. I can’t give this hotel more than an average rating. Check-in was fine and parking is free. One of the few “good neighbor” hotels left with free parking. The first room we received had a broken A/C unit. Instead of offering a room upgrade, they moved us to a different room and while that A/C unit worked, it sounded like a helicopter. Seriously. Again, no accommodations offered other than moving us to a higher floor. The room was fine. Due to Covid, we already know hotels aren’t operating like normal. They gave us a housekeeping card to fill out but didn’t say what to do with it so we filled it out and left it in the room. Upon coming back from Disney for a break, we found no housekeeping took
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are regular Disney visitors and were looking forward to trying this hotel for the first time for our recent October 2021 trip. We had read great reviews and it looks great from the outside. Bottom Line: Hotel Indigo is just average and we would not stay there again. While the pictures look great, it does not look the same in-person. It's definitely an older feeling hotel with a facelift, but still has that old hotel smell :( Biggest Pro: Location was within walking distance to Disney and they were flexible with some of our last minute changes regarding our dates of stay. Biggest Con: The shower was SCALDING hot and you couldn't take a shower. Our skin was bright red and the water felt boiling hot! And this is coming from someone who LOVES a hot shower.  After a long day at
Manager Response: Hello Akhite,  Thank you for your stay and for taking the time to leave us feedback.   We're determined to make all aspects of your stay pleasant, and I am sorry to learn that the shower water pressure fell below expectations. Along with your observations about the room condition. I have alerted the hotel management regarding your comments. I am positive that the measures that will be taken will avoid similar issues from reoccurring in the future.  I hope you choose us again!  Best regards,  Clayton G. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: My husband and I’ve spent last weekend at the hotel Indigo Anaheim. We have stayed at this property numerous times in the past. It is our go to hotel when we are visiting the Disneyland resort. Everybody that works there are extremely friendly and helpful, and that is why we keep coming back. This visit was extra special because my husband checked in while I sat in the car. Unbeknownst to me, he told the staff that it was my birthday. We left the hotel and spent the day at Disneyland. When we came back and got our keys to our room, my husband opened the door and the staff had decorated it for my birthday!  It really made me feel like a special guest at the hotel. The room was spotless, the air-conditioning worked great, and the bathroom had enough towels and toiletries for our
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Solid chain option close to Disneyland
Summary: Though there’s no shortage of lodging in Anaheim, it’s more difficult to find a decent chain hotel within a reasonable distance to Disneyland (that doesn’t charge an arm and a leg) than you would think.  I chose Indigo for its proximity and relative affordability, a combination that was difficult to find at other properties in the area.  The hotel is a manageable, straightforward walk to Disneyland (about 10 minutes to the intersection, 15 minutes to the gates).  Between GardenWalk and the main intersection, there are plenty of dining and convenience store options nearby to save some money outside of the parks.  The vibe of the property was a slightly more glam Holiday Inn (which I’m assuming is intended as they both fall under the IHG umbrella).  The hotel definitely felt more
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are so beautiful, spacious and clean! My friends and I were so impressed with how comfortable our stay was.  Breakfast was also fast and delicious. The fact that the entrance of Disneyland is only a short walk from the hotel was incredibly convenient and saved us a lot of time and money that would have been wasted on parking…
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great and clean hotel. Definitely we will stay again next time around.
Summary: Worked out great for our stay at Disney. The hotel is within walking distance to the park's entrance.  Rooms were clean and staff was very friendly.  We had such a comfortable stay there that we will definitely stay again next time around.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Save Your Money for Churros and Mickey Ears!
Summary: I had a big checklist of things we needed when planning for our trip...I wanted a hotel room with 2 separate sleeping areas (to allow privacy for another couple), a pool, close to the airport, walking distance to Disney, free parking and oh yah, all for under $250 a night.  Hotel Indigo delivered all that AND with amazing customer service!!  Check in was easy.  Front desk staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful.  Parking was underground and safe, in fact the whole area felt safe and secure.  Lots of restaurants, pharmacies, shops etc nearby.    The walk to Disney was under a mile and super easy to navigate.  The walk home, after a day in the park, was a little tougher on the feet. We took an Uber back one day when we needed to leave the park for a break from the heat.  It
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Close to Disney. Just ok otherwise.
Summary: A decent hotel that is a bit worn these days. Best feature is that it’s close enough to walk to Disney. You also get to hear the traffic on the main road. Tiny postage stamp pool and hot tub are available as well as a cooler with drinks up front. The cafe is only open for breakfast so not much choice there. Your basic 3 star.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Let me start off stating the staff here is abundantly friendly and absolutely wonderful. We were able to pre-check in so that our room keys would just be ready for us when we got back from our dinner and Scott was even nice enough to cone off a parking spot for us since our truck would not fit well in the underground garage and I am disabled and need the room to get out.   If I was not disabled, this review might read a little differently on a few of the points. But I am disabled and we specifically booked a handicap accessible room so that is my expectation.  As much as I wanted to love this hotel and be able to give it a glowing review, that was not my experience.  The lobby was large enough with automatic doors so the lobby is accessible, the rooms themselves though are not
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay for our Wedding Celebration!
Summary: What can I say about the hotel, it was nothing short of WONDERFUL! The staff truly made the whole experience so smooth and enjoyable for our wedding stay. We reserved hotel rooms for our wedding party and it was the best choice! They were kind enough to upgrade my room to a suite which was PERFECT for when me and my girls were getting ready.   The hotel lobby and rooms were very clean, and it felt very safe (esp since it was our first hotel stay since the pandemic started). It's also walking distance from Anaheim Gardenwalk and Disneyland. It is in the perfect location.   I was thoroughly impressed by the staff and the hotel. They knew our names, and were very accommodating. Hotel Indigo is definitely on my top 5 list, guaranteed. Thank you, Hotel Indigo, for being a part of our
Manager Response: none

Summary: We’ve never stayed off Disney property before, but needed something more budget-friendly this trip. We couldn’t be more happy with our decision to stay at Hotel Indigo. Everyone we encountered was so nice and we felt truly welcome. Our room was ready, even though we arrived well before 3:00. The room was modern, clean and quiet with comfy beds and a great shower. The dining room was only open for breakfast, but the food was good the one morning we tried it.  The free underground parking felt very secure. The walk to Disneyland was an easy 10 minutes.  All around wonderful stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worth the stay! Super close to Disneyland!
Summary: We had such a nice stay at the hotel. The staff was beyond helpful. Loved having a pool and cuzi to play in. They kept it open till 10pm, which rocked! Hotel room was clean and cute. Loved the showers too. They recently opened their Cafe, which was greatly appreciated for a quick bite to go on our way to Disneyland.  The walk to the park was really easy! Took us all of 10 minutes to get there by foot, even with a stroller.  The Disneyland convenience paired with the price and quality of the hotel exceeded our expectations. We like to visit the parks frequently and now that they are open again, I see many Indigo Hotel stays in our future!  Highly recommend 👌
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean and smelled great! Lots of amenities and short walk to Disney! Right next to the Anaheim garden walk so you have plenty of options for food and entertainment! Hotel is doing a great job to meet COVID-19 guidelines and keep all guest safe! Will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always stay in this great hotel, because is very Friendly, Courteous people, is close to everything you need, free parking , very clean rooms. I like the decorations. Very organize. What ever you ask to the staff . They help you. Great housekeeping friendly ,smiling, and great people. This is my favorite Hotel .
Manager Response: none

Summary: I never write these things but feel the need to warn potential customers. Oscar (front desk manager) needs to be fired or retrained. Extremely unprofessional and NOT knowledgeable. First, he told me that they don’t have Apple Pay and looked at me like I was crazy for suggesting it, yet when I called the day of and spoke with another employee, she assured me they do, but the system was down…not to mention their website shows Apple Pay as an option. She then told me that they should have the system completed the next day, which they did not. When I went to buy food at the front, Oscar told me I could charge it to my room but needed my card number. As the transaction went through he then charged my card an EXTRA DEPOSIT OF 100, even though I already got charged the 100 the first
Manager Response: Hi X9737KImadelinem,   Thank you for sharing your experience from your recent stay.   We want to provide a unique hotel experience and exceptional service. I'm sorry that your stay wasn't fulfilling due to the issues with the service of our managing staff and the extra charges incurred. It is certainly not the experience we want our guests to have. I have sent you a private message to get more details to help you further.  Thank you for letting us know about your experience. We're looking forward to your prompt response.  Regards,   Virgil N. Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: Pretty, deluxe, and cozy spot with covered gated parking.
Summary: This is the most stayed-at spot for me during the pandemic since 2020.  They take great care of me and my guests.    I've been in pretty much every room type - depends on where they put me.  Studios feel very small. 1 BR Suites are 600 sq ft - so try to get one. You get a deluxe finished wooden floor in the studios or suites.  There are no microwaves in the rooms but you get a mini fridge and keurig coffee maker. An underrated feature of this property is that you also get  covered parking on a prime spot on Katella.   Restaurants, CVS, Walgreen within immediate walking distance.  Hallways smell lemon fresh coming from some sort of air purifiers running 24x7 - this is very nice due to trash being placed in hallway.  They have a functional jacuzzi, pool, and fitness center. They
Manager Response: Dear Pphanfx  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay with us. We are overjoyed to hear that you have chosen our location as your go to IHG hotel in Anaheim. We feel very proud that you enjoyed the overall cleanliness of our hotel as well as the spacious suits we have to offer. We hope to see you again in the future for any of your Anaheim stay needs. Have a great day, we will see you soon!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I live locally and was pleased to stay at Hotel Indigo in early December while my house was being fumigated. My 2 night stay at Indigo allowed me to walk to Downtown Disney and Buena Vista Street in about 20'. All receptionists were friendly and helpful, but I'd like to especially thank Claire, with whom I checked in and checked out! When checking in she was able to help me find a room that was just right for me, due to a room map on the wall just behind the reception! I wonder why more hotels don't post such a map. Speaking of rooms: from reading reviews beforehand, and from personal experience while at the hotel, I suggest that guests wanting to avoid noise request a top (4th) floor room and avoid rooms located on Katella Avenue. The underground parking, at no cost, was safe
Manager Response: Dear ZmanCalifornia   Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay with us. We are overjoyed to hear that you appreciated the short walk to Downtown Disney and Bueno Vista st as well as our free underground parking. We hope to see you again in the future for any of your Anaheim stay needs. Have a great day, we will see you soon!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: So we decided we had to get out of the house and do "something" for my birthday! We decided to go to our favorite hotel in Anaheim and we were impressed. They followed stringent covid practices from arrival to check out. Staff was very courteous and excited to be back to work! My husband is dying to know what the scent is that they use in the lobby, I think he needs to ask the front desk next time and maybe they can reveal their secrets. We look forward to the rest of Anaheim opening soon.
Manager Response: Dear Steve M  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a  nice review about your time with us! We are so glad that you choose the Hotel Indigo Anaheim for your COVID birthday! We love to hear that our location not only met your needs but our staff was courteous and excited to help you! We hope to see you again in the future when Disneyland re-opens for another birthday celebration!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Thanks for putting the guest first
Summary: I can’t thank Hotel Indigo enough for their patience and generosity. After two days at Disneyland our two year old got super duper sick. We ended up needing clean linens, and the front desk was always patient and prompt to respond. Even when it turned into multiple requests. It became pretty clear that we were all getting sick, so we decided the best thing to do was to leave a day early. Long story short, Hotwire was stinky about the travel insurance and refused to refund us for the last day of our reservation. They said the only way to get our money back was if the hotel was willing to do it on their own. I called the manager, explained the situation, and thanked them for taking such good care of us already, and they said they’d be happy to refund us for our unused night. So
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us! While we are so sorry that you became ill at Disneyland we are overjoyed to hear that our staff was able to accommodate your family with all the fresh linens and towels you would need. We always strive to be fair and as accommodating with refunds as possible and we are very pleased that we could settle that issue for you. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any booking needs.   Best Wishes

Summary: Comfortable bed, good sized room and bathroom.  Bathroom had a weird smell, not sure if it was damp or mould.  Walking distance to Disneyland.   Parking at the hotel included in our room rate.  Friendly staff
Manager Response: Hello there Leannes  Thanks a lot for taking the time to review our Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We'll make sure to review that bathroom but of course I'm delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will also be forwarding your review to the management for reference, and in the meantime I want to thank you for choosing us for your stay, we look forward to seeing you again and show you the adjustments done.  In the meantime, please stay safe and healthy during these difficult times.  Alejandro G. Case Manager. IHGService.

Summary: We booked this hotel through Hotwire as a hot rate, so we didn’t know what hotel we were getting. We have stayed at many hotels in Anaheim, some good, some not-this was by far the best we have stayed at yet. The room was huge and VERY clean. The bathroom was incredibly clean, also huge and very well stocked with towels and toiletries. Downstairs there was a full service bar and restaurant and a lounge on the second floor. The staff was SO friendly and helpful. Parking felt very safe as it was underground and gated. We were so close to the park that walking was no problem. We can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Americahunnt13  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms spacious and comfortable as well as the close proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I would to take this opportunity to thank Hotel Indigo’s manager and staff for their understanding during this Coronavirus crisis. We stayed in this hotel back in November 2019 and January 2020. We actually booked a reservation for the Memorial Day weekend because we had a great experience during our previous visits. Unfortunately, Coronavirus Pandemic happened and we called them to cancel our reservation due to the uncertainties. We were able to cancel without any problems and the manager even mentioned we are welcome to rebook anytime in the future when we are ready. I can attest that they are very accommodating and customer oriented. We will definitely stay there again when everything is settled and of course when Disneyland is open.
Manager Response: Dear Rhanann  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review. With such uncertain and ever-changing times we have to be understanding and accommodating to our guest. We know that everyone is facing a difficult time and we are here to make this portion of your lives stress free. We hope that you will book with us in the future when everything is back to normal. Please stay safe and healthy we will get through this!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Great location! Clean rooms! Wonderful, hospitable service! AND they decorated our room and had a treat bag waiting for my daughter to celebrate her 8th birthday!!  Easy walk to Disneyland. Hot tub was an added bonus and the onsite restaurant had reasonably priced food with friendly service. They definitely extended that Disney magic to their hotel. Will definitely stay here again!💯
Manager Response: Dear 979Alliw   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this beautiful review about your experience with us! We are so glad that your daughter enjoyed the little extras we out into your room! It sounds like you really had a chance to enjoy all the hotel had to offer! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Booked a last minute trip to Disneyland and Hotel Indigo still had availability. I’ve stayed at a couple of these hotels in the country and this one didn’t let us down. The beds were comfy, everything seem clean. They was a little bit of a musty smell but we got over it. The only real negative was the shower would constantly leak. Free WiFi, and I believe free parking but you don’t need a car for Disneyland. It’s a pleasant 15 minutes walk into the park. A closer hotel to the parks would be nice for afternoon breaks but if the price was right, I’d definitely stay here again. We didn’t partake in breakfast as Disney has pretty good food. Our flight got in us early and we were at the hotel at 9am, a room wasn’t ready which I didn’t expect. They said they’d send a text when the
Manager Response: Dear Emmaxoxo  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us. We are so glad to hear you found the rooms comfortable and the walk convenient! I am so sorry that the shower leaked we will take a look at your reservation and send maintenance up to fix it today!  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs! Have a great rest o your week  Best wishes  Hotel Management

Summary: I can not say enough good things about this hotel! First of all, it is in a perfect location! About a 10 minute quick walk to the entrance of Disneyland. Second, our room was sparkling clean and had the most comfortable beds ever. Third, we had amazing customer service. From check in to check out, the staff was amazing. I especially want to recognize Jordan C. at the front desk when we checked out this morning (3/4/20). He was super friendly and very personable.    **bonus! The restaurant, Chambers Bistro has a very yummy breakfast. We did not have the chance to try their lunch or dinner but we enjoyed our breakfast!   We are already planning our next stay here. Highly recommend Hotel Indigo. They are also very reasonably priced. Thank you for such a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Chelsyea2020  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this glowing review of your stay! We love to hear that you appreciated the close proximity of our hotel to the Disneyland park. It really sounds like you had a chance to check out all we have to offer including our delicious breakfast options. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future bookings (make sure to ask for Jordan!)   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: A most excellent place to stay.
Summary: We've stayed in many hotels in the Disneyland area over the years, and this is quickly becoming a favorite of ours. We stayed mid week the last week of February as they had some of the best rates around. And you simply can't beat the free parking! The rooms are super nice with excellent bathrooms. The shower - wonderful. Our room did face Katella and yes, you do hear traffic (although it didn't really bother us), but the rooms have a noise cancelling device that really helps drown out the noise. And the staff - absolutely fantastic. I seriously can't say more positive things about them, they truly make you feel welcomed and do everything to make your stay special.  If you're looking for a not too huge hotel that's within walking distance of the Disney parks, give the Hotel
Manager Response: Dear Olympicnut  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed the whole hotel. It really seems like you had a chance to enjoy all the amenities on site! It makes us so happy to hear you enjoyed the rooms and little extras we have placed like white noise machines. We pride ourselves on creating a "family" type experience for our guests which make you feel welcomed and at ease! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!    Hotel Management

Summary: First off the staff is amazing. Jordon at the front desk made us feel welcome and special every morning. Jose in the restaurant took care of us for breakfast every morning. Second the location is great proximity to Disneyland making an easy walk. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Justansara  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us! We love hearing that our staff was beyond friendly and courteous! We will be sure to pass along the compliments to both Jorden and Jose! We hope that you will visit us again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: What I liked:* Close to Disney* Free Parking* Friendly Employees* Good Food What I did not like:NOTHING Comments:I have never stayed at a hotel where the workers were so friendly.The General Manager was passing out newspapers!
Manager Response: Dear DisneyFanNumber1  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Our close proximity to Disneyland is definitely one of our favorite perks! Thank you for letting us know that the food, staff and even free parking all added to an amazing experience! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best wishes Hotel management

Summary: Our biggest issue was that the hotel is situated right on a busy boulevard, and that was the side where our room was located. Was like trying to sleep right  beside an airport runway. To drown out the sound, we tried turning up the ancient ac/heating unit, locate by the window. That was a disaster because it was placed in such a way as to to blow cold air directly at us in bed.   So neither of us slept. We regretted not paying a little more to go to a nicer place. The staff, however, was friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Greg2U  Thank you for taking the time to bring this issues to our attention, we at the Hotel Indigo appreciate all guests feedback good or bad. We are very sorry that the room you got was noisy. Being on one of the main streets of Anaheim can have its ups and downs. We have placed white noise machines in all rooms on the Katella side in an effort to lessen the sound from the street but we know that does not always work for everyone. We would love the chance to earn you business back and invite you to call us directly for any future rooming needs. Again thank you for bringing these issues to our attention and have a great week.  Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay Disney Standard’s :)
Summary: What a nice surprise for the price we paid.   This hotel was amazing.  Rooms were big for a family of four.  Super clean and the staff is amazing.  Felt like they worked for Disney of how every single person went out of their way to help and answer any questions.  I wish we had more time to stay at this hotel.  Great stay and would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Greysc2014  Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to write such a lovely review of your time with us! We are so glad that you found our property to be warm and inviting! Our main goal is to always make sure we are friendly, helpful and attentive to the needs of our guests. We look forward to your next visit and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Excellent choice when visiting Disneyland, renovated rooms with comfortable beds, decent storage, great bathroom, coffee machine and parking is included in the room rate. A ten minute walk to the parks, and bunch of restaurants on the doorstep made the location ideal. Not a problem for us, as we were in the parks all day, but the pool and lounger area looked very small.
Manager Response: Dear KTREngland   Thank you so much for the review of your time with us. We are always happy to hear that our Hotel not only met your sleeping needs but also the proximity to Disney, shop's and restaurants was ideal for your time with us! We love to hear that the free parking and no resort fee was a big bonus as well. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any booking needs!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Walking Distance to Disney
Summary: This is a great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.  We booked the package which includes breakfast.  It was a great deal because we got 2 vouchers for breakfast per night we stayed.  The vouchers can be used for any item off the breakfast menu in the restaurant downstairs.  This was wonderful since it was a freshly cooked breakfast, unlike the complementary breakfast buffets at other hotels.    The rooms are spacious and come with a mini-fridge and keurig (yes!).  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  Overall, we had a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear LovesVacay   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review about your time with us! We are so glad that you had a chance to take advantage of our breakfast package. Since our breakfast is cooked fresh to order it always guaranteed fresh and delicious! It sounds like you also really enjoyed the spacious rooms as well as in room amenities (we are coffee obsessed too). We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: we had made reservations at another hotel, but there was an error and we made last minute reservations with Mimi at indigo Hotel.  we had a great stay!  I recommend very highly.  Thank you for saving our vacation
Manager Response: Dear F2488KCkaram   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review about your time with us! We are really happy that Mimi was able to save your vacation with a last minute booking here. We always strive to go above and beyond for any guest and make your time with us relaxing and easy. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel was very accommodating, we were a 20+ person team and they treated us very well. They served us a set breakfast almost every day. The beds were pretty comfortable as well. One person kept deactivating cards, and the staff was nice enough to keep giving us new ones.
Manager Response: Dear 23eryks  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us! We love working with groups and always do our best to make these stays as easy and carefree as possible! We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast set up we did for your group each day! We hope that your group will come back next year for Nationals, have a great weekend!  Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed six nights and had no complaints. The staff is extremely friendly, helped in any way they could. They have a nice little bar and restaurant, great service. We had some Tacos on Tuesday, cheap and delicious! They have a full bar, so we had drinks a few nights after coming back from Disney Land. We had a suite, I am not sure if all rooms are? But our room was wonderful, had pretty much everything you would need, with the exception of no micro wave. They did have a small refrigerator, two TV's, safe, nice walk in shower, really nice. The room and hotel was very clean. I would recommend the top floor, you could hear people walking above us since there are hardwood floors. We had a rental SUV for a couple days, parking under the hotel was easy and plenty of spots for a
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer0213   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review about your time with us! It really sounds like you had a chance to enjoy the amenities we have to offer. From our walk in showers to the taco Tuesday deal, it seems like you really got to try it all! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs. Have a great weekend!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The best hotel , my favorite staying, friendly, courteus staff. Free parking spaces, wify, great housekeeping job. Room is perfect orginize and clean, very clean,. Friendly and good manners housekeeping. This is my favorite hotel.  Thank you all.
Manager Response: Dear Carlos B  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a glowing review about your time with us! We are very happy to hear that our location met all of your rooming needs. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Everyone I met throughout my stay was nice and attentive. They were always with a smile and ready to give you some small bottles of water in the lobby. Though service is limited and there is no bell service, I still enjoyed my stay.   The room is very spacious and nicely decorated. The bathroom is at a great size and very clean. I have everything I need for a comfortable stay. I love coffee and I am always happy to see there is a coffee making machine available in my room.   It was a great experience. I will definitely stay here again when I come back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Missteeteecee   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us! We are overjoyed that you were pleased with the level of service the staff put out. It is always our #1 goal to make our guests as comfortable and carefree as possible. It sounds like you really had a chance to check out all amenities our location has to offer ( we love our morning coffee too!) We cant wait to see you again and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs.  Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: It does nt get any better I've been staying here since it was The Holiday Inn Maingate even when it was under construction ,most of the staff has been there for years and management takes a  personal interest  Ill be seeing them in 2021
Manager Response: dear e7241JVanthonyl   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review about your time with us. We are so glad that you choose the Hotel Indigo as your go to hotel in Anaheim! We are so glad that you keep coming back year after year. Please fell free to call us directly for any future booking needs. We will see you in 2021!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: My family goes to Disneyland regularly and we have sampled several of the hotels in the area. This is our second stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and we think this is the best one so far. The location is ideal, 10 minute walk to Disneyland and 3 minute walk to great restaurants at the Gardenwalk. The rooms are clean and the staff are accommodating. The food is amazing and we always look forward to having breakfast before starting our day. We are already planning on coming back during the Memorial day weekend and we will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear StararsDad123  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review about your time with us. We are so glad that you and your family not only enjoy our close proximity to the Disneyland park but also the food and rooms! It is always our goal to create a small home away from home for our guests. We can not wait to see you again over memorial day weekend and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs!  Have a fantastic weekend and May The Force Be With You!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: When I look for a staycation with the family near Disneyland there are a few “must haves” and the hotel indigo checks all the boxes! Number one is proximity to Disney and other restaurants, it’s location is perfect! Ten-fifteen minute walk to the gate; about ten minutes to all the restaurants nearby. Number two is onsite amenities, I need a fitness center and a nice hot tub or even regular tub after a long day at the park! All are clean, surprisingly not that crowded even on the weekend I stayed.  Adding to the need for onsite amenities, I always look for a dependable restaurant/bar. The bartender, Jesus, makes a fantastic cocktail. The waffles for breakfast and the burger for lunch are my go to, they won’t disappoint when you’re about to walk off all those extra calories.
Manager Response: Dear Snycry   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review about your time with us. We are so glad that you and your nephew had an amazing time at our location. We strive to create a carefree and relaxing atmosphere that caters to kids and adults alike! Our front desk staff loves to give out small facts about Disneyland and love hearing them being shared! We cant wait to see you again in then future and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Sunny california was a blast!  Being from seattle we wanted sunny weather and sunny we got.  Indigo Hotel Inn was a cool surprise.  I never heard of it before, but the staff was great and the rooms were spacious and clean.  It was about a 10 minute walk to the disney parks.  It was our first time at california adventure.  You need a full day at each park at least.  The food at the hotel was very good.  We can't wait to go back to Indigo and Cali.
Manager Response: Dear 2020mando   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of our property and your time with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here. It really sounds like you had a chance to enjoy all the benefits our property had to offer. We are so glad that you will be coming back for your next California visit and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: hOTEL indigo was a nice hotel.  Check-in was fast and the staff were friendly.  The rooms were standard size, but clean.  Small pool, but we were able to view Disney's fireworks from the pool area.  Did not try the restaurant, but the food smelled great!  Parking is free, walking distance to Disneyland with lots of restaurants on the way.  I recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Z5627MCdanielg  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed the firework view from our pool (its one of our favorite hotel features!). It really sounds like you had a chance to enjoy all the hotel had to offer restaurant aside! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs!   PS: Try the chicken and waffles next time they are to die for!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Friendly staff, very accommodating. The entire staff was always smiling and helpful to our every request. Rooms were very clean and they were able to arrange all of our rooms on the same floor close together at the very last minute.
Manager Response: Dear Mixtel  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us. We are so glad that you found our staff both welcoming and friendly. and we where able to keep you close to your party. We strive to create a family like atmosphere here and always try and go above and beyond for all our valued guests. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs. Have a wonderful rest of your week.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Loved this hotel as it was only a few years old. If you’re fussy like me then stay in hotels that aren’t too old. Clean, comfy, bathrooms are mold free. Great Customer Service. Walking distance to Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Maxinecolettea   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your time with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed the newly remodeled look and feel of our location as well as a friendly and inviting staff and easy walk to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs. Have a fantastic rest of your week!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Amazing service from staff!!!!! They microwaved our leftovers from lunch and brought them to our room when my son was sick. They carried our bags to the car, etc. Perfect location for Disneyland. Can’t be beat!
Manager Response: Dear Mammaisontheinternet   Thank you so much for your review of your time with us! We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here. It makes us very happy to hear that all of your needs where met while enjoying our facilities. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for future booking inquiries!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The Hotel Indigo in Anaheim, CA always provides a wonderful stay! This was our 10th year to stay at this hotel and we’ll keep coming back for our annual visit to Disneyland. Cleofe, Jose, and all the staff are welcoming and very professional. They have accommodated us each time we stay at the hotel. The location is very convenient to Disneyland and to restaurants and shopping. All are an easy walk from the hotel. I highly recommend this hotel if you’re in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Dear Murraywk  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We are so glad to hear that you have chosen our location as your go to hotel in Anaheim for the last 10 years!  We can't wait to see you again next year and encourage you to call us directly for future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: Really enjoyed our stay - friendly staff, nice modern rooms. They were even kind enough to upgrade us to a suite, and allowed us to check-in early so our 3 y/o could nap after a 1/2 day at Disneyland! Very accommodating. Also about 4 blocks from Disneyland - literally from hotel to Main Street. Easy, safe walk, and parking is included so you don’t have to pay for Disneyland parking! Very comparable price to all of the hotels around the area. Will definitely be staying here again next time we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Awdyer   We want to thank you for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We are so glad that we where able to get you in early, upgrade your room and let your little one sleep! We love to hear that you enjoyed the rooms and close proximity to the Disney parks. We hope to see you again in the near future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Spent the weekend at this hotel and I’m glad I chose to stay here. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable about the area and what to do to make the most out of our stay. Disneyland is just a short 10 minute walk away. The guest rooms are stylish and up to date. Everything in the guest rooms are great, from the large walk in shower to the bed linen and the large high definition television. The property is well maintained and clean. We ate at the Chambers Bar & Bistro, which is in the lobby and the food was delicious. I’ve stayed in many hotels in the Disneyland area, and hotel Indigo is one of the best.
Manager Response: Dear DavidD4374  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us! We are so glad that you got the chance to enjoy all the different amenities our location has to offer. From the comfy beds to the large walk in shower you really got to try all our rooms amenities. We love hearing that you enjoyed the american style breakfast served at The Chambers Bar and Bistro as well as the short 10 minute walk to the Disney parks. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call u directly for any future booking needs! We hope you have a fantastic rest of your week!  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great clean hotel that is minutes from Disneyland
Summary: We had a 2 night stay here recently and it was awesome. The rooms are very spacious and clean, they are even better than the photos.  I’m a light sleeper and the rooms were very quiet. Also the bed was very comfortable.  Location wise it is a 10 minute walk from Disneyland which made it really convenient. It meant we could walk back from our hotel in the afternoon, have dinner in there and then go back for the fireworks.   Staff are very friendly and always quick to help you out.
Manager Response: Dear jaf8130  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us! We are so glad that you found our rooms clean and comfortable and quiet! One of our favorite things about this location is the close proximity to the park and it sounds like you truly enjoyed it as well! We hope to see you again in the future and invite you to call us directly for any booking needs. Hope you have a fantastic Holiday season!  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is tidy and efficient. We were there on what appeared to be a busy Saturday night. The parking garage was full and the clerk directed us to the neighboring hotel’s garage, which was a tight squeeze for my F250 pickup. The room was very quiet. The mattress was exceptionally comfortable. There is a small bar/eatery, but we didn’t try it.  We may stay again, as we are looking for a good place in that area, however, there are only 10 king bed rooms. My husband is 6’7”, so a good portion of him hangs off a queen.
Manager Response: Dear CareyMendi  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your time with us.
