We apologize for the tight parking on the day of check-in but are very glad we where able to accommodate you at our sister lot. As a smaller boutique Hotel we pride ourselves on creating a cozy and relaxing environment for all that stay with us and hope you will visit us again on your next Disney trip. Please call us directly to book a king room for you and your husband as we want to make sure his feet stay nice and warm! Have a wonderful holiday season and we hope to see you again in the future.    Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Spent a night here for Disneyland. It’s about 10 min walk from Disneyland. It near to many restaurants and convenience store. I was welcome by a wonderful lady at the reception. She was very friendly, assuring and allowed us early check-in due to room availability. The room and beds were comfortable. It was also nicely decorated. Love the amazing breakfast selection and it was delicious! Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear nattile   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed the comfortable amenities that our location has to offer! We hope that you will come back and see us again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I just had to post a reference for Hotel Indigo Anaheim, my home away from home, when I go to Disneyland. The staff is welcoming, helpful, and friendly. The room decor is modern and updated, and always clean and working condition. Lastly, the distance to the park is a short 10 min. walk or a shuttle is right next door. And the City Walk and other restaurants are next door. Simply the best Disneyland hotel with free parking of this caliber and this price. And the small bar next to the dining room is wonderful and has special drinks.
Manager Response: Dear ReadgSpellgTutor   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We are so glad that you had a nice time while staying here! We love hearing that the modern and chic decor was exactly what you where looking for. We love the close proximity of our property to not only the Disney parks but all the shopping and restaurants the garden walk has to offer! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future bookings!  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: A great hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here on our recent trip to Disneyland. After dealing with rush hour traffic for 3+ hours we were welcomed to the hotel like we were family. Check in was smooth and efficient, which then allowed us to grab a drink and a bite to eat at the bar / restaurant. Breakfast meals were great as well, with an endless supply of coffee before the short walk to Disneyland to enjoy the park. Underground parking was a welcome bonus as well as we did not have to worry about having to find a place to park. The only bad thing I have to say about the hotel is that the dryers in the laundry room did not work well and it took hours to dry clothes that we washed
Manager Response: Dear CdnDisneyFan   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We are so glad that you and your family felt the welcoming presence of our hotel and staff upon arrival. We are thrilled you enjoyed all the amenities on property like underground parking and endless supplies of coffee! I am truly sorry for the inconvenience of the dryers not working well in our washing facility. I want to thank you for bringing it to our attention and let you know that I have reported this to our maintenance crew and they are looking into it as i type. We always strive to create a relaxing, inviting and most of all efficient stay for our guests and hope you will come back to us in the future.  Please feel free to call us anytime you are looking for a room in Anaheim!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Best hotel so far near Disneyland
Summary: My family have tried many different hotels around Disneyland and this has been the most impressive. It’s only a 10 minute walk going to Disneyland which is very convenient. The hotel has ample garage parking. Our room was clean and comfy. The dining area/restaurant was nice and the breakfast was great. What we loved the most was than we can walk to the park and walk back to the hotel as we please without waiting for a shuttle ride or worrying about parking. The hotel staff and the manager were amazing. We will definitely stay at this hotel every time we visit disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Rhanann   Thank you so much for your review of our hotel, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. It really sounds like you had a chance to take full advantage of all the amenities we have to offer. I have to say one of our favorite things about our location is the close proximity to the Disney parks! just a short 10 minute walk and you are there! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any booking needs! Have a fantastic week!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Really great place, just a few minute walk to House of Blues
Summary: Loved everything about this hotel. The front desk staff, housekeeping, the wait staff in the restaurant were all extremely friendly and helpful. It was beautifully furnished, extremely clean room, very comfortable beds. The breakfast we had in the restaurant was very good. I definitely would stay at Hotel Indigo again if I was ever in the area.
Manager Response: Dear 602lyndas   Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us! We strive to create a visually pleasing and dynamic living space for our guests so we love hearing the amazing feedback about our rooms. We are so glad that you had a chance to enjoy the breakfast at The Chambers bar and bistro while staying with us. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly for any future room needs in Anaheim, we hope to see you again real soon!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Just wanted to give a big thanks to Mimi and her staff for making Komatsu feel welcome and taking care of all our needs at the recent SWE event. Thanks for making it easy on me, as an event manager, and my staff supporting the event
Manager Response: Dear 1KomatsuEvents   Thank you for the amazing review of your time with us. We are thrilled that you and your group had a pleasant experience. Please let us know if you have any further meeting space or rooming needs! We hope to see your group again next year!  Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Beds were comfortable, room was clean, and staff were very friendly.  Location was excellent with many restaurants and stores nearby in the GardenWalk area.  10 minute easy walk to Disneyland!  Enjoyed our stay and would visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Katyb1980   Thank you so much for your amazing review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed the many amenities we have to offer! We love our hotel location and the close proximity to Disneyland and many shops and restaurants it truly makes any stay with us stress free. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs in the future. Have a fantastic day!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: After a 14 hour flight from Australia, 2 hours through customs and 1 hour drive to the hotel, we were exhausted.  We were not expecting room to be ready at 10am but the reception staff did all they could to hurry things up.  Offered a small lounge to rest and the restaurant/bar area. All well received.  The staff were all friendly. The reception guys outstanding. The breakfast staff amazing. The evening bartenders wonderful.  Great location with Walgreens nearby and restaurants as well as the offer in Indigo.  Loved our stay. Room was well maintained and comfortable. Quiet and relaxing.  5 stars at anytime.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear OooRoo1  We wanted to say thank you so much for such an amazing review of your time with us. We are overjoyed that you where able to check in early after such a long flight and drive. We love hearing that all of our staff from the front desk to the evening bartender exceeded your expectations. We hope that you will consider our location again for any future Anaheim stays and encourage you to call us directly for your next booking to ensure the best rate possible! Have a fantastic rest of your day, we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel was great, nice clean comfortable rooms that were decorated very modernly.  Not too far from Disneyland, maybe a 15 min walk.  The restaurant in the hotel was delicious!!  If you pre-buy your breakfast you wont be disappointed!!  However what made this trip the very best was the staff, so helpful and friendly!!  I had a few problems with my reservations when I checked in with booking from a 3rd party and then getting my scooter onsite but the staff was so nice and always happy to help me.  We will stay here again!!  If you stay here you wont be disappointed!! Parking is free for guests.
Manager Response: Dear 624karit   Thank you so much for the shining review of your time with us, we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! We always strive to make our guests feel like they are at a home away from home by easing any issues or problems you may have. We love hearing this our front desk staff was able to take care of your reservation issues upon arrival and get you set with your scooter! We look forward to seeing you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: What can I say we have stayed here a few times now it's easy location free parking complimentary Wi-Fi amazing breakfast at the chambers restaurant. Being part of the IHG Club I was able to get two free drinks on my last visit which was a great way to start our vacation the hotel is a short walk to Disneyland I can usually make it there in under 10 minutes. Also the housekeeping at this hotel is amazing always clean always fresh and it feels like my home away from home I always recommend Hotel Indigo to any friends or family visiting the Disneyland Resort area or the convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Steve M   Thank you so much for your lovely review of your time with us we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! It seems like you truly had a chance to enjoy all the amenities that we offer to the fullest. Please let us know about any room needs you may have in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any booking needs!   Best Wishes  Hotel Management

Summary: Absolutely awesome stay at the Hotel Indigo! The staff was exceptionally friendly and went out of their way to be as accommodating as possible. Jorden, the front desk manager, was exceptional the entire stay and couldn't have been more helpful. The room was spotless and tastefully decorated.  The lobby restaurant was fantastic for breakfast at very reasonable prices.  It's about a ten minute walk to Disneyland and also close to the convention center.  Really couldn't be happier and will definitely stay here every time we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Ligetian  Thank you so much for such an amazing review of your stay. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. It sounds like you really had a chance to check out all the our hotel offers!  We hope to see you again in the near future for any stays in Anaheim and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great place for the team in walking distance
Summary: Great place to stay with the team, within walking distance of the convention center, Disneyland parks, and various hotels/restaurants for events in the area. Very clean, good team meeting rooms, nice spa to relax after a long day of conferences.
Manager Response: Dear ClairekF935EY  Thank you so much for your lovely review of your time with us, we are so glad you enjoyed the comfort and relaxation of our Hotel! , We look forward to hosting you and your group again, please do not hesitate to call us anytime for direct booking!  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: All this times its been a good xperience and friendly people. Close to anyplace you want to go in Anaheim. Courteous people great staff. Love my room its very nice,clean, and organize. Great housekeeping, and helpfull and friendly. Always with a smile.  Great work ....
Manager Response: Dear Carlos B   Thank you so much for the lovely review of our hotel we are so glad you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly next time you stay in Anaheim.   Bets Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Just returned from another visit to this lovely hotel no other place to stay in Anaheim All the staff are friendly and nothing is too much trouble Feels like our home from home The attention to detail is exceptional Breakfast in Chambers sets you up for the day Easy walk to Disney and The Garden Walk Could not recommend it more highly Already planning a return trip Thank you to all the staff from the General Manager Mimi to the ladies who serviced the room for making our holiday so enjoyable
Manager Response: Dear RonnieW274  We are so happy that you enjoyed the amenities and staff of our hotel. Our main focus is always to create a home away from home for our guests. We can not wait to see you again for your next visit. Please call us directly to book and we will take care of everything!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights, and it was great. Clean room, comfy beds, spacious shower, friendly staff, and walking distance to Disneyland! The bar/dining was our go-to for excellent coffee & breakfast, and evening apoetizers and coctails!
Manager Response: Dear Melissa M  Thank you so much for the amazing review, we are so glad you enjoyed your time with us, We strive to make every guests experience with us a memorable and pleasant one  We hope to see you again in the future for any stays in the Anaheim area. Please feel free to call us directly at anytime for your booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I was so impressed by this little hotel! Every single staff member we ran into was so friendly and helpful. One even went out of her way to help me find a packing tube to put posters in from the event I attended. The restaurant has a nice menu, great servers, and is a good spot to eat breakfast in the AM, or dinner if you're burned out in the evening. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Samantha A   Thank you so much for the amazing review of your time with us. We at the Hotel Indigo pride ourselves on our customer service and are thrilled to go above and beyond for any guest!  We love hearing feedback from the Chambers bar and Bistro and are so happy that you enjoyed the american style cuisine. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: GREAT price, location, service and perks for Disneyland visit!
Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem for the location. With FREE parking, the location makes it so much more convenient for your Disney visit, as it's only a 10-minute walk to the parks! Mimi Jeng, the General Manager, literally goes above and beyond for her guest and it shows! The room is more than you would expect for the rate you are paying for and the remodel of the rooms gives it a chic modern feel that you would not expect from a hotel in Anaheim.  Highly recommend staying her as it is the ONLY higher quality hotels in the area that offer FREE parking and offer exceptional service.  I've stayed in this hotel 3 times already this year and has quickly became our first choice!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review Jesuse1225 we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We value any and all feedback from our guests and appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your time with us. So glad that Mimi was able to help you from beginning to end ensuring a fabulous stay. We hope to see you again in the future, please feel free to call our hotel anytime to book your next stay!

Summary: We booked the Hotel Indigo last minute based on its proximity to Disneyland and the free parking. We were pleasantly surprised that it was located near several restaurants, stores and even a Starbucks! Upon entry, the first thing I noticed was the beautiful modern decor and a smiling front desk clerk. Our room was equally aesthetically pleasing with the most comfortable hotel bed and pillows I’ve slept on in a while. The happy hour and breakfast room service was fast, friendly and delicious. We’ll definitely stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review 8Juanitaj . We strive to creating a visually stunning decor throughout the hotel and are beyond happy you enjoyed the aesthetic appeal. We hope that you will stay with us again soon, please call us anytime to book your next stay!

Summary: Unlike many of the guests who are at this hotel to attend Disneyland and enjoy “the happiest place in earth”... my wife and I needed to attend to some family business in Anaheim that was not so happy.  This added some stress to our trip. The room, the bed, the pillows, the shower, the location... all fantastic. But what will make us always choose this hotel when we’re in Anaheim was the amazing customer service, hospitality, and kindness displayed to us by Elizabeth at the front desk. She went above and beyond to accommodate our needs and to help us with our arrangements. Elizabeth is exactly the kind of person you want assisting you. She knew how to get things done and could not have been more gracious, warm, professional, and helpful. The hotel is wonderful, but we’ll always
Manager Response: Scotteskiles thank you so much for writing such a nice review about our hotel. As a hotel our main focus is now and will always be customer satisfaction and comfort. We are very happy that Elizabeth was able to assist you with your check-in process making it seamless and smooth. We hope to see you again soon in the near future. Please do not hesitate to call us anytime for your next reservation.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for our son's first Disneyland trip. He is 21 months and had a great time. It was a very nice hotel and the staff was amazing. They were spectacular and made our trip so sweet. We were sad there was no continental breakfast  but the restaurant offered a great breakfast for a reasonable price that even our picky little munchkin enjoyed. The hotel is about a 15 minute walk from the front gates of Disneyland and is close to all of the restaurants. The pool was nice and relaxing. We really enjoyed this hotel and will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear A5349NSstephanied   Thank you so much for the amazing review of our hotel. We thrive on hearing feedback about the various amenities we offer at our location. We are so glad that you and your little munchkin was able to enjoy our breakfast options before you all went to enjoy the Disney parks. We look forward to seeing you again for your next Disney trip, please feel free to call us at anytime to book your next magical stay!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Very nice room at a great location, but I had some issues with the layout.
Summary: This hotel is really nice. The room and bathroom were very clean. The modern furniture and decor in the room were nice. The location is walking distance to Disneyland or Gardenwalk. The free underground parking is great, but the entrance/exit is a bit tricky if someone is coming from the opposite direction. Also, the parking spaces are a bit snug, but that makes sense given the size of the garage. The glass elevator is cool, but it takes an insanely long time to stop on the selected floors. The parking and elevator aren't really dealbreakers though. Hotel Indigo does a lot with the limited space that they have.  My main issue has to do with security. Not the security staff, but rather, the layout of the building. The stairs leading to the second floor is right next to the main
Manager Response: Dear DiagonAlleywaze  Thank you for your review of our Hotel we always welcome feedback on any situation that occurs on premises. We take the safety of our guests very seriously and have relayed this issue to our security, management and front desk staff. We are  are taking steps to ensure nothing of this nature happens again. We thank you for letting us know about this issue and invite you to stay with us again in the future to see our improved efforts. Please give us a call anytime and ask for Mimi or Scott to book directly. Have a wonderful day!  Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo over the long weekend. It is a short walk to Disneyland and close to many restaurants. There is a wonderful restaurant within the hotel, no need to go elsewhere. Beds are very comfortable. Shower has good pressure. Staff helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Haragama   Thank you so much for your review of our hotel we are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us. We hope to see you again in the future for any Anaheim stays. Please do not hesitate to call us directly at anytime to schedule your next Disney trip!    Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: This place is beautiful!! Great restaurant for breakfast, nice little water show at the front of the hotel, great view of the fireworks at night on the top floor, safe parking and free parking and of course the staff is amazing!!! Lucy and her staff are great, they always go above and beyond whenever I come to this hotel and it shows why people keep coming back. The rooms are nice but what really shines in this hotel is them, great hospitality and very helpful with recommendations and help in general around the hotel.  The pool is beautiful as well. If you are an IHG member you do get a lot of perks like early check in, upgrades if available, late check out and special little amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Mindyjaz1   Thank you so much for your beautiful review of our hotel we are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us! We strive to create a dynamic and relaxing experience for all that stay with us. From the water show out front to the room/parking lot view of the fireworks we love to create an all encompassing experience for our guests. We look forward to seeing you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly to book your next stay!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel staff was the BEST!!  They were helpful and very friendly.  The rooms were really nice - clean.  The bed was comfy.  Get the breakfast voucher - it's worth it.  The restaurant if small and the food was great.  The pool is small - but nice - and ADA accessible.  I'll be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jane R   Thank you so much for the amazing review of our hotel! We are so glad you where pleased with our staff.  We strive to create a relaxing and seamless experience from check in to check out.  We hope to see you again in the near future and encourage you to call us directly to book your next stay!   Best Wishes Hotel management

Summary: We stayed here a week ago for both of my daughter's birthday trips to Disney. The hotel is very nice, super small, and intimate. The staff was amazing, and treated my girls like royalty for their birthdays. I really liked that the bathrooms only have showers, and not shower/tub combos. It's just so much easier to get ready. We had an excellent time at Hotel Indigo, and will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Kole360  Thank you so much for the amazing review of our Hotel. We are overjoyed that your daughters felt like queens while staying with us for there birthdays! Our main goal is to create a relaxing and personalized experience for all that stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future, please do not hesitate to call directly to book your next stay!   Best Wishes  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Magical 2 night stay, lovely clean hotel and perfect location for Disneyland!
Summary: We spent ages debating hotels in Anaheim and we really couldn't have picked a better choice.  We had two adjacent rooms that were lovely, spotlessly clean and with double queen beds that were so comfortable.  Location from Disneyland is second to none, it is a just a 5 minute walk and perfect for tired little (or big!) legs after a magical day!  Nearby shop in case want to stock up on anything. We'll definitely be back!

Summary Heading: My Favorite Hotel for Disney Trips

The rooms are very clean with a refreshing style, the beds are comfortable and I really love the Aveda products provided. I also really appreciate they have free secured parking and don't add the extra resort fee for each night. They do not have free breakfast but the Chambers restaurant has yummy food, especially the chicken and waffles and churro waffles, as well as some tasty grab and go options. But besides all what is mentioned above, what makes this hotel a joy to stay at are the staff. they are always great to interact and so very helpful with anything I need.

Summary Heading: Great location, but it comes at a cost

Super-friendly service, spotless rooms, and a nice restaurant/lounge area next to the lobby is all you need to unwind after a long day waiting in lines at the two parks. (There's even a second-floor seating area with TV for a tiny gathering.) About a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney and a 5 minute walk to Anaheim GardenWalk (Roy's, CA Pizza Kitchen, P.F. Chang's, Bubba Gump's, McCormick & Schmick's, The Cheesecake Factory, etc.) This is the first hotel that actually got my "Stay Preferences" 100% correct! I'll be back - hopefully, during a time when it's not as pricey.

Summary: All the Hotel Indigo has to be is convenient; it's within walking distance of both Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. And it is that, but this property gives more in its every aspect. The staff goes out of their way to make sure your comfortable; they ask questions, make helpful adjustments even before you think to ask for them. The rooms are stylish, airy and nice and very quiet--a rarity for resort district properties, where the sound of kids running up and down the halls is usually the norm. The cafe is very good; the pool clean and nicely enclosed; the parking shielded from the sun. In short, whenever the Indigo is available, I stay there. It's the first, best choice for the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Another amazing visit in spite of adversity, no water
Summary: Hotel Indigo Anaheim is my choice of hotels when I visit Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. I happened to stay there a few weekends ago and unfortunately the water tank broke so no water for a two days. We were offered showers in the hotel next door. While I saw many guests losing their tempers with the staff who had nothing to do with the shutoff, I thought the staff acted accommodating and professional. I will continue to enjoy the updated Hotel with it’s amazing décor, shower with great water pressure, Aveda toiletries, luxurious bed and bedding, and proximity to the park(10 to 15 min). The price is one of the best in the city of Anaheim. The staff has always been polite and accommodating and a special shout-out to Mimi, who always brightens my day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed here overnight during our trip to Disneyland.  We booked a suite.  The room was nice and bathroom was big.  It has hardwood floors, a fridge, and Keurig machine.  What killed the trip for us was how noisy the room was.  Our room faced the street, and you could hear the cars driving by and people talking as they walked down the street.  I woke up at 2 am, and could not go back to sleep because of the noise.  I have stayed at many hotels around the Disneyland area.  This was the worst night sleep that I ever had.  There are many rooms that face the street as well.  I will never stay at this hotel again, because it would be a crapshoot.  If we end up in a street facing room because no other rooms were available, than I would end up not sleeping again.  It’s too
Manager Response: Hi cuaman,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us. While we are delighted to hear you liked your room and everything about our hotel, I am sorry the noise from the street greatly impacted your stay. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please don't hesitate to approach our Front Desk or ask for the Manager on Duty.  Again, thanks for your feedback. I hope you would give us another chance to make your stay better than the last.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGService

Summary: This hotel has become my go-to when I have family in town. In April I had cousins come down and stay with us here. It's super close to the park and the bar downstairs is great for before and after. Spacious rooms and friendly staff. Would recommend for business or for families. Super close to the garden walk eatery area as well!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It takes a lot for me to leave such a negative review being I am in a similar industry and understand the day to day struggles of hospitality.  There are however a few things that get me to do so.  For starters, after taking a shower a went to grab a towel to find human (I assume) feces on the towel hanging over the shower rail.  HUMAN FECES! Immediately went down to the front desk to tell someone about it and it was a very nonchalant “I do apologize”. I do apologize? Do you have any idea the number of diseases that can be found in feces not to mention now I am not sure if anything in the room is clean.  I received a phone call later in the afternoon saying that again they apologize and that there would be a credit for some amount on my bill.  Fast forward two days, no hot water
Manager Response: Hi itlntravler!  Thank you for taking the time to share your review of your recent visit! We are known to delivering a great experience and in making travel inspiring and I'm sorry to learn the challenges encountered with the towel and with the hot water. I also understand your dismay with the lack of soundproofing and with internet access. Your feedback is very important to us. I would like the chance to look into this for you. I have sent you a private message to gather more details about what happened. I look forward to helping you further.  All my thanks,  Jonathan A Case Manager IHGService

Summary: This is our hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland (only a short walk from the hotel or transportation next door) and Knotts Berry farm. This hotel is always perfectly maintained, rooms are clean and staff goes out of there way to make you feel special. The MGR Mimi makes her self available to her guests, she goes out of her way to accommodate our needs if possible when staying at the hotel. We are IHG Reward Members and this IHG property really does recognize that. The Front desk staff, restaurant employees and cleaning crew were equally great. The food at the restaurant was also on point. That you Mimi to you and the Indigo staff for another great stay! Mark, Kimberlee and Family :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: No hot water for 2 days and no comp offered by manager, nothing. No accommodations. Black water came out of faucet and drips of cold water on shower so basically water - less hotel.  Manager won’t return my call and hasn’t given the staff permission to comp anything. Slum way to run a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Janedontplayy,   We appreciate you for sharing your review about your recent stay.  We are very sorry that you did not experience an exemplary hotel stay because of the level of service your have received. I apologize for any inconvenience you might have experienced. I have sent you a private message to reaffirm my apologies.  I very much hope that you will grant us the opportunity to prove ourselves again.  Best Regards,  Ben W. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Came into town for a quick business meeting found a great rate online this is definitely my go-to hotel very quick and easy check in complimentary Wi-Fi as well as parking can't wait to come back for a real vacation
Manager Response: none

Summary: We’ve stayed at the Hotel Indigo a couple of times both traveling with our 2 dogs and without. This hotel has a great location, clean and comfy rooms with plenty of space, and a friendly staff. They are attentive and helpful and the hotel location is walking distance to both the Disneyland Resort, Anaheim Convention Center, and plenty of restaurants and some shopping. We highly recommend for couples and small families with and without pets!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel! It's a quick walk to Disneyland. It was very clean and the room was a decent size. The beds were super comfortable and felt like a cloud after chasing our 3 year old around Disneyland all day. I didn't have any problems hearing other guests on the 1st floor.   And customer service was impeccable! Jorden checked me in at around 11:30pm. Myself and my 3 year old had been up since 4am, driven 6 hours, and spent all day at Disneyland before we checked in. My husband had to stay home this trip so it was just me. My daughter was passed out and I struggled to carry her, wrestle our luggage and check in. Jorden was kind and patient. And when I went to put the parking pass in my car, he let me leave my luggage there. When I came back in, carting my still sleeping kid,
Manager Response: none

Summary: One of my highest rated reviews on TripAdvisor is for this property.  We have stayed here before and just stayed here again - 6 nights.  This time we booked a suite which gave us a lot more room with the extra sitting room - 2 queen beds in the bedroom plus a sofa bed in the sitting room.  We’re a family of four ( two girls 15 & 12) so the extra space was perfect.  The bathroom is huge, the water pressure is great, the beds are comfy, the decor is really cool, we could see the fireworks from our room, had breakfast included, what’s not to like..  I had originally booked the Springhill Suites by Marriott but changed my booking to Indigo when the suite became available - I booked via the IHG website. It was about $500 cheaper than the Marriott and so it was a no brainer given we’d
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the final stop of a most phenomenal Easter weekend for my husband and I! From the moment I entered the lobby, Jorden was most inviting and accommodating! Jesus at the bar was a great friend as we closed our night out with the complimentary drinks as Spire Elite members with IHG hotels! The room was perfectly tidy and clean! I totally recommend this site for a family, couple, business, group, or solo trip! :-) I was happy to know that they are super pet friendly so I will bring my pup next time. There were extra pillows and blankets and everything!
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a cool place! We loved our room, and the bar was great. We stayed in the king suite, and had plenty of room. The bathroom was nice size and the shower was hot and had great Aveda products. The room was quiet and the bed was very comfortable. Everyone who worked here was very friendly. Jordan at the front desk set us up with a driver to take us to The Grove to watch a concert. Alfredo made great drinks And was very pleasant in the bar. We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked on Hotwire and ended up getting the Hotel Indigo for a quick trip down to Disney. I can't even say enough about how amazing the hotel customer service is here. It's incredible. Joel and Angela at the front desk were the most friendly, and helpful. So kind and informative. I can't say enough. The comfort level was unreal. The cleanliness is a 10. The beds are super comfortable. The decor is great. I just totally love it here. They have a pool, it's heated. I believe they have a gym as well? I'd definitely come back and stay here. It's an extremely short walk to The Garden Walk and all the restaurants. Also looks like an extremely easy walk to Disney however I'm sure I'll grab the $5 lyft instead. Great location. And again, best customer service ever.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros:  - Room was super spacious. It had a little sitting area, and the bathroom was gigantic! It had plenty of space for all my toiletries, which is rare find in hotels.  -The bed was very comfortable, which was so nice after long days spent at Disney. -The staff were all friendly and professional. - The parking is included in your rate....so no additional parking fees - We ate breakfast in the hotel restaurant, and it was delicious! Plus the staff were all friendly and attentive.  - The hotel is located away from the chaos of the parks, so it’s quiet. However, it is only a short 10-15 minute easy walk to the parks.  - There are plenty of convenience/drug stores close by for any last minute needs.  -There is a Starbucks and Blaze Pizza right across the street.   Cons: -No
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location with excellent staff.  Try breakfast here!!!
Summary: Hotel Indigo is a step above most of the other properties near Disneyland.  Excellent location close to main entrance of the park. Our well maintained, clean room with a big bathroom and a large shower was very comfortable.  We also had a nice view of the fireworks.  The restaurant has a great breakfast menu and I highly recommend both the Omelet and the Eggs Benedict.  All staff was helpful and anxious to please.  A boutique hotel that makes sure it's guests enjoy their visit.  Don't miss out on a wonderful Hotel Indigo!  We enjoyed every minute from checkin to check-out.  We'll definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great property, convenient walk to Disney, includes parking
Summary: Recently stayed at this hotel with my family for a couple days at Disney and we were quite happy. It's relatively new and very clean. Our room (family suite?) was spacious. While we were facing Katella, we didn't have any noise issues. The staff is very friendly. One nice thing is that parking is included in the rate and the spots were relatively spacious compared to other hotels we've stayed at in the area.  The location is a close walk to Disneyland, about 10-12m depending on pace and stoplights. There is a Walgreen's, Starbucks and Blaze pizza across the street.  I'd say the only "bad" thing is that there is only one elevator and it's super slow but it didn't seem to be overly in use.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, convenient and the friendliest staff at this boutique hotel. Skip the masses you’ll see at the other big near Disney hotels and enjoy a quiet nights sleep in this smaller quaint one. The customer service is amazing and although breakfast isn’t ‘included’ the $10 vouchers you can buy gets you anything on the menu. The food is Delicious so it’s worth it. No more instant eggs or soggy sausage in huge buffet bins.  In the heart of Restaraunts and a short walk to Disney.  Free parking. Wish we found this place for our past teipsnyere for baseball and Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, modern facility at a reasonable price with parking
Summary: This is a newer property within reasonable distance to Disneyland, family-friendly and at a decent price compared to what other hotels nearby were charging during spring break.  We split our vacation up, and at the tail end, found ourselves returning to Hotel Indigo because of our first positive experience, and because we found the beds to be the most comfy.  The young man at the counter at check-in was very nice and accommodating after hearing about our airline losing our luggage and recognizing my stress level, he deserves a gold star!  The free parking is secure and the pool and bar area looked nice, although we didn’t use them.  It is a little bit of a walk from Disneyland, but we didn’t find it unbearable even with two young kids in tow.  Being across the street from
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights and had great sleep every night. The chambermaids are very thorough and meticulous, with the room being very neat and tidy after each day. Reception and other service and restaurant staff were very friendly too - even the GM Mimi would make her rounds offering newspapers and bottled water whenever she’s around. The gym and pool were very well-maintained too.  However, the ceiling seems to be poorly sound-proofed. Each morning, I can hear the guests living upstairs scurrying over the room very loudly :S  The hotel is conveniently located near the Anaheim Convention Center and close to many cafes and restaurants nearby. Disney’s about 20-25 minutes walk away, so Uber is a good and cheap option if you have kids or elders with you. Orange County Outlet is
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a follow-up to a previous review. I was very pleased to hear from the hotel manager about my negative review. Our experience was far from ideal, but the response from the hotel's management has been amazing. Highly recommend this hotel for great customer care that shows from the top of the organization.   Thank you hotel Indigo!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at Hotel Indigo three times and have enjoyed the experience each and every time.  The rooms are clean, the staff friendly, the location perfect for going to Disneyland.  Our last trip we decided to try another hotel and it paled in comparison.  Most recently we planned a trip and made reservations for Hotel Indigo but due to a medical issue, we had to cancel.  The staff and manager were extremely helpful in taking care of us, refunding our money very quickly and easily.  We will be rescheduling our trip very soon and will be planning to stay at hotel Indigo this time and for future trips.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Perfect location for convention goers or Disneyland Clean comfortable rooms, friendly staff and convenient restaurant. Located near many restaurants and night spots and just a five minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 7 nights for a Disneyland vacation. Can’t fault it for cleanliness, service and quality of breakfast. Breakfast was actually a highlight: freshly prepared every morning and freedom to choose from an extensive menu. Out of 6 breakfasts we had at the hotel, 5 were excellent and 1 was all right.  The only thing I would warn fellow travellers about is that the hotel rooms are not well soundproofed. If you’re a light sleeper or trying to recover from jet lag, I recommend a top floor room and ear plugs, as you will hear every movement from nearby rooms.  Only about 15 minutes walk from the Disneyland gates and significantly cheaper than many worse quality hotels closer to the theme park. It’s definitely on my list for a future Anaheim holiday! Thanks for a
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were large and very comfy. The cleaning was great and the staff were super friendly and helpful. Also, the food was yummy and reasonably priced. Highly recommend staying at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recently visited this hotel again with my husband back in February. I absolutely love this hotel and it is so close to the park! Everyone is super friendly and helpful and the free parking is a plus! Highly recommend this place and we’re so glad we chose to stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wife and I recently went to down for a Disneyland trip and stayed here again, and have to say that this place continues to live up to the good memories we have from last time we came down. The decor and design of the hotel are great, and there are a ton of conveniences - free parking, free WiFi, bar in the lobby, totally within walking distance of the harbor gate, NO RESORT FEES... so great! I’ll continue to come stay here and recommend it to everyone I can.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great hotel, this is my favorite one. I like it i love it. Nice place, good staff and friendly. Rooms very orginize and clean very clean. Great housekeeping staff friendly, courteous,attend to my needs. I will stay here again. This place is close to what ever you need. Free parking . Good atmosphere. Thank you Indigo.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Didn't Actually Stay In A Room
Summary: Hi - we booked a room here but never actually stayed in the room. We arrived before noon, checked in and parked. Our room would not be ready until 3:00 PM and that was fine with us as we were headed to Disney for the day so we would get our keys then. While at Disney, we got a call and had a bit of an emergency which required us to go home. We knew it was a long shot to ask for a refund or credit but we let the front desk know of the situation. They took great notes and were very sympathetic and asked us to call the manager the next day. I called and spoke with Cleo and before I could re-explain the situation, she let me know we would get a full refund! The service at this hotel is the best I have received - they did not have to refund anything since we did check in and they
Manager Response: none

Summary: My Disney-fanatic friend and I did a quick girl's trip and stayed here for the night. Beyond the great location (just a 5-minute walk to Disneyland...or 10, if you're walking with my friend...), they offer free parking in a secure garage, free WiFi and the cutest orange pens I ever did see!  We pulled in well before check-in, but Jordan greeted us and got us squared away so that we'd be able to stroll in later, grab our keys, and get settled in. We were able to park her car, leave our stuff and walk to the parks for a few hours of fun and booze and booze. And fun.  When we finally got our highly intoxicated bodies back to the hotel, we were given our keys right away - a room on the top floor. They only have one elevator, and we were in no shape to navigate the stairs, so we had
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was so appreciative of the service from making the rez to check out! I love the contemporary décor but mostly I love the smell!!! No musty mildew or old smell. It was like an ocean breeze fresh. Everything was perfect in my room! No missing toiletries, everything worked, tons of light, and outlets. I will definitely be staying here multiple nights. And it's only a safe short walk to my beloved Disneyland. Shout out to Mimi.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My family stayed here over Christmas for 3 days and did Disneyland.
Summary: We loved this hotel.  Very accommodating and friendly staff.  We ordered an amazon fresh grocery delivery and they kept it for us until we checked in.  The pool area was a nice quiet break during our afternoons, although the pool was not heated.  We enjoyed the hot tub.  The walk to Disneyland was reasonable, at 15 minutes.  I would recommend this hotel for a Disney visit!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff were very gracious. Room was clean. Hotel is within two blocks of tons of some famous restaurants. No complaints about anything especially the beds are quite comfortable. I would stay here again.

Summary: Not the closest hotel to Disneyland but not too bad, about a 15 minute walk.  Travel to to the left and your at Anahein Garden Walk.  There isn't much retail but does have a theater and bowling alley and lots of higher end restaurants like McCormick and Schmick, Roy's, PF Chang's.  Travel to the right and you have a strip mall with cheap eats like Chinese, Mediterranian, Mexican and burgers.  At the end of the street and across both a CVS and Walgreens with lots of Disney gift items.  The hotel also has it's own restaurant.    The rooms are updated and spacious. Included are nice desk and chair, mini-fridge, closet and keurig coffeemaker with coffee and teas.  Very nice shower but no tub.  Fairly large in-room safe and many outlets and charging ports.    Staff was friendly and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at Hotel Indigo for 3 nights with my family of four and opted for a “family room”. The room itself was very nice but I’m not convinced it was worth the extra dollars for this room type which essentially just had a small space next to the beds with a couch.   The positives of this hotel are the friendly staff, great location near restaurants and of course the Disney parks, the modern decor and free parking.   The biggest negative for me was the complete lack of sound proofing. I’m a light sleeper and even being on the 4th floor (the highest floor at the hotel) I found it hard to sleep with the constant noise from the very busy street we were overlooking. I was then woken by the family in the room next door whose children were very energetic and loud at 6am every day.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Another Wonderful Stay!! Free Parking & Great Staff
Summary: I love this hotel!  Stayed again and was not disappointed.  The staff is always helpful and welcoming.  FREE parking and FREE internet access with NO resort fee!  This hotel is about the same price if not just a little more but well worth the few additional dollars!  Clean rooms and a lovely little restaurant with great food and not too expensive for a hotel restaurant.  I you are looking for a coffee and bar, go next door and enjoy what the Wyndham Garden Hotel has to offer.

Summary: We had a very enjoyable visit to this hotel. Firstly, it has a great location and great scenery. The hotel is modern and has all the amenities you could wish for. The rooms were very nice and the staff were friendly and polite.

Summary Heading: Best hotel only minutes from the main gate .
Summary: We were amazed at not only the location, and free parking ( saves you $25 per day ) .  Rooms were very clean and staff were extremely friendly.  We stayed took my 4 year old son so it was easy to take breaks and go back to the room for naps .  Less walking distance than any of the hotels on Disney property and a fraction of the price.

Summary: The contemporary style and added warmth of the hardwood flooring, make this little gem a real find in bustling Anaheim!! Also worth a mention...Indigo Anaheim offers.... *FREE SECURED PARKING*

Summary Heading: All Around Wonderful Hotel With Amazing Staff
Summary: Hotel Indigo is the perfect place to stay in an ever growing market around Disneyland.  The rooms are clean and comfortable with fun details in the décor and the staff are so incredibly nice and helpful.  We hosted an event here and the General Manager Mimi was the absolutely best to work with helping with incredibly priced group room rates as well always all the little details related to our event space.  Have to add one of the best things about this hotel compared to all the others in the area is that they don't add on the extra resort and parking fees. That's right, FREE PARKING and its in a SECURED GARAGE!!! So unheard of for a hotel in the area and especially so close to the park and will save you so much money on your final hotel bill.  PLUS you can even save time by
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great little hotel. Super clean, super friendly (helpful) staff, and in a great location to boot! This place is walking distance (about 20 minutes) to Disneyland and it is an easy, nice walk. The room was great, not huge, but perfect for two adults. Everything was very clean and well taken care of. We had breakfast included with our stay and it was fantastic! All made to order in  cute little cafe type setting. The servers were all incredible as well. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I stayed at the indigo in two rooms for four nights. We had rooms which each had two queen beds In. Bathrooms have Aveda toiletries and the shower is pretty good.  The beds were very comfortable and the room was a good size. Rooms at the back of the hotel are much quieter and have fireworks views. We had breakfast a few days and there was a good choice and it set us up for a busy day at Disney. Jose was very attentive and friendly. The hotel is in a convenient location and is about 15 minutes walk from Disneyland and very close to lots of restaurants, including The Cheesecake Factory. We would stay there again
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here last week and had a wonderful stay. Mimi was amazing! She gave us a great rate and even hooked us up with free water bottles when we arrived! The room was clean and the shower was amazing! I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Repeat visit. Just as great as the first time!
Summary: I just cannot say enough about this hotel. The ease of booking, the staff, the rooms, parking, ease of checking in. We arrived earlier than planned. We were able to pre-check in making it quick and easy to get our rooms after a long day at Disney. The front desk held our suitcases for us, there were 8 of us and we were able to take advantage of their secured free parking. We were greeted by Mimi, who is, I believe the GM, with bottles of water and a nice chat. Once she made sure we had everything we needed I watched her enter the restaurant and greet guests eating lunch, making sure everyone was happy. It is nice to see "the big boss" out mingling, making sure everyone is happy. I could tell customer service is very important to the Hotel Indigo and the staff. We will forever be
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at this hotel during my visit to Disneyland.  The location cannot be beat.  We were able to walk to Disneyland which took about 15 minutes.  The restaurant serves a good breakfast.  Small bar for those who want to unwind at the end of the day.  The rooms were comfortable and very quiet.  I was able to sleep and rest.  The value was very reasonable.

Summary: Hotel Indigo is a beautiful hotel. The hotel is very clean and a great location. The staff was very helpful and everyone was very nice. We ate breakfast at the restaurant and It was very delicious. I would highly recommend the hotel Indigo to anyone looking for a great hotel in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: A quick trip over to the Indigo
Summary: My wife and myself decided to take a break over to the Indigo from the UK  We had stayed there before along with how can I put this, some of the hotels facing disney The booking would have been at short notice of our arrival, so I made the call. No problem of course we will fit you in. I have written a review before on the Indigo our views are still the same. It is one of the best hotels within the area of Disney, every thing you need is within walking distance of its front door entrance door. The level of service from the staff at the hotel is excellent which is very rare these days The hotel is very clean and tidy  Advice if you wish to book a room at the Indigo do it early rather that late.

Summary: Room with 2 double beds for 2adults and 2 teenagers was pretty small but adequate for 2 nights.  Great bar/ restaurant with super friendly staff.  Self service laundry was clean and good condition.  About 15 min walk to Disneyland. Free parking.

Summary Heading: Superior service from my encounters on phone to front desk. Convenient location - walk to Disney!
Summary: We were visiting two parts of So Cal, finishing in Anaheim. We decided to change our arrival date and called to revise the reservation. Cleo was very helpful, as the hotel was sold out and she took my number to call when/if a cancellation made a room available. We got that extra night!  Heading there, I called to confirm a late arrival and ask for a room away from the elevator. Jorden handled the request and we even had a room with a view of the fireworks.    The room was spacious, clean and the beds were very comfortable. After a day at Disney, sleep is needed. A well-stocked coffee maker is provided.   Bistro staff and front desk were also very nice. The pool area was enticing but we did not have time to try it--will need to return for that.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Based on the numerous good reviews and with my reward points it made sense to stay here. This ain’t a bad hotel but I was expecting somewhat more.  The hotel is situated on a main road and you can hear the noise even from a top floor. The room itself could use a little love and when we got the room we found ants in the bathtub. The service was good and they helped us with everything. The paid Breakfast was nice and generous and there are restaurants nearby. The proximity to the park is also a plus. It was a good stay but not excellent.
Manager Response: Hi AmirHY,  Thank you for staying with us and for being an IHG Rewards Club member. I am glad that you found our location to be convenient. Thank you for noting our good breakfast options and the staff service.  I am sorry to learn about your disappointments when it comes to the room received. I also regret any inconvenience the noise may have caused. Your comfort is important to us and I am sorry for any letdown.  I have taken note of your valuable comments and will use these to monitor and improve the quality of services we offer to our guests in the future.  Sincerely,  Ingrid V. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: We stayed at the Indigo for 7 nights in December 2018. This was our third stay at this wonderful hotel and we always come back to it when we are visiting Disneyland.  We arrived at around 3pm and our room was ready. Check in was easy as always and the receptionists were very friendly. We had booked a king room again and were on the third floor this time. As usual the room was spotlessly clean. We book the Indigo partly because the room is so large, it has so much storage and the beds are so comfortable. Just what you need after walking 15 plus miles around Disneyland daily! Along with a set of 4 drawers there is also a closet with enough room to hang up a few things and then a safe and shelves to fold things if needed.  The bathroom was very clean as always and we love the fact

Summary Heading: Best Hotel 10 stars across the board
Summary: We just stayed at this hotel this week and I have to say this was one of the best hotels I have stayed at for customer service, cleanliness, and covienient for Disneyland!!! We were welcomed at the front desk with smiles and all questions answered and the gentleman also told about a place to save money on tickets along the walk to Disney! They were fabulous 10 star.  Our room was very clean with Aveda brand toiletries!  I love Aveda!  The beds were very comfortable and we forgot toothbrushes and they staff brought them up right away. 10 star! Summary: Quick Disney trip for candlelight weekend,  check in always goes smoothly,staff is so sweet. I love getting my IHG Rewards benefits here as well. They have a quick grab and go area for early morning or late night snacks, and full meal service too. Let me not forget FREE WIFI, NO RESORT FEE and FREE PARKING! This is so rare in Anaheim, and means extra churros in the park. Small Business center saved my life, i couldn't get my tickets loaded to my phone. Looking forward to coming back soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel Indigo Anaheim is a great package overall for the price. The staff was excellent. I had called ahead to make a request, and at check-in the front desk staff let me know that they had gotten my request and fulfilled it before I asked! The staff were helpful on check-out day, too.  The rooms are interesting looking and in good shape. I wasn't sure how I would feel about the fake wood floor, but it was comfortable and very clean. The decor is bright and modern, with bold colors. The bed was comfy, and there were a ton of outlets in good locations. The bathroom is big! Lots of counter-space and a large shower with both a sprinkler head and a handheld shower. The only drawback is that the shower has a totally clear partition, so it can be a little awkward to share.   The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Was expecting more from Hotel Indigo
Summary: Stayed here for 1 night with my wife and toddler. Had booked the hotel expecting an upscale hotel but was quite disappointed with the rooms. Overall, nothing amazing. No help with the luggage. No complimentary water. No shower gel... (bar soap is provided)  Room did not have bath tub. Location was alright. Walk to Disneyland is around 10 to 15 minutes. Might have preferred to stay a bit closer to the park. A few dining options nearby. Free parking  Hotel Room: 3 Stars (Clean rooms but basic) Room View: 3 Stars (View of the pool) Service of Staff: 3 Stars (No help with the luggage) Lounges/Restaurants: (NA) Room Service: (NA) Location: 4 Stars (10 to 15 mins from Disneyland Park)

Summary: stayed here for a few days before a trip to Las Vegas and then for a longer stay on our return. This is not the first time we have stayed her, would not stay anywhere else. Disney round one corner, Garden walk with all the great eating places around the other corner. All the staff are amazing, they cannot do enough for you from housekeeping, restaurant and front of house. The General Manager fully engages with guest, checking everything is ok. Even handing out papers at breakfast. You will struggle to find a cleaner hotel where attention to details obviously so important. Cannot recommend a stay here more highly. You won't regret it. Lovely bar to relax and have a drink after a busy day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Another great stay at The Indigo!  We arrived early and were able to park onsite and head off to Disneyland. Once we got done with the park our room was ready. It was nice to see the same people as last year so we know it’s not only a great place to stay but must be a happy place to work.  Birthday celebration weekend continues on after we enjoy the happy hour downstairs. Makes it so easy for us.  It’s a safe place, clean and well taken care of. We definitely have this down as a regular place to stay and share with those who ask us!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Easy walk to Disneyland; helpful staff
Summary: I would stay here again.  The rooms were comfortable (although you could here a lot of noise from outside - so you should request a room that doesn’t face the alley). The location, parking, and staff were great. Parking is in an underground garage accessible by room key.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a night when we visited Disney for two days. Check in was smooth and we were allowed to park our car early in the morning before our room was ready so we could head on to the park.  Our room was perfectly turned out and had some lovely touches such as Avada products and decent coffee pods.  The beds were super comfy and we really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is over the road from a Walgreens, starbucks, various other shops and a Dennys which we used for breakfast.  We were also allowed to leave our car there until the following evening whilst we went back to another park.  The park is only about a 10 mins stroll away as well.  We will definately return for our next trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I got exactly what I needed from this hotel. Quality, simple room at a reasonable price within walking distance of Disneyland. I liked the refreshing green decor with the walnuts. I was happy that they were able to let me check in a couple hours before normal checkin time.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not a 5 star property, but close!
Summary: We recently stayed here for a trip to Disneyland.  I booked it originally because the perk of free parking and walking to Disney was what we wanted.  We were pleasantly surprised to find a clean, mostly updated property.  The room was a little small, but worked just fine for our small family of three. We asked for a room facing Disney and we stayed in room 310.  We were able to just see the fireworks over the neighboring hotel.  The restaurant downstairs was fantastic for breakfast and I would highly recommend booking the breakfast package.   The walk from the entrance of the hotel to the entrance of Disneyland took only 13 minutes.  It was an easy, well lit walk.  It was definitely worth the time and saving the money for parking at Disneyland.    The *only* downside I had was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel Indigo Is Overall the Best! Close! Customer Care and very Personable!!!!
Summary: Love the personal one on one service you get at this hotel! Close to many restaurants, Disneyland, Downtown Disney, and they have a very cute little restaurant that serves great food if you decide to eat in house.  We have been very happy with the first time we found them and it gets better each time after, highly recommend them! The staff is amazing! Try them out i'm sure you will agree !

Summary: This hotel is close to everything you need in Anaheim. It's next to great restaurants and just a couple blocks from Disneyland. The hotel is super clean and the rooms are very comfortable. I was really impressed with the laminate floors and the Spa shower. We had a great stay and will stay again.

Summary: We visited recently with our grandaughter and found the hotel to be quite good. The staff were extremely helpful and the rooms a nice size. We ate in the hotel restaurant area several times but I must say that I didn't rate it very highly. Breakfast was Ok but for other meals I would suggest eating out. I would certainly recommend this property for family visits.

Summary: This hotel is our go-to Disneyland Hotel. We've stayed in this hotel at least four times and each time we were happier than the first visit. The staff is super friendly and very accommodating. Our rooms have always been clean and tidy upon arrival as is the hotel. The bed is super comfy. The restaurant serves good food (not a fan of the coffee though) and they even have a mini fountain and light show out in front of the hotel in the evenings! The walk to Disneyland is about 15-20 minute walk from the hotel. We will be returning to Disneyland again next year, and I know where we'll be staying!

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights in a family suite. We had a superb time and would happily recommend this hotel to anyone. Spent lots of time researching hotels in the area and so happy we chose this one. The accommodation was clean, spacious, modern and quiet and the staff were professional and friendly. The beds were comfortable and the walk in shower powerful. The Aveda products were lovely and replenished daily. The free under ground parking was an added bonus. The hotel is situated in a great location for Disneyland (10 minute walk), Knotts Berry Farm (20 minutes drive) and a variety of restaurants in walking distance. Would happily stay here again.

Summary Heading: Very nice stay, would come again
Summary: We stayed here in mid October to for our 3 day visit to Disneyland.  On our previous visit we stayed at the Park Vue Inn, directly across the street from the park entrance.  Both hotels are very good, but I think if I had to do it again, I'd stay at Hotel Indigo.  Here's why:  Park Vue Inn definitely takes the cake when it comes to location.  It just can't be beat.  However, Hotel Indigo is about 1/2 mile from the entrance and a quick Uber Ride (if you want to save your feet and legs for the park) is an excellent option.  We used it a lot and, other than waiting a few minutes for Uber to arrive, we didn't feel there was much difference from walking across the street.  Hotel Indigo location also had some advantages, for example it is closer to some different restaurants we like
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed in July for the Scentsy Family Reunion.  Could not have asked for a better location.  Walking distance to the convention center, many restaurants and Disneyland.  Staff was very friendly, room was clean and large, although lacked any sort of view, certainly not a deal breaker. The free parking was appreciated, and as a solo traveler, I felt safe and did not worry about leaving my car in the garage.

The rooms are modern, spacious and spotlessly clean.  We were lucky enough to have a room with a fireworks view so we caught the Disneyland fireworks on multiple occasions whilst relaxing in the room.  Disneyland itself is a short (10-15 mins) walk down South Harbour boulevard which is well lit and easy to navigate, although the ART stops at the corner of the block for those that would prefer not to walk. Summary: Clean and spacious rooms and decent location next to Disneyland. Parking is free in basement. Decent cafe next to reception. Service is slow and might be more prompt. i had an issue with the hotel staff, but it was resolved.

Summary: The hotel has the best location in Anaheim.  I'm not much of a walker, but it is very close to Disneyland and Anaheim Garden Walk.  The staff is very friendly and makes magic happen outside the park.  Perfect upscale hotel outside the park to stay at.

Summary: From the moment we walked in till the moment we checked-out I could not stop complimenting the hotel. Every nook and cranny was spotless and appeared as if the hotel was only a few days old. Summary: Everything about this hotel was AWESOME!!! A walk to Disneyland, restaurants, Walgreens and more places. TOTALLY RECOMMEND. Thank you to the ladies at front desk and the bartender Jesus. Aloha and Mahalo

Summary: This hotel has an overall great vibe , stayed here for the 1st time second week of october for family vacation , who can beat FREE parking? Summary: Overall, a really great stay at this hotel.  We were there for 5 nights.  The Pros:  Parking is free which is unheard of in this area.  Most other hotels are around $20 a night. Most of the parking is also underground and gated which is a great security feature. The staff was great and very responsive to our needs.   The floors are wood which provides a clean look and feel. Housekeeping did a great job.  Toiletries provided we're very nice.   About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and there are tons of other restaurants within walking distance. Water show out front was pretty cool. We had breakfast at the hotel restaurant our last morning, and our food was delicious.  Cons: The walls are thin.  We had a third floor room and were awakened each morning @ 6:30 by the trash

Summary: Hotel Indigo is our home away from home when we visit Disneyland or California in general! Summary: I’m happy with my stay at this hotel overall. Pros: room was clean, staff is super friendly, location is good, beds were suuuuuuper comfy and wifi was strong. Cons: walls are super thin. Like we could hear someone coughing in the room next to us! We could hear people walking upstairs which was not so nice for a good night of sleep. The room also smelled a little weird (like humidity).  But overall a very nice hotel. Would stay here again!

Summary Heading: Modern, Comfortable, Clean, Close to Disney Parks
Summary: We loved our stay at the Indigo. The hotel is clean, modern, and has a boutique feel to it. The location is about a ten minute walk to the Disney parks; if you'd rather take a shuttle, the ART shuttle stops right next door, and you can ride it for a small fee. Our room had two very comfortable beds and a sitting area with a sofa and a flat screen t.v. The front desk service was friendly and helpful, and they even gave us a thoughtful little welcome bag since we were celebrating a special occasion. There's a good restaurant in the lobby; we were able to grab breakfast there before heading out to the parks which was really convenient. There's also a small gym and a pool. The only thing missing for us was a bathtub, but it had a nice shower, and it wasn't a deal breaker for us

Summary: Stayed at the Hotel Indigo to watch a show at the new HOB in Anaheim.  They moved from Downtown Disney and the new facility is really nice.  I was impressed at how close the hotel was from GardenWalk.  It was within stumbling distance from the venue, lol.  Other than a few restaurant, that GardenWalk was pretty empty and dead.  Not sure why this place is not hopping considering it is close to all the action.  The hotel was modern and the staff were nice.  Tight on parking, but everything else was perfect.

Summary: We are locals from South OC, but we attended a car show this past weekend and decided to stay in town.  We have always driven by Hotel Indigo on the way to Disney. The pool is tiny as is the pool area, it wasn’t busy, but we didn’t have the desire to even try it. Summary: Really a great hotel. Close too Disneyland not a lot of crowds to deal with.  Free parking.   The only bad thing here is the shampoo and bath soap, they don't smell good. Bring your own.  Beds are comfortable. Everything nice and clean.  Will stay here again soon.

Summary: Nice clean hotel with average rates. Close to Disney. Pet friendly. Has a small pool and a workout room with two treadmills but not much more. The restaurant makes a good egg breakfast, just don't get the oatmeal it's all water and little oatmeal. The rooms are nice and the beds were clean and soft. Staff are friendly.

Summary: Hotel Indigo Anaheim had amazing customer service and great rooms. On arrival we were greeted and given water bottles by the staff at the check in desk. We were also provided with a guest key card for the secure underground parking (as this usually requires a room key but we arrived prior to check in time). Our hotel room had a separate lounge room, which was very nice.  The complimentary breakfast was in the restaurant next to the lobby and had good sweet and savoury options (much nicer than the complimentary continental breakfast that we were used to during the trip). Front desk staff also offered newspapers to read while we were eating, which was a nice touch. It was only a 10-15 min walk to Disneyland and California Adventure park. Summary Heading: Good Option Near all the Anaheim Attractions
Summary: Stayed here for a night in September, when I had business in Orange County. The room was huge, had an interesting style, and all the amenities one would need when traveling. Parking was relatively easy and it was within walking distance to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. The internet was horrible, and I didn’t even get a connection through my provider, so I had no access while in my hotel room. Also, since there was only one elevator it often took a while to get to and from when on higher floors. I would stay here again if I had business in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel has been our choice a couple of times and we've had pleasant experiences both times. The hotel decor is modern and I love it. Rooms are clean and it is a pretty short walking distance to the pedestrian Disneyland entrance. Also, it is right next to great restaurants and stores for dinner/outings outside of the Disney park or Downtown Disney, called Gardenwalk. Only thing is the beds are not "super" comfortable. Summary: This is the second time we stayed here to visit Disneyland. Very polite and friendly staff. Room very clean and bed comfortable. Easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  I would highly recommend this hotel.

Summary: Stayed here while family was in town. The staff was amazingly helpful and gave us everything we needed. Summary: I travel a lot and I must say the staff here are exceptional.  Jorden at the front desk was very helpful with area and hotel information.  The restaurant is a hidden gem. Summary: We stay here in August. Arrived early morning but they let us do all the check in paperwork and park the car so we could get into Disney for the day instead off paying to park the car else where. They even said they would contact us when the room was ready but we said we wouldn't be back till later. On return we were quickly issued with our room. Rooms are really nice beds are very comfortable. Bathroom has a lovely walk in shower. Coffee maker which was great after long days in Disney. We ate first night in the hotel and food was very good. Summary: BUTTONS FOR HOTEL RATINGS ON THIS PAGE ARE BROKEN  We were very pleased by this hotel.  A good value.  Good  and friendly service and nice decor. Summary: Was down in LA for a wedding over labor day weekend. Stayed at a few hotels in the surrounding area, but hotel indigo was still my favorite. Summary Heading: Fantastic, boutique hotel close to Disney.

Summary Heading: Fantastic for our family Disney vacation
Summary: Coming from Australia for a Trip to Disneyland there is so many option and it can be confusing. We went with Hotel Indigo and it was perfect. Location is great. 10mins walk to the parks entry on flat shaded footpaths. We would get to the park at 8 - 12 then walk back to the hotel in the middle of the day for a swim and a nap before heading back for afternoon/nighttime at the park. The hotel has a great little restaurant in the lobby we had breakfast there most mornings with plenty of options. It’s also Close to food options Bubbagump shrimp, California pizza and Cheesecake Factory for dinner. CVS and Walgreens for all your supplies for Disneyland. So the location is great. Pool and hot tub is perfect for a break on hot summer days at the park. Every time we were at the pool a

Summary: The room is spacious, location is perfect within 10 mins walking distant to Disneyland. Its clean and tidy. The bed is so comfy I actually slept like a log here.   Free parking too, if you ever stay the night here, try the mexican restaurant "Sabrosada Fresh Mexican foods" which is around 5 mins from Hotel Indigo, Anaheim. Big portion. My husband ordered their breakfast burrito for $5.04 and it was HUGE. Then I've ordered mine two beef Tacos $7.64 it came out huge too. Its a very good deal plus you can take as much as chillies you want. I love chillies and they have other sauces there like salsa etc.  Overall staying at Hotel Indigo, Anaheim is PERFECT for us.   Thanks Hotel Indigo, Anaheim.

Summary: Lovely hotel within walking distance of Disney. Lots of Restaurants also within walking distance. Also free parking which was great considering what we paid in LA. Nice pool on the ground floor too. Lovely little hotel and would recommend.

Summary: As Disneyland Anual Passholders we have stayed in a few hotels surrounding Disneyland. Hotel Indigo was by far the best one yet. Everything from the employees to the sheets were a 10. All remodeled rooms and bathrooms. There is a pool which the family enjoyed the evening we arrived. Parking is underground and complimentary.   That same evening of our arrival we walked about 15 minutes to the front gate of Disneyland to buy our tickets for the next day to save some time in the morning.
