Summary Heading: Impeccably Clean, Great Value, Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel Indigo in Anaheim is an excellent value option near Disneyland for families or business travelers. The hotel is new and modern, with bright colors throughout.  Upon arrival, I was greeted quickly and handed my room key. Parking is gated in an underground garage, which requires a room key to access. The garage feels clean and safe, with convenient elevator access to the lobby and hotel rooms. Unlike most chain hotels in Anaheim, parking is free at Hotel Indigo, a savings of $12 to $30, compared to other hotels in the area.  I had room 129, a first floor room just past the outdoor pool. This two queen room was immaculately clean and in great condition. The only noise was from the guest laundry room across the hall.   Breakfast is not included, however there is a small

Summary: This hotel worked great for my husband and I. They offered the ability to pre check in, which we took advantage of so we could park our car and walk to Disneyland before our room was ready. The fact that this hotel has free parking is astonishing. We booked the hotel about a week before staying there and we were happy with the price compared to other hotels near Disneyland. Depending on how fast you walk, it can take as quick as 25 minutes to walk to the park. It’s actually a little closer than the Toy Story Parking Lot. Our room was clean and updated. It had non carpeted floors and a comfortable bed. We would consider staying here again if the opportunity presented itself.

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels on our road trip vacation and this has been the best. Very friendly staff, lovely room and decor and spotlessly clean. How kind. Towels provided by the pool was an added bonus. Coin laundry facilities within the hotel was a godsend too as we are a family of four on a road trip vacation. Restaurant area within hotel looked nice but we didn’t use it. Can’t recommend this place enough.

It was getting too tight for large conventions like VidCon and WonderCon.  A lot better than last year.  I am impressed at how more restaurants seem to be pooping up all the time.  We stayed at this hotel last year.  There is a new Starbucks, Blaze Pizza and a Seattle's Best Coffee nearby.  This is the perfect location for conventions and Disney. They have specials with pictures on the table, and smoked salmon is one of my all time favorites and my wife loves eggs Benedict. We ordered then the server comes back with the bad news, no smoked salmon. OK normally i would have just walked but my wife loves eggs benny and from the look of Yelp its very popular there. The rooms were a little bit outdated already, but still clean.  Huge beds and rooms just as we remember it.  Parking was free for hotel guests but the walk to Disneyland is still quite a bit so we choose to still take the car with us to Disney every morning since kids will be tired by the end-of-the-day and can not walk that far.  Several small eateries around the area too.  The street is very lively and lots of establishment open even after Disney closes.  Would stay here again due to competitive pricing.

So much easier to avoid stains/smells.  The shower is walk-in and large.  There is great pressure.  Aveda toiletries.  The staff is accommodating, outgoing and helpful. But, the best part of the hotel is the location.  It is about 15 min. walk to Disney parks.  But, that is not what makes this hotel a great option.  Most hotels around this hotel charge for parking.  Indigo does not.  And let me tell you that adds up.  There is no resort fee either.  There are many restaurants around the hotel and fast food within minutes. My parents from Washington State, my brother from Arizona, my sister from Northern California and my grandparents from Florida all visited the Happiest Place on Earth! We come every month except during Disney's peak month of July when the crowds are just miserable.  The hotels across the street from Disney don't have their own restaurants so we generally eat their continental breakfast, inside Disney for lunch and then fast food for dinner, but Indigo has its own restaurant and it is REALLY good.  Won't break your wallet either.  A little farther to walk to the parks, but this hotel is close to CVS

I went back and they were gone.  Jorden at the desk said no one turned them in.  I was devastated as they are expensive sunglasses.  I asked Jorden again two or three times over the next couple of days.  Each time he was caring and professional.  He went out of his way to search for them.  On our last morning Mimi Jeng was at the desk.  I asked her if she would look at the video surveillance they have in the lobby and she readily agreed.  We had to get on the road so we left before we got an answer.  Several hours down the road I get a call from Jorden saying he thought he had my glasses.  He
Manager Response: Dear Shannon H,  We are happy that you got your sunglasses back!   Thank you for your patience and i am glad Jorden was helpful to you.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Mimi the manager and her staff are the best. We have stayed at other IHG properties, but we will only stay here from now on. Free parking. Short walk to parks. Updated, comfortable rooms. Mimi went out of her way to make me feel welcome as a spire Elite member.

Summary: As a young adult couple sans kids who enjoys Disney, we wanted a calmer, nicer lodging experience that wouldn't break the bank and Hotel Indigo fit the bill perfectly. The rooms are bright and clean with wood floors and lovely smelling Aveda toiletries. The bed was comfortable, and although we did not receive the room location we requested, ours had a nice view of the pool as well as Disney's fireworks at night. The free parking was also a plus. While close to Disney, it's not as quick a walk as some other hotels and a free shuttle like many other local hotels offer would have launched this hotel to a full 5 stars. While I normally would have been happy to walk a little more, a recent knee injury had me conserving my steps for the parks, so we took a lyft each day.
Manager Response: We appreciate your great feedback!  Thank you for your compliments regarding our bright and clean rooms with hardwood floors and Aveda spa care amenities.  We do have rooms with views of the pool and Disney's seasonal fireworks based on availability.  We were very full in April - my apologies.  The walk to Disney is about 15-20 minutes and there is a city shuttle that leaves to Disney about every 20 minutes from the hotel next to the Hotel Indigo.  It is currently $5.50 per day for adults and $2.00 for children.  The day ticket is good all day.  Yes, we are one of the last hotels to offer complimentary parking and no resort fee.     Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Overall nice hotel for the price and free parking.

Summary: Wonderful place to stay. It’s clean, comfortable, and affordable.  I had a special request that the staff bent over backwards to accommodate me. It’s a short walk to Disneyland. The food in the restaurant is great.   I highly recommend Hotel Indigo. I’ll be back soon.

Summary Heading: What a great place to stay!!

The room we stayed in was clean and modern with everything you need. We had asked for a room at the back of the hotel as it is quieter and u get to see the fireworks from your window!!  Great view.   Bathroom was spotless and modern with great shower and plenty of hot water. Beds were huge and so comfortable.  There was even a sofa bed if you needed it. Lockable safe was free to use and wardrobes plenty big for four of us.   Pool and hot tub were
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that our Team welcomed you after a long flight.  Our goal is to welcome each guest to their home away from home while on holiday.    We prioritize cleanliness. Summary: We hosted a breakfast meeting here for our clients during the NAMM show. The food was fantastic... they refilled our coffee right away and made sure everyone was well fed.... Mimi Jeng (General Manager) made sure we had everything we needed and helped us find parking.   I would highly recommend this location to anyone else in need of a great meeting space. The amenities inside the hotel and in the surrounding areas are all you will need.   We have already booked our room again for next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending the Katella Meeting Room at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We hope to host your events in the future.    Very Best Regards, Hotel Indigo Team

Summary: Best hotel of the trip. The rooms are nice, they also properly recognize my status and it wasn't too far of a walk to the parks. my only complaint was breakfast was a little slow especially if you are looking to get a jump on the parks.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for letting us know that the Hotel Indigo Anaheim was the best hotel of your trip!  We appreciate your feedback so we can improve.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disneyland trip
Summary: Stayed here over Easter weekend with my wife and 16 year old.   I read a lot of reviews and have to say that the Hotel Indigo positive reviews ring true.   The room was very nice.  Clean and well appointed.   The beds were comfortable. The mini-fridge came in handy for leftovers.   Parking was free and easily accessible underground.   The front desk staff were very helpful and friendly.    Breakfast in the cafe was awesome and the service excellent.   We were very happy with our stay.   In addition,  it was an easy walk to Disneyland.    It was also just down the street from Cheesecake Factory (they do take out for the entire menu if you want to stay in and skip the line).  There were several other restaurants nearby.    We were very happy with our choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your Easter Weekend with us at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am happy to hear that you found our guestrooms to be clean and the beds to be comfortable.  We receive many compliments from guests about our luxurious bedding.  Yes, we try to offer convenience like refrigerators in the rooms, value like complimentary parking and quality service.  Chambers Bar & Bistro offers the best breakfast in town!  I hope you also got a chance to try our brunch, Happy Hour and or dinner.  We hope you will visit us again.    Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland!
Summary: Nice, comfortable room; free secure parking under the hotel.  Good restaurant.  General manager, Mimi Jeng was very helpful & welcoming. Much cozier & more personal than many of the larger hotels that cater to Disney visitors.  For those who would rather shop than go to Disney, it is very close to the Garden Walk with numerous restaurants, & House of Blues for concert goers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everytime I go to Anaheim i stay in this hotel INDIGO. Very nice place, wonderful people, great staff, friendly. Is close to everything. And a good place to relax and have a great time. Close to disney. Like the rooms, feels good everything in order .what ever you need i just have to ask. Very clean rooms. Courtous housekeeping ,friendly and organized people. Houaekeeping helps for anything you ask. Thank you .👍.
Manager Response: It is always great to hear that guests enjoy their stay.  I want to thank you for being a loyal, frequent guest.  Please do let me know if you need anything in your future stays.  We strive to be the home away from home for our guests.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is an excellent boutique style hotel located within a ten minute walk of the Disney Parks. Parking is gated and free. Hotel room was clean,  and the shower was fantastic.  Has a pool and restaurant but didn’t use either. My son left a souvenir sweatshirt in the hotel upon check out and when we realized, we called and they stored it until we came back a few days later. The hotel is next to Garden Walk where you can dine at Cheesecake Factory or PF Chang’s. The outlet mall is a  five minutes drive from the hotel too. Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location, free parking, clean room and deluxe shower!  You should try our Chambers Bar & Bistro next time!  Yes, we are two buildings away from the GardenWalk and all the popular restaurants.  Hope to see you again very soon!    Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: NEVER HEARD OF A HOTEL INDIGO, but this hotel was a real GEM!!!  Beautiful property, close to Disney, but not too close like the motels right across the street from the park.  My husband and I liked the hip feel of this hotel, away from the hustle and bustle of being across the street.  Rooms were really nice with wood floors and furniture with leather accents that I want in my own house.  Staff were friendly.  There is a restaurant inside, but we didn't try it.  Smelled yummy in the lobby so we will try it next time we stay.  Not sure when we can visit again since our Disney Annual Passes expired and Disney raised their prices. but we will be back for sure.  The only problem we encountered were noisy guests at the pool on one of the nights.  We called the Front Desk and I'm not
Manager Response: We are happy that your first experience with our brand.  Yes, the Hotel Indigo brand are boutique hotels that represent their own community with the perks of being part of the IHG family of hotels.  I am glad you like the rooms.  Thank you for your compliments about out Team!  We hope you will stay with us whenever you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with fantastic personal customer service
Summary: I stayed at the Indigo for the first time this year while attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  From check-in to check-out, everyone was very personable and looked to make sure my needs and those of my family were taken care of.  We had breakfast each day in the restaurant.  Each time, the servers worked as a team to make sure that we had everything we needed from refills on our drinks to the morning paper.  The location is PERFECT as it is within walking distance of the convention center as well as the nearby restaurants.  The rooms are comfortable with all the necessary amenities (the beds were particularly comfortable!).  I will be attending the same conference next year and will very likely stay at the Indigo once again.
Manager Response: Dear Brian F, thank you for your compliments about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Yes, we are within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and there are many restaurants nearby.  We are also just 2 blocks away from Disneyland.  We hope you will return from a leisure trip very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We checked in on Tuesday, easy and fast check in had a room that faced the park on the 4th floor. We were told you can see the fireworks from our room however, Disney did not have fireworks while we were there. The restaurant in the lobby is great. Much butter than your typical breakfast. I had an egg white scramble my kid shared the egg, pancake, breakfast. It wasn’t busy while we were there and there Was no wait ! The room was large and easily fit all 4 of us. Plenty of storage for your items. The bathroom was large and the shower was amazing. Only complaint was the the elevator was super slow but it is only a 4 story building so stairs were much fast. We would definitely stay her again!
Manager Response: We really appreciate detailed feedback so we can see how we did.  Thank you for your compliments about our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro!  Yes, our deluxe showers are amazing with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda spa care amenities.  Thank you again and please visit us again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and great customer service!
Summary: This hotel has the best customer service! The location is great! Short walk to the convention center, Disney, and close to many restaurants. We have stayed here for quite a few years and are never disappointed in the service we receive.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a loyal guest.  Hotel Indigo Team

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel close to the Convention Center and Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Indigo for two nights.  We come to Anaheim for business about 2 times every year.  I have to say this is the best hotel in the area.    We loved it.  Mimi the manager is excellent and keeps everything running smoothly.  Service at the restaurant is excellent, Alfredo made sure we had everything we needed. He was able to get my husband a very specific smoothie that he wanted one of the mornings we were there.    In general we felt at home in this hotel, it has the feeling of a small personalized hotel.   Everyone has a smile and great service disposition to help and meet customers needs.  We felt sorry that they were fully booked for the following 3 nights we would be in the area.   We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We appreciate you as a loyal frequent guest.  I thank you for your 5-star review.  We will make sure Alfredo gets a copy of your compliments.  Our Team works hard to provide great, personalized service.  Looking forward to your next visit! Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great  Boutique Hotel Close to Disneyland
Summary: I'm glad we decided to stay at Hotel Indigo. The staff was wonderful, the location convenient, the price was worth it. Most of the staff we encountered were outgoing and friendly, those that we not were still helpful. The room was bigger than I expected and comfortable. It's about a 15 minute walk to the Disney parks and we felt safe walking the neighborhood after the parks late closings. We will definitely consider staying here again!
Manager Response: Our Team thanks you for your wonderful compliments.  Yes, we are located in the heart of the Anaheim Resort.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: The comfiest bed I’ve ever slept in
Summary: We stayed here for two nights to visit Disneyland. I can’t recommend the hotel highly enough. The staff were fantastic and the rooms were great. I have never stayed in a comfier bed in my life which was just what we needed after 14 hours walking around Disneyland.  Free parking was included and easy to access.  The walk to the park entrance was about ten minutes at a slow pace so an ideal location.  I will be looking for other Indigo Hotels to stay in!
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team appreciates your compliments on their service.  I am happy to hear that you liked our room.  Guests rave about our new pillows!  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland.  We are one of the last hotels that do not charge for parking, resort fee and WiFi.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We are so happy with our choice of this hotel!  We booked a group of 16 rooms and were delighted from the minute we arrived!  Big shoutout to Jordan at the desk who was ready for every situation!  The rooms were clean, staff so helpful and everyone talked about the comfortable beds the next morning.  It was a 15 minute walk to Disney and a quick ride back on the city bus if the kids were tired.  The food at the Chambers restaurant was delicious!  We were delightfully surprised!
Manager Response: It was an absolute pleasure to meet you and your family and friends celebrating your daughter's wedding.  Our Team was impressed with one of the most unique and creative wedding parties we had ever seen with the custom Minnie ears for the ladies and Disney themed bow ties for the gentlemen.  Our Team was trying to help guess the locations of the scavenger hunt at Disneyland!  Thank you for your compliments about Jorden - I left him know to please read your review!  I am happy that you had a good experience at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has great food!  I know I have gained weight working here :)  Thank you again for making us a part of your daughter's wedding memories.  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Front desk was polite and helpful, honored reservation request for a top floor room away from elevator. Upgraded because I'm a club member, which was nice. Maybe I've been spoiled by the Indigo in San Diego. Maybe I shouldn't have expected this to be as awesome as that. That hotel has urban swank, this hotel feels like a remodeled budget chain. Upgrade meant that our double queen room was longer and had a sofa bed at the end. The room felt sad and empty, traffic was noisy, and the trendy design felt slapped on as an afterthought. However, you will get a comfy bed with lots of pillows, a wonderful bathroom (great shower, no tub) plus everything is very clean. I was just hoping for more character, a room with some ambience, ours did not feel as nice as the pictures.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments on our Front Desk Team.  We appreciate all feedback so that we can improve.  Yes, guests rave about our bedding, new pillows and our deluxe shower with shower head and hand shower.    Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at several Hotel Indigo locations and always have an excellent stay - the hotel in Anaheim is no different! Comfortable bed. Clean hotel. Easy travel to Disneyland. We chose to take a Uber there and back to avoid the hassle of the parking garage, it was nice having both options! Whenever we travel we always check for a Hotel Indigo before booking!
Manager Response: I love the title of your review!  Cleanliness is our #1 priority at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do all we can to make sure you have a comfortable, enjoyable stay.  We are located in the heart of Anaheim and offer complimentary parking.  We hope you will stay with us again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Great hotel with friendly and helpful staff.  Love to go in the off season!!  Less busy, but its still Disneyland.   Sleek modern style hotel.  I have stayed before and this is my go to hotel when in this area.  Reasonable priced and clean.  I love the Taco Tuesday in the restaurant. Ask the staff for recommendations, so far all have been great.  A wonderful stay as usually.
Manager Response: Thank you, Todd, W, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are happy to hear that we are your go to hotel.  Yes, the Taco Tuesday is really good.  We hope to see you again very soon.    Kindest Regards Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Went to stay at the  hotel next-door disgusting went to indigo for breakfast and ended up staying for a couple days, very clean very modern excellent excellent staff great Pool outside and Jacuzzi, good breakfast a lot of places to eat in the area and a five minute Uber ride to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wow! What a great title. Thank you for your review. I am glad you found the Hotel Indigo Anaheim to be clean and modern. Our Team appreciates your shout out. We hope to see you again very soon!  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for just one night because it was close to Gardenwalk and the House of Blues. We couldn’t have been happier. Staff were very friendly and the location was perfect. Overall, it was relatively quiet. There are several restaurants nearby and it’s relatively close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that your one night stay at Hotel Indigo was great.  Yes, we are walking distance to the House of Blues at the GardenWalk and Disneyland.  I hope you will return for a longer visit next time.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My partner and I wanted to visit Disneyland and get some sun, and this hotel was a great pick. Easy ten minute walk to the main gates, nice cafe' in the lobby, and a bar, too! Since we weren't bringing kids (thank goodness!) this was a nice place to stay, as it had tasteful decor and didn't seem to be full of little ones. One night, we had three very loud guys in the room that was adjoining our room partying and yelling at 2:00 am. I called the desk three times, and each time the brave young woman knocked on their door and asked them to quiet down. She offered us free breakfast, which was very good, and they finally went to sleep. That event aside, the hotel was quiet and comfortable. After leaving, we realized we left a garment and they were helpful and happily sent it to me.
Manager Response: Wow!  What a wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim,  I am happy to hear that you liked our tasteful decor.  I hope you enjoyed meals and drinks at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you for compliments about our Team Member and I am glad she was able to assist.  I just returned from taking the item to the local USPS office today because we missed the pickup this morning.  The garment is on its way back to you!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Wife and I stayed here for her birthday weekend for a visit to Disneyland and local restaurant for a special dinner. We were very pleasantly surprised at the quality of property, staff hospitality, restaurant and value of this stay. It was our first weekend getaway at Hotel Indigo and it will definitely not be our last, we are already thinking about when we can go back and stay there again. The property is very clean, new facility, modern decor, we liked the comfortable bed and pillows, we liked the multiple head shower, we liked the hardwood floors, and having a mini fridge and Keurig coffee maker in our room. The staff is AWESOME, greeted me by name as a member, acknowledged that it was wife's birthday and gave us FREE vouchers for breakfast for her b-day present. The staff at
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for a fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and our Chambers Bar & Bistro!  I am glad to hear that our Team exceeded your expectations in property quality, staff hospitality and restaurant.  Yes, our hotel is new and modern.  Our spacious rooms are clean with hardwood floors and comfortable bedding.  Our deluxe showers have both a shower head and hand shower with Aveda spa products.  Guests enjoy the Keurig coffee makers.  We are close to Morton's Steakhouse and many other popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  There is a Disneyland shuttle bus stop at the hotel next door, where tickets can be purchased at their Front Desk.  We are also walking distance to Disney.  Many of our guests park at our hotel for free and walk to the parks to save money on Disney parking.  Our restaurant has great food with a full bar.  It sounds like you got to enjoy dinner under the stars at our Chambers Outdoor Patio with the heat lamps and fire pit.  I hope you will celebrate future birthdays at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!    Kindest Regards,      Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Me and a few friends went to a concert at the house of blues. This hotel was literally right next door to the house of Blues in the garden walk in downtown Anaheim. Not only did we have an excellent time at the bar before the show.. we relaxed on the patio after. Enjoyed wonderful staff and comfy beds.  Definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had fun at the House of Blues and a great stay at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes we are very close to the GardenWalk.  Thank you for your compliments on our wonderful staff and comfortable beds.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is a solid choice for a Disneyland vacation. It is a relatively easy walk to the theme parks and the rooms are clean and comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful in my experience.   One complaint is that the pull out sofa beds are not comfortable. They might be fine for a child but would not recommend for an adult. Overall though, I liked this spot and would definitely consider it the next time I am in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland.  I am happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable.  Our Team appreciates your compliments about our friendly and helpful service.  We take all feedback seriously so we can continue to improve.    Thank you and hope to see you again very soon! All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Love this hotel.  Super close to Disneyland, free parking, super clean, sleek and modern decor.  We parked there then just walked to Disneyland - super easy, no hassle with Disneyland parking that is expensive and can take forever.  Really nice room. The staff was so friendly and helpful.  I'll stay here every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We appreciate your compliments.  Sincerely, Hotel Indigo Team

Summary: Stayed at Hotel Indigo in December and loved it. Room was extremely comfortable, very clean and had a lovely bathroom. We had booked the  2 x queen room and this accommodated three adults perfectly. Wonderful location: short walk to Disneyland, Starbucks & Walgreens opposite and Cheesecake Factory within a couple of minutes stroll away. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Wow!  Great to see a review titled, "Perfection"!  I am happy to hear that you found out hotel to be extremely comfortable and very clean.  Yes, the guests rave about our deluxe shower, shower head and hand shower with Aveda products.  I personally think that our bowl sinks and LED vanity mirrors are very nice.  I want it for my own house!  Yes, we are close to many popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  Were you able to try our own Chambers Bar & Bistro?  We have great food and specialty drinks.  I hope you will stay with us again very soon when visiting Disneyland.  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my Niece for a December trip.  Front staff is always friendly, offered us little water bottles as we checked in, and changed our room quickly and without issue when the first room had an odd smell.  BEDS are so comfortable.  We had a room overlooking the pool.  It was quiet, housekeeping kept things clean, and overall we were happy.  Note that this is a walking distance hotel but it was worth the $5-6 Uber/Lyft when feet were tired after a long day.  No breakfast but parking is free.  One of our "go to" hotels in the Disneyland area.  We would recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for a great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you found our beds to be comfortable.  We just purchased new, deluxe pillows and linen and donated our previous linen.  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland.  We offer complimentary parking, WiFi and do not charge resort fees.  Thank you again for recommending us.  Please visit us again very soon!  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is about a 25 minute walk from the main gate of Disneyland.  It is a safe, well-lit walk, with businesses on each side of the street.  There is a number of stores that carry grocery items if you want to get some things for your room.    Our room was clean, the TV didn't work and took two trips for maintenance to fix it, but we experienced no problems parking, our 3rd floor room was quiet, and the elevators are extremely slow.  Take the stairs unless you're hauling luggage.    The staff was very friendly and helpful.  There are shops and restaurants all around this hotel close by, so you can plan to leave Disneyland, rest up at your room, grab a bite at one of the restaurants, and then go back to the park.    The hotel is a bit expensive, but considering you're close
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed review which is helpful to other travelers.  Yes, we are within walking distance to Disneyland, stores and to many popular restaurants.  I hope you got a chance to try our own Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  We have the best cooked to order breakfast in town as well as great Happy Hour selection with a full bar.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is by far the loudest hotel I've ever stayed in. They put us in room 119 which is right by the lobby. You could hear every person that passes by on the way in and out of the hotel. The doors slam all morning. You can even hear street traffic. The walls are also very thin, the alarm from the room next to me woke me up. After a late night at Disneyland due to a special event that kept the park open till 1am I was hoping to sleep in a little but there is no way that was happening.
Manager Response: Elisabeth P,  Greetings from IHGService! Thank you for your stay and for taking the time to leave us the above review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim, CA. I am sorry to see that noise became a factor in making your stay with us less than ideal. I want all areas of your stays with our hotels to be pleasant and this includes having a quiet room to stay.   IHG values you and continuously aims that all guest feedback be heard and resolved. Your comments have been shared with the hotel management as reference for improvement. I have also sent you a Private message in an effort to follow-up on your experience.   I am looking forward to your reply and I hope you give our hotel a second chance to serve you better.  Sincerely,  Clayton G. Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: Upscale Boutique Brand with nice amenities thwarted by remodel within motel footprint
Summary: Awkward layout obviously came from a remodel of a motel, making it difficult to check in: Needed a room key to get into gated garage but couldn't find parking during check-in and no valet on-hand so ended up parking temporarily in a handicapped space: a big no-no, but other guests were doing the same. Small lobby consists of front desk and a few chairs, not inviting or comfortable. Driveway to underground parking narrow (it took some time and quite a bit of maneuvering to back out of it when I found that I couldn't enter the garage without a room key).  Once in the room, very nice remodel with new decor and amenities; loved the hardwood floors! BUT: (1) Needed to go to another floor to get ice; (2) room very noisy all night from street traffic - windows didn't keep noise out at
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments regarding our nice amenities.  We appreciate your feedback so that we can improve.  I am glad you liked the room and decor.  We will review all of the experiences you listed to make sure we make all corrections.  Once again, thank you for letting us know the issues you had during your stay.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Our second time staying here and we can't say enough...LOVE IT!!!! Staff is professional, rooms are clean, grounds are perfect, and they have a bar with excellent food.....with in walking distance to Disneyland....can't wait to go back....
Manager Response: Great to hear that you returned for a second stay and had a positive experience.  Thank you for your compliments regarding our Team and the cleanliness of our rooms.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro offers excellent food.  We cannot wait for your return visit.  Thank you again, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: From the front desk to the restaurant and bar....the staff were exceptional. I felt appreciated and welcome. They even gave my daughter a little gift for her 16th birthday, which we were celebrating. We liked our 1st stay so much...we ended up coming again the next weekend to visit Disney. The location is great. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area and will definitely be staying again the next time we visit.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday once again to your daughter!  I am glad you are now officially part of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim Family and hope you celebrate many occasions with us at the Disneyland Resort.  Until next time, Mimi Jeng, General Manager

Summary Heading: Not as good as it used to be
Summary: This was my favorite hotel in Anaheim. Their customer service used to be really fabulous. Our last visit over the holidays was not so good though. The customer service was ok and the room was clean enough, not great, just ok. There were maintenance and housekeeping issues with our room. When we mentioned our disappointment at check out we were told that corporate had come in and told them to change the way they were doing things. It's a real shame, because this is just an ok hotel now. We won't stay here again unless there is a really great bargain. It's in a great location but there are better, cleaner hotels in the area that I would rather stay at for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you cantbelieveit_B for your review.  We appreciate all feedback.  Our Team strives to improve everyday.  We appreciate your compliments on our customer service.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel was a fabulous choice for the Disney parks - I was so confused about where to stay but knew I had made the right choice after arriving.  The room was very clean, the showers amazing (not to mention the aveda products) and there was a huge tv!  I have to say the beds are some of the comfiest I have ever come across.  The hotel staff were extremely accommodating when I let them know a friend would be visiting partway during my stay, and changed my room from king to two queens with no extra fuss.  There are many food choices nearby especially at Anaheim Garden walk which is literally the next block (one of the biggest Cheesecake Factorys I’ve ever seen), and there is an ihop and Starbucks nearby.  Blaze pizza opposite the hotel is also great.  I went shopping at CVS and
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review!  Your comments are so helpful to other travelers.  I am happy to hear that you found your room to be clean and yes, we have deluxe showers with shower heads, hand showers and Aveda Spa Products.  We appreciate our comments on our Team and service provided!  We are centrally located in the Heart of the Anaheim Resort...walking distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and GardenWalk.  We are upgrading our WiFi.  Thank you again and hope to see you soon!  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My husband and I took an adults only getaway to Disneyland. I chose Hotel Indigo based on both the location and reviews. This hotel exceeded our expectations in every way. The staff were friendly and accommodating from our arrival to our departure. Their customer service was truly top notch. We appreciated that the hotel honored all of our requests and assisted us with all of our questions throughout the trip.   The location was convenient to Disneyland, taking only about 15 minutes by foot. We walked there each day, and took taxis for less than $10 back 2 out of 3 nights because of our tired feet. The hotel is right across from Starbucks, very close to Walgreens, and within walking distance of P.F. Changs, McCormick & Schmick's, The Cheesecake Factory, and Bubba Gump.   The
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear that you and your husband had a wonderful getaway to Disneyland.  I am happy to hear that we exceeded expectations.  Thank you for calling our service "top notch."  Our Team works hard to provide the best service.  Yes, we are the closest IHG property to Disney's Theme Parks.  We are centrally located, across the street from Starbucks and Walgreen's.  We are only two buildings away from The GardenWalk with all of the popular restaurants you mentioned.  I am glad you found our rooms to be spacious and clean.  The Hotel Indigo is a modern, boutique brand and we do our best to provide an upscale, yet personable experience.  Our Chambers Bar and Bistro has the best breakfast entrees in town!  I am sorry, we are in the process of updating our menu.   Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Wow - a great place to stay
Summary: We stayed here last week, wanting to spend a day at Disneyland. Checked in at 9am and were allowed to park the car free all day, then returned quite late to get our room keys. The manager on duty upgraded us to a wonderful suite which we really enjoyed. Breakfast next day was also great- and cheap! The hotel renovation is awesome (we stayed here 4 years ago when it was a Holiday Inn Express) - the whole hotel has a great vibe and the rooms are modern and funky. The hotel is really close to Disneyland ( a 10 minute walk at most), is surrounded by excellent restaurants, and is the perfect place to stay!
Manager Response: Wow - what a great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Thank you for your compliments.  Yes, we are the closest IHG Hotel to Disneyland and we are surrounded by popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  I am glad that you got a chance to try our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We are a boutique hotel, new, modern and funky, as you described.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon!  All The Best! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Indigo is our first hotel we stayed during our 3 weeks trip along West Coast and Canada. Stayed two nights at this hotel and what positive about this hotel is excellent location with lots of restaurants nearby, comfy room, and outstanding breakfast waiter named Jose who is friendly and served us with smile.  Since this menu to order breakfast, we have to pay for children breakfast which is not happened for Indigo hotels we stayed in Europe where children is free.  However, we really like the buttermilk pancake which is one of the best pancake we ever tried.    The negative side which caused me not to vote full stars because they didn't upgrade my room even though we have put notice on my reservation request.  I asked this request because I am spire elite member which is almost
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We appreciate your compliment about our Team Member Jose at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Yes, we are centrally located near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center with a lot of restaurants nearby.  We always try to upgrade rooms for our IHG Rewards Club Spire Elite Members.  I am sorry you did not receive it on this trip.  We are always striving to improve.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We booked Indigo through Priceline, got a good deal and we are anxious to see what expected us. To our surprise the hotel was awesome. Room is brand new, spacious and comfortable. The crew was very friendly. It is so good to be treated so well. The restaurant is reasonably priced and has decent food. They were always willing to get us breakfast even after the time for breakfast. Did I mention free parking? What a treat. And the best for last...the location! U will end up close to Disneyland, the Angels stadium and across the street from Starbucks, a pizza place I forgot the name, CVS, Walgreens and various other businesses to support your stay.  We did the research and I’m telling u, it will be hard to find a better deal so well located. Go for it!
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our rooms to be new, spacious and comfortable.  We appreciate your compliments about our service.  Yes we have good food at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Our location is perfect for guests visiting Disneyland, catching a game at Angels Stadium or attending a Conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  We have new restaurants and stores all within walking distance.    All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is our 2nd time staying at a Hotel Indigo and it didn't disappoint. Our reason for being there was Disneyland, so we weren't in the room very much. But it was clean, comfortable and convenient to Disneyland, convenience stores, food options, etc.  The staff members we experienced were all very friendly.  Our window looked straight at a wall and there was a lot of outside traffic noise at times (sirens) but that's not the hotel's fault.  Overall, a good stay and I'd stay here again.  Great value!
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear that you had a great 2nd stay!  We hope you will return for more visits!  Cleanliness is our number one priority.  Yes, we are one of the closest hotels to Disneyland.  We are conveniently located near GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory and we are across the street Starbucks and Walgreen's.  Thank you for your compliments regarding our Team!  It means the world to them to read positive comments about their service.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 2 night for an event and Disneyland. Our first night we have a room next to us who played music all night and kept us up for most the night. We called the front desk and let them know and they did address the other guest immediately. The next morning I called to ask to move rooms no question asked she had another room ready for us! Everyone was so nice, professional and accommodating. I would 100% return! The team at the restaurant was amazing as well, very nice!  Thank you to the hotel indigo team for making our stay restful.   Very close to Disneyland and a lot of restaurants with in walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Second time was just as good as the first
Summary: We first stayed at the Hotel Indigo in 2015. I am happy to report that the hotel has maintained extremely high level quality of service, cleanliness, and appointments as it did on our first stay. With an extremely attractive price point and only 10 minute walk from the main gates of Disneyland I can’t recommend this hotel enough to those planning to visit the Magic Kingdom.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest!  Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay both times.  Yes, we are the closest IHG property to Disneyland.  We hope you see you again very soon, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I have always stayed at this hotel, even when it was Holiday Inn.  Love the renovation and the friendly staff.  We also had a great meal and adult beverages at the restaurant/bar.  Walking distance to Disneyland and CVS/Walgreens is nearby, in case you forget something. I would always recommend this hotel.  Thanks, Hotel Indigo, for a safe and comfortable place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staffs are great. Sandy at the front desk was so friendly. Not minding working till midnight on New Years Eve. Smile is always on her face just to make guest feels at home. Great GM. More power to you Mimi
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review.  Our Team appreciates it when they are recognized.  I am happy to hear Sandy made you feel at home.  Hope to see you again very soon!  All the Best in the New Year! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful second stay at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim
Summary: This was our second visit to this great hotel having last stayed as part of our honeymoon in December 2015. We are so glad we chose to stay here again.   We stayed for 7 nights this time in a King room. Check in was simple and quick and the receptionist was very friendly. Our room was on the second floor, overlooking the pool.  The room was light and decently sized with plenty of storage space. There are drawers and hanging space and a safe big enough for a 15" laptop. There is a good sized fridge and the bed was very comfortable. There's a Keurig coffee machine and pods provided. It was also spotlessly clean.  The bathroom is a good size as well and I appreciated the power shower only instead of a shower over the tub. There is enough vanity space with good lighting and more
Manager Response: Thank you for making a second visit to the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  How wonderful to hear that your first visit was on your honeymoon!  Yes, our rooms are spacious and functionally designed in contemporary decor.  Our amenities are second to none with Keurig coffees & teas and Aveda spa care products in our deluxe shower.  Thank you for your compliments on our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We have the best Happy Hour deals in town.  I hope you got to try our excellent, cooked-to-order breakfast.  We are centrally located in the heart of Anaheim, not just close to Disneyland, but within walking distance to Starbucks, CVS and Walgreen's.  We hope you will return again for your future wedding anniversaries.    Thank you again and Happy New Year! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable Hotel Within A Great Location
Summary: Hotel Indigo's main advantage is its location: it's a short walk away from Disneyland.  In addition to this, the staff were very friendly and helpful.  The first room we were assigned to was a bit of a nightmare: the walls were very thin and the room itself was only separated by a door from the room next to ours.  The noise became so unbearable at one point, I called reception to see if they could move us to another room.  They quickly responded and had us moving within less than half an hour.  Unfortunately, the A/C in the next room wouldn't shut off.  I reported to have the problem fixed but no one came to repair the unit.  I spoke with the supervisor on duty, Jordan, to discuss the issue and he promised me extra IHG rewards points to make up for the inconvenience.    I
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback.  We are always looking to improve.  Thank you for your compliments about our Team's friendly service.  Yes, we have spacious, modern rooms.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed our Aveda spa care products.  We hope you will visit us again.  Have a Wonderful New Year! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Myself and 3 colleagues stayed here for three nights on a business trip. For what we needed it was excellent. Really friendly staff, nice choices at breakfast with very tasty cooked options, easy parking and good for us was the near by restaurant options in the Anaheim garden walk. Everything was super clean, rooms a very good size and comfortable as well, slept well with no noise as my room was at the back of the hotel. There are 2 reasons why this isn't a 5 stat review. 1. The internet connection at the back of the hotel was very poor 2. It took an eternity to get hot water in the mornings, on my last morning it took 5 MINUTES for the shower to get hot, no exaggeration.  Now talking to my colleagues they experienced delays with getting hot water as well, so I thought it was
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you would return to the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Team always appreciates guest compliments.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has great food.  Like you mentioned, we are located close to other restaurants at the GardenWalk, like the Cheesecake Factory.  Cleanliness is our priority!  Thank you for your feedback!  We are always striving to improve.  Hope to see you again very soon. Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for boutique hotel near Disneyland
Summary: Clean, a few blocks walk to Disneyland, walking distance to many restaurants and shops...free parking and free WiFi!  Pool, jacuzzi and small gym.   Great Wall murals make this a cool retreat from the parks. Nice bar and assortment of food for purchase.  Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for a 5-star review!  We are located in the heart of the Disneyland Resort.  Yes, we are one of the last hotels in Anaheim that offer complimentary parking and WiFi.  We do not have resort fees.  Guests can view Disney's spectacular fireworks display from our Pool & Jacuzzi area.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed dining at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We hope you will join us again very soon.  Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is our third time staying at this hotel with our kids.  We get multiple rooms as they're adults.  The rooms are super clean and comfortable and they use Aveda products.  There's also a mini fridge for drinks and food.  It's a 15 minute walk to Disneyland (we stop at the 7-11 on the way for snacks and drinks).  The restaurant has great service and food!  Even if I didn't stay here, I would definitely come for breakfast.
Manager Response: Great to hear that you are a frequent guest of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Thank you for your compliments about our Housekeeping Team and yes, we have great amenities like Aveda spa products.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro does serve the best breakfast in town with great service!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I come to Disneyland a few times a year. I stay at a different hotel each time in search of one I can call home for a few days. I can officially say my search is over! The staff is beyond professional and helpful but what I love most is how clean it is, you can smell it when you walk in. The rooms do not have carpet, they have faux wood floors and that  alone was the selling point for me to try this place.  The design is somewhat contemporary but gives it a nice fresh, clean feel. There is a pool and hot tub, small restaurant and bar that was great also, though hours are limited. Wondering about the bed? This is huge for me as my spine is fused. Well I wish I had this mattress at home. Starbucks, Walgreens, CVS and several nice restaurants are either across the street or just a
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you loved your stay at the Hotel Indigo.  Our Team always appreciates compliments from our guests!  Cleanliness and providing superior service is our priority.  I am glad you found or hotel to be contemporary and comfortable.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is open for breakfast, brunch and dinner.  I hope you gt a chance to enjoy Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from our pool and hot tub area.  See you soon!  All the Best and Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng  General Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean, accommodating and friendly place to stay!
Summary: I've never experience such kind staff, from the front desk to the restaurant. They were extremely helpful with anything I needed, for example offered to switch my room on the first night for a situation I didn't like, lent me a phone charger for my stay when mine died and gave me a free breakfast just because. I stayed for 4 nights and had a fantastic experience the entire time. The location was great too!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for your compliments on our Team!  We hope you will stay with us again very soon.  Very Best Regards and Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed here when visiting Disneyland. The location is great, just 5-10 min walk the the entrance to the park. The hotel is clean and well kept and the staff friendly. There is a Walgreens and a CVS over the road and there are plenty of good restaurants nearby. Parking is free for hotel guests and there is a small pool that I did not use.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  Yes, we are located in the Heart of the Disneyland Resort and we are one of the last hotels that do not charge a daily parking fee.  Guests can view Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from our pool area.  Thank you again and Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is the 3rd Disneyland-area hotel I have stayed at in the last year. The styling of Hotel Indigo is trendy and cool. It is certainly not the closest hotel to the park entrance, but it is close enough to walk.   At first glance, Hotel Indigo looks like a fresh, new hotel with cool art and vibrant colors. Upon closer inspection it is pretty clear that the hotel is just a spruced-up budget motel. The walls are incredibly thin, and we could hear the people above us walking around late into the night. One afternoon I came back to the room for a nap but was kept awake by housekeeping vacuuming down the hall. It sounded like they were in the room with me.   On the plus side, the bathroom was luxurious. I loved the large, tiled-in shower and the higher-end fixtures. The linens were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad you enjoyed our luxurious shower, shower head and hand shower.  We have Aveda Spa Products.  Thank you for recommending our hotel.  Hope to see you soon!  Very Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed here just for one night on our way home. We were given a massive room (2 queen beds, and a sofa bed)  The room was nice, modern and had lots of ammenities.  The restaurant served good food and the staff were all friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments on your experience at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and our Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We hope you will choose our hotel to be your home base on your next visit to California!  Cheers and Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland the first weekend in December. Hotel Indigo was just a wonderful experience for the whole family. We arrived early and they let us park our car in the garage and pre-check in. The staff was incredible-nice, helpful. the rooms are very nice and super clean. We had breakfast in the morning and it was very good. I will stay again-
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your Family Disneyland Christmas Vacation at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We offer complimentary daily parking.  Thank you for your compliments on our Team's service and cleanliness of our facilities.  I am glad you got a chance to dine at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We have the best cooked-to-order breakfast entrees!  We hope to see you again very soon.  Happy Holidays from our Team to your Family, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The hotel is well situated, close to highway Congress Center and Disneyland. Very convenient parking place (underground and ground level). Professional staf, clean and nice good rooms, outdoor pool and perfect wifi connection completes the image. The breakfast is “a la carte”, no buffet. I couldn’t find anything negative here!! I would “tripadvise” anyone to have a stay in this place
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!  Thank you so much.  Yes, we are within walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  I am glad you enjoyed our cooked-to-order breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Have a Wonderful Holiday Season and hope you will stay with us again.  Warmest Regards, Mimi Jeng  General Manager

Summary: I spent there a week and I was satisfied with everything from staff, grounding and room to wifi connection. The hotel is well located near highway and has a nice underground parking place. Breakfast is ok, “a la carte” no buffet  No wonder high marks everywhere for this hotel
Manager Response: Our Team is happy to hear that you had a nice stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Thank you for your compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I am very late in submitting this review, but finally have time do do so.. :)  Stayed here 4 nights during a California trip, this being the Disneyland portion.  Was dropped off by Uber and headed to check-in.  I was busy but I got set up and keys in hand very quickly.  Front desk staff was superb, not only during check in, but during the entire stay.  Always a "hello, how are you?" or "have a great day".  Was lucky to get upgraded to a suite, and room was very large with two queen beds and tons of extra.  Small fridge but no microwave. Kurig coffee maker.  Great shower.  Decor is probably not for everyone, but I thought it was great, awesome colors everywhere.  Hotel has a nice sized pool and seating area.  No complimentary breakfast (like all Indigo hotels) but they had a full
Manager Response: What an outstanding review!  Thank you, TheVerro.  Thank you for your compliments about the Front Desk staff.  Reviews like yours help inspire them to continue providing superior service.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, the guestroom, shower, pool and our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  Yes, we have great breakfast.  I hope you were able to try our brunch and dinner.  We will await your return visit to our hotel on your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Kindest Regards and Happy Holidays! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: A shining gem of a hotel
Summary: My family (me, my wife, and kids aged 4, 2, and a newborn) stayed here at the beginning of the Thanksgiving week. The hotel is a shining gem in the sea of hotels near Disneyland. This hotel has one of the most genuine and classiest staff that I have ever encountered. The young man who checked us in made sure that I knew of all the amenities that the hotel had, but he was also incredibly gracious to my two kids who were enjoying the lobby while we spoke. A few days later we spilled water in the lobby, and he was calm and gracious again as he cleaned it up.  This hotel offers some great room options. We chose to stay in a 2 queen studio suited, that also had a pull out bed from a couch. It gave my children a nice amount of room to enjoy.  Another benefit of the hotel is that they
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear that you chose the Hotel Indigo Anaheim to spend your Thanksgiving!  We appreciate your compliments regarding the Team and the property.  Yes, we do have spacious rooms and suites.  We love our breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro too!  We are withing walking distance to Disney.  Thank you again and hope to see you soon.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We just returned from a 6 night stay at this location to go to Disney and see friends in nearby Huntington Beach.  This hotel is not huge but is a total delight!   Staff:  so nice and treated us like family.  Just very sweet people and continuously kind and giving.  They gave us advice about the area and extra towels/coffee pods.  My husband has a disability and they were very accommodating.  Fun Decor:  fun lighted walls in bar and 3rd floor that change color;  bright colors throughout the hotel, dancing fountain show outside, glass elevator with view to outdoors. Area:  Walgreens and Starbucks across the street.  IHOP and other restaurants within walking distance.  Several ART shuttle stops in the area.  Clean and safe area. Fun Features:  a 2nd floor sitting loft that opens
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful review of the Hotel indigo Anaheim.  I am glad our Team made you feel at home.  We love our modern decor.  The dancing fountain show outside and our glass elevator are our signature features.  The Lounge is my personal favorite.  Guests can enjoy Disney's seasonal fireworks display from our pool area.  Taco Tuesday at our Chambers bar & Bistro is very popular with guests and locals.  Our breakfasts are the best!  We receive a lot of compliments on our bedding.  We have the best amenities including Aveda spa products and Keurig Coffee.  Yes, we have fridges for your convenience.  Our pillows are brand new!  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Always a pleasure to stay here - The staff makes your visit a most memorable one! Its convenient locations makes getting to all the fun places a breeze - I can't possibly say more about the great customer service one gets with each visit!  A+ !!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star, A+ review!  Please visit us again very soon.  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed 3 nights at Hotel Indigo and had a great experience. This hotel is stylish and unique, plus the location is only a ten minute walk away from Disneyland. The very best part about our experience was the top notch customer service. Every employee was on the same page with regards to giving their best to us.  We were very impressed with Yen, one of the front desk employees.  She was so professional and always had a warm welcome for us upon returning from our activities. We had breakfast every morning and the food was really tasty, but the best part was the fantastic wait staff. Jose was so efficient as was Alfredo. They worked so hard to make sure we had everything. If you are looking for a nice place to stay with the best service, this is the place.  Well
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for a fabulous review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and your compliments regarding Yen, Jose and Alfredo.  Our Team works very hard and we appreciate it when guests recognize them.  we hope you will make our hotel your home away from home when visiting Disneyland!  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Beds were amazingly comfortable, nightlife was within walking distance to restaurants and nightclubs, staff was super accommodating and nice, they allowed us a late check out till 1pm. Free garage parking , most hotels in the area charge 18$, definitely will be coming back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo for four nights while visiting Disneyland. The staff were great, especially Alex who tried his best to find us a room for early check in as my daughter got sick the morning we flew in. Rooms are very clean, nice hardwood floors. The bathroom is very nice, including an above counter sink. The small kids will like the small water show that happens out front every night starting at 6PM and runs very half hour I think.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your experience!  I hope your daughter is feeling better.  Yes, guests love our hardwood floors and clean rooms.  The bathrooms are also my favorite with the bowl sink, shower head and hand shower.  I am glad your children enjoyed the water fountain music show!  We call it our very own World of Color at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  It runs every half hour from 5pm to 8:30pm.  We hope you will bring your family again.  Very Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Just returned from a 6 night stay at Hotel Indigo in Anaheim. We have a ball, from checkin to checking out.  Great staff but a special thanks to Jordan for everything. I am an Ambassador Member and he welcomed me.  Probably the onk6 thing I would say slightly negative (and it’s not a big deal) is I received no welcome gift or water on arrival. I had to complain to get my late check out which I am entitled to. Staff may need some training on their own IHG Ambassador program.  Location was perfect.  About 15 mins to Disneyland and 5 mins to great restaurants like The Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump. It was incredibly hot while we were there so having things close was a blessing at times.  Room was good.  We had the Queen 1 bedroom suite. Unfortunately the room looked right onto the
Manager Response: Greetings and thank you for your great review and helpful feedback of the Hotel Indigio Anaheim!  We are the closest IHG hotel to Disneyland and yes, we are close to popular restaurants.  We just installed new pillows and plush linen for the guestrooms.  I am glad you enjoyed our pool and relaxed in the Jacuzzi.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is the best deal in town.  Thank you for all of your compliments.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We were attending a medical conference at the Anaheim Convention Center and booked the Hotel Indigo based on TA and Yelp reviews. The rooms were clean and well appointed with relatively new bathrooms. The service and attention to detail were excellent. The manager, Mimi, was particularly helpful and gracious. The elevator and hallways were a bit dated but did not detract from our stay. Would highly recommend Hotel Indigo.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim, Chris Y!  We appreciate your comments on our guestrooms and deluxe shower.  we hope you will visit us again in the future.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I had a confirmed reservation... I even called ahead to let them know that I'd be checking in at 10:30 PM, and they told me it would be no problem. When I arrived at the hotel I was told by the desk clerk, "Sorry, but we have no more rooms, but don't worry they have availability at out sister property, the Ramada Inn next door." Do I need to say anything more? Stay far away from this hotel and its sister next door.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Modern Hotel but Not Quite Perfect
Summary: We stayed here at the end of October and had booked three rooms over the phone. We were traveling with our infant so we wanted to find a nice hotel relatively close to Disneyland. To start, it is a short walk to the park entrance. I would agree with other reviewers saying it’s between 10-20 min depending on how you hit traffic lights.   The hotel itself is modern but you can tell that it is a reno. The hallways in particular could use a bit of a facelift.   The rooms are also very modern. The bathrooms are especially nice. There isn’t a tub but we used the little spray nozzle to bathe our baby and it worked fine.  My parents room had tiny ants in it. They told the front desk about it after the second night and after their room was cleaned the next day the ants were gone. Other
Manager Response: Hello, dzire1!  Thank you for your detailed review.  We appreciate your feedback so we can improve!  Yes, we are within walking distance to Disneyland.  The Housekeeping Team thanks you for your compliments!  I apologize about the mix up with the bed types.  We have guestrooms with one king bed, 2 queen beds or 2 queen beds and a sofa bed, as well as some spacious suites, but not 2 kings.  I am glad you liked our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.  Very Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to rest up in Anaheim
Summary: Stayed here for one night on way from San Diego back to LA, and really impressed with the hotel. Hotel Indigo in the US has always disappointed me; they are always a half hearted effort. However this one is really up to the standard. There is a connection between the hotel and the area history. Love it. Plus the best guest welcome I have ever had at a branded hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review.  We do have a rich history.  I was also surprised to hear that we were once a walnut farm because everyone has heard how Walt Disney purchased orange groves to build Disneyland.  Our restaurant Chambers was named after the farmer of the walnut grove, and or street Katella was named after his daughters, Kate and Ella.  Our neighborhood story is part of the history of Anaheim.  we really appreciate your compliments about our hotel.    Cheers! Mimi Jeng  General Manager

Summary: I have very mixed reviews over this hotel but the good definitely outweighs the odd.  The car park is great and seems very secure. The rooms are clean, spacious and always replenished with whatever you need.  The staff are amazing! They even brought me a birthday present which was a lovely touch.  The weird things about this hotel is the hallways to the rooms are very hot, this also includes the lift. The ice machine in the hallway is also externally loud.  I like to have a window open, which you can do so, but if your room is at the front of the hotel the road outside is very noisy.  The huge bonus is this is good walking distance to Disney.  Would I return? Yes I would! Like I state the problems were only small compared to how good everything else is! Well done!
Manager Response: Thank you Jo Anne L S for your feedback!  I am happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and spacious.  The Team appreciated your compliments about their service.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Will continue to be a return guest
Summary: I come and stay at the Indigo at least twice a year, either with friends or family. Mimi and her staff never fail to disappoint us. Thank you for the great customer service and for keeping your facility in top shape every time. Love the amenities! See you next year Indigo!
Manager Response: Great to hear from a return guest!  Our Team awaits you for your next visit.  Along with our amenities, we purchased brand new pillows and deluxe linen.  Yes. see you next year!  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Indigo. The room was grest; very upscale and comfortable rooms. Staff was friendly. Location is close to the Disneyland resort, Angel Stadium, shopping, freeways, public transportation and casual/fine dining including a movie theater.
Manager Response: We appreciate your compliments, 5CrystalR!  Yes, we are located in the heart of Anaheim, within walking distance to Disneyland and a short drive to Angel Stadium.  A lot of popular restaurants close by.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I had a great experience at this hotel highly recommend it , room was very spacious , I was greeted very well in the front desk , breakfast was delicious . Parking was also good had no problems . I will definitely come back thank you for making me feel welcome
Manager Response: Dear Gaby A, I am glad that you had a great experience at Hotel indigo Anaheim.  Yes, the food at Chambers Bar & Bistro is delicious!  We offer complimentary parking and WiFi.  No resort fees!  We hope you will return for a another stay very soon.  Very Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We have had the opportunity of having our training function at this hotel and we were very happy with the experience. We were really impressed with the customer service and professionalism of the staff of the hotel!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our facility and services.  We hope to host more conferences for you in the future!  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We come to Anaheim for Disneyland wanted somewhere close, clean and easy and reasonably priced Hotel Indigo covered all of these for us, and staff were lovely and very helpful nothing was to hard. Would recommend hotel Indigo to anyone.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, Breanna S!  Thank you for recommending us!  Hope to see you again very soon.  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The room was great and the staff was outstanding, going the extra mile, and offering to assist consistently where many properties wait until a guest requests something or complains, this one is very proactive on ensuring guests feel comfortable and satisfied.  The breakfast was simply above and beyond, rivaling and in many cases exceeding the quality and taste of restaurants.  There was no microwaved buffet here, just fresh food prepared on request from a concise and satisfying menu.  The quality, quantity, and taste were better local chains, and considering this is walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center, that is saying something.  I would actively seek to stay here again.  The bed was a firm mattress with a very thick pillow top cover, giving a very
Manager Response: It means a great deal to our Team when guests take the time to provide feedback.  I am glad you had a quality stay.  We try our very best to go above and beyond for each guest to provide customized service.  The breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro is simply the best in town.  A hidden GEM!  We just installed brand new pillow and plush linen.  We are happy to hear that you will stay with us again.  Like you said, whether you are going to Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention Center, we are within walking distance to both!  Sincerely, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Me and my mom spent 2 nights here and they made it well worth the stay. Their rooms are modern and unique, their showers are soooo cool, and are VERY accommodating to all their guests to make sure your stay is a pleasant one. They have free parking and their own grill. They do not have free breakfasts, because they have their own restaurant, BUT their prices are so reasonable for the amount of food u get it’s well worth it, and their food is really good at “Chambers.” I have been nothing but impressed with the hospitality of this entire hotel.  Everyone was so sweet and hospitable. I will be back FOR SURE, no question. Amazing hotel and price. They are not out to fiscally rape you like most hotels do, and they are within walking distance to Disneyland, although I don’t recommend
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good quiet rooms, helpful staff with good advice on local amenities and ie getting the bus/ train.  Rooms have safes. Hot water can be provided at the cafe downstairs to take away.  Shower only - no baths. Aveda toiletries - very nice.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the Hotel Indigo, the great, quiet rooms and the helpfulness of our Team!  Yes, our Chambers Bar and Bistro is in the Lobby and services great food!  I am glad you enjoyed our deluxe shower with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda Spa Amenities!  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for a Disney Stay
Summary: First of all - big shout out to Alex Sandy and the other great employees at this hotel.  When I made my reservation I noted that my daughter would be celebrating her 17th birthday while we were there.  When we arrived at our room there were balloons and candy treats for her.  My daughter was thrilled!  Thank you! Other good things about this hotel - cool ambience and the walking distance to the park!
Manager Response: We appreciate your shout out to Alex and Sandy.  It means a lot to our Team when they are mentioned by name for providing excellent service.  Happy Birthday once again to your daughter and thank you for choosing the Hotel Indigo Anaheim as your celebration hotel!    All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Return and stay at the Indigo
Summary: My wife along with myself decided to stay at the Hotel Indigo for a total of 8 nights. This has been up of the best decisions that we have made as regards hotels. There is no need to write a long review as this hotel ticks all the boxes and more. The management along with all the staff are always on the go. From the maids who look after the rooms ( The designs they can do is something to be seen with the towels ?) to cleaning the public areas also cleaning oil left on the carpark floor. All the check in staff are excellent along with being very good at their job The hotel itself is well maintained, it is so clean all around the property. Chambers bar / bistro is to our mind as one of the best places to eat in Anaheim all the staff are good at their job. I watched part of the
Manager Response: Thank your for returning to the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Yes, we are always on the go as a busy hotel within walking distance from both Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Our Housekeeping Department works very hard to make sure that the guestrooms are spotless.  Our Team also prides themselves with the towel art that they create.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed watching the World Series at our bar and found our guestroom bedding to be comfortable.  We just got brand new pillows and plush linen.  We have had guests asking where to buy them.  Thank you again for the compliments, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location and an Amazing Staff
