Summary: Love this place and the next time I'm in the area, this is where I'm staying.  I would never stay anywhere but the Indigo when in Anaheim.  The staff genuinely cares that you are staying with them.  Every time I came in the hotel or went out for the day, whoever was at the desk always called me by name and told me to have a good day or welcomed me back.  Only used the restaurant for breakfast, but every day, it was just delicious and it was a great way to start my day.  They say it's a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, but it depends on if you're by yourself or not.  I want to say it was a 10 minute walk.  Far enough away that you didn't have the crazy busyness at the hotel, but close enough to walk and see the fireworks if you had a room facing that direction.  It was great because
Manager Response: Dear jbrenz, I am happy that you loved the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and that you will make us your home away from home when you are in Anaheim.  Yes, Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best breakfast!  I hope you got a chance to try our daily Happy Hour.  You are right, we are close to everything including views of Disney's fireworks from some rooms, pool/Jacuzzi area and Chamber's Outdoor Patio.  Thank you for your compliments about our Team.  It means a lot for everyone to be mentioned by name.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this location 3 times Now and have enjoyed each stay. The front desk is extremely welcoming, friendly, and nice! The rooms are always clean. The location is perfect for a 10 min walk to Disneyland or plenty of restaurants nearby. Free parking. Good breakfast and restaurant within the hotel.
Manager Response: Wow!  Wonderful to hear that you have made the Hotel Indigo Anaheim your home away from home Crystal M!  Yes, we prioritize cleanliness.  I am glad you like our breakfast at Chambers bar & Bistro!  See you next time!  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is my new place when visiting Disney! Clean, comfortable, easy access to parks and a quick exit off the freeway.  Staff is quick and ready to get you to your room (should you arrive early).  Must dine for breakfast downstairs - good food and get you out quickly if in a hurry to head to the parks.  See you in January!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Brandon J, for your great review of the Hotel indigo Anaheim!  I am happy that you found out hotel to be clean, comfortable and convenient - the 2 C's!  Yes, Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best food!  Thank you again for your compliments and hope to see you again very soon.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a great location to stay when visiting the Disneyland Parks. It was a 15-minute walk and closer than the Paradise Pier Disney Hotel to the main entrance. The rooms are up-to-date and the best thing was there was no carpet in the room!!! Helpful items included a refrigerator and a crib and the room was clean. There were also lots of restaurants almost next door at Garden Walk. Great value.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you found the Hotel Indigo Anaheim to have great value!  Yes, we are located in the hear of Anaheim.  Guests love the hardwood flooring.  We do not charge for parking or cribs and there is a refrigerator in every room.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean and convenient place to stay
Summary: PROS: Located about 5 to 10-minute walk to Disneyland resort. Walgreens and CVS pharmacy just at the corner. The garden walk (restaurants and shopping) just 3-minute walk as well. Hotel from the outside looks really welcoming with bright colors during the night. Food and drinks reasonably priced. They also have a jacuzzi and a pool!!! I did not get to dip into the pool as it was too hot to be under the sun when we stayed at the hotel. Camped in the room to avoid the heatwave. Room is clean and large.  CONS: They did not have a kettle in the room (the double standard room, so unsure about other rooms) so can't really eat instant noodles when you want to save. :P
Manager Response: Greetings, 796dorothyc!  Thank you for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are close to all, including Disneyland, pharmacies and restaurants.  We do not have a kettles in the room, but we do have Keurig coffee makers and we can heat up items at our kitchen in our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The hotel is 3 blocks from the main entrance to Disneyland parks, walking distance.  Bang for buck unbelievable room, free breakfast, free parking.  The room was smallish but with nicest beds I have slept in years. The bathroom was large with a very large walk in shower, with lots of upscale amenities.  There was a coffee maker and mini refrigerator.  The restaurant is very nice, breakfast included was anything on their breakfast menu.  The food was served fast and was very good with lots of choices, service was fantastic. The hotel pool was small but nice.  Overall, my new Aneheim hotel of choice.
Manager Response: Great to hear that we exceeded your expectations at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, Chambers bar & Bistro has the best, cooked-to-order breakfast in town.  I am happy that you enjoyed our deluxe shower experience.  All of our rooms are equipped with a Keurig coffee maker and fridge.  Thank you for your compliments on our Team's service!  I hope you got a chance to view Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from our pool area.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay, would definitely stay again!
Summary: Great hotel in Anaheim with a super helpful staff and luxurious feeling room.   Jorden and Alex at the front desk helped us get in and out quickly. They were so friendly and welcoming, and made sure we were well taken care of.   The room was a good size, and had one of the most comfy hotel beds I have ever slept in. The furnishings and decorations made the room feel luxe, and they had every amenity I needed in the bathroom....and lots of towels. I love when rooms provide enough towels!  Free parking was great, right under the hotel with direct access to the rooms. Super easy and convenient!  The view from the room was not cute (a parking lot and a dirt patch of land), but not a deal breaker at all.   If staying in Anaheim, would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Happy to hear you will stay again with the Hotel indigo Anaheim, faithc!  Our Team reads the guests' reviews daily and appreciate it when their names are mentioned.  We do have one of the larger guestrooms in Anaheim and we just got new pillows and plush linen!  We have a very organic, clean feel to our decor.  I am glad you liked our fcomplimentary parking convenient location.  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Hi everyone,  I didnt stay here but ate here twice.  I wish i stayed here. Great little bar and restaurant with great food and drinks. Awesome service. The hotel is a hip nice and clean. This place is a secret. Close to the Disney gates.  Wish I stayed here instead of Porto finnio (sp??)
Manager Response: Hello markfromvan, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro!  The food is great here.  Yes, please stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Being a neighborliness proficient myself I see the subtle elements. The General Manager Mimi and her staff were a joy. Everybody was proficient and cordial. Meticulousness was obvious in each part of the property. I come to Disneyland regularly and have needed to remain at this new IHG property for a while...., I'm happy I at last made it! I anticipate the Hotel Indigo Anaheim now being my home base far from home when I am in Anaheim. Much obliged to you Mimi and team.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review to motivate our Team to strive harder!  Thank you, brandonpattersonp, we work very hard to provide the best service we can and make each and every guest's stay comfortable and memorable.  We believe real connections with our guests and attention to detail is a must.  We are happy you made it to our property too and hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient, well managed, superb staff, secure parking.  Short walk to Disney.
Summary: Conveniently located on Katella Ave, a few short blocks from the Santa Ana freeway (I-5, Exit 109) and a short walk to Disney.  Check-in was expertly attended to by Jordan, the day manager, and his excellent front desk staff who were on the ball and expertly attended to the needs of our two family Disney soiree.  The lobby, restaurant and common areas were modern and immaculate.  The room was impeccably clean, quiet, and equipped with quality sheets and ample pillows and accoutrement.   Secure, underground parking was provided at no additional charge.  Chambers Restaurant was similarly clean with a small bar, acceptable menu selection, and very reasonable prices ("Taco Tuesday" was a hit with authentic Mexican "taquitos").  Our enjoyable stay was enhanced by a staff that was
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I remember your family.  Our Team love working at this modern, boutique hotel.  I hope it shows.  We are committed to making sure that our guests are happy and comfortable during their stay.  The plush pillows and linen are brand new!  And yes, we are just about the only hotel left that does not charge for daily parking or resort fees.  Chambers Bar & Bistro serves the best food with a wide ranging menu.  I am glad we were able to locate the items left behind and you received them.  Thank you for your compliments.  Reviews like yours motivate us to do better!    Cheers! Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disneyland and Business Visitors
Summary: Hotel Indigo is my favorite place to stay when we are doing long shoots at Disneyland.  The hotel is clean and modern, and the staff is friendly and attentive. They have a bar, restaurant, pool and gym all on-site, and they have gated underground parking. The prices are very reasonable, even at peak times.  This is great because usually the hotel comes out of a 'fixed' budget, and the cost of staying at one of the Disney properties is not an option. It's a great hotel for business travelers who don't need the extra fun activities or fancy amenities that the resorts tend to offer for 'family and vacation' visitors. I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Great to hear that you are a loyal guest of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim, Mr. Matt B! Doing photo shoots at Disneyland! How exciting. Yes, we have a great hotel with everything that a guest on business can ask for including complimentary WiFi and Business Center. We believe we offer the best value in town with no daily parking or report fees. See you next time!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Hotels do it, Airlines do it. It's a technique to extract more money from the consumer. Hotel Indigo had ZERO resort fee and ZERO parking fee. Sure, if you want a breakfast you can pay for it but we didn't need it. Friendly staff, I can't single out just one. Close walk to Disneyland without a false "main gate" name in it. My only complaint would be the slow elevator. We've stayed at about 10 hotels here and I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Yes, RDBinAZ!  We have no junk fees like parking or resort fees.  We also offer complimentary WiFi. Thank you for your compliments!  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is brand new located in Anaheim and not really close to downtown LA. If you are visiting Disneyland it would be a super choice as Disney is just in walking distance. And for others please consider again.  For the room it was very modern clean spacious and the decor is very young and makes you feel like comfortable. Nothing others to did with this area. Some god food choice within hotel and around hotel. There has a MORTON STEAKHOUSE, a pizza shop, ccs pharmacy and a walgreen in walking distance. Inside the hotel there has a bar and bistro they really served well with good breakfast and good service, which is very attractive to hotel guests. And I left my cell in the table after finished breakfast but they cared and help me stored and it returned to me when I am back.
Manager Response: Yes, Hotel Indigo Anaheim is a brand new, modern hotel and we are within walking distance to Disneyland.  I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant!  Our location is second to none like you mentioned.  We hope to see you again soon.  Warmest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Big and clean room and bathroom.  Room without slippers and the bathroom doesn’t come with shower gel but it’s come with soup bar.  And one more ,, help your self there is no luggage services but there is luggages carry    Staff cool and the manager she helpful.   Good place for long stay and about 10 minutes walk to Disney land everything close to you Walgreens Pharmacy and CVS pharmacy all kind of restaurants and coffee shops
Manager Response: Hello, MAAlawadhi!  We appreciate your compliments.  Yes, we have complimentary parking and WiFi.  No daily resort fees too!  I am glad you enjoyed our location.  The Hotel indigo Anaheim is in the heart of Anaheim and within walking distance to Disneyland and all the fun & convenience for our valued guests!  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed here the weekend of September 30, 2017.  We have a 16 month old son, so we requested a crib.  Upon check in, we were told that the crib was already in the room!  This is amazing to me because most hotels, even though I request it, I have to re-request it upon check in and then wait for someone to bring it.  So this was a pleasant surprise.  The staff was extremely nice!  The room was nice, clean - the hotel was clean.  It is an easy walk to Disney, CVS, Walgreens, and some restaurants too.    My only complaint is that there is NOT enough parking and the spaces are so small.  We had such a hard time with parking the car (find a space), that once we did, we didn't move the car until we checked out.  Otherwise, we would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Greetings, living4music27!  What a wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We appreciate it very much.  We are happy to hear that you liked our proximity to Disney, CVS, Walgreen's and restaurants.  A new Starbucks also just opened within walking distance.  I hope you got a chance to try our Chambers Bar & Bistro too.  Please visit us again!  Thank you kindly,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Good value, three blocks from Disneyland
Summary: A fairly new hotel with quirky decor (seems to be the style of the Indigo Hotels).  Not much on views, but well located near Disneyland and walking distance of a large number of restaurants.  We arrived very early.  As expected our room was not available however we were able to park in the hotel garage and walk to Disneyland (a big plus). Breakfast was not included however a very nice cooked to order breakfast was available for a reasonable cost.  Decent sized, well furnished rooms.  AC fairly quiet. Clean. Good wifi.  Friendly reception.
Manager Response: Yes, bobolan92, the Hotel Indigo Anaheim opened a few years ago.  We are the most modern hotel in the Anaheim Resort.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland & restaurants and free parking.  Yes, our Chambers Bar and Bistro prepared the best breakfast!  Thank you for your compliments on our friendly reception.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at multiple hotels surrounding Disneyland over the years, but this was our first stay at Hotel Indigo.  The staff was friendly, the hotel was clean (aside from some dust), and the location is very close to the park!  The only complaint is that the walls appear to be paper thin.  We have never stayed in a noisier hotel, but, other previous reviewers complained of the same, so I suppose it shouldn't have been such a surprise to us.  The high level of noise that we were able to hear was just surprising is all.
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are getting brand new, plush area rugs so you should see a big difference in future stays.  I am happy to hear you liked our location.  Thank you for your compliments about our Team!  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: A few months ago my sister and I wanted to do a trip together to So Cal and that included a trip to Disney. Our mother surprised us and booked us this hotel. It was an amazing surprise and this is a great place to stay.  The location is great if you are going to either of the Disney parks as it is within walking distance (about a 15 min walk depending on your walking speed and crosswalks).  The staff is really nice and helpful.   The standard room is amazing if you're staying a few days. It has a kitchenette (with mini fridge and microwave), living room area, beds, and bathroom. I like that the tv swiveled between the living room area and beds. I also like that there was a mini memo board near the door so you could put reminders and things you may need to bring with you
Manager Response: A sisters getaway!  I am glad you liked our location and closeness to Disney Parks, Kellen T!  Yes, our guestrooms are well equipped for travelers.  We hope you will stay at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim on your next trip.  Warm Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We have stayed here twice.  Both times our rooms were clean and well appointed.  We even had towel animals in the bathroom!!!Staff is very friendly.  The hotel is quiet with comfortable beds.  Quick walk to Disney, close to restaurants and corner drug stores/convenience stores.  This is our non-Disney property go-to!  You won't regret your stay.  Only downside-the elevator is slow and scary! :) we just take the stairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim a second time!  I have noticed a lot of people mentioning comfortable beds.  We just got new pillows and plus linen!  I am glad people are noticing and enjoying a god night's sleep!  Yes, we are within walking distance to nice restaurants like Bubba Gump.  I hope you got a chance to try our own Chambers Bar and Bistro restaurant.      Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: the breakfast was epic, their service was excellent and the staff was very kind and friendly.the beds were so comfortable and the setting of the bedroom was fantastic and the bathroom was sparkly clean,so overall EVERTHING IS AWESOME!!!!
Manager Response: What an awesome review, Xreviewer21.  We love reviews like yours!  Yes, we have comfy furniture including new pillow and we consider cleanliness our number one priority.  I hope you enjoyed our luxurious showers with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda Spa Products.  We hope you will stay with us again, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic time with the exception of the pool
Summary: Great location!  Reasonable prices.  Pool is fit for maximum of 7-10 and there were many more in pool most of the time.  Rooms have extra living space which makes it great when bringing kids.  The location could not be better.  Easy walk to every point of interest.
Manager Response: Hello, Laurabsachs!  Thank you for letting us know about your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our pool is nice, but not huge.  Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display can be viewed from our pool.  Yes, we are centrally located in the Disneyland Resort.  I hope you will make our hotel your "go-to" hotel when visiting Anaheim.  Kind Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful Modern Hotel Close to Disneyland
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Indigo. The rooms were very clean and modern, wood floors throughout (which we prefer due to allergies), spacious modern bathroom, and a comfortable bed. Overall I loved the cleanliness of the room and modern fresh decor. We could hear people upstairs most likely kids running but did not mind it. The lobby and pool also were clean and had the same modern decor throughout. The complimentary parking was also great  and one of the reasons we chose the hotel along with the wood floors and modernness of the rooms. The hotel location was perfect for us- it was about a 15 min walk to Disneyland park for those that do not mind the walk but it was very close to restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, California pizza kitchen etc), Walgreens, CVS Pharmacy 7-Eleven,
Manager Response: I think it is great when guests take the time to detail their experiences to assist other travelers.  I think our guestrooms are very clean and organic with the wood flooring.  Certain helps with guests with allergies and asthma.  We prioritize cleanliness and personal service.  I am glad you enjoyed the Hotel Indigo's modern decor and convenient location.  Thank you, tubytoast - Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Very nice staying....again..  also relax staying. Friendly staff. Nice rooms like always.  Close to parks. Everything is near by. Restaurants. Stores.  Free parking. Like the clean rooms. All in place . What ever you need and ask the housekeepers they help you anytime. Friendly ,and good manners, smiling , and ready to assist you . God bless you. All. And thank you..👍.
Manager Response: Thank you, Carl F for a Greaaaaat review!  It is reviews like yours that really encourage the Team to strive harder to provide excellent service.  We like to think that we offer our guests a great value with free parking and WiFi.  No junk fees!  we do our best to be above the rest of our competition, and people is what makes the difference.  And thank YOU for your kind words.  It means a lot to us.  Very Best Regards., Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Greatest hotel near Disneyland with The BEST staff!
Summary: We have stayed here several times this year. It has always been a positive experience. This time it was to visit Disneyland for a family reunion. The hotel was clean and fresh as always...and no parking or "resort" fees! The staff, Mimi, Jorden, Tiffany and Lyra, deserve a special shout out for always being very friendly and knowledgeable, as well as putting in the extra effort to ensure an excellent experience is had by guests at Hotel Indigo!
Manager Response: Wow, BunnyBoyd!  We are happy that you enjoyed the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our hotel is our home away from home for our guests.  I hope you and your family had a wonderful reunion.  Come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for a Disneyland stay
Summary: My wife and I were going to Disneyland and needed a nearby hotel.  The resorts on premises are very pricey, so we always look for a place within walking distance and this time went with Hotel Indigo.  Overall, the place was nice.  It was clean and updated and had free parking.  Breakfast wasn't included (which would've been nice) but you could either purchase it separately, or do what we did and went to the Starbucks across the street.  It's about a one mile walk from downtown Disney and about .8 miles to the main gates of either Disneyland or CA Adventure.  We could hear noise in the morning of our neighbors in the hall through the door, but the walls seems pretty sound proof.   The staff was very friendly as well during check in and check out.  Overall, while nothing special,
Manager Response: Dear Hanzosbm, I want to thank you for your input!  The Hotel Indigo Anaheim is centrally located within walking distance to Disneyland, Disney California Adventure, Downtown Disney, popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory at the GardenWalk and stores like Starbucks and Walgreen's. We like to think we offer the best value in town with complimentary parking, WiFi and we do have packages that include breakfast at our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant for your next trip. Our Team thanks you for your compliments about the friendly service.  All the Best, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We checked in, thankfully early, after getting off a cruise in San Pedro. My husband wasn't feeling well, so the staff went over and above. Elevator to the second floor made getting the bags up easy. Beautiful large bedroom with beautifully comfortable bed. Fantastic bathroom with Aveda products (what a bonus!) Coffee machine, fridge and plenty of storage. Lovely restaurant for breakfast. The eggs BLT are a steal for $8. Great FREE WiFi. 10 minute walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Hello, there, Jenniem62!  We do have guests staying with us after a cruise like you did, either from San Pedro where you were or the posts in San Diego.  I am glad you enjoyed out beautiful large rooms and comfortable beds.  We recently added new pillow and plush linens!  Our amenities are great, like Keurig Coffee and Aveda Spa products.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro is a hidden gem with delicious, cooked-to-order entrees!  We hope you will visit us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim again very soon.  Best Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The room is perfect and the washroom is truly decent. The stylistic theme in the lodging is current and perfect. Extraordinary client benefit. Their eatery is better than average. Strolling separation to Disneyland and a great deal of eateries adjacent. I had a decent and unwinding time at the lodging Indigo.
Manager Response: Greetings, virginiaplantp! We are happy to hear that you found the Hotel Indigo Anaheim to be a "perfect place to stay." I am glad you enjoyed our eatery, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Cheers!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I did not take any pictures but the pictures provided are completely accurate. First and foremost location is great, you could walk to Downtown Disney and Disneyland easily. Huge strength parking is included in the price of your stay. There is plenty of parking and it is in a very walkable area. Its great for couple and great for families. Although I really liked that it was wooden floors the sounds do carry and you can hear those above you, the walls are fairly thin.  None of us had an issue with it though, but if you are a light sleeper maybe ask for the highest floor? So our room faced the Disney side so we were able to see a lot of the fireworks, only obstruction was a tree from the hotel that was in front of us. We were so happy to be able to see fireworks 2 nights so no
Manager Response: Dear Julia G, thank you for choosing the Hotel Indigo Anaheim as the hotel for our daughter's first trip to Disneyland!  Yes, we are one of the last hotels in Anaheim that do not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee.  I am happy to hear that you were able to view Disney's spectacular fireworks display from your room.  The Team appreciates your compliments on service.  Thank you and we hope you will come back again!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 8 nights during September and had a great experience.  The hotel staff were exceptional, special thanks to the team of people who work there, and Mimi the manager, best hotel customer service hands down.  The hotel itself is in a great location, about 10-15 min walk to Disney Land, cafes and eateries within walking distance, but would strongly recommend the onsite restaurant, we enjoyed quite a few meals there during our stay and were very satisfied, would suggest utilising their Happy Hour as there are some smaller meals at great prices during these times.  Hotel room was good size, beds were very comfortable, décor is pleasant, bathroom was the biggest we have seen in USA, a great deal of bench space too, which comes in handy.  Hotel grounds were
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  It is because of reviews like yours that continue to motivate our Team.  We are proud to work at this property for the same reasons you enjoyed being our guest.  Our location is second to none and our hotel is new with large guestrooms, suites  and restrooms.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant and pool deck.  Thank you again for recommending our property.     Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel with my wife for 3 nights while at Disneyland.  The hotel was was very clean.  Staff was the most friendly I have experienced.  The room was an average size for a hotel.  Oversized stand up shower.  Plenty of drawer space.  Parking is a little small but I was able to find a spot pretty quickly and is secured underground.  We did not eat at the hotel restaurant but the food did look and smell pretty good.  The hotel is only a 10-15 walk to Disneyland.  The hotel is close to Bubba Gumps Shrimp, Cheesecake Factory, Ihop, Starbucks, Mimi"s Cafe, plus more.  There were only a few cons in my opinion.  There was only 1 small shelf in the shower.  2 shelves would be plenty.  There was no hand towel rack by the sink.  The biggest con for me was there was no
Manager Response: Thank you Adam G, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We appreciate it when guests take their time to provide feedback so we can see how we did.  I am glad you liked our deluxe shower, and complimentary, secured underground parking.  Yes we are a short walk to Disneyland.  We are close to many restaurants and stores.  We can heat up items for guests.  Thank you for recommending our hotel and hope to see you very soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This was a nice hotel within walking distance of Disneyland.  Kids thought pool was great.  Rooms clean and comfortable. Bed was GREAT!  The only complaint I have for this Hotel was the room was very small we were 4 in a room with 2 beds but it felt very crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are happy that you enjoyed the pool.  Yes, guests rave about our comfortable beds.  We just got new pillows and linen and donated our items to the hurricane relief.  Hope to see you soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: From check-in to check out, our experience was outstanding! Every staff member we encountered, from the front desk to housekeeping, demonstrated a true sense of caring about us and ensured our needs were met. Vicky, Jesus, and Dean at the Chambers Bar & Bistro were very welcoming and provided excellent service; great food as well. Upbeat vibe throughout the property; very well maintained. Will definitely stay at Hotel Indigo again.
Manager Response: Thank you, Tony B for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We will make sure that Vicky, Jesus and Dean at the Chambers Bar & Bistro receive your compliments!    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Super friendly and welcoming staff. Stayed here for two nights during a trip to Disneyland. Parking was free and we walked to the park which was about a 10 minute walk away. The onsite restaurant was good for breakfast. My gf left her retainer and they shipped it to us (however, they did not notify us that it had been found by housekeeping - it was only after we called that they helped us out).
Manager Response: Thank you, Phillip S for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you and your family enjoyed your stay.    Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay here! We stayed here for 2 nights and we had an amazing time. Location is perfect for those who are going to visit Disneyland. Its in-house restaurant and bar is amaaazing! Food was great and drinks were spot-on!  The service was also great! The room was nice and ambiance great. I was also intrigued by the chestnut pictures everywhere lol The bed and pillows were fluffy, comfy, and clean. The shower was also great, complete with the hygiene kits! I also want to know where and how to buy your shampoos and conditioners which were labelled as organic and locally produced, they were soooo fragrant and soft to skin and scalp.
Manager Response: Dear IraTarynBlanco, thank you for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we have the best location, close to Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant!  We have the best cooked-to-order breakfast and Happy Hour in town.  Each Hotel Indigo has its own neighborhood story.  There used to be a walnut ranch where the Hotel Indigo Anaheim stands today.  We just got new pillows and plush linen!  Glad you enjoyed the sleep experience.  Guests rave about our deluxe shower with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda spa products.  Thank you again for your compliments and hope to see you again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: What a great find this hotel is. Short walk to Disney. Great hot free breakfast. Free parking . Excellent wifi. Tuesday night is taco night and happy hour. Food in chambers was excellent. All freshly made and excellent value. We used the pool which was a nice change and good to cool off. I also used the laundry facilities which were good. I could not recommend enough.
Manager Response: Thank you Jusytops, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best cooked-to-order breakfast.  I am glad you enjoyed our facilities, including our pool and guest laundry.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 5 nights in April 2017. We went both to east and west coast and have stayed in a few hotels in the 3 weeks in total that we had our holiday. Hands down this was the best hotel we stayed at during our holidays. We stayed in a 2 queen bed family suite and it has exceeded all our expectations. Have you ever stayed in a hotel where the flooring is not carpet? Well I haven't and this was a first for us which we loved because having kids, we know that the floors are clean! The room was so spacious which was welcomed since we bought a lot as in a lot of shopping plus we had other stuff that we already brought with us coz of our kids. The staff where all so helpful and friendly with special mention to the manager Mimi who I have been emailing even before
Manager Response: Thank you, aubreyron, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, guests rave about our spacious rooms with chic hardwood floors.  We are located in the center of the Disneyland Resort, with the parks, Anaheim Convention Center, popular dining and pharmacies all withing walking distance.  I am happy you made our hotel your home away from home during your holiday here.  Hope to see you again!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Indigo because of the reviews here on Trip Advisor. So glad we did! What a lovely hotel---so clean and modern. Our check-in was made effortless and delightful by Jordan, who explained things about the hotel and gave us perfect rooms. Thank you, Jordan. The rooms are so clean---our number one priority. One of the best clean features is the wood laminate flooring instead of the usual suspect carpeting at most hotels where you might be afraid to walk barefoot on. Only small drawback is that we could occasionally hear the person walking above us, but not too bad at all. And the bathroom is wonderful. The above the counter sink is great and there's good counter space for products that I totally appreciate. Speaking of products, they have Aveda which is really one of
Manager Response: Thank you, ShelleyB17, for your terrific review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am happy you selected our hotel because of our high ranking on TripAdvisor.  We do have a clean and modern hotel.  We are proud of our rich agricultural history here in the Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate our compliments about our service.  Guests love our hardwood style flooring, contemporary shower with a bowl sink, shower head, hand shower and Aveda spa products.  We just upgraded to new, plush pillows.  Our location is top notch,  just 2 blocks from both Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center, 2 buildings away from the Anaheim GardenWalk with the Cheesecake Factory and other popular restaurants (and yes!  Starbucks across the street).  We feel we have the best value in town as one of the last hotels that do not charge a daily parking or resort fee and  complimentary WiFi.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Indigo is a boutique hotel.  It was a newer hotel so everything appeared brand new and right out of an HGTV show.  We had a king suite which was perfect for us and our tween and teenager.  They slept on the sleeper sofa in a room with their own tv, with my wife and I in a very comfortable king bed with another big screen LCD tv separated by an upscale spa like bathroom.  They had a small excellent cafe attached serving above average breakfast.  There was also a nice pool with a free parking garage below.  What struck us the most was how friendly and helpful all of the staff was at this operation.  The management has a done an excellent job hiring people with a very good customer service skill set.  The walk to Disney seemed a bit long and tiring, but reality is by the time you
Manager Response: Thank you, Sqwerl, for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are a modern, chic boutique hotel with deluxe furnishings including a flat panel TV.  It sounds like you stayed in one of our spacious suites!  Guests love our deluxe shower with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda products.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is excellent!  Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display can be viewed from our pool and our restaurant's outdoor patio.  Thank you for your compliments on the friendly service of our Team!  We hope you will make our hotel your home away from home when visiting Disneyland, which like you experienced, is just a 10 minute walk away.  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Just stayed one night before our day at Disneyland. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Walls are a little thin and noise from guests above was irritating but that wasn't staff's fault.  We were able to see the fireworks from Disney that night from our room window. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you, 3roaming for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We hope you enjoyed the fireworks view from your room.  Thank you again for recommending the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!    Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Hotel Indigo sets the standard for customer service. At check-in we were offered bottled water and staff were very welcoming. All employees were friendly and being handed the daily paper at breakfast by the manager is a touch that starts your day on the highest note.   Breakfast is reasonably priced (if not part of your package) and set in a funky relaxed area facing the fully stocked bar. The food was delicious with changes and dietary requirements easily accommodated. The breakfast/bar/chef staff offered quick attentive service and were fantastic to deal with. We didn't use the bar due to being at Disneyland or out for dinner but they had regular drink and food specials and happy hour.   The double queen suite we had is easily big enough for 3-5 people and the bathroom was
Manager Response: Thank you, headinajar, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are glad to hear that you felt welcomed by the staff.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best cooked-to-order breakfast and Happy Hour deals at night with a full bar.  We do have spacious rooms and deluxe showers with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda spa products.  All rooms are equipped with a refrigerator and flat panel TV.  We call our fountain the "mini Bellagio."  Many people who walk by are entertained by the music , water and light show.  We are located in the heart of Anaheim, just 2 blocks from Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center and 2 buildings away from all the popular restaurants.  Thank you again for your compliments!  Hope to see you again.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I attended a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. This hotel is maybe a 10-minute walk to and from that site. The staff was friendly and asked me often if I needed anything. Rooms are comfortable. Many nearby restaurants are available in case you want to get a meal outside of the hotel restaurant. I found the hotel a fine value.
Manager Response: Thank you, owlgymcoach, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are 2 blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center and the best hotel to stay while attending a convention.  We are also 2 buildings away from the GardenWalk with many popular restaurants like Bubba Gump and Roy's Hawaiian Restaurant.  We also have our own restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro, serving breakfast, brunch and dinner.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The hotel is located 15 (walking) minutes away from the Disney Parks or a $5 and some change through Uber. It is so close to the parks you can even watch the fireworks by their bar or outdoor pool.  The staff are very friendly upon check in and check out. Free parking was a major plus and is located in the basement. We had one night where parking was an issue, I guess a wedding party took over most of the parking spot and we were asked to park our rental by the hotel entrance.  The rooms were different, I loved the hip wallpaper and wood (laminate) floors. There is no tub so if you have a baby, this might be an issue. Our toddler was able to use the shower as they had a hand held shower head available.  Room service was surprisingly quick but take note that they add 18% gratuity
Manager Response: Thank you, Tonifaj, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are 2 blocks from Disney.  We have some guestrooms that also have the spectacular view of Disney's seasonal fireworks display as well as at our pool and restaurant's outdoor patio.  We are one of the last hotels that do not charge a daily parking charge or resort fee.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our new, modern decor and deluxe showers with a shower head and hand shower.  We are glad that you enjoyed our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you again for your compliments including the friendliness of our Tea.  We all read the reviews.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I couldn't decide to give it a four or 5, but since I have no complaints I will give it to 5 we stayed here probably five years ago. We stayed on our freedom points for two nights I wish it have free breakfast but it does not charge parking but most of the hotel is now do so for the $18 we save we can go to McDonald's and feed my whole family. The rooms were very basic but clean bathroom was very very nice. The pool was very small and we did not use it. I'm not sure if it was a workout room or not this was half marathon weekend so I really did not need it. It is a nice short walk to Disneyland. Parking garage is pretty tight if you have a big vehicle luckily we did not
Manager Response: Thank you, tly, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am happy to hear that you returned and had a great stay.  We make cleanliness our number one priority.   Guests love our deluxe showers with a shower head and hand shower.  We hope you will make your home away from home for the Disney Marathons!  Sincerely,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We've stayed in many hotels in the Disneyland area, and Hotel Indigo Anaheim was by far the best! One thing that speaks volumes to me about a hotel is the cleanliness of the front entrance. If I see dirty floors and window smudges, it's usually a bad stay. However, Hotel Indigo's entrance was immaculate. One morning, I even saw an employee sweeping the sidewalk/driveway outside.  Employees take pride in this property, and it is evident in their workmanship and super friendly customer service. Our room reflected the standards of the hotel entrance. It was clean, and the furniture and bathroom fixtures made it feel as though we were staying in a room at the Four Seasons. From our first ride in the clean elevator that smelled of white tea, to the luxury shower, Aveda products, and
Manager Response: Thank you, Adriana L, for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, cleanliness and superior service is our number one priority!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our deluxe showers!  Guest love our shower head and hand shower combination, topped with Aveda spa products.  We do our best to pay attention to the smallest detail, including scent sticks in vents for a welcoming aroma throughout the property.  Our Team loves our property and we are glad you do too!  We hope you will make Hotel Indigo your home away from home!    Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Just came back from my recent stay at Hotel Indigo. It's been year since my last visit and i was looking forward to this vacation. First of all, what brought me back was the location! Can't beat how close of a walk Disneyland is. I think the most generous thing that the hotel does is NOT charge a resort fee or parking fee!! This is truly appreciated since most hotels I've stayed in anywhere charges those ridiculous resort fees. Thank you for thinking about those who don't have extra money laying around to pay for annoying fees. Brought my family back with me as well and of course their favorite part of the hotel was the breakfast. This is definitely our family home away from home. Big thank you to the friendly staff!! Check-in and check-out process was a piece of cake. You will
Manager Response: Thank you, Shell2bias, for your 5-star review and being a loyal, repeat guest!  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland.  Most people do not know that we do not charge a daily parking or resort fee like most of the other hotels in the Anaheim Resort.  I am glad that you enjoyed our breakfast!  Chambers Bar & Bistro now serves lunch.  We hope you will visit us again very soon.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location and fun, engaging, professional staff!
Summary: Being a hospitality professional myself I notice the details. The General Manager Mimi and her staff were a delight. Everyone was professional and friendly. Attention to detail was evident in every aspect of the property. I come to Disneyland often and have wanted to stay at this new IHG property for a while...., I'm glad I finally made it! I look forward to the Hotel Indigo Anaheim now being my home base away from home when I am in Anaheim. Thank you Mimi and crew.   Steve
Manager Response: Thank you, UtahHospitalitypro, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team appreciates your feedback.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've ever stayed at!!
Summary: Hands down the best hotel we've ever stayed at. The room was amazing, the staff was right there to answer questions or assist us in any way they could. Everything was clean and professional. The restaurant and its staff were top notch. Location is perfect for visiting Disneyland. The price was very reasonable for the location. Free parking and internet were a bonus!
Manager Response: Thank you, Dan P, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  What an honor for you to call us the best hotel that you have stayed at!  We are within walking distance to Disneyland.  We do our best to provide friendly service.  Yes, guests love the fact that we do not charge a daily parking fee, resort fee or WiFi fee.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: So close to the Disney parks!  Front desk personnel very nice and helpful.  Room was comfy with quirky decor (I liked it because it is different) but a little bright.  Nice and quiet.  Very small pool -- not very inviting.  But who cares when you can go down the street to Disney parks.  Convenient parking included which is a big deal in this area.  There is a restaurant offering breakfast however it closes at 10:30.  (We missed it) But it looked really good.  Chef takes great pride in his cooking.
Manager Response: Thank you vm0654, for your good review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Team was happy to hear your compliments about our nice and helpful service.  Yes, we do have quirky decor!  It is modern, yet we pay homage to the area of yesteryear.  The location where Hotel Indigo Anaheim stands today used to be a walnut farm.  So we have contemporary wall murals of farming equipment in bold colors throughout our public areas and guestrooms.  The pool & Jacuzzi area is a perfect place to watch Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display.  We are one of the last hotels in the area that does not charge a daily parking or resort fee.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best cooked-to-order breakfast in town.  We will let the Chef know that you enjoyed his cooking!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I start writing this and I haven't even checked in yet. I'm just thrilled there is not an abundance of fees tacked on to the price of the room. I looked at Great Wolf and the price was $169 and after all the taxes and fees the price came to $250!....I'm out. Hotel indigo was $126 and $147 with tax, nothing else extra. Thank you for not insulting my intelligence.
Manager Response: Thank you, deartori, for your comments that we do not have any "junk" fees!  We do not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee.    Thank you again,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Indigo in Anaheim and Loved it, from the housekeepers to the Management staff, everyone was so accommodating and nice. Our room was  spacious  and clean. It is centrally located, perfect walking distance to Disneyland, downtown Disney and many restaurants and shops...If you are looking for a hotel that offers that boutique experience in downtown....look no further...this team of professionals hit the mark!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and our Team.  We do have spacious and clean rooms.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our boutique hotel.    Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, great value, friendly staff. Need better ventilation?
Summary: Location: Hotel Indigo is about 15-20 minutes walking to the security check point of the main entrance of Disneyland.  It's located half a block from the GardenWalk shopping area which includes many great restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen, Bubba Bump Shrimp, etc.  On the block there are Starbucks, Walgreens, CVS and a lots of strip mall fast food like Chinese, Mexican, Pizza, etc.  Value: For the location and amenities it's an excellent value for Hotel Indigo.  Our room has two queen size beds with a lean back sofa.  The LCD TV has a plathera of channels including HBO, ESPN, etc.  It also has a Keurig coffee machine with complimentary K-cups.  We opted for the downstairs restaurant (Chambers) coffee or the Starbucks across the street though.  The
Manager Response: Thank you, 9-v-9, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are located in the Heart of Anaheim, close to Disneyland, GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the ones you listed as well as to Walgreen's and Starbucks.    I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our hearty, cooked-to-order breakfasts at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Yes, we have rates that either come with or without breakfast for 2 people per morning.       Our rooms are equipped with flat panels, refrigerators, safe, Keurig coffee makers and plenty of complimentary K-cups and tea!  Guests rave about our deluxe showers with a shower head and hand showers.    I hope you got a chance to view Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from our pool & Jacuzzi area.    Most hotels charge a daily parking fee and a resort fee, but we do not.  WiFi and use of Business Center with a printer is also complimentary.      Our Team thanks you for your compliments on our service.    Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My fiancée and I stayed at this hotel for our first ever visit to the Los Angeles/Anaheim area and it was wonderful! The staff was so friendly and helpful! We had an issue with our a/c unit the first night, it would blow but not cold enough to my liking (I can't sleep unless the room is like an ice box) and someone was in the room within minutes to make it blow colder! 😊 if we are ever back in the area I'm definitely staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am happy to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful.  We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed two nights at Hotel Indigo and enjoyed every minute of our stay! The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. Our room was spacious and very clean. We had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks at night. Perfect location (walking distance to many restaurants, The Garden Walk and Disneyland). Having the restaurant and bar downstairs by the lobby was an added bonus!
Manager Response: Thank you, kferguson731, for your perfect review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team will be very happy to hear your compliments.  Yes, our rooms are spacious and clean.  We are the closest IHG Hotel to Disneyland and just 2 buildings away from the GardenWalk with many popular restaurants like Bubba Gump and Cheesecake Factory.  I am glad you also got to try our own restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you again and all the Best,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Holiday base for Disney, universal and LA
Summary: Clean, practical, comfortable and functional hotel.  From checking in to leaving we were made to feel welcome and staff were helpful and friendly. The breakfasts were fab and very well priced.  We only had one evening meal in restaurant due to being out and about all I can say is I wish we'd had more.   Going on our experience I can highly recommend The Indigo.
Manager Response: Thank you, MLEMMorgan, for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are glad you felt welcomed by our staff.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best hearty cooked-to-order breakfast entrees in town!  We hope to see you again real soon.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Hotel was awesome. Very clean. Nice aesthetic. They do decorate with walnuts a lot (one wall in the bedroom was a mural ode to walnuts - cracked me up). Staff was VERY friendly and helpful. The restaurant in the hotel had delicious breakfast (we purchase breakfast vouchers) and was very high quality. Close to Disney, close to the convention center - great location! The only negative was that the treadmills in the gym were broken.
Manager Response: Thank you, Joshua R, for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Each Hotel Indigo around the world has its own neighborhood story.  Our story is that the area that our hotel stands today used to be a walnut farm, which is why we have a lot of walnuts displayed throughout the property.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed our hearty breakfast at the Chambers Bar & Bistro, named after the walnut farmer.  Yes, we are 2 blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center and also 2 blocks from Disneyland.  Hope to see you again soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The room is very clean and the bathroom is really nice. The decor in the hotel is modern and neat. Great customer service. Their restaurant is really good. Walking distance to Disneyland and a lot of restaurants nearby.  I had a nice and relaxing time at the hotel Indigo.
Manager Response: Thank you, Yoshiko O, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team is happy to hear that you had a relaxing time and liked our modern decor & customer service.  Yes, we are centrally located just 2 blocks from Disneyland.  We hope you will visit us again.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is a great, little hotel within easy walking distance to Disney. It has recently been remodeled and the decor is fun and fresh. We ate at the on site restaurant for breakfast and dinner and found the staff to be incredibly helpful and friendly and the food to be delicious (even for our picky 12 year old). Make sure you check out happy hour and their specials for some great deals. The pool here is very small, but it was never busy while we were visiting. As for noise....the rooms all have hardwood floors. They are beautiful and clean, but they don't absorb noise like carpet would. We could hear doors slamming all over the hotel all hours of the night. It wasn't awful, but if you're a light sleeper this might be bothersome. We found  that we were usually so exhausted at the
Manager Response: Thank you, Jennifer0810, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, our hotel was renovated and guests love our fun and fresh decor!  We appreciate your compliments regarding our team's helpful and friendly service.  I am glad you were able to dine at our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant and Bar.  We have the best, cooked-to-order breakfast entrees in town and a super Happy Hour deal daily.  Hope to see you soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Our new favorite hotel to stay at
Summary: We are annual pass holders at Disneyland and usually come once a month. This was a last minute trip and booked a hotel a couple hours before we drove down. We were so so impressed with this hotel! Super clean! Staff was extremely friendly! Also, it was so nice being able to just leave our car and walk to Disney. It was a super short walk and beat dealing with the parking garage at Disneyland! We will definitely be back to this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you, Jennifer N, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am excited to hear that you will be making us your home away from home when visiting Disney.  Yes, we are one of the last hotels that do not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee!  Watch the fine print!  No junk fees at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We also offer complimentary WiFi.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I have been fortunate to got to Disneyland every year for the last 10 years.  Usually we would stay directly across the street from the main entrance because convenience  or quick access was a great benefit, however we were always just meh with the experiences.  I stumbled across Hotel Indigo on Expedia and did a ton of review reading on Trip Advisor.  I took the leap and opted for Hotel Indigo as opposed to our regular standard and boy was I pleasantly surprised.  The Front Desk staff was super friendly and very attentive.  Positive attitudes and some funny humor go a long way, both of which I encounter at check in and check out.  When we opened the room I was wowed by the bright colors, wood floors and clean look.  The bathroom was super spacious, clean and
Manager Response: Thank you, gbrinaz, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  It is always a pleasure to hear that our guests enjoy our modern hotel, superior amenities and friendly service.  Our guests rave about our deluxe Aveda personal care products and luxurious shower.  I am happy to hear you had a great experience at our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  We hope you will make us your Home Away from Home!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Very Clean, Close to Disneyland
Summary: Wonderful stay. The staff was friendly everyday. The beds are very comfortable. The room was extremely clean. Love the wood floors in the rooms, The bathroom was clean, the towels were very soft. Great walking distance from Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am happy that I decided to stay here instead of a Disney Hotel. This hotel was way cheaper and very ideal for our family vacation. The staff at the hotel are very friendly and caring from the moment of Check-in to the time you check-out. Always with a smile on there faces. We had a couple of incidents occurring during our stay and as soon as I told staff they were quite friendly in offering solutions to our problems. I would stay at this hotel all over again. The hotel is 10 to 15 minute walk to Disneyland, the purpose of our trip but it has other local venues nearby restaurants, and shops. Our room was very beautiful and the beds were very comfy and they provide a lot of pillows as well. The bathroom was also nice, all it needed was a bench in the shower so you can sit and
Manager Response: Thank you gonzalap, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are happy that you found us to be less expensive and a great value.  Yes, we have a very friendly and caring Team.  I am glad you found our location to be convenient.  We are 2 blocks from Disneyland and 2 buildings away from the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  I hope you got a chance to try our own Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant and Bar.  We have the best, cooked-to-order breakfast entrees in town and great Happy Hour deals.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, I will stay here again
Summary: The hotel itself is pretty basic, though it is very clean and the rooms were great. What I most want to comment on is that everyone at this hotel was amazing. There was a minor problem with our room, and all staff members went above and beyond to make sure that we were taking care of and the situation resolved. I wish I could remember everyone's name who assisted us, but Mimi and all the others who were available to help during our stay were kind and professional. I highly recommend this hotel because it's staff is amazing.  Also, the restaurant was wonderful. We enjoyed our breakfast there each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you, Jennifer H, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We appreciate your amazing compliments regarding our Tram.  We do our best to provide customized service for every guest.  Glad to hear you enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro!  Hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards, Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: BEST DISNEY TRIP EVER! Amazing hotel for a family!
Summary: Where do I even start........ I'll just get back to the basics.... If you are planner or procrastinator this hotel was giving the BEST prices for what the hotels around Disneyland were offering. Alot of the other hotels are overpriced in my opinion and dont look like there hotel pictures. The rooms at the Indigo are super CLEAN and NEW, I love the vibrant modern vibe its such a super family friendly style. The beds are comfortable and jumping into that after a day of walking around Disneyland was the best feeling ever. My daughter turned 1 a couple weeks ago and we were looking for a more than decent room to just stay for the night for her birthday since we live in LA we didnt want to drive home in traffic. This hotel makes you feel like you paid 2x as much for less than the
Manager Response: Thank you, ashley m, for your amazing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we offer the best rates and our rooms are clean and new.  Guests rave about our modern vibe and comfortable beds.  I am happy to hear that you chose our hotel to celebrate your daughter's first birthday.  We do not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee and we offer cribs to use free of charge.  Our Family Studios are popular because they are spacious and have 2 queen beds and a sofa bed.  Thank you for your compliments about our friendly service.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon!  Warmest Regards.  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a total remodeled motel with fancy new decorations. The beds are so comfortable and sheets are very clean. You can smell they are well washed. Hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and very close to Cheesecake Factory. However there is some minor things in my stay - A water bottle is left from the previous guest in my room. A bag of trash is put on top of my luggage. House keeping person forgot to take it. There is a solid "Wall" view from my room. Air-Con is off in the day time or when nobody is in the room. In the summer the room is hot and make you hard to sleep if you get back late. And there is a guy talking loud at 1am?? in my first night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you, alanlP2471JK, for taking the time to write a review about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are glad you found our hotel to be centrally located, close to Disneyland and popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  I hope you got a chance to dine at our own Chambers Bar & Grill Restaurant and Bar during your stay.  We appreciate all feedback so we can continue to strive for excellence.  We will have a team meeting regarding the items you brought to our attention.  Rest assured, it will be taken care of and my sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced.  Please contact me directly at the hotel.  Thank you again and Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Superior customer service, great location, and clean
Summary: The customer service and location are what make this property outstanding in my opinion. The front desk staff gave us 5 star treatment our entire stay.  Far better than anything we've ever experienced at Disney. We ate dinner in the restaurant right off the lobby and I was able to see and hear the front desk. I never once witnessed the staff being snarky or unprofessional even when they thought there were no customers around. They were all focused on their job (not on their cell phones) and very friendly.  The only negative thing I can say about this property is that the rooms could use a little TLC. There were small things like a hole in one of the lamp shades. Also, I was not a fan of the décor but loved the clean wood floors. I would have liked a room like this when my son
Manager Response: Thank you, cantbelieveit_8, for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We do our best to provide each guest with customized service.  I am so glad to hear you had a superior experience at our hotel than at Disney!  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant and Bar does have mouthwatering entrees!  Yes, guests love the hand showers, over sized shower heads in our luxurious showers and Aveda spa amenities.  GardenWalk has great restaurants and just 2 buildings away!  We can't wait to have you stay with us again!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Just got home from my last trip into Anaheim and Disneyland with another beautiful stay at the Indigo. Staff has changed a little since my last trip but the attitude and ambiance is the same since last time, friendly staff and attention to detail is what i like about this place. Anaheim is getting inundated with hotels recently, its great to find a place that welcomes you back and im so glad that i found that there. Thank you staff and continue the good work all around.
Manager Response: Thank you, travellots82, for coming back to stay with us and writing a great review.  We appreciate your comments on our hotel ambiance and friendly Team!  We do have a lot of hotels in Anaheim, but we are one of the few that do not charge a daily parking or resort fees.  We hope you will make the Hotel Indigo Anaheim your home away from home!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This was a great hotel to visit Disney land.  The rooms are very nice and spacious.   The beds are very comfortable, very clean.  Plus side that the staff goes out of their way to accommodate everything you need.   There is a Walgreens across the street.  Note,the Restaurant on site is amazing, so don't bother walking to the big box restaurants.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you, Spring J, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we have clean rooms with comfortable beds.  We do our best to assist our guests with any questions they may have while visiting the Disneyland or Anaheim Convention Center.  We are located in the heart of Anaheim with Walgreen's and CVS within walking distance.  I am glad you enjoyed our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you again for recommending our hotel and hope to see you soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: A Great Home Base for D23!
Summary: My friend and I stayed at this hotel last weekend when we were attending the D 23 convention at the convention center. What a perfect location! It was easy to get to the convention center and it was easy to get to Disneyland. The hotel is stylish, clean, and a great value! And the beds were so comfy! This is my new go to hotel when I visit the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are walking distance from both the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.  We enjoyed watching all of the D23 attendees dressed up in superhero costumes as they walked by our hotel.  I am glad you enjoyed our stylish, clean hotel.  Guests do rave about our comfy beds.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The hotel offered a very clean and welcoming accommodation for us during a recent stay foe D23. We found all the staff very welcoming and the location was great. It was so wonderful to be within walking distance of everything and being able to park for free during our stay. The amenities were clean and tidy and had all the comforts you would like when away.
Manager Response: Thank you, Leanne C. for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are the closest IHG Hotel to the Anaheim Convention Center.  I am glad you enjoyed our amenities and found our facilities to be clean.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We just stayed at Hotel Indigo for two nights on a family vacation to Disney. The location is really good, walkable distance from the main entrance to the parks.  Room was really nice and clean, we had a small inconvenience with the A/C but it was fixed right away, the staff was friendly and diligent.  Mimi the manager did an amazing job with few inquiries that we had kept email communication every day.  Definitely would recommend this hotel and for sure we will come back on our next family vacation!!
Manager Response: Thank you, Hermes S, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are centrally located in the heart of the Disneyland Resort, just a short walk to the parks.  I am glad you found our room to be nice and clean.  Thank you again for recommending the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  All the Best,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at Hotel Indigo in Anaheim for our recent trip to Disney. Having complimentary parking within walking distance was a huge benefit to us, but so was having a friendly and hard working staff. From the moment we parked, through check in, our stay and breakfast the next morning, we were treated wonderfully. It was such a treat to have a courteous and polite staff who were willing to do what they needed to do to make our stay amazing. We will definitely return and recommend this hotel to others!
Manager Response: Thank you tmbalberg, for your amazing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We appreciate guests taking the time to share their experiences.  We have a great Team of Hospitality experts and we do our best to make every guest feel right at home!  I am glad you enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  Thank you again for recommending us!   Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this great hotel every time that I go to Disneyland for a few days. The staff is very friendly and helps quickly with any issues that I have. They even gave us a free upgrade! The rooms are spacious and clean and the bed is so comfy. The bathrooms are large and bright. I would recommend staying here over any nearby hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you Wesley H, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our Team to be friendly and helpful.  Cleanliness is our #1 priority!  Guests rave about our luxurious restrooms.  Thank you again for recommending our hotel.  All the Best,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay, close to Disney. They have a restaurant, bar, pool, Jacuzzi, business center, fitness studio and guest laundry. so much! Workers are nice too. Next time, I'll go back with my friends :)
Manager Response: Thank you. miiiiiiiks, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim,  Yes, we are a full service hotel with superior service.  Thank you again, and we look forward to see you and your friends on your next visit!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: AMAZING!!! Everything from the beginning to the end of our stay was everything we expected and more!!! The location is perfect as it is just minutes from Disney and the convention center, not to mention the Angel Stadium!  The hotel itself was relaxing and fun especially the pool and Jacuzzi.  I definitely recommend Hotel Indigo Anaheim to anyone!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Roger Jacobo A, for your 5 star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are close to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and Angel Stadium.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our facilities including the pool and Jacuzzi!  Thank you again for recommending us!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel Indigo in Anahiem is amazing
Summary: This  hotel is close to disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center, as well as within walking distance to downtown disney, and famous restaurants like Bubba Gump Shrimp factory. The rooms are great, they have hardwood floors, lots of space and storage and they have a real comfortable ,homy feel to them. There is an evening water/light show, great views of the fireworks, and the rooms are so clean, I suffer from allergies and I had no problems with the cleanliness. The staff is very friendly and eager to help you plan out your stay. I would recommend this hotel for anyone looking to have an enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you cynthiateske, for your amazing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are in the heart of the Disneyland Resort.  Yes, guests love our spacious rooms with hardwood floors.  We are happy you felt at home!  We appreciate your compliments about our staff's friendliness and helpfulness.  Thank you again for recommending our hotel.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: recommend this place hands down!!!! we were there for a 3 day getaway and we spent most of the time in our room which was perfect had breakfast and enjoyed the pool. Even the scenery was good, very close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you dvega2017, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you enjoyed your 3 day getaway.  Yes, we do have a nice pool & Jacuzzi area with a cabana that lights up at night.  I hope you got a chance to see Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from the pool!  Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best cooked-to-order breakfast in town!  Great food, large portions at a good price.  We hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in the Disneyland Resort.  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I back and I really enjoy staying here. The room was fresh and clean again. All the people here are very pleasant. Eating places are all around me. One night I visited the house of blues.  Very cool!  I know I'm coming back again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you Jerry O, for being a repeat guest at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim, where we strive to provide superior service and clean facilities.  Yes, we are within walking distance to the House of Blues and other popular restaurants like California Pizza Kitchen in the GardenWalk.  See you again next time!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel very close to Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel to stay at for a trip to Disneyland.  10-15 minute walk from the hotel to the entrance of Disneyland.  Beats having to pay for parking at the park as well as deal with Disney traffic.  The staff were all very nice, from the staff working the front desk when we checked in to the mornings down in the restaurant having breakfast.  The manager walked around the breakfast area and asked guests about their stay.  Note, breakfast is not included, but there is a restaurant area where you can order breakfast food.  The only reason I can't give a 5 star rating is we stayed in a suite and when we went to unfold the sofa bed, there was a bikini bottom in the bed.  I went down and asked for clean sheets so that we could change them out just in case.  The front desk worker got us
Manager Response: Thank you, Rachel S, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are the closest IHG property to Disneyland.  Yes, we offer complimentary parking - no junk fees l like resort fees.  WiFi is also free of charge.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is the best place in town to have hearty, cooked to order breakfast.  We hope you will stay with us again,  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng Genera Manager

Summary: We stayed there last week with our kids.  The hotel was new and very clean.  Walking distance to Disney.  Great staff and delicious breakfast, for a very good price! Definitely will stay there again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you, Fondantbird, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We appreciate your compliments on our staff and our delicious breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We hope to see you again very soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Modern Decor and Quick Access to Disney
Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Indigo for two nights at the beginning of July to visit Disneyland. I was with 3 teenagers.  I  have stayed at the same hotel on Harbour blvd since the kids were toddlers so the change was a big step for us.  I was pleasantly surprised that when we arrived at 2pm our room was ready and we were able to check in. There is a small surface level parking lot and and underground parking lot with a security gate that is accessed via room key.  The decor is modern and although the lobby is small with a tiny seating area and bar.  We found the front desk staff to be extremely gracious and friendly.  There is one elevator for the entire hotel but we did not experience prolonged waits at all. The room has modern decor and faux hardwood floor (except for the area rug
Manager Response: Thank you, whimsical_n1, for your 8-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are one of the last hotels that do not charge a daily parking or resort fee.
