We are happy to hear that you liked our modern decor, friendly staff, guestroom cleanliness, hardwood floor, comfortable beds, plush linen, luxurious shower and deluxe Aveda products and the nightly dancing water and light show.  Our guests love to watch Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from the pool & Jacuzzi area.  Our cabana lights up at night!  I am glad you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland Resort, including Downtown Disney.  We do have a lot of popular restaurants nearby  I hope you got a chance to dine at our own Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  Thank you for making us your official Disneyland hotel.   See you on your next visit.  Thank you again,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Extremely nice staff and management!   Great accommodations and comfortable bed.  Very convenient to Convention Center and Disneyland.   Good for families as well.   Could use a little more shade and lounge chairs by the pool.   Great restaurant for breakfast.    Will stay again.  View of Disney fireworks a special treat!
Manager Response: Thank you, sokobird, for your terrific review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We do have very comfortable beds.  Guests ask what brand of mattresses we have!  The breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro is great.  Yes, the private viewing of Disney's spectacular seasonal display from our pool and Jacuzzi area is very nice.  Guests can also view the fireworks from our restaurant's outside patio.  We hope you will stay with is again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel in Anaheim hands down!!
Summary: When looking for accomodation in anaheim, My husband and I and my brother and his wife, collectively decided on the indigo. The photos and reviews on trip advisor were amazing and it seemed the perfect place to spend our holiday. We were not disappointed! On arrival, we realised I had made a mistake when booking the Room, the staff behind the desk were so helpful and lovely to help solve our problem. Once we entered our Room, my jaw dropped! They are stunning! After doing a ton of travel around America, I can easily say this is the nicest place we had stayed! Every inch of the room was spotless! The thing I appreciated the most was the large glass shower rather than a shower over the bath which I was used to from the rest of my travels. The small touches were amazing like the
Manager Response: Thank you, Alison A, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you had such a great stay.  Our Team strives to offer excellent, personalized service for every guest.  Our rooms are stunning.  I personally love the modern decor with glass, stainless steel and wood floors.  Our Housekeeping staff is excellent and pride in our product.  Some staff make elephants out of towels, other make swans.  We are very close to Disney and there are many popular restaurants nearby like Bubba Gump and Denny's.  I hope you got a chance to try our own Chambers Bar & Bistro withe best cooked-to-order breakfast and Happy Hour in town!  We look forward to your next visit!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We had a very good stay at this hotel for 3 nights in late June 2017 on a vacation trip to Disneyland. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. While the hotel was an older property, it had been very nicely updated with clean, fresh rooms, comfortable bedding and a great walk in shower in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you Z1755VRrobertp, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are newly renovated in fresh, modern drcor.  I am glad you enjoyed our clean rooms and luxurious showers!  Hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The most amazing hotel in Anaheim it's one of our favorite hotels very friendly very clean very accommodating my son loves this hotel we stay 4 times and each is great❤️ also get to see the fireworks from my room❤️
Manager Response: Thank you, breysen07, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and calling us "The best hotel."  We appreciate you as a loyal guest.  See you on your next stay!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: On a strong recommendation to stay here from family - I'm very glad I did.   A beautiful, spacious but quaint hotel. The staff make you feel like you're at a home away from home. Incredibly attentive and warm, we felt very catered to for the entirety of our stay.   Loved the food, and parking was a doddle. A short walk from Disney too... frankly, an absolute Gem of a hotel.   We look forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you David J, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are proud of our beautiful boutique hotel with spacious rooms.  We are quaint and we try to make every guest feel at home!  Thank you for your compliments regarding our Team and our food from Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I stayed there with my friend who often travel all over the world. We had a fantastic fireworks view from pool side. Other clients said they are regular guests whenever they go to Disney attraction. All drink at bar are reasonable price and fireworks. You can remind good memories of Disney even you left the gate for a day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, our guests can enjoy a private viewing of Disney's spectacular seasonal display at our pool and Jacuzzi area.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best Happy Hour in town - a perfect way to unwind after a long day at Disney.  Thank you again and please visit us soon.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: First time here and I LOVED IT!
Summary: Free wifi, complimentary parking, food for breakfast and dinner was great! 10-minute walk to Disney Land. Staff is beyond accommodating and friendly. Decor is gorgeous. Heated pool. Gym. Great location-- walking distance from CVS, Walgreens, Anaheim Garden Walk. Clean. List goes on!
Manager Response: Thank you Betsy V, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do have gorgeous, modern decor.  Guests love our heated pool, Jacuzzi and cabana that lights up at night.  We are located in the heart of the Anaheim Resort, close to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, pharmacies, retail shops and popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  We hope you will stay with us again!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location - Modern with great service
Summary: Room was new modern and clean - front desk service and manager Mimi treated us very well - a short walk to Disney parks - right next to a new mall with lots of restaurants - parking was secure - grounds well maintained - gym was small but adequate.  I would definitely stay here again - good price - excellent - service.
Manager Response: Thank you, Laura4747, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, are the closest IHG hotel to Disneyland and right by GardenWalk with popular restaurants like Roy's Hawaiian Cuisine.  We do not charge parking or resort fee, unlike most hotels in the Anaheim Resort.  I am glad you found our grounds to be well maintained.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at Hotel Indigo 3 times this year and have two more trips planned. It is our go-to lodging when we visit Disneyland. It is up-to-date and extremely clean. They don't charge parking or resort fees, which is unheard of near Disneyland!! And the most outstanding feature is the staff! We have traveled a lot and have never had a nicer, most gracious staff. They are friendly, knowledgeable, and always making sure you are satisfied with the Hotel in all respects.
Manager Response: Dear BunnyBoyd, thank you for calling us the "Best Hotel near Disneyland!"  We are happy that we are your go-to lodging when you are visiting Disneyland.  Yes, we are one of the few hotels left that do not charge parking in the Anaheim Resort.  Our staff will be excited to hear your compliments about their service.  We try our best to assist every guest with all of their questions and needs.  Hope to see you very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Wonderful friendly staff who were quick to solve our every need. When we checked in they had everything ready for us.Parking was a breeze and walking back and forth to the convention center was easy. Love staying here!!
Manager Response: Thank you, Lance P, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We do prepare for every guest arrival.  Yes, we are 2 blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center with complimentary parking.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel was well done but spoilt by noisey people in adjacent rooms. I had expected high sound proofing but was kept awake two nights running with same issues. Also trays left in hallway made the place look uncared for and shabby I liked the look of the place but it felt a little unloved at times
Manager Response: Thank you, Richard S, on your feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We will take your comments and strive to improve.  My apologies and thank you again.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing! Excellent customer service,  clean rooms and private parking. Worth the stay. This will be the hotel my family and I will continue to stay at. We checked in without reservations at 3 am and the customer service was excellent, especially a gentleman by the name Brian he went above and beyond with his customer service skills.
Manager Response: Thank you, Martiza C, for your amazing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our excellent customer service and clean rooms.  Yes, we offer complimentary underground and ground level parking.  Brian was excited to be mentioned in your review.  We hope you will visit us again very soon.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I previously stayed at this hotel earlier in the year and really enjoyed my stay (i should have written a review then) The service was wonderful from the front counter, to the restaurant, to housekeeping. It's a short walk to the Disney, and an even shorter walk to Garden Walk for shopping.  The rooms are good-sized, decorated well, and clean. The food in the restaurant was consistently delicious (much better than some stand alone restaurants I've been to) And free parking!  I recently had the opportunity to stay again and the service was as usual, outstanding. On this trip, I had left some items in the room after checkout. Once the front desk was notified by housekeeping, they immediately contacted me about the items.  Unfortunately, I was already on the road home but they said
Manager Response: Thank you Chazel134, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  we are happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our service at the Front Desk, Housekeeping and our Chambers Bar & Bistro to be wonderful.  Yes, we are in the heart of Anaheim, just a short walk to Disneyland and next to the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like California Pizza Kitchen.    We are one of the few hotels in Anaheim that does not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee.    Tiffany is our Inspiration Maker!  I am glad she was able to assist you.  We love her too!  Hope to see you very soon.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: Everything was excellent! Only drawback was odor from drain in shower...recommend pouring bleach or something to take mildew smell away! Also I didn't have a microwave nor a refrigerator. Bummer because I dined out and couldn't take anything with me I'm guessing they were in all the suites. Should consider placing in regular rooms.   Staff was extremely nice and accommodating. Parking garage underground.  Nice location, near everything, well the good eats! Breakfast was everything. It was so fresh...  If I'm ever in the area, I'll book here without a question.
Manager Response: Thank you, Only1Empress28, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you found our staff to be friendly.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro does have the best, cooked-to-order breakfast in town.  I hope you got to try our daily Happy Hour!  We also have Taco Tuesdays.  Yes, please do stay with us again!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Hands down the best hotel in the disney area
Summary: Since my family enjoyed Hotel Indigo on our last visit to the Anaheim Disney area...  We decided that there's no reason to go elsewhere.  So we visited our friends at Hotel Indigo again a few weeks ago.  I have to stay that we were very happy with our decision!  The location is perfect, just a little stroll around the corner and you're in the parks!  Once again, the staff was amazing; they’re always so nice and helpful.  We're always greeted with a smile and a hello when entering.  You just can't beat the rooms here; they're very nice, modern, extremely comfortable, and clean.  The pool area is nice and relaxing, especially on a nice hot day.  Chamber's bar & bistro has a great atmosphere, food selection, and the bartender is very consistent.  The hotel is also so close to the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review about our hotel and team members! I am so pleased that you find our staff totally amazing. Our team aims to arrange excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job! We look forward to your next following stay with us here at Hotel Indigo of Anaheim, and providing you with all that you need to make your stay memorable!

Summary: We would definitely stay at Hotel Indigo again 😃!!! Rooms were clean, security safe in rooms, food was very good, indoor & outdoor eating area (nice portions, not overpriced, timely room service with our food still hot), Front Desk staff friendly, helpful, & professional. We booked 3 rooms for the family and no one had anything bad to say! I would recommend calling the hotel directly to book a room because you might get a better rate than booking online. It was convenient to buy our Park tickets at the Hotel Front Desk instead of waiting in a long line (only disadvantage is that you have to pay Cash Only for Park tickets). We didn't mind that Hotel doesn't have Shuttle service to the Parks (we didn't want to be packed in with people after spending all day in the Parks). Uber
Manager Response: Thank you Gloria Z, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are happy that you found our rooms to be clean and our restaurant to have good food.  Yes, we do have Outdoor Patio seating for dinner under the stars!  We do have a Fitness Studio and Pool & Jacuzzi area with a cabana, a perfect place to watch Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display!  Our staff works hard to provide friendly and helpful service and yes, we do sell Disney Tickets so our guests can avoid lines at the parks.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My family of four began our vacation in Southern California with two days at Disneyland.  We chose the Hotel Indigo in Anaheim for three reasons: price, location and service.  The hotel was positive on all three fronts.  The price for three nights was reasonable and a major factor in our selection.  The only down side was the size of the rooms; with two queen beds it was tight.  The location in relation to Disneyland was great; an easy ten minute walk.  In addition, several different restaurant choices are within a short walk.  Finally the service was positive.  Staff was friendly and the rooms were clean.  Again, just a couple of issues: when we returned to the room that first afternoon we had to call to have someone return to finish cleaning the room.  Finally, the amenities
Manager Response: Thank you, houlihanmc, for choosing the Hotel Indigo Anaheim as your home base for your family vacation to Southern California!  I am glad you were happy with our price, location and service.  We are the closest IHG Hotel to Disneyland.  We are also right by the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like McCormick and Schmick.  I hope you got a chance to try our on site restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We serve, hearty, cooked-to-order breakfast and have the best daily Happy Hour deals in town.  We hope to see your family again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My 7 yr. old granddaughter and I had a pleasant stay at Hotel Indigo in April 2017.  Best part was the friendliness of the staff.  Very courteous and helpful.   There is a handy, casual restaurant in lobby for breakfast and dinner.  But we also bought fresh sandwiches, snacks and beverages from vending machines in lobby, when we were too tired to go anywhere.  She loved the pool, perfect size for her.    Room was clean and bath room had plenty of towels. Lots of bed pillows.  Only one chair. Halls were updated as well but bit of musty odor in halls.    It is not "steps" to Disneyland, as advertised.  But about a 15 minute walk to entry.  There is a bus that you can take to and from park, that stops next door, about every 30 minutes.  #6 I think.  At night, you are the last stop
Manager Response: Thank you, jk34jk34, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Team appreciated your comments about their friendliness.  I am glad you found them to be courteous and helpful.  We do have a nice Pool Area with a Jacuzzi and Cabana where guests can view Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display!  Our rooms are spacious, clean well stocked with towels and other amenities.  We are close to Disneyland, GardenWalk with popular restaurants like Bubba Gump as wll as our own Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant with the best cooked to order breakfast and daily Happy Hour!  Thank you again and hope to see you very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng   General Manager

Summary: My family and I spent five nights here when we came to Disneyland for vacation. Hotel is a nice boutique hotel with a modern feel. Everything is updated but it is very noticeable that the building itself is old when walking through.  Loved the fact that the rooms had hardwood flooring, no dirty carpets here! And free wifi! Parking is also free, which is a huge plus! Surrounding hotels charge a fee of about $20 a day. It is clean throughout and Housekeeping staff did a wonderful job of keeping our room clean and tidy every day which was great to come back to after long days at the park. The only downside was the occasional smell of sewage if the bathroom vent fan was on too long and the smell of mildew from the A/C unit. The hotel is within walking distance (about 10min) from
Manager Response: On behave of Hotel Indigo of Anaheim, thank you for sharing your positive feedback about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us. We also would like to apologize about our Air Conditioning system. Our maintenance team takes daily measures to prevent such a situation like the one you experienced before they arise and unfortunately we fell short based on your review. Our goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay and I ensure you this will be brought to the appropriate department. Thank you once again for your awareness and please feel free to contact me directly should your travel bring you back to our property and I will personally oversee your accommodations.  Best Regards, Jorden Collins Front Desk Supevisor

Summary Heading: Very clean and looks brand new
Summary: The whole property is clean and well taken care of.  Rooms were impeccable.  Pool area small but had shady spots for relaxing.  We walked to Disneyland in 10 minutes.  My only complaint is that our room on the first floor had a small window with very little light, looking into a wall. The front desk gave us a choice to wait for a room higher up but we chose to get checked in earlier instead.  Overall, a great value!
Manager Response: none

Summary: On this trip we needed a room to come to after Disneyland so we wanted something close but inexpensive. We have 2 kids, 7 and 1.   Reception:  We arrived early, way before check in time, staff was courteous and helpful.  They have us a garage pass, parking is free, let us leave our rented car there. They offered their amenities and gave us all information needed about the hotel.  Room:  Great appearance, clean, stocked and fresh. Only wish they would have a microwave. Fridge was in room. Rooms service was friendly didn't bother us when the sign was up.   Safety:  Cars are inside a gate, entries have card access only and the reception area is always staffed. Great on the safety.  Distance from Disney:  I believe we got a great price for the walking distance trade off. The closer
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not too shabby for a short stay
Summary: Sometimes the most difficult thing about traveling is navigating the intricacies of finding a perfect hotel that's reasonably priced and centrally located. This is one of those places that offers both.   If you're wanting upscale glamour this might not be the locale for you. But you can't beat walking distance to Disneyland in Cali. I mean come on, California traffic is not Zen-like in the least. Throw on those tennis shoes (if you're wearing anything other than tennis shoes for a Disney theme park jaunt...well...you're crazy).  This hotel was boutique-ish and quaint. The rooms were clean, average, and affordable. The staff were always friendly to us and offered their expertise in places we should visit while in Cali; even offering up a map to the Flower Fields (when we weren't
Manager Response: Thank you, Misty H, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are indeed within walking distance to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure Parks.  Guests love our boutique decor and friendly service for a quaint experience.  We try to assist every guest with their questions and travel needs to make our hotel their home away from home.  I am glad you liked our guestrooms.  We make cleanliness our #1 priority.  Thank you and hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My family and I visited the property in June for 3 days. From the initial communication via telephone to our actual departure; this team exemplified the Best of the Hospitality Industry. Two team members that stood out were Jorden & Erik. The professionalism and concern for our family was of the highest priority. They consistently welcomed and acknowledged each guest with a smile. They were also well versed on the local attractions and best dining options in the area. Definitely, the best kept secret in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you , hwwkriya, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Team is so excited to hear that you feel that we exemplified the Best of the Hospitality Industry!  We will continue to strive to exceed guest expectations.  We hope you will visit us again very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for two nights as we were going to Disneyland and California Adventures. This hotel is convenient and close to the theme parks so we can walk to the park from the hotel. Parking is free at the hotel so you don't need to worry about paying for parking. The room was comfortable, and they provide laundry facilities as well. The staff was very helpful and made our stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you, cpcch0i, for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are the closest IHG property to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure, just 2 blocks away.  We are one of the last hotels in the Anaheim Resort that does not charge a daily parking fee or resort fee.  Guests love our rooms which are large, spacious and comfortable.  Thank you again, the staff will be happy to hear that you found them to be helpful and made your stay enjoyable!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed for three nights over Memorial Day weekend. When we arrived we were immediately greeted by two smiling hotel staff members. We were a little early for check in, but they offered to hold our bags so that we could head straight to Disneyland and start our vacation! After a long day in the park, we returned and got the key to our room. Our room was on the 4th floor and away from the elevators. The room itself was quiet, clean and stylishly decorated. The bathroom was spacious and clean. They provide all toiletries and daily room cleaning. We were very pleased with the room in general. The bed and pillows were very comfortable and, again, the room was quiet, The staff was unbelievably happy and helpful. At one point, we had a small problem with the in-room
Manager Response: Thank you, Brenda C, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We do have stylish, clean and comfy rooms.  Guests love our spacious bathrooms.  We have both a shower head and hand shower along with Aveda products.  Thank you again for recommending our hotel.  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary Heading: Three Night stay and it was Superb
Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo for three nights in May and it was brilliant. The hotel reception is modern and cool and the free parking is a bonus. The hotel is located close to Disney land so is ideal for anyone wishing to attend. The hotel bar / restaurant was good with great staff and the specials deals was superb. Me and my girlfriend wanted to visit universal studios and the reception staff were fantastic in telling us the best way to travel by public transport (we had dropped the car back off at the rental company). It turns out uber - ARCTIC overground train - metro underground train is the best was to get there! The room was huge and very very clean and modern and the bathroom was unbelievable. The outdoor pool looked clean and the hotel provided free WIFI. A must stay
Manager Response: Thank you MancccTraveller, for your superb review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Guests rave about our modern & cool decor, great reception & service, huge & clean rooms, our close proximity to Disneyland and complimentary parking and WiFi.  I am glad you enjoyed our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We hope to see you again very soon!  Disney has a lot of events coming up this summer!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is a clean hotel with nice, helpful staff. The woman who helped me check-in was wonderful and I should have gotten her name to put in my review. We could hear noise from our neighbors due to thin walls but the rooms were clean and cozy. The parking garage was a hassle and we always had a hard time finding a spot. This hotel would not be my first choice, but not my last either.
Manager Response: Dear 31msmcgee, thank you for letting us know that you found our staff to be nice & helpful and our rooms to be clean and cozy.  We do have a welcoming, wonderful Team!  We usually have plenty of complimentary parking, but like most hotels, do run tight on parking during holiday weekends.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review!    Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: If your looking for a "Home Away From Home" experience when in the "So-Cal" area, look no further then The Hotel Indigo Anaheim! From the get go you are quickly transported into an impressively clean & modern boutique hotel setting. Their warm and welcoming staff soon become family who go out of their way to ensure your fully accommodated but most importantly comfortable through out your stay! SPECIAL SHOUT OUT TO ERIK AND IVONNE FOR A FLAWLESS CHECK INEXPERIENCE! Erik took time to showcase a room for us as we were new to this specific hotel brand. He highlighted features that set them apart from the other hotels within the area. He extended thorough knowledge on the area and how we can get about, enjoy meals, and feel at home during our 3 night stay. Upon room assignments the
Manager Response: Thank you Jasem A, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are a new, boutique hotel in the Anaheim Resort and the closest IHG property to Disney.  Thank you for your shout out to Erik and Ivonne.  Our Front Office Team works very hared to make sure our guests receive superior service!  Our Housekeeping Department is top notch!  We are one of the few hotels that do not charge daily parking fee, resort fee of for WiFi.  I am happy that you found us to be a "Great Hotel that Guests Love"!  Thank you again, for your compliments and comments.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This was a family vacation to Disneyland and Hotel Indigo made it all so pleasant and easy.  Great upscale hotel, clean, modern, comfortable.  The staff was amazing, front desk, restaurant, room service, housekeeping they were all absolutely fast and super friendly. Room service was a treat, the menu is good, food great and the prices were competitive with local restaurants.  The location is super as we were able to walk to and from Disneyland easily.
Manager Response: Thank you, Maytripdisney, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are an upscale, boutique hotel with modern decor and comfortable furnishings.  The Team will be happy to hear that you experienced amazing service.  I am glad you got a chance to try our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We have the best food in town at great prices.  We hope you will make our hotel your home away from home when visiting Disneyland, which is a short walking distance away.  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My husband and I just stayed here over the weekend and were very excited to try a new to us hotel. When we arrived, the check in was great. Everyone at the front desk was very friendly. We got our room keys and proceeded to the parking garage underneath. There was practically no parking, that continued to be a problem our entire stay. The walls must have been very thin as well. We were on the second floor and I was woken up around 5 AM to what sounded like someone running back and forth in the room above us for about three hours. It also sounded like that same room moved the furniture around multiple times.   The hotel itself was very appealing looks wise, the bed was comfy, nice bathroom, and a spacious room.   However, I'm not sure if we would stay here again. The parking and
Manager Response: Dear Amberlynn M, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We normally have ample parking, but we had an unusual circumstance just for those few days.  We do offer both ground level and underground parking free of charge.  We had a situation where the ground level parking could not be used for a couple of days.  Thank you for your compliments about our friendly service, property design, spacious rooms and comfortable furnishings.     Please contact me directly for your next visit so I can reserve a room on the top floor.  Thank you again,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We travelled with a family of 7 and requested 2 rooms beside each other and close to the pool.  The staff completely accommodated our request.  The hotel and rooms were very clean and the food was great.  Not a long walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you, Helen, M for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We try to accommodate all of our guest requests.  We make cleanliness our #1 priority!  Yes, our Chambers Bar and Bistro serves great food!  Please visit us again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Our GO-TO hotel for Disneyland visits
Summary: My fiancé and I love going to Disneyland at least every other month. We live about 6 hours away from the parks so we stay over for 1 or 2 nights when we go. We initially stayed at one of the three hotels on Disney property but depending on the season they can be very expensive.   Hotel Indigo was our saving grace. The hotel is clean, trendy, friendly, comfortable, convenient and affordable. This is the only hotel we will stay at during our Disneyland visits.
Manager Response: Thank you d_lenox88, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are happy that you found us to have friendly service and clean accommodations.  Guest love our modern decor and comfortable furnishings.  We are one of the only hotels that do not charge daily parking or resort fees and offer complimentary WiFi!  Thank you again and see you in a few months!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Close to Disneyland, and several restaurants--although restaurant on site was good.  Also convenient to pharmacy, 7 11. Friendly staff, nice pool and free parking made this hotel a great value for our 2 night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you, 554karinu, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we do have our own restaurant with great food and also close to popular restaurants like Bubba Gump.   2 new pharmacies opened within walking distance, Walgreens and CVS.  We have convenience stores like 7-11 and we have a Grab & Go in the Lobby for fresh fruit, salads, sandwiches, parfaits, fruit cups, bottled waters, sodas, coffee drinks, snacks, candies and gum.  Please stay with us again in your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: My family of four was heading to Disney for my son's birthday and we decided to book a hotel last minute to avoid driving up so early the next morning.  I picked Hotel Indigo mostly due to the reasonable price.  I was so pleasantly surprised with the whole experience!  We arrived pretty late in the evening and I was so excited to see multiple restaurants right next to the hotel, so it made finding dinner super easy!  The hotel itself is adorable.  The rooms are very clean and modern and the hotel staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  We had breakfast at the Bistro inside the hotel before heading to Disney and the food was delicious!  The best part was the quick walk to the Disney from the hotel and the FREE parking!  Even though we had already checked out, we were allowed
Manager Response: Thank you, luvsunnyweather, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Glad to hear that you celebrated your son's Birthday with us!  Yes, we are close to a lot of popular restaurants like California Pizza Kitchen.  Our own restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro offers mouth watering breakfast entrees!  The Team will be happy to hear that you found them to be friendly and helpful.  Thank you again for your kind words and hope to see you again!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel has good underground parking and is within walking distance of Disneyland - we had researched it and booked based on its good location and reviews. There are closer hotels that are in the same price range, which we would consider next time. Unfortunately, the toilet in our room did not work from the start. In the morning we reported this to reception (who were surprisingly not very apologetic at all), and they said that it would be fixed. It was still a problem the following night. We were given a key to a neighbouring room, but this was not convenient at all as I had to take our baby with me while my partner was out, and there was nowhere to put him (we had a cot in our room). Awkward and annoying. We were offered a free bag of chips for the inconvenience on
Manager Response: Thank you KaccaM, for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate all feedback so we can continue to improve.  Thank you and Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel near Disneyland and Convention Center
Summary: Stayed here for three nights during a trade show. The room was clean and quiet. Made good use of the elliptical machine in the small gym, which was never occupied when I was there. Staff seemed attentive. Parking was a little bit of a challenge but workable. Walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Center, so good location!
Manager Response: Thank you Jeremy H, for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we have the best location in town, walking distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and GardenWalk with many popular restaurants like PF Chang's.  I hope you got a chance to try our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you for your compliments about our attentive staff.  Hope to see you soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Hotel Indigo is a great option near Disneyland, with big rooms and friendly staff. The manager Mimi puts in extra effort to make guests welcome.  The room was very clean and comfortable, and extra bonus was the Aveda amenities! Nice to see a hotel that doesn't cut costs on the little extras.  On the first day there was a problem with the water, but the staff organised rooms at the neighbouring hotel for guests to use showers etc. The problem was dealt with efficiently and was not the fault of the staff, so kudos for handling it so well.
Manager Response: Thank you oop-89, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Team works hard to make sure that each and every guest is happy during their stay.  Guests love our Aveda products (and our Keurig coffee products!).  We do not believe in nickel and diming our valuable guests!  We are one of the last hotels in the Anaheim Resort that does not charge for "extras" like a daily parking fee, daily resort fee, etc.  Thank you again and please stay with us again.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The location of this hotel is awesome everything is within walking distance. The customer service was great everyone was was very helpful. The room were very clean and well kept, as well as the pool and fitness room.
Manager Response: Thank you Gilbert A, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are close to Disney, Anaheim Convention Center and GardenWalk.  We work very hard to make sure our guests receive superior guest service!  Thank you for your compliments on the cleanliness of our rooms.  Were you able to catch Disney's spectacular fireworks display from our pool?  I am glad you liked our Fitness Studio.  Hope you will visit us again very soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We had 4 nights at this hotel and can recommend it thoroughly. The were very friendly and helpful, and the room was clean, large and light. We chose itfor it's location ; it is easy walking distance to the Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you Bev D for taking the time to recommend the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We always strive to provide personalized service to our guests whether they are traveling for leisure or business.  Our rooms are spacious and clean with a lot of natural lighting.  We are close to Disney, Anaheim Convention Center and GardenWalk with popular retail and restaurants.  Did you get a chance to try our Chambers Bar & Bistro?  Hope to host your next stay to the Anaheim Resort.   Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: We spent 4 nights at Hotel Indigo and found their staff fantastic. Great location close to Disneyland with convenient eating options.  My 8 year old son left his favorite soft toy behind and Mimi searched for it, and FedEx the toy to our next location...on her lunch break when others could have done nothing. Can't recommend highly enough from our experience. Thank you Mimi...I have a very happy son now that he has been reunited Spots!!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Andrew W, it was a pleasure to host your family's holiday here in the States.  It was a Team effort to get Spots back to your son!  Our Housekeeping staff searched for it and our Inspiration Maker Tiffany took it to FedEx.  We are happy Spots is back where he belongs!  Please enjoy the rest of your vacation!  Thank you and Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This lovely little hotel is an easy 15 minute walk from the gates of Disneyland.  There are lots of restaurants nearby.  We stayed here for two nights and it was just perfect.  The staff were super friendly, the room was lovely and bright, very clean.  We could watch the fireworks from our bedroom window on our first night.  They even allowed us to leave our car in their car park free of charge after we had checked out. We would happily recommend it and will definitely stay there again if we go back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you dawnbracken, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are centrally located, close to Disneyland and GardenWalk with many popular restaurants and retail shops.  We prioritize great service and cleanliness.  We do have renovated modern rooms with plenty of bold colors and natural lighting.  We are one of the few hotels in the Anaheim Resort that does not charge a daily parking fee.  Hope you will stay with us again on your next trip!   Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel is awesome. Very convenient location to the parks.  Staff is very helpful and courteous. The amenities were great. Gym was great and food was delicious. Room is spacious and beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your super review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team strives to provide excellent service.  Guests love our amenities including Keurig coffee and Aveda products!  We do have spacious rooms with comfortable furnishings.  Hope to see you again soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: We're SoCal residents, but we stayed here one night before hitting Disneyland for Magic Morning the next day. I'm generally a big fan of Hotel Indigo's brand, and this property was very good.  First, location-wise, the hotel is an easy walk to the park. I personally like modern hotels, and from the park's entrance to this hotel, the only other comparable hotels I saw were clustered around this one (e.g., Hyatt House, SpringHill Suites) so it's got the best combination of comfort and distance, in my opinion. Even better, the hotel doesn't charge for parking or wi-fi. That's huge in my eyes, and super family-friendly.  As for the room, we had a standard 2 queen beds room, and it was very spacious. It even had a pullout couch. Everything looked pretty new and clean and
Manager Response: Thank you dagongster, for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad your son and family had a great Birthday Celebration for him.  We are the closest IHG property to Disneyland and one of the few hotels that do not charge a daily fee for parking and WiFi.  Our Team is happy to hear that you were pleased with our services, cleanliness, our spacious and modern rooms with plenty of outlets.  I hope you will make our hotel your home away from home when visiting Disney.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a great location
Summary: If you're planning a trip to Disneyland this is a great hotel to stay in. It is approximately a ten minute walk to the front gates/security check.  The location is fabulous. There is Walgreens, CVS, 7-11, liquor store, pizza, Chinese food all right next door. There are also plenty of dining options that are only a 2-3 minute walk such as IHOP and the Cheesecake Factory which is perfect if you don't always want to spend the money in Disneyland.  I stayed in a room with two Queen beds and it suited us just fine. It was a bit smaller than some other rooms or hotels but my family of 4 had no issues as we were mainly only in the room for sleep anyways. The beds and pillows were comfortable and the room was clean.  The bathroom has a large shower. My husband did complain about the
Manager Response: Thank you, Alisha Z, for your detailed review.  It is travelers like you that make TripAdvisor a great source for traveler information.  Hotel Indigo Anaheim is in the heart of the Anaheim Resort.  Whether you are on holiday going to Disney or attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center, we are within walking distance to ALL!  Yes, we have had a lot of development over the years, including popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory and pharmacies like Walgreens nearby.  A new venue also opened 2 buildings away, the House of Blues at the GardenWalk.    I am glad you enjoyed your room and shower.  Guests love our plush bedding and hand showers.  Cleanliness is our number 1 priority.       Thank you for your compliments on Alfredo, our star server at our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.  We have the best breakfast and Happy Hour in town!  We hope to see you family again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Though the room was spacious and conveniently located to Disneyland, the stay was disappointing. Our room was not very quiet and you could hear practically everything going on in the hallway, including the elevator opening and closing.    The service was also lacking, both at check-in and during our stay. We forgot our toothbrushes so called down to the front desk to get some delivered to our room, a service the hotel offers. Unfortunately, the toothbrushes never came and we had to go down to the lobby to pick them up at 1:00AM. In general, this was a disappointing stay.
Manager Response: Dear Erica O, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate all feedback so we can continue to improve.  We normally receive great reviews on our property, amenities and service.  We will review your comments and make improvements.  Thank you again and Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great launchpad for Disney without paying Disney hotel prices!
Summary: I knew we would hardly be in our room, so I wanted to save money to apply it to theme park experiences.  I still wanted a hotel that was clean, priced right, and close enough for my 7 and 8 year olds to walk.   Hotel Indigo checked all the boxed, plus staff was really friendly.  My daughter left her souvenir in the room upon checkout, yet we realized it when we were already on Laguna Beach. A staff member personally found it and saved it at the front desk until we returned a couple days later to fly back out.  I would recommend staying here
Manager Response: Thank you, katiebat, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad our Team got your daughter her souvenir that she left behind back.  We do our best to take good care of our guests from pre-arrival to post departure.  I am happy to hear you liked our hotel.  Yes, we are the closest IHG property to Disneyland!  Please come back and visit us!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I Stayed for a night, super friendly staff, wonderful atmosphere and a walk away from "the happiest place on earth". How can you beat that? I had breakfast at the restaurant, the eggs Benedict was made to perfection, the waitress was friendly and super attentive. Loved the experience! I will definitely stay here again and I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you Bella430, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, indeed we are the closest IHG property to Disneyland.  Guests love our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We have the best breakfast and Happy Hour deals in town.  Thank you for recommending our hotel and see you soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo to attend a concert at The House of Blues. Extremely friendly check in. Modern/newly updated and in the rooms there were more electrical outlets than any traveler could dream of having! (Conveniently located too!) Attention to detail was amazing. I really appreciated the secure underground parking as well. It is a very short walk to the Garden Walk where the House of Blues is located so our evening could not have been better. The restaurant/lounge looked great but we did not dine there as we had already made other arrangements. Check out was as great as checking in. We will stay again and I highly recommend to everyone.
Manager Response: Dear reddd29, thank you for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim, the only boutique hotel in the Anaheim Resort.  We are the closest IHG property to the new House of Blues inside the GardenWalk.  Many of the performers stay at our hotel.  We are new, so we have modern accommodations including plenty of electrical outlets!  We are one the few hotels in the city with gated underground parking.  And the best part is that parking is free!  Please do try our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro next time you stay with us.  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel if you're going to Disneyland
Summary: Really convenient, being just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks. The quality of the rooms & the breakfast were excellent - really friendly & helpful staff. We loved our stay there, and our two days in Disneyland. Would highly recommend this hotel. Only wish we'd packed swimming trunks, as the pool & spare area looked very tempting after a long drive down from Santa Cruz.
Manager Response: Dear Dave M, thank you for taking the time to write such a fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our team does our best to provide excellent service.  Yes, please do come back and enjoy our pool & spa.  You can view Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display from the pool area, as well as at the adjacent Outdoor Patio of our Chambers Bar & Bistro Restaurant.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: You can't beat Hotel Indigo!! Amazing customer service, hotel overall is very clean and tidy and the amenities are great.  Wifi and Parking are both free, which is hard to get around the Disneyland area. I will definitely visit again!
Manager Response: Dear cmc9008, thank you for your review about our amazing customer service!  Our amenities including Keurig coffee and teas and Aveda products are second to none.  Yes, guests rave about our clean, modern hotel as well as complimentary parking and WiFi!  no resort fees!  See you next time :)  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Exquisite little boutique hotel in the heart of Anaheim
Summary: Stayed here over spring break, April 18th thru the 21st. Pleasantly surprised by the hotel, the cleanliness, distance to amenities and friendliness of the staff. Parking was FREE. Hard to find anywhere in LA let alone Anaheim. Walking distance to Disneyland. Walgreens and CVS pharmacy right at the corner of Katella and Harbor and plenty of dining options in the Anaheim Gardenwalk which is just next door. Rooms were very clean and tidy and DID NOT have carpet which I loved. Spacious bathroom with a huge walk in shower There was no microwave in our room but it did have a smallish refrigerator and a decent size safe for your valuables. Aveda bath amenities. Love it.  Small well maintained pool and jacuzzi. Room service available and they had a sit down restaurant on site. WiFi
Manager Response: Thank you dsequeira, on your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Cleanliness is our #1 priority.  We strive to provide excellent customer service.  We are walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We are also next to the GardenWalk Restaurrant & Retail Center.  CVS and Walgreen's are across the street.  We are one of the last remaining hotels that do not charge a daily parking fee.  Guests love our spacious guestrooms with hardwood floors and deluxe showers.  We have refrigerators and safes in the rooms and microwaves on property to heat food for our guests.  Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display can be viewed from our pool and Jacuzzi area.  Our in-house restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro, offers the best hearty breakfast entrees in town as well as great Happy Hour deals!  Chambers just received an Award of Excellence from the County of Orange.  Glad to hear that you will visit us again!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights whilst visiting Disneyland.  Location is very convenient - only a 15 minute walk to the park and amongst a selection of popular eating places.  The staff were brilliant and so helpful.  Mimi the hotel manager pays attention to the small things that made the trip more enjoyable.  Jordan on check in said the hotel breakfast was the best around and he was not wrong!!  It was very good value and delicious - especially the breakfast burrito and the huevos ranchos!!  He was also very helpful in recommending shopping areas nearby that suited our need.  There is secure parking on site and a small pool area which sees the sun so we managed to fit in a bit of relaxation too.  The rooms are not massively spacious but big enough for our needs - we are a family of
Manager Response: Thank you Joanna B, for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are in the heart of Anaheim and the closest IHG property to Disneyland.  We are next to the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  Yes. the guests and employees love the Chambers' breakfast!  We have underground covered parking and the best part is that we are one of the last few hotels that do not charge for parking!  Thank you again and hope to see you again for your next holiday.  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: My mom and I had a girl's weekend in Disneyland and this hotel was fantastic!  Super clean, great amenities and a short, easy walk to Disneyland.  The food at the restaurant was great, the staff friendly, it was perfect!  Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear that you had a great stay!  I remember you and your mom :)  I hope you both had nice flights home.  Please visit us again.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel -- I stay here every year
Summary: My friends and I visit the Anaheim area every year, and this is our pick every year. We've been staying here since 2009, when it was still a Holiday Inn Express. It was always a good hotel, but especially after they switched over to a Hotel Indigo a few years ago, it's been fantastic. The rooms are kept in great shape and the people who work here are great. The location is excellent, too.  I would definitely recommend this hotel, whether you're visiting Disney or in town for a convention.
Manager Response: Thank you, fny82, for being a loyal guest.  We are so happy to hear that you stay with us every year.  We are Anaheim's first boutique hotel where guests can enjoy the benefits of being part of the world's best hotel company, IHG.  Our location and guestrooms are second to none and we strive to provide excellent customer service.  We now have Chambers Bar & Bistro on site.  We have the best cooked to order breakfast and Happy Hour in town!  See you next time!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I don't know if it was just the room we were in, but we could hear everything. People above us were loud, people in the hallways were loud. In most hotels we have been, they are quiet even with people walking around everywhere. The maids were also very pushy. They checked 3 times one morning to see if we were out yet. Will never go here again.
Manager Response: Dear Josh L, thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are 2 blocks away from Disneyland.  We do have a lot of guests and most people are excited about going to the theme parks.  Thank you again for your valuable feedback so we can improve.  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I'm sure there are lots of hotels in this vicinity, but it's a super location, 20 mins walk from theme park.  Excellent rooms, lovely and clean and spacious.  There is a little swimming pool just right for cooling off at the end of the day.  If you walk 5 mins down the road, make sure you visit the amazing cheesecake restaurant- it's mind and taste bud blowing.
Manager Response: Thank you Helen S, for your brilliant review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are 2 blocks from Disneyland and our renovated rooms are spacious and clean!  Our pool area also has a Jacuzzi and it is a great place to unwind and watch Disney's spectacular seasonal fireworks display.  We are right next to the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory.  I hope you got to try our restaurant, Chambers bar & Bistro.  We have the best cooked to order and Happy Hour in town.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng  General Manager

Summary: We travelled around California for 3 weeks and stayed in 5 different hotels this was the best one. The location is ideal for Disney,Restaurants & shopping the room we had was of a very high standard with modern amenities and very clean. The staff were always polite,friendly & helpful a special mention for Jordan he always went above & beyond to help us with any question we had and his suggestions helped us get the most out of our stay in Anaheim. Will definitely be back. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Kickboxerx12, thank you for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our Team was happy to read that you complimented our services.  We do offer modern amenities and we work very hard to provide a spotless facility.  Thank you for mentioning Jorden and his helpfulness.  We are happy to hear that you will visit us again!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Jordan at front desk was extremely helpful - top notch service - great food places nearby from Ruth's Chris to IHOP - you choose !--- - v clean modern vibe in the hotel ... stayed there twice before - will be back for next convention travel !
Manager Response: Thank you, GaryJ2468, for your awesome review!  Yes, we have a very modern hotel close to the Anaheim Convention Center, GardenWalk with popular restaurants and Disneyland.  Se you next convention or sooner!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel close to Disneyland, Friendly, Efficient and Attentive Staff, Wonderful Group Trip
Summary: The Hotel Indigo Anaheim is located near the intersection of Katella & Harbor within a short walk to Disneyland and is next to several restaurants (Roy's, McCormick & Schmidt's, Cheesecake Factory) and the Anaheim Garden Walk.  The rooms were clean and well appointed with hardwood floors, refrigerator, Keurig coffee maker, and complimentary wi-fi.  The hotel has an underground garage and we had no problems with parking.  Our check in experience was very easy and the Front Desk staff was friendly and efficient.  Our church youth group was looking for a hotel to book 14 rooms and we initially contacted the Ramada Plaza Anaheim property next door.  When we were in Anaheim for another event we met with Laura, the Director of Sales-Ramada Plaza, she notified us that she did not have
Manager Response: Dear Shin3kt, thank you for taking the time to write such a great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  It was our pleasure hosting your group.  Yes, we are 2 buildings away from the GardenWalk with all of the popular restaurants.  We have beautifully furnished guestrooms.  We make cleanliness our #1 priority.  Guests like our complimentary WiFi and covered parking.  We are happy that you enjoyed our hotel and services.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with very caring hotel staff. We had breakfast at the hotel restaurant and it was very good. It was about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. I definitely would stay at this hotel again when I go back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear matthew r, thank you for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad you enjoyed our service and our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We hope you will make our hotel your home away from home when visiting Disneyland.  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay at Hotel Indigo. Unfortunately the first room was on the second floor near the lift and it was very noisy. Floor boards are great for hotel staff but not so great for sound from above if you have inconsiderate people above you. Staff were very accommodating and moved us to a quieter room. Location was great for Disneyland and we also had breakfast and dinner at the restaurant which was enjoyed by all and value for money. Stayed for New Years Eve which was great. They also have free car parking.
Manager Response: Dear Kateh1906, thank you for taking the time to write a nice review about Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you found the staff to be accommodating.  We are very close to Disneyland.  Yes, Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best breakfast in town and a great deal on our Happy Hour.  We are one of the last hotels to offer complimentary parking.  No resort fees, either :)    Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: From the moment I checked in the staff was efficient and helpful. They offered good suggestions for local shopping and activities. I am writing to share how well they solved a minor problem with my room. HBO was not working, all other channels were. Maintenance came by and checked all the obvious things. It became clear that it was a problem with the cable TV provider Time Warner. Mimi the general manager took full responsibility offering her card and assuring me that she was taking care of the problem. They key here is that the hotel made sure I was happy, even though the problem was not theirs. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear David C, thank you for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are happy that you found our staff to be helpful.  We do our very best to address any issues as soon as possible.  We are looking forward to your next visit :)  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: A great hotel in perfect location. It's about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and steps from several well known chain restaurants. The staff is exceptional- Emily, Jose, and Mimi made us feel very welcomed. Our room was impeccably tended to by housekeeping. The pool is pretty basic, but your kids won't care.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel P, thank you for a great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are very close to Disneyland and popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory at the GardenWalk.  Our Room Attendants do an outstanding job.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate it very much.  See you soon!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: Everything was perfect. From check in to check out. Front desk staff was kind, courteous, and very helpful. Rooms are clean and well appointed. Property is clean and very well maintained. Hitting the fitness center in the morning and literally walking only a few steps to the pool keeps the workout flowing smoothly. Definitely planning on coming back to Hotel Indigo.
Manager Response: Thank you, Elly T, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We try to make every guest feel at home and work hard to maintain a clean property.  We have a great team of people, ready to service your every need while on vacation at the Anaheim Resort.   We hope to see you very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I stay in this hotel before and im going to keep staying in this great hotel everytime i come over here.  Beautiful rooms. Great personnel . Great staff.  Friendly people.  Rooms are very clean . Nice and organize. Housekeeping helpfull and attend to everything.  Friendly ladys. They do a good and great job.   👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
Manager Response: Thank you Carl F, for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do pride ourselves in our beautiful rooms.  Cleanliness is our priority and our Room Attendants are awesome!  The staff really enjoys reading that guests appreciate their service.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: When only the best will do.
Summary: Indigo Hotel Anaheim has everything you would want in a hotel BUT the staff, including front desk, house keeping & the restaurant are what separates Hotel Indigo from a hotel with really good facilities to a Hotel who really have your best interest at heart. Thank you for making our holiday so special.
Manager Response: Thank you, Karen M for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do have a great staff here.  We are a family and we welcome our guests to their home away from home!  We are glad your holiday was special.  See you again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: stayed here on a recent visit to Disneyland. The rooms were very neat and the beds comfortable, they have a secure parking area, gated need room key to enter. For viewing new flat screen TV. Shower had both stationary and hand held nozzles, staff was very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you Doug P for your compliments.  We do have comfy beds!  Yes, all of our furnishings including the flat screen TV are brand new.  I am glad you enjoyed our bath experience with a shower head and hand shower.  Guests like our complimentary, covered parking.  Hope to see you soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this location 4 years ago when it was being converted from Holiday Inn Express and was very pleased. Now that it is fully Indigo it is even better. Rooms are modern, clean and have comfy beds. Bistro and bar are better than expected. Happy hour fare is delicious and very reasonable....recommend the angus burger and fries for only $7!  Close to Disney and free parking.....fantastic. Service excellence everywhere!
Manager Response: Dear Ibcorn, thank you for being a loyal guest and your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Yes, we are now a contemporary hotel with a full service restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro. Locals and tourists love our Happy Hour with delicious appetizers for only $5.00 and $3.00 for domestic beers. We are one of the only hotels in the Anaheim Resort that does not charge a daily parking fee or Resort fee. Thank you for your compliments about our service and cleanliness. See you on your next trip!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Very modern with it's design, interior, and even the alarm clock- made for iphone. I had an issue with not knowing about $50 hold on my card and was upset about this. I received a bag of complimentary after an apology. They took care of my needs. Clean. Nice rosemary/thyme Aveeno bath products. 5 min walk to Wal-Greens and 15 min walk to Disney. Free parking. Breakfast not included. The breakfast is fine, just a little more money for the convenience of eating there. I love that they incorporated a little history of the area with the decorations...it's built where there once was a walnut farm so it's decorated in walnuts and the gear that was used in the farming.
Manager Response: Thank you Ginger R, for your awesome review!  I am glad you enjoyed our hotel.  We do receive many compliments about our modern design.  You are right that we have incorporated our history into our decor.  We offer great amenities that you listed as well as Keurig coffee makers.  Yes, we are one of the only hotels that do not charge for parking or add a resort fee onto you bill.  Hope to see you again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We recently stayed here to go to Disneyland & CA Adventure. The hotel is a quick 15 walk to the entrance. The hotel is clean & new. The staff was always super friendly & helpful. We ate breakfast at the restaurant both of our mornings & the food was great. We would definitely stay here again. I only wish we had an extra day to relax & take advantage of the pool!
Manager Response: Thank you, Mommabird23 for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are new, clean and a short walk to Disneyland.  Our Team does our best to be helpful.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best breakfast and Happy Hour in town.  Looking forward to your next visit and please stay longer so you can enjoy our pool and Jacuzzi.  You can have a private viewing of Disney's fireworks.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: A pretty good choice for Disneyland
Summary: Based on the many positive reviews, we tried the Hotel Indigo for a trip to Disneyland.  We had reserved two rooms with two queen beds.  The rooms are quite spacious, clean, and comfortable.   In addition, there was a nice spa next to the pool, nice for soaking in after a horrendously long day of walking around Mouseland.   There were only two negatives.  First, we had asked for two adjoining rooms on the 4th floor when we made our reservation many months ago.  They were able to give us two rooms next to each other, but on the 4th floor, but on the 2nd.  That actually worked out okay--the rooms were quiet, and noise wasn't an issue.  Since the elevator is one of the slowest in the world, it was kind of nice being on the 2nd floor as we always took the stairs.  The second minor
Manager Response: Dear Philip M, thank you for taking the time to provide valuable feedback.  Yes, guests love our close proximity to Disneyland and large rooms with comfortable furnishings.  We prioritize cleanliness.  Our pool deck with a Jacuzzi and cabana is the perfect place to have a drink and enjoy Disney's spectacular firework display.  We are glad to hear that you will visit us again.  Looking forward to your visit.    Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Great hotel close to Disney or to the Anaheim convention center.  Walking distance to restaurants, bars and attractions, so definitely worth while to stay there.  Staff is super friendly, food at restaurant is great.  Accommodated a big group with out any problems.  highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you Evelyn J, for your excellent review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are in the heart of the Anaheim Resort, close to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and Honda Center, Angels Stadium.  Guests love being able to walk to the GardenWalk, where there are popular restaurants like Bubba Gump, Roy's Hawaiian Fusion, California Pizza Kitchen, P.F. Chang's, Cheesecake Factory and the new House of Blues!  Our Team appreciates you recommending our hotel.    Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Terrific stay during Expo West Conference
Summary: My team has stayed here for Natural Food Products Expo West over the last few years. We are all very pleased. The customer service is above and beyond! The staff was very accommodating.The general manager, Mimi, is extremely helpful. The rooms were quite spacious for two colleagues to share. The whole team was very productive during our stay thanks to Hotel Indigo! Can't wait for next year!
Manager Response: Thank you, ShannonHorn for your glowing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad your Team enjoys staying with us for the annual convention.  Our rooms are spacious and very popular among conventioneers due to our short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.  Thank you again and see you next year or sooner!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Stayed here one night. Warmly greeted after a long day of travel by Ivonne (hope I spelled her name correctly) and Nicholas. Our room was very clean and modern. Beds were comfortable. The shower was great!  Walking distance to Disney  Every staff member we encountered was friendly and helpful. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you AKD for your kind words about Ivonne and NIckolas!  They are great with guests.  I am glad you found the Hotel Indigo Anaheim to be clean and modern.  Guest comfortable beds and our bath experience with a shower head, hand shower & Aveda products.  Yes, we are very close to Disney.  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, contemporary, and eco in a great location
Summary: Have stayed at the Indigo several times over the last few years - the rooms/bathrooms are spacious, the decor is contemporary (and plenty of power plugs!), the amenities are excellent for this class of hotel, and the staff is exceedingly friendly and helpful. One of my favorite random features are the hardwood floors in the bedrooms - cleaner and cooler than traditional hotel carpet. There are a number of properties in the area (given its proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center) but I feel that the Indigo is a bit of a secret.
Manager Response: Thank you Bill S, for your review.  We have many frequent and repeat guests.  We are modern with many power outlets for today's traveler's.  We are right about us being a hidden secret!  We are one of the only properties in the area that does not charge for parking, resort fee and WiFi.  We are a popular convention hotel because we do not charge for incoming or outgoing packages.  Thank you again and see you soon!  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I travel into town each March for the last 9 years for a convention & a Hotel Indigo is my home away from home. Great attentive staff. Jose & Vicky will always get u a quick hot breakfast to start the day & get things rolling. As long as I can get a reso hotel indigo it will be.
Manager Response: Thank you Darian R, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  It is a pleasure to have you as our return guest.  Jose and Vicky are great and we do offer delicious breakfast at Chambers.  Thank you for staying with us and see you next time!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Cant Change of hotel when I go to Anaheim .The staff is courteous and friendly. Great hotel . Beautiful rooms . No complaints at all. Good house keeping and attend to your needs. Rooms are clean and what we see everything was there what we need.  We all be back again...For sure soon.. thank you ...
Manager Response: Dear Jhon T, thank you for your 5 star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are proud of our beautiful property and rooms.  We are happy you always find our staff to be courteous and friendly!  See you soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Leaving soon for our second stay at this location and realized I never wrote a review for my visit last year. Loved our stay. Great access to the parks. Super friendly staff... helped w airport transportation and luggage issues. Plus a bonus approval from my teenager.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela X, thank you for your excellent review!  We had a guest the other day who is also a return guest and while we were putting on luggage tags, she showed me that she still had her luggage tags from us last year!  We enjoy seeing familiar faces here at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We try to be home away from home to our guests visiting the Anaheim Resort.  See you next time!  Warmest Regards.  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: No stress a booking made with ease.
Summary: Just a little back ground history as to why I am writing this review.  We where moved to one of the sister hotels, it was nice but not the carousel. This was in the later part of last year.  After talking with my wife plus after a visit to the Indigo last year we where both very impressed with what we call one very nice hotel.  We are the sort of people who like to pick our own hotel.  One cold raining just plain horrible night last week we telephoned the Indigo, within a very short space of time are booking was made for our vacation later this year, with an hour the confirmation was sitting on my laptop.   That is what I call good customer service.  The Indigo has our vote as being one of the best hotels within the Disney area.  Also my wife can go shopping from there so thats
Manager Response: Dear London888888, thank you for your review, we look forward to your return visit.  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I spent much time researching hotels in close proximity to Disney. I am very happy with the staff and ease at check in. Parking was good and overall hotel cute and clean.  I am disappointed with my room. I wasn't expecting a grand room as I booked a basic room with 2 queen beds, yet I am unhappy with the level of cleanliness. In the bathroom there were 2 clearly apparent hairs on the floor and in shower. Additionally when making the bed, there were 2-3 long black hairs on my pillow as well as on the comforter. This makes me question the level of care and attention housekeeping puts into their work. The bed is comfortable but hair on it was not ok!  Close to Disney and price was good, yet traveling with children in a newer hotel, I was expecting a bit better.... should've booked
Manager Response: Dear Roxana P, thank you for your review.  It is because of guests like you who take time out of their busy day to provide feedback that helps us review and improve our product and services.  I am glad you did like the staff, easy check-in and complimentary parking.  We do have a variety of different room types and suites.    Thank you again,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I've been bringing my Church group for the RE Congress for the last 3 years and have stayed at Hotel Indigo due to their AMAZING service and hospitality. The entire staff is friendly and hospitable. They make you feel at home!
Manager Response: Dear Glenda A, thank you for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We have enjoyed hosting your church for the Religious Education Congress.  Our staff reads reviews on TripAdvisor daily.  We appreciate your kind words about their friendliness and hospitality.  We do our best!  From your family at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and see you next year (or sooner!)  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: After a lot of debating where to stay for a quick Disneyland weekend away I picked this hotel with my son. It is walking distance to the parks, if you don't mind a bit of a walk. Walking with a toddler meant it took about 30 minutes to get from door to gate, which is only a tough walk at the end of the day.   I selected a One King Suite for our stay because I really wanted a separate area for the kiddo to go to sleep while I could wind down from the day. The room was reasonably spacious and the bed was very comfortable. I like the cleanliness of the all wood floors in the rooms, however it also means sound bounces around quite a bit.   The walls do seem a bit thin, I could hear everyone next to us and above us, but my child is a very sound sleeper so it didn't get in the way of
Manager Response: Thank you Brittany A, for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are in the process of adding plush and stylish rugs in our rooms and suites.  We have a different suite if you would like to try it on your next visit.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel delivers everything I expected. Pros: 1) walking distance from Disney, restaurants, etc; 2) big room, bathroom and new furniture; 3) very friendly staff; 4) free self-parking in a great area; 5) free wifi. Cons: honestly, could not find any considering the proposal of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you enjoyed our proximity to Disney and the restaurants.  Yes, we have large rooms with contemporary and comfy furniture.  Guest love that we offer complimentary parking and WiFi.  We are happy you found zero cons!  Please visit us again very soon!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager
