Summary: Clean room. Decent shower.  Fast check in. Free parking. Too noisy for my taste. I can hear everything outside and in the next room. I was on the third floor and the people upstairs were running and around all night sounded like they were even riding some sort of toy all over the room.  Around 9:20 the fireworks start and it was so loud.   Will maybe consider coming back. Maybe.
Manager Response: Thank you, afglv for taking the time to write a review about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are in the heart of the Disneyland Resort.  I apologize that the room was not as quiet as you prefer.  We do have guests who specifically request Disney's spectacular fireworks display.  I hope you will return in the future so we can reserve rooms on the other side with views of our pool and Jacuzzi.  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: We chose this hotel based on its proximity to Disneyland. It was an easy walk each morning we visited the park. It was a short walk back, but not easy with 2 tired kids! Uber drivers were easy and quick to locate outside the entrance. For about $5 we could get a quick ride back. The room was nice and well maintained. The hotel was very modern. Breakfast at Indigo was delicious, and the kids were thrilled to see that they made Mickey shaped pancakes. Service was great too. We were a short walk from several restaurants, including Bubba Gino's and California Pizza Kitchen. We were also close to a lot of souvenir shops and a Walgreens- handy if you forgot something!
Manager Response: Thank you Monica T, for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are a short walk to Disney.  We have fresh, renovated rooms with modern and comfortable decor.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best breakfast!  I am glad your little ones liked the Mickey shaped pancakes.  Hope you will visit us again in the future.  Thank you again and all the best,   Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Loved this hotel. We recently had a bad experience for a different family trip because we got the cheapest room we could find. We decided to splurge a little more in order to not have broken TVs and backed up toilets. We came across this hotel and the price was super reasonable given how new and updated it is. The front staff was really nice. They let us keep our car there after check out while we did one last day at Disneyland. Only a 10-15 minute walk to the park. Tons of food options in the area. We ate at the hotel restaurant twice and the food was decent, especially for grabbing something on the go. There's quite a lot of hotels around so we felt very safe walking back late at night as there were tons of other Disneyland guests walking with us. The beds were nice and
Manager Response: Dear Bailey C, we are happy to hear that you loved the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are updated, close to Disney and offer the best value in town with complimentary parking, WiFi.  Thank you for complimenting the Front Desk staff.  They work very hard to make sure all guests have a great stay!  We hope you will return and try out our pool and Jacuzzi!    Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This is a great central location to stay within walking distance to Disney Parks and a large variety of restaurants and public transport  The bed and pillows were the best we have had so far and staff were very attentive with suggestions on things to do for our trip especially Amanda and Brooke  We would recommend highly as great value very clean and great location
Manager Response: Thank you Michelle F, for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are happy that you enjoyed our great location, 2 blocks from Disneyland and walking distance to popular restaurant and retail shops.  We do have plush linen!  We appreciate mentioning helpful staff members by name.  It really helps us to strive harder to provide excellence.  Hope you will visit us again,  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Modern little hotel close to disney....
Summary: We stayed here for one night for a Disneyland trip and found the hotel to be a refreshing departure from the usual hotel offerings near the park.  It worked very well for our purposes:  walkable distance to disneyland (but not on the same side of the street as the park like 'candy cane inn'), clean, easy...  It is newer and is a sort of inexpensive, boutique-style, 'modern' hotel.   They offer an indoor parking garage & complimentary breakfast. All of the staff members we interacted with were pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear lux4me, thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad you enjoyed our facilities which is about 2 blocks from Disneyland with complimentary underground parking.  A cooked to order breakfast comes with certain rates and it is served in our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Our property has new, modern decor, the only branded boutique hotel in the Anaheim Resort as part of IHG.  Please visit us again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: Great visit to the theme parks!
Summary: My wife and I stayed 4 nights to visit the theme parks. We walked back and forth each day (about 3 city blocks). The area is a city, but we felt safe at all hours of the am and pm walking around. The hotel is beautiful and clean with a nice sized room and spa style bathroom (shower no tub).  We did notice a little  it of noise in the am and pm when families were coming and going from the parks, but no more than on our numerous trips to Orlando theme parks. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. I ate breakfast downstairs each morning and we had some sandwiches one evening for dinner. Again, we enjoyed great, friendly service! We definitely recommend this hotel and will be back on our next trip to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Michael R, thank you for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are glad you enjoyed our beautiful, clean property.  Yes, guests love our spa style bathroom with a shower head and hand shower.  Our staff reads TripAdvisor reviews daily, so they will be happy to hear your compliments about their friendly service.  Chambers Bar & Bistro has the best breakfast in town.  We hope to see your family again very soon!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Indigo 3 or 4 times when taking our grandsons up to spend a couple days at Disneyland.  The walk is short (half mile or so) and safe, easily done even with a stroller.  The hotel is clean and the staff is very friendly.  There is also a nice little restaurant on site but there are also several family-friendly restaurants close by.  The rooms are smallish, as is the swimming pool, but if you're using this as a base camp for a trip to Disneyland it's perfectly fine.  We'll definitely go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Example of a Great Hotel & Great Staff!
Summary: My wife along with our two kiddos stayed for a night at Hotel Indigo in Anaheim on 2/18 - 2/19.  We claimed our IHG share forever free night promo and this was the hotel we selected over the other hotels within the IHG properties. (Intercontinental, Holiday Inn, StayBridge.. etc)  I noticed that  Hotel Indigo Anaheim ranks #4 of 118 hotels in Anaheim.  So Great!  During the day of check-in....The Hotel Indigo Anaheim was booked solid, but we got our reservation in just in time. Emily and Alyssa were EXTREMELY helpful in check-in and also in check-out.  Jay and Jordan great in the late night shifts after hours. The hotel staff was AMAZING, every staff member that I ran into they greeted me.   Upon our check-in, thankfully we were upgraded to a King Suite for being IHG Spire Elite
Manager Response: Thank you dmirage, for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We appreciate your comments, both in person and in writing!  It is great when guests provide great feedback because it helps motivate us to strive harder!  Emily, Alyssa, Jay and Jorden are all hardworking.  We enjoyed having your family stay with us so we are happy you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you again for taking the time to compliment us.  You are a five star guest in our book.  We hope you will make us your home away from home in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Walking distance to Disney. We were only in the room to sleep and clean up. Rooms were modern and clean. Restaurants were close, so you could walk to grab a bite to eat. I'd rather stay at Disney but this allowed us to save some money to spend at the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Roberjd, thank you for your compliments of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are modern and make cleanliness a priority.  Guests enjoy the short walk to Disneyland and the popular restaurants at the GardenWalk.  I hope you got a chance to dine at our on-site restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro as well.  We offer complimentary parking and WiFi, saving guests in a lot of junk fees.  We feel we offer the best value in town!  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Quick stay in Anaheim right near Disneyland, within walking distance, and so glad we found Hotel Indigo.  Super clean, brand new, friendly staff and super convenient  parking and breakfast restaurant right there in the hotel.  Very reasonably priced.  Beautiful pool and outdoor seating.  Really friendly and attentive staff.  What a relief to find after an awful stay at a hotel in Las Vegas last week.  Will have friends stay there when they come to town.
Manager Response: Thank you, ctwalsh4, for calling the Hotel Indigo a gem!  We are new, clean and have the best team of people!  Breakfast is delicious and guests love lounging at our pool.  With free parking and WiFi, we are the best deal in town!  Glad to hear you will stay with us in the future.  Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We first stayed at a Hotel Indigo in San Diego last spring and were very impressed with it. Your well behaved pet is welcome almost anywhere on the hotel premises. Very courteous staff and bell men !!
Manager Response: Dear Debbie M, thank you for your 5-star review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We do our best to provide 5-star service to all of our valued guests, including our pet VIPs!  We also have kennel information at Disneyland in case guests would like to take their puppies with them to Disney!  Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon.    Very Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary Heading: A hip hidden gem close to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I just returned from a quick two night stay at the Hotel Indigo. We loved it! It's super cool. The rooms look brand-new and the beds were really comfortable. The staff was very friendly. It was a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland. It's also pretty much next-door to the Gardenwalk where there are a ton of great restaurants. Will be staying again in a couple of months when we go to a show at the new House of Blues since it will be such a short walk to and from their new location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star rating of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are all excited about the grand opening of the House of Blues.  Looking forward to hosting your visit then!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: The staff is wonderful. This hotel should teach other hotels how hospitality is done. EVERYONE was friendly and helpful. The premises are spotless inside and out.  From the evidence the hotel was another brand and worn out before being remade as an Indigo. Too many traces of the old hotel remain. Our room almost had the modern, clean, Indigo look, but the sheet metal bed frame rattled when every time we got on or off the mattress. This could have been lots of fun if we wanted to give the neighbors something to talk about. The steel room doors have that 10 coats of paint look of a Red Roof room. Light leaks around all the gaps in the door frame. The hallway rugs would look at home in a Comfort Inn.  If this was not an Indigo and did not cost over $200 per night, I'd say it was
Manager Response: Thank you, NattyClevelandOhio for your compliments about the staff.  They will be happy to hear that you felt everyone was friendly and helpful.  Yes, we prioritize service and cleanliness.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide valuable feedback so we can improve.  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manger

Summary: This hotel is a short walk to Disneyland and is in a very convenient location.  The rooms are clean and spacious. The hotels that we saw on our walk to Disneyland seemed quite aged in comparison.   The staff at the front desk and in the restaurant were very friendly and helpful.   There is a laundry and dryer next to the ice machine which can be quite helpful if you're traveling for a long period.
Manager Response: Thank you J M, for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  We are happy to have hosted your visit to the US.  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland and conveniently located.  The rooms are newly renovated in modern decor.  We try to be superior to our competition.  We have a friendly crew and cleanliness is our priority.  We do have both an on-site Guest Laundry as well as dry cleaning service available, perfect for both families on extended stays and business travelers.  We hope to see you again on your next trip!  Warm Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I am a fan of the Indigo Hotel chain, so I was looking forward to staying here.  Let me point out, however, that this hotel is not really a boutique; it's an upscale Holiday Inn with some boutique touches that are much appreciated.  That said, I had no real problems with the hotel: it was clean and functional, which was all we required.  The location is excellent if you are visiting Disneyland, and the breakfast was quite good.  I would happily stay here again if was in the area for the same purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you, RPH80 for your feedback.  I am glad you found our rooms to be clean and enjoyed Chambers Bar and Bistro.  We do have excellent location if you are visiting Disneyland, Downtown Disney, Anaheim Convention Center, Honda Center and Angels Stadium.  A lot to do in the Anaheim Resort!  Please contact me directly for your next visit so I can suggest our suites.  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Amazing Boutique Hotel. I squealed when I walked into our room. Hardwood floors, super chic decor, AND very pet friendly.  So close to Disney. But to tell the truth ... I would stay here even without Disney.  I WILL stay here again.  Love, Love, Love 💗
Manager Response: Wow, Gretchen F. what an amazing review.  We are happy that you loved our hotel.  We love working here too!  We are very close to Disney.  Thank you for your compliments.  We hope to see you again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I held a small event at Hotel Indigo in January. The staff were very friendly and equally as helpful. The hotel is charming and clean too. The Katella room, where my event was held, was perfect. It was roomy, clean, well lit, and the amenities were easily obtained and well maintained. I definitely recommend this hotel if you are visiting Orange County for the weekend. Centrally located near freeways and walking distance to Disneyland too. I had a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Melanie R for your great review!  I am happy to hear that our staff were very friendly and helpful.  We enjoy working here.  It is charming and clean.  Please visit us again when you are going to visit Disneyland again.  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: First of all I would like to say this is my 2nd visit to this hotel.  (The first visit we were facing the pool on the 4th floor).  No complaints.    This week we booked two rooms (deluxe King suite - 2 room) and both were on the 2nd floor.  (One facing Katella Ave. & one facing the back of the hotel). The noise from the little monkeys upstairs kept both families up most of every  night. (Seven nights) You can hear every footstep, bed squeak and person talking during the night.  The 2nd room we booked received a complimentary gift basket for the inconvenience???  Pool was nice although this time of the year the pool is covered in shade and very chilly.    Chambers Restaurant was a 5*.  Service and food was amazing!  Berry waffle was our favorite!   10 minute walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear trishl3, thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate it when guests take the time to let us know how we are doing.  I am glad you had a good stay the 1st time.  We do have a variety of rooms with different locations.  For guests who prefers quieter rooms, we have rooms on the 4th floor facing the pool.  I apologize that there was a family that was noisy during your stay.  We have had unusually chilly weather.  Chambers Bar and Bistro has great food and service.  The staff will be happy to hear your compliments.  We do pride ourselves in cleanliness.  We hope you will try us again in the future.  Please contact me directly if you decide to return.  Our location, product and service is excellent.    Sincerely,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at three Indigo Hotels and this one is no different...meaning all three had awesome guest services! The front agent "Jay" was very professional and warm. Our room (308) was just off the elevator and has mini-ref and Keurig coffee maker. Nice view of Disneyland fireworks from our window. There is free parking at basement level accessed with room keycard (better check-in first). Playful lights on every floor as you step out of elevator. I would definitely stay at an Indigo Hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear Angelo T, thank you for your awesome review!  It is because of guests like you who take time out of their day to share your experience that makes being in the hospitality industry worthwhile!  Jay will be so excited to read your compliments about his great service.  I am glad you enjoyed Disney's spectacular fireworks show from the privacy of your room.  Guests love our Keurig coffees & teas and do enjoy having the convenience of a refrigerator.  Yes, we have complimentary parking that can only be accessed with a guestroom key.  I also like the lighting at the elevator landings.  A touch of Las Vegas in the Anaheim Resort!  Hope to see you again on your next visit.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I paid for a Suite for two days almost $500 total for the two days.   In reality it's not that expensive but I would have expected a larger room.  My brothers room was a little smaller than mine and he had a double queen.   I was not impressed and probably won't stay there again.  It was not a horrible hotel I have had better experience in the City of Orange hotels at about the same price.   I guess you pay for being close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear JasonC185, hotel rates fluctuate depending on what conventions and other events are going on in town.  We did just have the largest convention of the year in Anaheim.  We do have larger rooms including the Family Studio Suite.  Thank you for your feedback!  We appreciate you taking the time to review our property.  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This place is cool, funky lights walking distance to the convention center and Disney. The breakfast is really good and the GSA, Tiffany went above and beyond to make our stay a good one. Helpful with directions and arrangements on where to eat and what to see in the area. Thank you and we look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Dear Jordan S - I remember you!  Thank you for letting me know in person that our Front Desk Agent Tiffany provided outstanding service.  She will be so happy to read your review.  We appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our on-site restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro do serve the best breakfast in town.  Hope to see you again next year for the NAMM Convention!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: I appreciated the suite upgrade and the friendly check in. Staff was great! Room was clean!  Artwork in the room was interesting. I still have not received my welcome points... All and all great experience and I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you, jdaubs, for your A+ review!  Yes, our suites are spacious and very nice.  I wish I could move into them!  The artwork are agricultural equipment in bold, vivid colors.  Each Hotel Indigo in the world tells its own neighborhood story.  So no two Hotel Indigo properties are the same.  Our story is about a farmer names Chambers who harvested a walnut grove where the Hotel Indigo Anaheim stands today.  The street we are on, Katella Avenue was named after the farmer's two daughters, Kate and Ella.  Our property has a walnut theme throughout and guests love our modern, organic look.  Welcome points will be deposited right away.  We deposit them on certain days of the week.  Glad to hear you will be back!  Best Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland.  Great location.  About a 10 min walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney.  Clean rooms.  Plus we could keep our car parked their after we check out while we spent out last day at Disneyland.  The only thing I did not like was that the restaurant closed too early, we came back from Disneyland a little hungry and it was closed.  I think it closed at 10:00.  We used the pool area and it was perfect for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you, 115Jess115 for your great review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney.  Cleanliness is a priority and we work hard to provide superior service.  We are one of the few hotels in the Anaheim Resort that offer complimentary parking.  Thank you for your feedback about our restaurant hours at Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We do have a Grab & Go with fresh sandwiches and salads for late night snacks.  I hope you got to catch Disney's fireworks from our pool and Jacuzzi area!  Hope to see you back on your next visit!  All the Best,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We rented a. Bedroom suite which consisted of two queen sized beds in the bedroom and the living area had a double fold out bed. Both rooms had a good sized television, and were clean and comfortable. The staff were amazing - really friendly and nothing was too much trouble. The location is perfect for DisneyLand which is a 10 minute walk. The suite also had views of the Disneyland fireworks which were fantastic.......the breakfast was great and room service really good......I would definitely stay there again.......
Manager Response: Thank you, Chillout0000 for your amazing review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Our staff works hard and it is always great for them to hear when a guest enjoyed their stay.  We are  very close to Disneyland and some rooms have a Disney fireworks view.  Chambers Bar & Bistro is one of the top restaurants in Yelp for our area.  I personally love the hearty breakfast entrees.  Please visit us again.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Nice clean hotel with very spacious room. It was a short walk to Disneyland, maybe 10-15 minutes. Staff were all helpful and very friendly.  Why not 5 stars? Well, there are few issues with the rooms, the biggest of course being those hard floors. Yes, they look great, and are easy to clean (but then again, they are not kept very clean, unfortunately), but the noise. On the first night we had no issues since the room above was very likely empty, but from the second night forward we had a runner upstairs and the noise was quite loud. Must have been a little kid or something but running started very very early and was very annoying. And yes, I knew about those hard floors when booking, so maybe it is not totally fair to deduct one star based on that but...  The other, very minor
Manager Response: Thank you, PKa,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a detailed review.  We read all reviews so we can continue to improve!  We are glad you liked our spacious rooms.  Yes, we are close to Disneyland.  Our staff will be happy that you found them to be helpful and friendly.  More decorations sound like a great idea.  Our decor is mostly clean and contemporary.  We are one of the last few hotels that still offer complimentary parking.  There is also no charge for WiFi.  We are proud of our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro with a full bar.  And GardenWalk does offer a variety of popular restaurants to choose from, including the Cheesecake Factory and PF Chang's.  Please visit us again very soon.    Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Wonderful clean hotel with very spacious room! It was just a short walk to Disneyland. The staff were all helpful and very friendly! At check in they had maps of the area and even knew the average cost of a taxi or Uber to Disney if you didn't want to walk. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you, Miranda S for your super review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are close to Disneyland and our Front Desk is ready to assist guests with transportation needs.  We also sell Disney Tickets and book tours.  Thank you and please contact us when you are returning to the Anaheim Resort!  All The Best,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: This hotel gem is amazing . Their customer service is out of this world  . The decor is beautiful and the rooms are big ,clean, and the beds are comfortable . The onsite restaurant has amazing good food and service . The parking is a little tight but that's about the only inconvenience. The location is close to Disneyland and freeways . When visiting Anaheim this is the hotel to book. Rates are reasonable . Will defiantly be staying at the indigo again.
Manager Response: Wow, Chozengirl1432, thank you for your rave review!  The staff will be happy to hear your compliments about customer service.  We try our best to provide personalized service for every guest.  Every guest is s VIP at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  Please let us know when you plan to visit Anaheim again.  Best Regards and hope you had a wonderful holiday season,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: If you do not need to be right next door to Disneyland this place is perfect and for us being that little bit further away from everything was quite nice and rather peaceful. Hotel Indigo is literally 15-20 minute walk to Downtown Disney and close by Anaheim Walk， Bubba Gumps and Cheesecake Factory. It is one of the newest hotels in the area and is very clean and nicely modern. Comfortable bed although average pillows. Good sized bathroom with nice shower. Restaurant is very good and staff are friendly and helpful in general. Glass elevator is a nice touch but be warned， it is painfully slow. Would happily stay here when visiting Disneyland and highly recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you, bluemountainkiwi, for your fantastic review!  We like to think of our hotel as the oasis in the middle of the Anaheim Resort.  We are close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center, but within walking distance so our guests can enjoy some peaceful time!  In addition to being close to popular restaurants, we have our very own Chambers Bar & Bistro with a full bar inside the hotel for guest convenience.  Guests love our hearty American breakfast cooked to order and our daily Happy Hour deals.  I am gald you enjoyed our spacious room and shower.  We have both a shower head and hand shower for a spa experience.  We hope to see you again at the Hotel Indigo.  Warmest Regards and Best Wishes in 2017,  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: Good location. 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Free parking. Spacious, beautifully decorated rooms. Super comfortable bed. Nice amenities such as Aveda bath items and Keurig coffee maker. Pool and restaurant. My only complaint is that you hear your neighbors. We had a first floor room which was super convenient but we heard the families next door and upstairs. Next time I would ask for a corner room on the top floor.
Manager Response: Thank you, Linda S for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, our guests love our beds and we are often asked what brand of bed it is.  Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon!  Happy New Year!  Mimi Jeng General Manager

Summary: We booked a one bedroom suite, which worked out perfectly for our family of four, including two teenagers. The 17yo had the lounge area which had a foldout couch and own tv, so had his own space while the 13yo had one of the two Queen beds. The two rooms provided enough space also for four large cases, so we weren't cramped.  The location is an easy 10 walk from Disneyland and there are a number of well known restaurant chains very close by.  Staff were all very friendly and helpful.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Wangadilly, thank you for calling the Hotel Indigo Anaheim the perfect family hotel in Anaheim.  Yes, we have spacious suites!  We are conveniently located to Disneyland as well as the GardenWalk with popular restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump.  We hope you were also able to try delicious meals at our own restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you again and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Room was great. Most comfortable hotel bed I've ever slept on. Staff was friendly, helpful and enthusiastic. Price was very reasonable. But the best thing was free parking in their underground, secured garage. Most hotels around Disneyland are charging for parking and it's a big rip-off.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. RICHARD S, I am glad you enjoyed our beds!  Our mattresses are Simmons and guests eave about the comfort.  Yes, we are the best value in town with complimentary parking and WiFi.  Most Anaheim hotels do charge for parking in open lots, we have underground, gated parking.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Happy Holidays and Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: This place is so much better than the Disney properties!  Chic and upscale and the staff are really noice.  Great food in the restaurant.  Free parking!  LArge and clean rooms.  We had a room with Disney fireworks view.
Manager Response: Thank you, Kimi T for your compliments!  Yes, not a lot of guests know that we have some rooms with views of Disney's fireworks.  You can also enjoy the view at the pool deck under the California stars.  Please visit us again very soon!

Summary Heading: Stylish & clean hotel but lacks comfort and warmth
Summary: The hotel is very stylish and the rooms are lovely but the place lacks comfort and warmth, that includes the service. We had booked 1 night and thought we would book another night if we liked it but decided to move to another hotel.  There is free secure parking.
Manager Response: Dear CorAl02, thank you for letting us know that you felt our hotel is stylish with lovely rooms.  We appreciate your feedback.  We are always striving to improve!

Summary: Stayed 2 nights at Hotel Indigo and have nothing to complain about. The room is modern, clean and spacious enough for 3 luggages. The carpark is gated and comes in handy if u are driving. We placed our car in the carpark throughout the stay as there is no need to use it. The location is perfect with food options just minutes walk away. CVS and Walgreens are just across the roads. 10-15 walk can get you to Disney Land main entrance. Very convenient. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is gorgeous! Had all the amenities I needed and was a short walk to Disney. I loved the affordability as well as the modern design elements. The staff were super welcoming and friendly. I would definitely choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you Angie D!  Yes, we feel our hotel fits all of your descriptions!  Fresh, modern and gorgeous.  Please visit us again very soon!

Summary: The hotel was very nice and updated with hardwood floor. We got a room with two queen beds and a little sitting area with a couch. The room has a refrigerator and Keurig coffee maker. The only thing it didn't have which I think would come in handy is a microwave. It is about a 15 min walk to Disneyland (no shuttle offered). Plenty of restaurants in walking distance as well. There is a restaurant on site, we ordered room service and the food was ok. We stayed on the 4th floor and had a room that allowed us to see the fireworks from Disneyland perfectly which was Awesome. Bathroom was nice (no bathtub, just shower), Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Rachelle02, thank you for your wonderful review.  Yes, our guests love our remodeled rooms with hardwood floors, rugs and comfortable furniture.  We have our own Chambers Bar & Bistro serving delicious, cooked-to-order breakfast and Happy Hour along with a full dinner menu.  Our hotel is next to the GardenWalk Dining and Retail Center for a variety of dining options and souvenir shopping!  Disneyland is just a few blocks away.  Guests rave about our luxurious baths with a shower head, hand shower and Aveda spa products.  We hope you will visit us again.  Next time, you can check out Disney's fireworks from the pool & Jacuzzi area too!  Warmest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: Stayed in a king suite and was very surprised with the quality and comfort.  Great front desk service. 15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure. Free parking for both days even though I only stayed one.
Manager Response: Thank you, ojaidenny for your compliments about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We pride ourselves in providing excellent guest service.  Yes, we are within walking distance to both Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  We are one of the few hotels in Anaheim that do not charge for daily parking.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Kindest Regards.  Mimi Jeng

Summary: The fitness center was awesome used it a few time on my stay. The pool on the ground floor and easy to access. I loved the rooms they are so beautiful and clean. The front of the hotel was beautiful and the staff was very helpfull. It's on the corner of Harbor and Katella so it's close to Disneyland and everything else in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Gilbert A, we are happy to hear that you loved our beautiful hotel and rooms.  Yes, we do have great Team.  We are centrally located, within walking distance to Disneyland.  I am glad you enjoyed our pool and fitness studio!  Thank you and hope you will stay with us again very soon!  Kindest Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: This is a very nice place to stay. It been upgraded and the front office staff is very helpful. Easy access to the freeway. The rooms are nice and clean. The only issue I had was it was raining one night and you could hear the roof drain pipe in the wall of our room. Annoying. The door of our room didn't seal really tight either, not unsafe it was just not real sound proof. There are a lot of families staying here since its in walking distance of Disneyland. The hallways are pretty noisy in the mornings with families heading out on their Disney adventures. This is to be expected at a resort that is so close. The food area near the lobby seems small, but once you eat there you understand that its just right. Great food and excellent service. Simple menus. There is also a Fire
Manager Response: Dear Scoot1966, thank you for your nice review of the property.  We are conveniently located.  We will let the staff of our Chambers Bar & Bistro that you really enjoyed our great food and service.  GardenWalk Retail and Dining Center is 2 buildings away and Disneyland is 2 blocks away.  We do have a private Business Centre with 2 workstations and 2 printers for guest convenience.  Please visit us again on your next trip to the Anaheim Resort!  Warm Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: I come here with my family after we look for a small hotel with good price and I feel in love in this place, so clean so nice good service and the design it's killer.  I love the room and the way it's look I feel like I want to stay here forever  I really highly recommend P.s. I already say that I love the design
Manager Response: Thank you BaruchReuveni, for your outstanding review.  We were remodeled with modern decor and have large rooms with comfortable furniture.  We appreciate your positive feedback on our service.  We are always striving to improve our service and products.  We hope you will stay with us again soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary: Great location for Disney, funky refurbished hotel with nice rooms. Gym, pool, decent free parking and a 5 min walk to Garden Walk which has a choice of restaurants. Rooms were a good size and well kept. Took us 10 mins to walk to Disney. Take the breakfast option when you book - well worth the $14 per couple as it's A la carte and worth far more if you were paying for it. Be careful when you book, the earlier you book the more expensive it seems to be.....completely the opposite to every other hotel we've been to!   So why not 5 stars, well we had problems with our bill which took 3 attempts to resolve which was a fuss we could have done without.
Manager Response: Thank you Gareth M, for your compliments.  We are very close to both Disneyland and GardenWalk with a variety of dining choices.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro does offer delicious entrees with large portions.  The hotel has been renovated.  We are glad you liked the refurbishment.  We do pride ourselves in maintaining a clean facility.  I hope all of the billing questions have been answered.  Thank you and hope to see your family again very soon!

Summary: We checked in on December 6, 2016 for 2 nights.  When we awoke the next morning we found a couple strange looking bugs on the sheets.  We took pictures and sent them out for confirmation.  My daughter squished one and it left blood on the sheet.  We immediately contacted the front desk where we were offered a free breakfast- manager not in yet.  We demanded that mgmt come to room 409 to see the evidence.  It took approximately 25 minutes for someone from onsite mgmt to arrive with housekeeping.  They were shown the evidence.  He offered us another room- we declined.  We loaded our belongings quickly and went to the lobby.  I asked if we were being reimbursed for previous night.   No but the new supervisor who stated he had been on the job for two weeks  only would offer 25,000
Manager Response: Dear Debe5069,  Thank you for your writing us a review. As an IHG Rewards Club member, it is regrettable that you did not experience an exemplary hotel stay with us due to the cleanliness of the room. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain additional details about your experience. We hope to hear from you soon and be of further assistance.   Kind Regards,  Tracy V. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Stayed here for an overnight business trip....this property was suggested by a colleague, and this is definitely not a business traveler hotel. The walls are paper-thin, could hear other guests above, below and all around. Had a room facing onto Katella Avenue, which is a very busy street, and the vehicle noise was horribly loud coming through the window and walls. On a positive note, the room was super-clean, and the front desk staff members were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear travelingDuo02,  Thank you for considering the Hotel Indigo Anaheim Maingate, CA for your business lodging needs.  We apologize that the acoustics of the property was not as effective to alleviate the noise to suite your noise tolerance. We have forwarded your concern to the proper department for them to look into this. Also, it is great to know that the room was clean and our hotel staff provided great service during your stay. Thank you for providing the feedback and it definitely helps us improve and be better.  We hope to host you soon, should your business bring you to the area. Enjoy the rest of the holidays and a may you have a prosperous new year.  Sincerely,   Wazay P.  Case Manager  IHG Service

Summary: We stayed during a time when the hotel was completely booked for a convention, so it was busy and hectic. However, I want to commend the staff. Everyone we met was extremely friendly, even the housecleaning staff we shared an elevator with. The front desk staff was excellent and remembered me upon walking in. They called me before we arrived to upgrade our room to a suite and worked with me by giving me a family suite when I told them that our group was too large for a king suite.  The room was clean, modern, and comfortable. The hotel is fairly small and the hallways are tight, but that doesn't matter much. The only thing that would dissuade me from staying here in the future is the fact that they don't include breakfast. For a more budget hotel, I like to have free parking and
Manager Response: Dear Risinggravity, thank you for your wonderful review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim!  I am glad you found all our employees to be friendly.  We try to get to know each guest to provide personalized service.  We do have a variety of rooms to choose from and our suites are very popular.  Our rooms are new, fresh and bold in design.  Guests like you love our contemporary and comfortable furnishings.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro offers breakfast made to order.  We do have complimentary parking and WiFi with no resort fees.  Please visit us again very soon!  Kind Regards,  Mimi Jeng

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed on the second floor and had a nice clean room. It had a large shower, no bathtub. The pool was fun after a long day at the park, and the jacuzzi was nice and warm. The restaurant was average, and the staff friendly. It was a great place to land after long days at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you, Jenn H for your positive feedback.  Guests do enjoy our spa amenities including a hand shower and Aveda products.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has great food and friendly service.  Our pool and Jacuzzi area is a perfect place to unwind and watch Disney's fireworks.  Thank you again and hope to see you very soon!

Summary: Nice looking property. The pool on the ground level next to the fitness center. The staff is warm and welcoming. Housekeeping answers all request. I would recommend this property to anybody and everybody going to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you Cc M for your compliments.  We pride our selves in providing superior service and warm hospitality.  Please visit us again very soon!  Mimi Jeng

Summary: Hotel indigo is situated a 10min walk from the gates of Disneyland and is perfect if you want to add class to your stay.   It's a boutique design hotel - and stands it apart from many of the hotels surrounding the Disneyland park. The decor is vibrant.   This boutique hotel had wonderful facilities, a bar that has happy hour and the food is delicious. It has a pool and fitness Center if you want to keep active while you stay there.  Also depending on what floor your room is on you get a lovely view of the Disneyland fireworks.   It's located a short walk away from the garden walk area, where there are also bars and restaurants for your enjoyment.   The staff and very friendly and will go above and beyond to help you with whatever you need.  It had wifi and unlike other hotels
Manager Response: Thank you lou88London for your wonderful review.  I think it is wonderful when people take the time to post such a detailed review to assist other travelers.  Not a lot of people know just how close we are to Disneyland and that you can view the fireworks from our pool and some rooms.  Hope to see you again!  Mimi Jeng

Summary Heading: Good choice for convention attendance on a budget
Summary: When I booked, Hotel Indigo was the best option price-wise within walking distance (for a young-ish person) of the convention center. I was pleased with the comfortable bed, large and well-designed bathroom, free parking, and free wifi.   I asked for the quietest room possible and received a room far down a hallway from the elevator; it was a good choice. I had a very quiet stay, aside from the nightly fireworks that could be heard from Disneyland. If I had one recommendation for the hotel, I would say that their website should be very clear about the fireworks. They are loud enough and powerful enough that the windows shake, and it's quite startling when they begin, if you aren't expecting them.  The one window in my room overlooked the roof of a nearby building (not the
Manager Response: Thank you Mr. Steveshooman, for your good review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I am glad you had a nice stay.  Yes, we are very close to Disneyland and we can see the fireworks from the pool and some rooms.  We appreciate your feedback.  We hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Terrific place to stay to visit Disneyland
Summary: Nothing but good things to say about this hotel. When you visit Disneyland, you are looking for a place that makes things easy. Hotel Indigo fits the bill.  It is easy to unload the car at the main entrance, which is right next to the main elevator. Or, you can pull into the basement garage after check-in and the same elevator runs there too. Either way, it is not too many steps from your car to your room. There was plenty of parking during our stay, and the spaces were large enough to accommodate a minivan.   The rooms are great. We stayed in a reasonably-priced suite that included two queen beds and a sofa sleeper in a separate sitting room. The room was very clean, nicely decorated, and very comfortable. The beds and pillows were first-rate. The bathroom is far above average
Manager Response: Dear CaliforniaDrew01, thank you for your detailed and positive review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim. I think it is great when travelers take the time to write a helpful review for other travelers.  We hope to see you very soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, but noisy and staff seemed confused
Summary: Overall: Okay experience, but boyfriend and I won't be back.  The Good:  - Clean - The window opened so we got fresh air - Could turn on air conditioning or heat - Had a mini-fridge - Bed was very comfy & pillows were plush - Free internet + free parking - Sound machine next to the bed had nice options (like beach waves and white noise) - The room was actually dark at night - Location was GREAT (maybe like a 10 minute walk to the park; close to restaurants at the Garden Walk)  The Bad:  - The room was stuffy and weird smelling (maybe the windows should be opened by staff upon check-out to prevent this) - Bathroom door didn't stay open unless you fling it all the way (we didn’t figure this out until the last day, so the bathroom got stuffy),  - Room was loud - through the
Manager Response: Dear laleellama,  Thanks for staying with us and for the feedback on your recent stay with us. I’m very pleased to hear that you appreciated our hotel location, comfortable bed, internet service as well as the free parking. On the other had, I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered with the smell of the room, bathroom door, noise levels and room allocation received. Your comments are really valuable to us as they really do guide us and help us to improve ourselves where we can.  I really appreciate your feedback as it will be shared in order to avoid a similar experience as it is our goal to provide excellent service to all our guests. Again, thank you and we hope to serve you soon and provide you a better stay.  Sincerely,    Zelyn N. Case Manager  IHGService

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a disney trip for families!!
Summary: Just 2 blocks away from Disney! Great price and super friendly staffs made our trip even better!! They have a restaurant, bar, pool, jacuzzi and a gym. We stayed in the room where we could watch the disney fireworks .... just Awesome :) We are definitely coming back to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you miyaki3, for your awesome review!  Not many people know that we have rooms with Disney's fireworks view.  The Hotel Indigo Anaheim is a full service, boutique hotel with a Chambers Bar & Bistro serving delicious breakfast, Happy Hour and diverse dinner menu including Pho noodles!

Summary Heading: Nice, convenient spot for a Disneyland trip
Summary: This hotel is a great little boutique-like place that's an easy walk from the Disneyland Resort. Everything feels very fresh, new, and clean. It's bright and colorful, and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We liked that there was a full breakfast menu, free parking, and a pool and hot tub.   Our room was comfortable, and the giant shower and spa-like amenities were nice. Really, the only downside was the thermostat - it was pretty loud whenever it switched on and off, requiring me to sleep with ear plugs. Even when you set the fan to running, you could still hear it. It would be nice if they could fix that, because you really need the sound of the AC to cover up the sounds of people in the corridors and outside at the pool.   Overall, it's a cool, comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you, CTGirl2013 for your feedback.  We are happy that you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland.  Hotel Indigo Anaheim is a new, clean hotel with a fresh look.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is a favorite among visitors and locals for our full breakfast menu and Happy Hour!  Yes, we are just about the only hotel now near Disney that does not charge for parking or resort fees.  It is a busy area with families and children going to the parks.  Please do visit our hotel again in the future.

Summary: Nice rooms. Clean.  Good showers.   Small but ample pool for small kids.  Hot tub, oh the hot tub, soooo needed after blasting your joints and calves pounding the Disney pavement for hours and hours.  The sacrifices we make for our kids!  May as well relax in a decent hotel.  This one is more than decent for a boutique hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Perry L., thank you for your terrific review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do pride ourselves in having top notch, clean guestrooms.  Our showers are luxurious with a shower head and hand shower.  We have Aveda products for a complete spa experience.  I am glad you enjoyed our pool and hot tub area.  Thank you again and please visit us very soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disney
Summary: Very nice and modern. I wanted to give this hotel 4.5. Only issue was street noise. Bring ear plugs!  Otherwise, this place was just as good as Disneyland Hotel minus location. But, it was only two blocks away. Great staff and rooms!! New and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you Kristie R for saying that we are just as good as Disneyland Hotel!  We are very close to Disney and we are in the heart of the Anaheim Resort.  The Team works very hard and they enjoy hearing compliments.  Please visit us again very soon!

Summary: Wanted a hotel that wasn't kid focused.  This hotel was amazing everything looked new and fresh. Staff was friendly. Has a bar and restaurant.  Small pool and Jacuzzi.  Parking is not an additional fee.  Near everything!  Will be going again
Manager Response: Dear ChanelJ, thank you for your nice comments about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Yes, we are just about the last hotel in the Anaheim Resort that do not charge for parking or Wifi.  We are walking distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and GardenWalk Restaurant and shops.  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is close to Disney and to garden walk in Anaheim where are fancy restaurants and shops are. Hotel is almost new rooms are clean bed comfortable,bathroom is standard bathroom like all chain hotels. Breakfast is good and no open buffet you can choice from menu but is tasty food,internet and parking are free.
Manager Response: Dear vedlatzor, we are happy you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and our new rooms with contemporary and comfortable furnishings.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro restaurant serves great breakfasts and super Happy Hour deals.  Complimentary parking and WiFi makes us the best deal in town!  We hope you will stay with us again when you return to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Marvelous hotel to stay with my family. Our room was very spacious and Extremely clean!  Parking had easy access and it was free!!! Also, included WiFi!!  The entire staff were very helpful and friendly.  I definitely recommend this Amazing Hotel to all!  We plan to return early next year for our visit to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear 591Linda, we hare happy you had an awesome stay!  We are one of the few hotels in the Anaheim Resort that does not charge for parking or WiFi.  We cannot wait to see you again when you return early next year!

Summary: With so many new and old options in Anaheim now it could be very difficult to choose a new spot. With activities in both the Convention Center and in the park I decided to give this hotel a try. Doesn't look like much from the outside and it's not a big chain but let me tell you that it catered to my every need just like the big chains. The rooms a very solid, spacious and contemporary. I saw they did have my necessities online and all came through for me, happy hour, breakfast, and on the go options. The service was five stars all the way everyday of my 3 night stay, I even met the General Manager on my check in, she welcomed me and gave me her card for if I needed anything, when does that happens anymore?? That was a nice touch. I'll be back on my next visit to California.
Manager Response: Dear travelots82, thank you for your great review.  We are a boutique hotel with the rewards of being part of the IHG family.  We feel we offer our guests the best of both worlds.  Our Team do our best to cater to all guests to make their visit to the Anaheim Resort as memorable and stress-free as possible.  We are a perfect hotel for people attending conventions at the Anaheim Convention Center and for people going to Disneyland.  We are walking distance from both locations.  We renovated the entire hotel, including the spacious guestrooms.  Yes, we have the best prices in town for Happy Hour at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  Thank you again for your comment about our five star service.  Please visit us again!

Summary Heading: Lived up 100% to reviews and website
Summary: Looked at reviews for this hotel. Checked website and can honesty say this 100% matched both. The picture on website are a honest depiction of the rooms and facilities. Wanted to be close to Disney and sure enough 10 Min walk your there. Lots of places to eat nearby Cheesecake Factory was a big hit with the family. Staff were very attentive and so genuinely friendly. 1 disappointing issue was we booked with breakfast. Only applied to two guests and had to pay for the kids. A little misleading on website. However the breakfast was good as hotel food goes and fresh, also better value than restaurants local to hotel. All the family agreed this was a great hotel comfortable beds, very clean rooms and lovely environment Thank-you all at Hotel Indigo Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you Connollyf1 for your outstanding review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We really appreciate guests who take the time to share their experiences with us.  The staff enjoys compliments and keeps us striving to go to the next level.  We are conveniently located with a lot of restaurants nearby including our own Chambers Bar & Bistro!  We are very popular.  The locals love our daily Happy Hour!  Please visit us again soon so you can see what new improvements we have made.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay and hang
Summary: The Hotel Indigo was a wonder place for me and my friends to relax and hang for the weekend. The rooms were spacious and clean and the hotel was less than 2 blocks from Disneyland.  The hotel staff was amazing and very helpful. I couldn't imagine how awesome our stay was going to be. Great for families or Business.
Manager Response: Dear Lance P, thank you for your nice review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We do have large guestrooms.  We try to be as helpful as we can to make their visit to Anaheim Resort memorable.  Please come visit us again!

Summary: This hotel is fun...loved the decor and super clean room! The staff was friendly and helpful. The food in the restaurant was great too.  I would absolutely stay at the Indigo again. Thanks to the management and staff for your excellent accommodations and service during our stay!
Manager Response: Dear 4setsofblue, thank you kindly for your compliments.  Our team works hard to keep our facility super clean.  Yes, our Chambers Bar & Bistro has great breakfast and offer a wide variety of dinner menu items including American favorites and Pho noodles!  You are very welcome and we look forward to seeing you again very soon.

Summary: You will have the best time when you stay at this hotel - its close proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center make it the ideal location - Excellent customer service and great amenities! The Hotel Jacuzzi is a must try if you stay there!
Manager Response: Dear Tina C, thank you for your review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Our Jacuzzi with a cabana is a great place to unwind after a full day at Disneyland or a busy convention.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has an outdoor patio with heat lamps and fire pit.  We hope you had a chance to enjoy the restaurant.  Please visit us again real soon!

Summary Heading: Stylish modern living close to Disney!
Summary: Stayed for one night in april 2016.  This is a state-of the art modern, newly constructed and so-far well-maintained property. The location is great an smooth 10 minute walk to Disneyland (Or 2 minute uber-ride) and you have loads of restaurants and shopping close by. The area felt very safe.  Our room was a twin bed room overlooking the courtyard, it was decent in size with a above average sized bathroom with a wonderful large shower. The decor is, as with the rest of the hotel, modern and stylish. The room was extremley Clean and comftorable. The only downsides was the view, there's not much to look at around there except for Disneyland and our rooms didn't face that way, and the relatively long walk to the elevator.  Parking worked smoothly and the have an in-house garage in
Manager Response: Dear Mattias A, what a wonderful review!  We are always happy when a guest has a great stay with us.  Yes, we are a short walk to Disney and close to a lot of restaurant close by, including our own, Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We do have spacious rooms and restrooms.  We do receive a lot of compliments on our décor.  It is modern with comfortable furnishings.  Our underground parking is convenient for guest and the best part is that we do not charge for parking!  We hope your next stay with us will be longer.  Thank you!

Summary: During our yearly vacation to the Disney area my wife and myself payed a visit to the Indigo.  If you are looking for a property that is 5 stars and above then this is the place for you, some of the hotels within its area have lots of rooms the indigo has 104 all very clean (Spotless)  well decorated and presented to a high standard.  The first impression you get as you walk in the lobby is this place is so neat and tidy.  There is a quiet pool area away from the hustle and bustle of the street an ideal place just to relax.  Attached to the front lobby is the bar plus a bistro area, the food is excellent a visit to the bar is a must, if only to meet the bar tender stroke cock tail maker a master at his craft. They do have a happy hour. Well worth the visit.  Ron and Terry
Manager Response: Dear London888888, thank you for your compliments about the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  The team was so excited to hear that a guest called us a 5-star hotel.  We do our best to keep our property spotless.  We will let the bartenders know you enjoyed their cocktails!  Yes our Happy Hour has mouthwatering items at $5.00 daily!  We hope to see you again for your next trip.

Summary: Wonderful stay.  Staff was friendly and helpful. Ran into staff member Mimi, and while she said she was new really seem to know what was going on around the area. Hotel is close to everything! Restaurant was great too. Will be staying there again
Manager Response: Dear Theo4us, thank you for your positive review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are in the heart of the Anaheim Resort and yes, close to everything!  Please visit us again real soon.

Summary: We stayed from October 30th - November 4th.  We had a double queen room. The room itself was very modern and impeccably clean. The beds were very nice. The bathroom was spacious. No bath tub, but there were 2 shower heads. One of them was removable, which was nice. The beds were really comfortable. We stayed on the fourth floor and you could see the top of Disney Lands Matterhorn from our room.   The pool area was very nice. The lounge area near the spa is the nicest I've seen in a hotel.   Their restaurant had top notch food. Breakfast isn't included, but you can buy breakfast vouchers and at a very reasonable price when you book your room. I highly recommend this.   Parking was great. Now to the best part... Costumer service was outstanding. Everyone from the front desk, maid
Manager Response: Thank you, mdknmk for rating us as the "Best hotel in Anaheim!"  We love our guest rooms too.  We feel we have the best rooms in town.  Guests love the hand showers.  I am glad you had a chance to dine at our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We try very hard to make every guest feel at home when they are staying with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Thank you again for staying with us and your great review.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice looking property, well maintained but breakfast...
Summary: This IHG hotel is perfectly located in Anaheim: around the corner from Disneyland. It looks and feels modern, it is nicely decorated, rooms have good size and nice amenities. Parking is also offered (I received it for free). It makes you feel welcome. Staff is friendly and this helps to the general feeling. There are lots of restaurants in 5-6 minutes walking distance (quite logic with Disneyland just around the corner). Perfect hotel? Almost. The price is quite fair for what it offers but the breakfast is a disaster! The hotel sells the rooms without breakfast, this is present as an option. And this is because they don't have a breakfast room but there is a little restaurant / bar that offers breakfast service for the hotel guests. Now, the offer is a disaster! I received a
Manager Response: Dear Claudiu M, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, the decor, large guest rooms and amenities.  We have a very friendly staff.  Guest feedback is how we improve and the management team has met to take action on your restaurant experience.  We hope you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Where to begin this brand new boutique hotel has it all - friendly staff, impeccable service and great location. The rooms are clean and comfortable, while the hotel offers everything you would need. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Wow!  What an awesome review.  Our staff was happy to read your comments.  We do have spacious rooms with new and comfortable furnishings.  Please come back and stay with us when you return to the Anaheim Resort.  Thank you, worldtraveler23!

Summary: After recently being shunned out of our favorite boutique hotel across from the main gate by Disney themselves for their precious parking lot expansion we thought we'd try our luck at this property. Thankfully, we did! From the moment we arrived, the front desk familiarized us with the local area (katella corridor) and we were off to the park! when we came back we were welcomed back by name by the front desk and treated to a room with all my daughters stuffed animals carefully placed by our lovely housekeeper on the bed. That was impressive in my opinion especially since the hotel ranks high on the business end to have that personal touch on the family end of things really set the tone. We can hardly wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you, Dalton B for your positive feedback.  We do our best to make guests feel at home.  We are glad you and your family had a great stay!  Please come and stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in a good location
Summary: This hotel (part of the IHG brand) is located around the corner from Disneyland and near the Anaheim convention center.  It is a very modern, clean, and well-kept hotel with a "contemporary" feel.  The rooms are a good size and they are finished very nicely.  I have zero issues with the room or staff, so I highly recommend it if you've visiting here.  (btw, I had no issues with the wood floors being noisy.)  There is a nice restaurant and bar in the lobby.  I was kind of surprised they didn't offer at least complimentary coffee or hot water in the lobby, but there is a Keurig in the room with coffees and teas.  The only thing that I can comment on is that it just has a weird kind of bland feel.  While it's suitable for families, it doesn't have that feel to it.  It's hard to
Manager Response: Dear RYCA1, thank you for your high recommendations of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We have contemporary décor and comfortable furnishings.  Guests love the Keurig coffee makers and we keep it fully stocked with coffees and teas.  We are new, so we are adding more and more personality to the hotel.  We hope to see you again for your next visit, so you can see the additions.  Thank you for an awesome review!

Summary: Check in was really great! Very friendly staff and beautiful new hotel! Rooms are super modern and you even get a k cup coffee maker in the room!!! Super great for those morning before hitting the parks! Love the pool, it's so relaxing. We ate dinner at the hotel restaurant and we were surprised by the price of the food was very reasonable and great quality! We will definitely be back soon!!!!!! Thank you to the staff for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Greetings!  We are happy to hear that you had a good stay with us.  Yes, guests love the Keurig coffee makers in the rooms.  We also supply tea.  Our Chambers Bar & Bistro has great food.  You are very welcome and thank you for staying at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great experience and like Disney location.
Summary: Great hotel with really good service, it has a great restaurant, Bar, pool, & Jacuzzi. The room was very clean and modern style with hard floors.  it's a block from the Anaheim Convention Center and 2 blocks from Disney, definitely recommended we had a great experience:)
Manager Response: Dear Gutierrezcindy1982, thank you for your super review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are centrally located in the heart of the Disneyland Resort.  We appreciate you referring our hotel.  Please come back and see us!

Summary: The room:  The room size was nice two double beds and a pull out sofa.  Quiet, couldn't hear any other rooms or hallway noise. Staff:  The staff was friendly greeted us each time we came in.   Location:  Very close to the Disney parks, we were able to walk to them very easily.
Manager Response: Dear Kate M, thank you for your fantastic review of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  We are an IHG hotel and we are trained in the "Winning in SLEEP" program.  Our Dream Team makes sure that our guests get a great night's sleep.  Please stay with us again!

Summary: Great hotel. I've stayed @ many of the hotels close to Disney, including Disneyland resort & Paradise pier, but I love the Hotel Indigo. The absolute best beds ever!!! Love the floors, no yucky carpeting. Great modern decor, friendly staff. Love it!!
Manager Response: Dear Michele P, thank you for letting us know that you loved the Hotel Indigo.  We love working here!  We hope we helped make your Disneyland vacation a memorable experience.  Yes, the hardwood floors are nice.

Summary Heading: Love the modern style and convenient location
Summary: The room was very clean and we are sticklers for cleanliness. Our room was spacious with modern style. The front desk was friendly and helpful. There is a gym, pool and restaurant here. Garden walk is nearby with shopping and great restaurants and also within walking distance to Disneyland. We are looking forward to coming back staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara D, we are happy that you liked our rooms and our all new furniture.  We receive many compliments about our modern hotel exterior, contemporary and comfortable furnishings including hardwood floors and hand showers in the restrooms.  We hope you will make Hotel Indigo Anaheim your home away from home when you are visiting Disneyland!

Summary: We enjoyed staying at Hotel Indigo for vacation. The room was very clean, spacious and modern style. The staff was friendly and helpful. They also have a restaurant, gym and pool at the hotel. It is cheerful and comfortable atmosphere. There are a lot of restaurants, convenient stores and the convention center nearby. Walking distance to Disneyland too. It is a Great location. We are looking forward to coming back staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Yoshiko O, we enjoyed having you stay with us too!  Many guests comment about our close proximity to area attractions, including Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and the shops and restaurants at the GardenWalk.  We do have great amenities and services.  Hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: This was a very good option for a hotel when visiting Disneyland. Only ten min walk away, and still affordable. Friendly and attentive staff. Spacious, clean and comfortable room, especially the beds. Breakfast included, with a variety to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Stefan T, thank you for your great comments about our Team and guest rooms.  We pride ourselves in our hotel and it is always nice when guests let us know that they enjoyed our facilities.  Hope to see you on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Aside from the smell of sewage coming from our bathroom, the hotel staff were very accommodating to make our stay better than we could ever imagine :) They dealt with the problem as soon as we reported it and offered to move us to another room. We declined as we were only staying a few nights and did not want to move so maintenance was sent in to properly assess and rectify the problem.  Overall, we found our room to be quite large and the bed to be super comfy (loved the sheets and duvet). The food from their restaurant was also ample, priced well and delicious. Having free parking was also a plus along with the Aveda products provided to us as our toiletries (nice touch).   The one downside was the noise level in the hall especially after a long day of travel when trying to
Manager Response: Dear curtisandandy, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed our large room and comfortable beds.  I agree that our restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro serves delicious meals.  We receive a lot of compliments on the Aveda products.  With our hand shower and luxurious baths, we try to create a spa experience.  We do not charge for parking or WiFi and our guests like you love that!  The staff enjoyed reading your compliments.  Please come back and visit us soon.

Summary Heading: Modern, clean , comfortable hotel. Perfect location for Disneyland visit
Summary: Our famiy of 4 had a great time at the Hotel Indigo. We wanted a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland and this hotel was perfect for our need. Room was very clean and nice modern feel. Free gated parking is great. I'm sure most reviews have covered every angle possible of this hotel. Two small details I wanted to point out.  1. The handheld shower head is a godsend! Most hotels usually don't have it. But with small kids, it's always been super difficult to give showers on a regular showerhead so THANK YOU Indigo for making our lives easier. It's the small things. 2. Get a room facing the pool and you'll see the fireworks from your room! The little strip mall around the corner has pretty decent Mexican food for a really good price. After seeing spending an average of
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for such great feedback.  Yes, we are close to Disneyland and have some rooms that face Disney's spectacular fireworks display.  Parking is gated and there is no charge.  The handheld shower is a great feature.  Our goal was to create guestrooms with contemporary décor with the guests' ultimate comfort in mind.  Thank you for recommending our hotel.  Please return for your future visits to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary Heading: Nice boutique option in a sea of chains
Summary: I arrived early after a day-long flight from the east coast.  My room was ready well before 3, the front desk staff was excellent.  They went above and beyond helping me find a quality day spa to help me unwind after my flight.  I liked the bedding, open concept shower, and the exposed, polished hardwood floors.  I was pleasantly surprised by the high quality of service from all the people I interacted with, from the front desk to the restaurant staff, who always had a smile that seemed genuine.  I'm still here, working from the cafe, while I wait for a late flight, and the staff has checked in me and made sure I was comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Cyborgoddess, thank you so much for your compliments about our team!  We pride ourselves in providing superior guest service.  We are proud of our hotel and our beautiful guestrooms!  I am glad you enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!

Summary: Our family frequents Disneyland often and recently found this cool gem. Conveniently located on Katella, this hotel has as much to offer as the other known brands nearby and very well run.   Glad to have found this property.
Manager Response: Dear Kurataohana,  We appreciate you for writing such a delightful review! We know you have other optios, thank you for choosing Hotel Indigo for your Anaheim trip. Hopefully you get to come back soon and see us again!

Summary: This was a great place to stay to go to disney land, which is just around the corner and down the road. It was modern, clean, bright and comfortable. The bath rooms where funky, the beds comfortable. We had breakfast here which was great, the staff were friendly and it was a really nice environment.
Manager Response: Dear aussiefamily04,  Thank you for leaving us a wonderful review! We are glad that our location and rooms were the perfect fit for you. Chambers Bar and Bistro is a great find in the resort area and we are pleased to know that you had the opportunity to try it out. Our team strives to give the best customer service on a daily basis and that's why your compliments to our staff are greatly appreciated. Again, thank you and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: I heard about Indigo Hotels from my sister and finally got to try one on this trip to Anaheim.  I was pleasantly surprised by the accommodations.  In my suite, there was a living room with a couch and coffee table.  The bedroom had 2 beds with tons of pillows.  Both rooms had flat screen TV's.  I especially enjoyed the Aveda products in the bathroom!  This hotel is a short walk to Disneyland and the convention center.  And plenty of restaurants to choose from for meals. I recommend this hotel, if you want a place for business and pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Shampa525,  Thank you so much for such an awesome review! We appreciate your compliments about our property. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed our amenities. We also would like to thank your sister for the recommendation and we're happy that we exceeded your expectations. Hope to see you and your family very soon!

Summary: Stayed for one week with my family at Hotel INDIGO as I needed to attend an expo at Anaheim Convention Center. Staff was not helpful at all upon our arrival. They were just standing there, looking at me and did nothing while I was unloading the luggages from my car, not even helping me to press the lift button!  Interior of the hotel and the room are not as good looking as from the photos. It may. due to wear and tear. Room size was just ok. Walls are thin and I could hear people walking or talking outside the corridor.  Towels inside the room were in poor condition. They were supposed to be in white colour but the ones I got were in grey colour. I think they had been used for a long time without replacement. Breakfast at their restaurant was good but dinner was not ok. I
Manager Response: Dear CaptainDen,  First we would like to thank you for leaving a feedback regarding your recent stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We would also like to thank you for choosing us among other options around the Convention Center area. Let me take this opportunity to apologize for the unfavorable experience you may have had during your stay. Although it does not seem likely for our team to deliver a service that is not up to par, please know that we are taking your feedback with utmost importance. We have discussed the matter with our team to make sure it does not ever happen again. We regret to hear that the room and amenities did not meet your expectations, we hope that you could still us another chance and make your next stay better. Again, thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Compared to all the hotels that are just a walk away to Disney, Hotel Indigo has to be the best! The front desk clerks were very friendly and asked us what we were in town for, which was very kind. We stayed in the family studio suite and it fit my family of 4 very comfortably. It's modern and the hotel was able to accommodate my family's stay by offering a crib for my baby. The rooms were well maintained and the color of the rooms were inviting. The restroom was beautiful. I loved how the pool was a good size and very relaxing. If you want to take the day to go shopping or enjoy restaurants, Garden Walk is not too far at all! What a plus! I would give Hotel Indigo 5 stars just for the customer service I've received from everyone. If you're looking for affordable rooms, short
Manager Response: Dear Shell2bias,  We are taken aback by your pleasant feedback about your recent stay! Our staff is our pride and we are thrilled to share the compliments you have for them. Thank you so much for your recommendation and we are looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My room was very nice and fresh looking. Everybody was very helpful. Very convenient for shopping, Disneyland, Eating and shows. The staff was informative and pleasant. Restaurants on almost every corner. Everything was clean and freshly relaxing. I really enjoyed my stay here. I wasn't disturbed with any outside noises or hearing neighbors. I am looking forward to returning here again sometime soon.
Manager Response: Dear Jerry O,  We greatly appreciate your stellar review!We take a lot of pride in our staff, always making sure our guests are having a pleasurable stay. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that it was very cmfortable. Thank you for considering us again and we hope that your next visit is just as wonderful!

Summary: Wonderful stay!! It checks all the boxes: decent rates, very clean, attentive customer service, and within walking distance to Disneyland/Restaurants/Walgreens and CVS. Our room had a good tea and coffee selection, and the bathroom was very clean, new, and stylish.
