My only complaint is that the walls are a bit thin - you can hear footsteps, but it doesn't disturb sleep. Overall, I will definitely be returning and make this my preferred hotel.
Manager Response: Dear kikininjamonkey,  Thank you for your lovely review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim! We are happy that you had a very comfortable stay and that you liked how vibrant our hotel is. We regret to hear that you found our walls thin. This has been brought up to our head and we are definitely doing everything we can to avoid this from disrupting our guests' comfort. We are delighted to know that this did not tarnish your confidence in us. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Amazing accommodations, very nice decor, outstanding staff!
Summary: My Wife, Daughter, and I stayed at the Hotel Indigo during out recent trips to the Disney/Anaheim area.  We've stayed at a few other great hotels in the area...  But we all agree that Hotel Indigo is head and shoulders above the rest!  First off, they have a to shelf staff.  Everyone from beginning to end was extremely friendly, professional, helpful, and knowledgeable about everything.  The room was REALLY nice, we loved the decor.  The bed was very comfortable, and we all thought the fixtures in the bathroom were very cool.  The pool area was very relaxing and inviting.  There's even a very cool cabana for relaxing out of the sun for a little break.    Also, the gym is very nice, clean and has everything you need to keep in shape.  We had planned to eat out more often...  But
Manager Response: Dear andy m,  We would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your compliments about our Hotel and staff! We are very happy to learn that our staff has given you stellar service. We firmly believe that they are the gem of our hotel and they will certainly be happy to read your pleasant comments about them. We are also elated to know that you enjoyed our amenities. What a great thing that you got the opportunity to try out Chambers Bar and Bistro as well. Chambers serves the best food and has great customer service as well. Again, thank you so much and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was a nice little hotel around the corner from Disneyland.   The walk to the parks was just a few blocks and there are plenty of restaurants nearby.   I was pleasantly surprised by the size of our room - plenty of space for us and all our belongings.   The bathroom was quite spacious.   The staff was super friendly.  When we arrived too early for our room, they went out of their way to make us comfortable while waiting, gave us the internet code, bottles of water, and a comfy place to sit and relax.   We would definitely stay here again if we were visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear dianelk  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Our staff greatly appreciates your compliments for them, this surely inspires them more to deliver even better customer service. They are our hotel's pride. We are delighted to know that we were able to accommodate you even before check in. Thank you so much for considering us again and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: Decent location for 20 minute walk to Disney parks. Friendly front desk and housekeeping staff. Clean room with modern look and laminate flooring which we liked. Shower a bit kooky but was fine, seal gone on shower door so water ended up all over the floor. Beds and pillows moderately comfortable. Thin ceilings and wonky slanted floor - I kept falling near the bed as I walked towards it the floor abruptly slants and it really throws ones equilibrium for a loop! Jerks above us were noisy scraping chairs across floors, talking loudly and walking with shoes on - all done at night. Who needs to be doing that at 1 in the morning? Pool was small but use able. The hotel has a few decorative fountains outside that have incredibly annoying repetitive music that accompanies them - we kept
Manager Response: Dear WhiteRockFamily,  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave a feedback regarding your recent stay. We are taken aback by your compliments to our Front Desk and Housekeeping staff. We have the best team of people who genuinely cares about our guests. On the other hand, I would like to apologize for all the inconvenience you encountered while staying with us. Please feel free to send us an e-mail if you would like to discuss any of the said issues further. We are currently doing preventive maintenance to prevent those issues from happening again. We hope that you could still give us the opportunity to change your opinion about us and again, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: This review is specifically for those in the area for business and not for Disney.  I attended a conference at the Marriott, about 3/4 mile away.  Next to the Marriott is the Anaheim Convention Center and the Hilton.  Walking time was 10 minutes to the Marriott, the others are closer.  I had a room on the fourth floor in the back because I wanted a quiet room.  I found the hotel extremely quiet and was able to sleep well, usually going to bed about 9 PM.  My room had hard floors only on one side, most of the room was carpeted (around the beds and sofa).  I could see Disney fireworks while lying in bed.  Check in and out was quick, and the front desk and housekeeping staff really are as friendly as everyone says.  Comfy bed, Keurig coffee maker with 4 choices, free safe (big
Manager Response: Dear Tom_1MN,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! It was our pleasure having you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim for your business trip. We're glad that our amenities, location and rooms worked perfectly for you. We are looking forward to seeing you back very soon!

Summary: This hotel was exactly what my family needed for our two day Disneyland getaway! This hotel is very clean and nicely decorated with new and modern decor! The beds were very comfortable, the bathroom was a great size with a fantastic shower and plenty of counter space, and the hotel provides Aveda products! The walk to Disney is an easy 15 minutes (no long shuttle lines to deal with)  and there are restaurants (and a Walgreens) along the way! Staff was helpful and friendly and they even allowed us to park our car early in the morning before we were allowed to check in for the day... so we could head off to Disney worry free! Slight cons were the noise from Katella Ave and noise from other rooms and hallway...But this did not bother us since we were exhausted from our 8 hour days
Manager Response: Dear Tamara B,  What a delightful review! We appreciate the time you took to leave us such a nice feedback. Thank you for staying at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are happy to know that you liked our rooms and amenities and everything including our location suited your family's needs perfectly. It was great being able to accommodate your parking before check in. We apologize for any noise issues you encountered. On your next stay, please feel free to request for a room on a quieter location, and we will definitely do our best to accommodate that for you. Thank you so much and see you soon!

Summary: The hotel is fairly newly remolded and clean. Staff were exceedingly friendly, accommodating our early check in. Below ground (free!) parking was very easy. The breakfast served in the cafe was tasty and didn't feel too gougy with the price. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. The bathroom was very nice. I like the 'modern' ascetic they are going for. Plus, as the title of this review says, its an easy walk to the park.  A note for a better stay... we initially asked for a room on the top floor. We would have had to wait to check in so we took the 3rd floor. Mistake. The hardwood floors are nice when they are under your feet, not above your head. The room above us were early risers.
Manager Response: Dear KenDiego,  Thank you for your compliments! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave such a wonderful review. We are very proud to have staff members who are great at customer service and who has genuine care for our guests. They will be really elated to read your review. We're glad that you liked our modern boutique hotel as well as our Restaurant, Chambers Bar and Bistro. Next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to let us know about your room preference and we will be more than happy to accommodate that for you. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Mixed bag for us but generally a good hotel
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in a King Suite, booked through their official website as they had the best price.   First, the not so good 1. The two air conditioning units in our room were very noisy, so much so that we had to switch off the one in our bedroom as it was interfering with our sleep. Also, the wall thermostat controller for one of the air conditioning unit was not working 2. The TV in the lounge was not working but it didn't really bother us as we do not watch much TV, but could have been an issue for some. 3. The impression you get from reading the reviews here on tripadvisor is that the hotel is just a quick stroll away from Disneyland. We found that to not be exactly the case as it took us approximately 13-15mins walk (typical hot and sunny weather too) to get there.
Manager Response: Dear  -Gary-T-L,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a helpful feedback! We appreciate the compliments and we are happy to hear that you found our restaurant excellent and that our hotel amenities and the cleanliness of our room suited your standards just fine. Our sincerest apologies about the Air Conditioning unit and television not being up to par during your stay. Our Housekeeping and Maintenance staff is equipped and well trained to fix such issues and we try to respond as quickly as possible when issues are being reported. We hope that you could give us another chance to turn things around for you and hope that the issues you encountered would not tarnish your faith in us. Hopefully the good experience you had can outweigh the bad. We will be looking forward to you next stay with us!

Summary: It was a great experience. Very nice. Friendly people friendly staff. Beutiful staying. Close to everything. Free parking. Free wifi.  Love the main lobby.  Nice and clean.  The cleaning ladys friendly and they are there for you.  What ever i need they are there. Looks like they work as a team.  I want my room clean two housekeeping to the rescue and fast. Very clean rooms well organize. Love the figures with towels.  .thank you for make my staying good and welcome.
Manager Response: Dear  Carl F,  Thank you for such a great review! We are happy to know that you had a good stay and our staff made you feel really welcome. We are very proud to have housekeepers that love being of service and interacting with our guests. Our team will be delighted to hear about your compliments! We are hoping to see you on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: this is my 2nd visit to Hotel Indigo and this time was as amazing as the first time. My room had an awesome view of the Disney Fireworks. I also had free parking.  Room was very clean and staff was friendly and welcoming. Would recommend taking the ART Shuttle it takes you to disney and back. For $5 its a better alternative than parking at disney. Will come again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Jakobcruz,  Thank you for choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim yet again! We appreciate you taking the time to leave your comments regarding your stay. We are delighted to hear that your recent stay was just as nice as the last one. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We had a 3 day trip planned to Disneyland for our granddaughter's 4th birthday and were looking for somewhere close to stay and discovered Hotel Indigo. What a delightful hotel! Rooms were beautifully appointed, clean with the most amazingly comfortable beds. The front desk staff were wonderful and were very pleasant and accommodating. We had 2 rooms, an accessible king and a family suite. The location was perfect for our Disneyland trip, a less than 10 minute walk. Everyone had a great time and enjoyed the hotel immensely. Definitely will stay here again! An added bonus was the little restaurant next to the lobby. Wonderful French Toast.
Manager Response: Dear Sue K,  We appreciate your 5-star review! We are delighted to know that you had a wonderful stay and that you found our property to be delightful for your family. We will let our staff know about your compliments about them. They will surely appreciate it! We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Trying a New Base for Disneyland
Summary: We have long advocated staying at the Northern end of Harbor Boulevard in Anaheim and have been regular visitors to The Fairfield Inn by Marriott and, more recently the Howard Johnson just a few doors along. On this occasion we were put-off by the slightly higher than normal room rates (we usually visit at a slightly later time of the year, when prices have proven to be a little lower – so no fault of those hotels). We wanted something close to Disney (within easy walking distance), clean, quiet, and with free-parking (increasingly a more and more difficult ask).  Just to give you some context. We were stopping for five nights, arriving on a Sunday afternoon and departing on the subsequent Friday. The online rates through the IHG website were competitive and the room pictures
Manager Response: Dear LasVegasNigel,  We are so happy that you got to try out our property, Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you liked our contemporary design, as well as our convenienct location. Our team members are always motivated to give such beautiful service, and knowing that you recognize that means a lot to us. Again, thank you for leaving us such a detailed review, and we promise that your next visit will be just as nice. We are looking forward to seeing you back very soon!

Summary: * FRONT DESK LADIES WERE AMAZING! Especially one in particular her name I think was Jessica. She wore glasses and brought me band aides to my room and extra ones for later.  also when I had lost my phone over the weekend she did everything she could to help me and even offered me complimentary drink and snack, which was very nice. I had booked a one bed king room which was more than a double queen bed room but to my surprise they actually gave me a double queen bed room and a view of the park. I had asked before I arrived if they could place me with a view over the park and the host mentioned we can try to accommodate but there are no guarantees but she pulled it off and that was so nice of her!!!! The hotel is nicely renovated and the walls might be alittle thin as another
Manager Response: Dear rocko_89,  Thank you so much for leaving us such a detailed, superb feedback regarding your recent stay with Hotel Indigo. It was our pleasure being of service to you, and we are very proud to have team members like Jessica who has genuine care for our guests, as well as our Housekeeping staff who always have positive attitude, they make our guests' stay wonderful and they make us such a great property. We are happy to have been able to accommodate your room preferences and parking for your vehicle. We hope to see you next year or even sooner!

Summary: During our stay every one within the staff team made us feel welcome, and also made sure that if we need anything they would promptly took care of it. I highly re commend it, rooms where clean beds where comfortable.and close to restaurants and convenience stores.
Manager Response: Dear Oscar E,  We appreciate your wonderful review about our property! We are so delighted to hear about your great experience with our staff. We take pride in the great service that our staff provides and they will be thrilled to get such a positive feedback. Thank you so much and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at Hotel Indigo. We stayed there primarily for the proximity to Disneyland, but we enjoyed much more about our choice to stay there. The rooms and decor are clean, fresh, and modern. The beds are comfortable, especially after a long day at the parks. The staff is to be commended for putting their guests needs first. The front desk staff always did whatever they could to help us out in a friendly manner. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Mad_About_Travel86,  Thank you for such a delightful review. It is good to know that you had a great stay. We take pride in having staff like ours. They are the asset of our property and help us a lot with making sure our guests have wonderful experiences. Thank you for considering us again for your next vacation and we can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here for four nights on a recent trip to Disneyland.  We had two rooms for us and our sons.  First let me say, the staff here is wonderful.Every person we spoke with was really genuinely kind and helpful.  Even little things, like when I asked at the front desk where the laundry room was and they reminded me I needed coins and they could make me change.  This saved me the walk back to the desk because I assumed there would be a coin machine.  Its a little thing, but not everyone would think to give that information.   We found the rooms to be clean and spacious.  Really liked the wood floors instead of carpet as well as the large shower with glass doors.  There was a refrigerator in the rooms which was handy for stocking bottled water which we bought right across the
Manager Response: Dear NYFLORIDIAN,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave such a detailed review! Your comments are greatly appreciated. We love these kind of review because it helps us pay attention to things that we need to improve. We are ecstatic to know that our staff has provided you with superb service. We take pride in all our staff members. They are the gem of our hotel. We are glad that our property has provided you great comfort and convenience for your visit in Anaheim. In behalf of our Central Reservations Office, I would like to sincerely apologize regarding the confusion regarding your room type. We regret that we were not able to accommodate your room preference. We hope that this does not tarnish your confidence in us and that we could still get the opportunity to restore your faith in Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We hope to see you back very very soon!

Summary: Other than the decor, this property doesn't have the same feel as other trendy Indigo properties I've stayed in. It feels more like an old Catskills resort that's been renovated. The long hallways and the rooms all have low ceilings, and this makes the rooms feel much less spacious. The building forms a U-shape around a courtyard with a small pool area that doesn't get sun for much of the day.   The room and bed were comfortable, and the TV was big with great picture quality. The shower was nice too with a separate overhead and hand-held spray. Everything seemed very clean, however we saw room service plates with leftover food sitting on the floor of the hallway at 8:00 pm, and noticed they were still there at 9:00 am the next morning. We didn't see a lot of kids at this hotel,
Manager Response: Dear shell202020,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us your feedback regarding your recent stay with Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are saddened to hear that our property did not exceed your expectations. We take your feedback sertiously and we have brought it up to our management team to make sure it doesn't happen again. Hopefully you could give us another chance to restore your faith in Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: This has to be the most outstanding hotel I've been to so far . The location is great . It is near Disneyland And the garden walk which is a plus because the traffic is hectic sometimes so it's not far of a walk . The service was a 10 and the house keeping was helpful and polite . I asked a housekeeper (Margot ) to bring me extra towels. She had a positive attitude and was friendly 😁 . Will stay here again .
Manager Response: Dear jeantte_G,  Thank you so much for your exceptional review! We are happy to know that you find us the "most outstanding hotel", this most certainly motivates us more to deliver the best service around. We are proud to have staff members like Margot, she always has a positive attitude and always inspired to make our guests feel welcome. We will most definitely let her know about your compliments about her. We are looking forward to having you at our property soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, and modern hotel, let down by the poor sound proofing
Summary: I stayed here recently while going for Disney, and stayed for 3 nights. My room wasn't ready, which I expected over a holiday weekend, but the stay said they would let me know as soon as it was. 90 minutes later they rang me.  The room is a decent size, and the bed was firm, and comfortable. The room is clean, well maintained, and a sensible layout, and it was great to have a decent sized bathroom. I couldn't really fault anything.   Then as I was trying to sleep, as I was jet-lagged, the running up and down the hallway started, and then the room above me sounded like a small trike or toy being run up and down the floor. Finally at midnight there was peace, and quiet, only for it to start all over again at 6am.   If you want a peaceful stay, this is probably not the place. I get
Manager Response: Dear wanderingaussie-adam,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a feedback about your recent stay! We value your feedback greatly! We are thrilled to know that you found the room comfortable and convenient for your needs. Our sincerest apologies regarding the noise issues you encountered. Our front desk staff are trained to handle these situations pretty well and we are always just one call away. We hope that you can still give us another opportunity to turn things around for you. On your next stay, don't hesitate to let us know and we will find you a quieter location. Thank you so much and we hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: We booked this hotel in the last minute as we decided it would be smart to have a hotel close to Disneyland to take a break. Check in was a  breeze. We got the parking pass and it was a challenge to park our 15 seater van in the basement parking, but I think the parking was adequate for most situations. We had booked 2 rooms and one of the room was upgraded to a suite which was a good bonus. We were 8 people between 2 rooms and all of us slept comfortably. The rooms were swanky. We had requested a late check out on the last day and the hotel was gracious to accommodate us with a small fee.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler777_boston,  Thank you so much for your terrific review! It was our pleasure being able to accommodate your early check in and late check out during your visit. We apologize for the difficulty you encountered your 15 passenger van. We do have a ground level parking. On your next visit, please feel free to swing by our front desk to ask for assistance, and we will happily assist you with easier parking. We are looking forward to your next stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Comfortable and stylish, great for Disneyland
Summary: Pros Staff is awesome bar and restaurant many places to walk to Comfortable rooms  COns Parking was not ample  _______________________________________ Stayed for 3 nights.  You can do a lot worse in that part of Anaheim.  THe exterior and interior was a real treat for the eyes.
Manager Response: Dear Baldie_Pauldie,  Thank you so much for your superb compliments about our property, and most specially our staff! We take pride in having staff that are always inspired to deliver the best service. We apologize for the tight parking you encountered. We are one of the very few hotel in Anaheim that offer complimentary parking. Know that we always guarantee one parking spot for each room when you stay with us, so no worries! It was a pleasure having you here and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Stayed 3 days here and couldn't have asked for better service, rooms were clean and staff on point also the parking garage is secure great location short walk to parks and restaurants. Will stay here every time we come back no doubt
Manager Response: Dear Alonz M,  What a wonderful feedback! Thank you so much and we are glad that you had a lovely stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are looking forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Free, covered parking.  Pleasant, clean room, with comfortable beds and decent-sized bathroom, safe and free wi-fi.  Pleasant front-office staff.  So why only 3 stars?   I guess our room had only just been cleaned when we arrived, but even so, the stench of cleaning fluid in the bathroom was overpoweringly nauseous and the fresh towels were still wet (from the laundry, one hopes!)  The racket created by the cleaning staff, slamming closet doors and shouting to each other along the length of the hallway, providing a most unwelcome "wake-up" call just after 8 o'clock in the morning.  No doubt ok if you're rushing off to Disneyland with the kids, but not if you're just a couple looking forward to sleeping off a late dinner/dance the night before.
Manager Response: Dear Menifeemonkey,  We want to thank you for leaving us a review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our rooms and staff. We regret to hear that you had some issues during your stay. We have taken the said housekeeping issues to our management and we are taking necessary actions to prevent this from happening again. If you would like to discuss this further, please feel free to contact us directly. We hope that we could still get the opportunity to restore your faith and confidence in us!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights and we were happy with our pick. Short walk to Disneyland, lots of restaurants on the way that are open late which is ideal for when you leave the park at night.  Comfortable, spacious room and large bathroom.  Free undercover secure parking. Pool and spa area were good. Gym is pretty limited but had the basics like a treadmill.  Only downside was the the hotel was quite noisy- wooden floors in the rooms and we could hear people from the rooms around us coming and going.  The staff were friendly and courteous. Overall, a very good stay.
Manager Response: Dear carlsnewb,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a nice review! We are pleased to hear that you liked our rooms and amenities. We apologize for the noise issue that you encountered. If you decide to come back for a visit, please don't hesitate to request for a quieter location and we'll make sure to do our best to make it happen for you. Our staff appreciates your compliments and your review motivates them even more to work harder for our guests! We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Perfect place for myself and 9yr old daughter travelling to America and visiting Disneyland
Summary: Location is number one, when we arrived very early after a 11.5hr trip from Auckland. Our room was ready and we were able to go straight in. The ladies at reception had also given us the room facing Disney and we watched the firework display, thank you. Service. The service has been outstanding, the staff appear genuine and especially helpful. Rooms the rooms are clean and exactly what we need Pool The swimming pool and spa is a welcome relief after a long day. Return I will definitely return, I love the colours, and location, we tried the breakfast and that was yummy and the service quick and efficient
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great feedback regarding your recent stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you had a wonderful stay and that you had the chance to use our pool and hot tub, as well as our restaurant, Chambers Bar and Bistro. Thank you for your compliments for our staff. They are the best around and they make us very proud. We hope that you are enjoying the rest of your vacation and we can't wait to welcome you again soon!

Summary: This is the Indigo on Katella that was renovated a few years back.  We stayed here last year and it was so good we came here again.  Very accommodating staff, quick check in,requested top floor and got it no problem. Main lobby is bright and clean and welcoming. Parking is free and secure. Elevator is always quick and the location to Disneyland couldn't be better. Rooms are large, spotlessly clean, large glassed in shower, lots of towels and counter space. It was quiet even though pool was below our room.  Only one thing missing is a free breakfast in the morning but there is a restaurant where you could buy it.  Great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear DarkoTraveler,  First, we would like to thank you for your wonderful review about our hotel. We are always happy to see return guests and we appreciate the confidence and loyalty you have given us. On your next visit, please stop by our Front Desk for any discounts and promotions available for you for breakfast at Chambers Bar and Bistro. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another great IHG option for Disneyland
Summary: Ever since the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites on S. Walnut partnered up with GetTravel, it's almost impossible to get a room there anymore without a 3+ night minimum stay, so I decided I'd try a different place and was just as happy at the Hotel Indigo.  Much newer hotel, free parking (please don't change this), slightly better/shorter (debatable for sure) walk to the front gate of Disneyland, but yeah not as convenient for RunDisney events if you plan on having to go back and forth to the Convention Center at the Disneyland Hotel frequently.  A big plus, however, is the closeness of a CVS, Walgreens, and other businesses on Katella.  Not much else around the S. Walnut Holiday Inn except for the gas station up the street.  Not as convenient for the typical start locations of the
Manager Response: Dear SeanAZ,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review regarding your recent stay with us! We would also like to thank you for giving us the opportunity to give you a great experience at our property. Your review will absolutely help a lot of travellers who plan to stay with us. We would like to apologize about not having more than one elevator. We hope that this does not cease your faith in us. We are looking forward to seeing you on your next run in Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed at hotel indigo for 3 nights, the place is wonderful and feels so inviting and comfortable. The bed was beautiful and comfortable, room was decorated very nice, tea and coffee pods, good size bathroom although it too a sec to work out how to switch from the hand held to the shower head.   Not long after you enter the room, reception calls to make sure everything in your room is up to standards and if you need anything. The staff are very friendly.   The one bad thing about the hotel, we had a herd of elephants move in upstairs and the crying baby next door. And the sad part is, it wasn't the people being overly loud, it's the hotel. I even heard myself thump the floor at one stage and felt bad for the people below. Noise doesn't usually bother me, and it didn't destroy
Manager Response: Dear R0wi3,  We are very delighted to hear from you! We are glad that our staff had provided you with great service. We are proud to have them in our team. We apologize for any trouble you had with our shower, the noise issue you encountered, and the height of the seats in the jacuzzi. Rest assured that these issues will be brought to our head's attention and will be taken with utmost importance. We hope that you could still give us the opportunity to restore your faith in us. If you would like to discuss further, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here 3 nights while visiting the Disney parks.  The hotel is clean with secure parking.  We were lucky enough to have a suite which was clean and spacious.  Found the shower a bit tricky at first, despite the instructions!   Our room neighbours had a dog, which initially kept barking.  A quick call to reception and didn't have any further problems.  Was even offered a change of room the next day, but didn't have any issues.  It's a short walk to the Disney parks so convenient if that's the basis of your visit.
Manager Response: Dear TeamMason,  Thank you for taking the time to leave great comments about your stay. We are glad you liked the suite you stayed in. Sorry you had trouble with the shower. We wish we had the chance to assist you with that, the Front Desk is only a call away. We would also like to apologize regarding the noise issue you encountered but we are glad that our staff was able to resolve this for you. We are hoping that next time you visit, we could give you an even better experience. See you soon!

Summary: One more time.  This is my number one hotel.  Wonderful staying and relax.  Close to everything. Free parking free wifi. The rooms are very nice and very very very clean .good staff at front lobby. The housekeeping ladys are very nice and helpfull. Good manners and friendly.  You ask for something .they got it for you right away.  This is my number one hotel.  Try it and you will see..
Manager Response: Dear carlos b,  Thank you for your great feedback about our hotel! We are glad that you had a great experience with us. We will definitely pass your review on to our staff in order to motivate them even more in delivering inspired service. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Close proximity to Disneyland and nice hotel
Summary: My wife and I chose Hotel Indigo due to the close proximity to Disneyland the rate we received. Check-in was quick and easy and we quickly found our room. One of the perks was that parking was included in an underground garage. The hotel and our room was very nice and clean and extremely comfortable. Although we slept soundly the noise level was a little more than expected, but not too much of a trouble. We could easily hear people in the hall and the heavier vehicle traffic (i.e. trucks) in the parking lot below through the window. We did not hear adjoining rooms though. The shower was difficult to adjust and could have used more water pressure but was not terrible. We would definitely stay here again. Staff was extremely friendly also.
Manager Response: Dear B C,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave comments about your stay with us. We are glad you got to take advantage of our complimentary parking, a rarity in the Anaheim Resort area. Thank you for the compliments regarding our staff. We are so lucky to have people that care about our guests genuinely. In behalf of Hotel Indigo Anaheim management and staff, I would like to apologize for the noise and difficulty you experienced with our shower. We will absolutely check on this. Thank you for not losing confidence in us. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel to Bring your Pets!
Summary: We go to Disneyland all the time and sometimes like to bring out pup. This hotel is in great proximity to Disneyland, about a 10 minute walk Everything seems to be pretty new and CVS Is directly across the street and open 24 hours. Parking is free and it is underground and gated.  There isn't a dog walk except for the walkway in front of the hotel but it wasn't much of a problem.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. We can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda N,  Thank you for leaving us a great feedback! This really means a lot to us and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here in Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We take pride in all our staff members, they make our guests feel at home and welcome. We can't wait to see you back on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Mmmm. Not as good as I thought :(
Summary: Okay. Just okay. Not really much to complain about or rave about.... you know what I mean ? Would I stay again ? Maybe. If I got a good deal. Pros : Free parking or if it wasn't , not expensive Across the road from Disneyland.... I wasn't going to Disney, I had a conference but it was a manageable distance to walk kids back and forth and still walk the park for 12 hours :)  Pool was nice but super small Rooms were lovely decor. Very mod. And faux hardwood floors which was a nice change to yucky hotel carpet  Great kebabs at the corner store  Great CVS nearby ;)   Cons : it took AGES to check in...and it was just me in line. My corporate credit card was not accepted (long story, not my fault) and then apparently not a single card I owned would go through. Eventually they took an
Manager Response: Dear creativenarelle,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad that you were satisfied with our rooms, location and parking. We apologize for the delay during check in. Our Front Desk staff are trained to check in guests efficiently and in a timely manner. That being said, we have standard operating procedures that our staff need to follow. We are sorry for the WiFi problems you encountered. We have recently upgraded our Wired and Wireless connection and it is now up and running and is working better for our guests.  Should you decide to discuss the issues you experienced, we are just one call away. We hope that we could still restore your faith in us and see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Best hotel in proximity to Disneyland!
Summary: I know it's a bold statement considering the plethora of hotels near Disneyland however Hotel Indigo has been the best hotel that I've stayed at in this area far.  Here's why I truly believe it's the best (in no particular order): 1) free parking on property.  2) rooms have a modern look, hardware flooring and equipped with a refrigerator and Keurig machine. 3). Hotel Indigo is NOT a motel.  It seems silly to note this given the name but there are a lot of motels in the area that look like a hotel until you arrive 4) although purchasing a voucher is usually required, breakfast for the price it goes for is worth it.  Through the hotel's direct site I paid $14 for a breakfast voucher for two.  The breakfast offered is not a buffet but rather a small cafe where food is made to
Manager Response: Dear Jeniece B,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a very delightful feedback regarding your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! We are happy to hear that you had the most amazing experience and that our rooms, amenities and location suited your needs perfectly! Thank you for stopping by Chambers Bar and Bistro as well. We take great pride in our staff. They are truly a gem! We will make sure to let them know about your review in order to encourage them even more to deliver inspired service! On the other hand, our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you have experienced. Know that we will take this seriously and take necessary actions to improve our property. Thank you for giving us a chance to enhance our service and still having faith in us. We will see you on your visit in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel until money stolen from our safe.
Summary: Our 1st stay on an 8 week trip. Nice location and comfortable rooms. However we placed 1,000 CAD in the room safe day 1 and on day of departure this was 950 CAD. Our emails to the hotel about this matter were ignored.  Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear paulcathyupton,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are sorry to hear about the issue you encountered while staying with us. Our staff are more than happy to respond to your issues. You can send us an e-mail at info@anaheim.hotelindigo.com or info@winwinhotels.com, these are the e-mail addresses of the hotel and our managers are reading and responding to e-mails on a daily basis. We hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: The service at this hotel was amazing. The staff went above and beyond. I had requested a single bed non accessible room, but was originally given a double bedded accessible room. When I informed the staff that this was NOT what I requested, nor what I wanted, she set about fixing the problem. I still ended up in a room with two beds, but she gave me 3 choices, and gave me a coupon for a free drink while I waited for my room to be prepared (at 10pm...which seemed a little odd). The room itself was fine, but the floors were dirty. I couldn't walk around without shoes, including in the bathroom. I may stay here again because the location was great and free parking was awesome, but I don't think it deserves the 4.4+ customer review rating it currently has. While the staff was
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us! We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our superb guest services. We would like to sincerely apologize for the unavailability of the room type that you preferred. We always try our best to make requests happen but sometimes circumstances just won't allow it. We have brought the room cleanliness issue to the Housekeeping supervisor's attention and we want you to know that we are taking your feedback seriously and will take necessary actions so as to avoid it from happening again. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss this further. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Really nice surprise!  Walking distance to Disneyland but without the craziness of the family-style hotel.  Quiet, clean.  Close to dining.  Easy and free on-site parking. Has small restaurant on site too but did not eat there. Pool area looked nice but did not visit it.
Manager Response: Dear gypsy_heart_and_soul,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room, parking and our location.  We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: A nice hotel near Disneyland. Free parking, free wifi, fridge in the room, Keurig coffee maker, Aveda soaps & shampoo. The front desk staff is cordial. The room and bathroom were spacious and clean. I have no complaints. There is a CVS across the street and a number of places to eat within walking distance. I would come back to this hotel if I ever return to the God forsaken LA area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Literally 8 minutes away from Disneyland. Also, the decor, cleanliness and customer service is outstanding! I decided to stay in Hotel Indigo based on the reviews I read, and I made the right decision!   Whenever I am in Anaheim, I am staying at Hotel Indigo.
Manager Response: Dear Glendy22,  Thank you for your kind words about Hotel Indigo Anaheim! We are indeed very proud of our staff for going above and beyond in maintaining the cleanliness of our property, and in always delivering great customer service. We are very happy to hear that you had a very pleasant stay and we can't wait to see you back soon!

Summary: Wonderful hotel with the best front desk staff you will find!  The decor is cool and modern and the rooms are clean and comfy. Close to everything and has an on site bar and restaurant. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear NJDels,  We appreciate the time you took to leave a great feedback for our hotel. Our Front Desk staff is indeed the best you will find! Thank you for your kind words, this will surely encourage our Front Desk staff  to deliver an even better service. We are glad that you were able to try Chambers Bar and Bistro as well. Thank you for your recommendation and hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Had a great stay. Front desk staff--especially Emily--were super friendly and accommodating. Restaurant/bar was good and room service was friendly and perfectly on-time. Guest room was modern, clean, and comfortable but noisy (210 is right at top of stairs from lobby and directly above the restaurant/bar/patio). I enjoyed the view of the Disney fireworks but would trade that for a less noisy room next time.
Manager Response: Dear 1_JMJ_9,  Thank you for your compliments about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are proud to have team members like Emily, her genuine care for our guests is outstanding. We are very sorry to hear about the noise issue you encountered. We will take note of this and rest assured that on your next visit, we will make sure to accommodate you in a quieter area. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Loved staying at this hotel. The front desk was very friendly and helpfull. The hotel has a nice modern look. The room and bathroom were excellent. Walking distance to Disney. Only stayed two nights and would have liked to stay longer.
Manager Response: Dear Silfá A,  We appreciate the kind words you have for Hotel Indigo Anaheim! We are glad that our property suited your needs. Know that your kind words about our staff will be shared with them to inspire them even more! We hope to see you soon and next time for a longer stay!

Summary Heading: Best hotel value you will find.  Period!
Summary: Fellow Trippers,  We do TA for a reason, right?  To find great places at even better deals.  Those who stay at the Ritz don't need to use TA.    This is the TA find of the year!  Clean, friendly, spacious rooms, great showers, close to everything Disney, free parking and ridiculously affordable.   Book ahead.  I am sure they are full!
Manager Response: Dear johndstewartsr,  Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We are very delighted to hear your awesome experience with us. We look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Have just stayed 5 nights at this lovely boutique hotel loved location rooms and wonderful helpful staff.  Having had a couple of locations and hotels for our Disney part of a California vacation so glad we chose this one also the restaurant not often mentioned in reviews was extremely yummy and reasonably priced
Manager Response: Dear Suzpea,  We appreciate you taking the time leaving comments about your recent stay with us! We take a lot of pride in our restaurant, Chambers Bar and Bistro, when it comes to quality of food and service. We are glad that our location and rooms suited your needs perfectly. Our staff make us proud, they are some of the bests around! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Our new go-to spot for Disneyland trips!
Summary: This is now going to be our new "go-to" place to stay for our Disneyland trips!  We stayed in a one-bedroom suite and it was very reasonably priced in comparison to other suites around the area.  I am very particular about cleanliness, especially when we're traveling with our kids, and this hotel was clean with super comfy beds.  I loved the modern feel/boutique vibe...and the wood (or laminate) floors were a plus because I HATE dirty carpets in hotels.  This place also offered free parking which is almost impossible to find with hotels around Disneyland.  And, speaking of Disneyland, it was about a 15-minute walk from the hotel to Disneyland's main entrance which is another bonus for us.  Thanks for a wonderful stay Hotel Indigo...we will be back!
Manager Response: Dear yamma33,  We are very happy that you have found your new "go-to" hotel in Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Our staff makes sure that our rooms are in the best condition for out guests, and we are very glad to hear that our rooms exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Stayed here for a few days for my birthday and was not disappointed at all.  Great location, amazing staff. Emily at the front desk is on her game. Friendly and always helpful.   Food at Chambers is very good as well, but it was nice to have the Gardenwalk up the street for a little variety.  Can't say enough good things about this place. It's truly a hidden gem!  I'll be back for NYE!
Manager Response: Dear dropkickchick55,  We are very delighted to hear that you have found Anaheim's hidden gem! We hope that you enjoyed your birthday while staying with us. We take pride in having staff members like Emily, always delivering inspired service. We will see you back on NYE and hopefully your next birthday too!

Summary: I almost don't want to share this because I don't want the "secret" out. I wanted to stay off our conference hotel locations, but be reasonably close. This is hard to do in a place situated in Disney. The hotel itself has kind of a European style to it. I was upgraded to a one room suite which was lovely with two beds, a small living area, plenty of windows and a lovely bathroom. Aveda amenties. The staff are spectacular - helpful and professional. There is a small restaurant that has happy hour, dinner and breakfast, decent food. Free internet - comfortable beds....Perfect stay.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle442013,  Thank you for sharing your great experience with us. We are glad that our location was convenient for you and that our rooms and amenities suited your needs. Lastly, our staff surely appreciates your great feedback about them and this inspires them to deliver even better service to all our guests. Chambers Bar and Bistro is truly a gem and we are glad that you got the chance to try it out. Again, thank you for your great feedback and we are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent place. Clean rooms. Warm pools. Nice housekeeping women. Very friendly staff. Free internet in the rooms plus you can use the terminal with printer in the lobby for free. Free Parking! Walking distance to the Disney Parks.. You can walk to the park. Great food right next door.   5 Stars for recognizing me as a return cutomer.
Manager Response: Dear nobbit2016,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your nice feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. We are glad that you got the chance to utilize our amenities. We always look forward to seeing our return guests. Until next time!

Summary: This Hotel is very modern,very clean.The staff are very courteous and always offer help and attend to your needs.For me the best part are the pillows and sheets.They're so heavenly you would want to stay in bed or take it home.Walking distance to Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Dear Louie V,  Thank you so much for taking time to writing such nice review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: We stayed with young kids for two nights.   Positives : - Very close to Disneyland - can easily walk to it in 10 minutes. Alternatively, 6 dollars by Uber.  - Friendly and accommodating staff. When we encountered some issues with the bed, the staff changed the room for us the next day - good ala carte breakfast options - decent sized room with two double beds, good for a family of 4 if there are young kids - reasonably priced esp compared to Disney hotels  Negatives:  - no lunch options available, however plenty of food options near by  Would recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are glad that you were satisfied with our location and was very pleased with our staff. We take pride in our staff’s hard work to make sure every guest’s stay is as comfortable as possible. In behalf of my team, I want to apologize about not having lunch options on-site, we hope that this has not put you off a return stay with us. On your next visit, feel free to swing by our Front desk to get recommendations from our staff who are very knowledgeable about other great dining options around the area. We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations and look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary Heading: Could be my favorite Anaheim hotel so far!
Summary: Haven't walked to Disney yet, but it's just round the corner from the Red Lion, and that took us 15 mins to the entrance with a 10 and 7 year old. We are staying in a room with 2 queens and a pull out couch. I'll update if the pull out is not comfortable, but so far it seems good. Room is very pleasant, is clean and the staff are extremely helpful.  Room even has hard wood floor!  Pool area is nicely set out, although the pool is not very big. Nice cabana next to the hot tub.  You can see the Disneyland fireworks from the pool area too!   My only complaint would be that the floor doesn't feel that straight so I feel a bit like I'm on a boat!
Manager Response: Dear Zoe K,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you were satisfied with the design of our property, guest services, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologize for the strange feel the room floor gave you; rest assured it will be brought up to our maintenance department’s attention. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel Stay Ever! I Highly Recommend This Location
Summary: Our recent visit to the this hidden Anaheim jewel was one the most memorable experiences in my life. We had 2 rooms on the 1st floor with a nightly view of the Disney fireworks. Easy access to the pool, fitness center & restaurant. The entire staff was the best example of what hospitality should be. Laura set the tone at check-in and throughout the entire stay. The hotel restaurant is reasonably priced and delicious. Also, conveniently located near Disney, PF Changs & Cheesecake Factory. Do yourself a favor and stay at the Hotel Indigo in Anaheim!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is close to Disneyland. It took us 15 min to get there (with kids walking speed). But I've got some complaint from the kids that it's so far at night after they played for the whole day and totally exhausted.  The car parking space is not enough. It's full most of the time.  I can't borrow the adaptor from the hotel that make me so frustrated. But then I found out it's quite common in US that the hotels do not have adaptor lend to the guest. It's quite different to the hotels in Asia that you can easily borrow from the hotels.  The design of the hotel is quite nice and the bed is quite comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear FATC38,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We apologize that you didn’t find a parking spot during your stay and also we could not able to provide an adaptor for you. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We hope that this has not put you off a return stay with us again and we would love to have the opportunity to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: Red Sox won on Sunday so I'm in a good mood for this review.  The hotel is well kept, clean, and the staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms do not have much in the way of noise dampening, thankfully things were quiet near my 4th floor location, but even corridor conversations were readily audible. I suspect this would be very annoying for rooms on the busier 1st floor or if you had rowdy neighbors.
Manager Response: Dear Sbrmatt,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This hotel is a 15 minute walk from the gates of Disneyland! It is surrounded by great restaurants and there's a CVS, a Walgreen's and a 7-11 on the corner. I was concerned about walking back to the hotel late at night, but found it to be very safe, well lit and well traveled. (Think about the Vegas strip...always crowded and well lit.)   Each night, when we got back to the hotel, we would grab a drink and a snack from the "grab and go" area and then charge it to the room. When checking out, I was pleasantly surprised to see  that these were really cheap. (Not your overpriced hotel food)  Our room was on the fourth floor (which is the top floor.) We found it to be mostly quiet. The gentlemen working the front desk at night were very nice and helpful. The parking was free.
Manager Response: Dear ronandcheryl,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We apologize that we did not replace the glasses for you during your stay. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Cute, comfortable hotel perfect for Disney
Summary: On the strip of hotels within 10-15 minute walk from Disney this definitely looks like one of the best options available. Most of the hotels very close to Disney look very basic motel-style accommodation but Hotel Indigo has an extra level of quality while not breaking the bank. We checked in for our 3 night stay and were greeted by some of the friendliest staff we had come across over our whole 2 week trip. Of the few members of staff we spoke to over our stay they were all felt genuinely friendly. The location is great if you don't mind the small walk to Disney. There's also a little entertainment complex nearby with some restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory (highly recommended). There's also a 7-eleven just down the street for after-park snacks.  Other pros- free parking!
Manager Response: Dear Chris M,  Thank you very much for your detailed and nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Our team works daily with a professional and friendly attitude to give the best service as all the guests of each hotel deserve. Your valuable words make us so proud of what we do. We all look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: This hotel was great for the price.  Super close to Disneyland and the Angels stadium.  Very nice street with a Bubba Gumps within walking distance.  It had laminate floors which I like much better than germy carpet.  Room was a little small but overall very nice and comfortable beds.  Also had a parking garage.  That was nice after having to pay to valet park everywhere in LA for a few days.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle L,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. It’s great to hear that you enjoyed your time with us particularly our location, room, and complimentary self-parking service. Thanks again and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Within walking distance to Disneyland and short drive to Angels Stadium.  It's been recently updated and has a retro vibe.  Not much of a lobby or bar/restaurant and it closes early. Rooms are small but clean.  Overall a nice hotel.  Nothing real fancy but the options around Disney don't appear to be high end to begin with.
Manager Response: Dear JayDubbATX,  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay here with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We sincerely hope to have an opportunity to welcome you again soon in our property.

Summary: Myself, husband and 2 children spent 5 nights at Hotel Indigo earlier this month to take in Disneyland and LA.  Having done much research before our trip we booked Hotel Indigo based on reviews and were not disappointed.  We really liked this hotel and would definitely recommend it.  It is perfectly situated for Disneyland being a short 5-10 minute walk away.  It is close to good restaurants and and CVS.  Rooms were modern, clean and staff were courteous and helpful.  Just one thing I feel I should point out.  We booked the room and breakfast option which gives 2 vouchers per day for breakfast (there were 4 of us).  Breakfast is NOT a self serve buffet type.  It is served in the small restaurant in the hotel and you can choose 1 drink and 1 breakfast option for 2 people from the
Manager Response: Dear Aim10,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review following your recent visit. As much valued guests we are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Comments such as this provide great motivation for the team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: An Affordable Gem in Anaheim/Disneyland Resort Area
Summary: Our family of five arrived at this attractive little hotel on July 4, 2016 with great expectations.  This was to be our hotel for the next 4 nights while we visited Disneyland and the Los Angeles area.  I had originally booked the nearby Residence Inn in Garden Grove but changed my reservation to this hotel about a month before our arrival.  I am so glad I did!  I had seen many photos of this hotel online as was drawn to it's hip, trendy, kind of quirky look; something about this place just looked fun. It's location is ideal. Located a little less than a mile from the Disneyland entrance, it's an easy walk to the parks along wide, well-traveled sidewalks. It is also surrounded by MANY restaurants, fast food joints, and convenience stores so there is something for everyone with
Manager Response: Dear WDB,  We are taken aback by your superb and detailed review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our property. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. Only 10-15min walk from Disneyland! Our room was amazing. Two queens, hard wood floor, standing shower no bathtubs. I noticed how tall the toilet and sink are for toddlers so I asked for a stepping stool. On the first night we slept in a nice soft/firm mattress. So Comfortable!! The next morning after my shower I noticed little ants in the bathroom near the toilet. We immediately told the front desk, they offered us compliment beverages and services to clean the room. That day we went to California Adventure and came back to the room, to meet my brother and sister in law. Upon leaving I told the front desk again that there are ants still there in room 232 😒 they offered to upgrade us to a suite. I told them we will think about it and will come back after
Manager Response: Dear 45thieryp,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are happy to read that you are satisfied with our room. We apologize for the ants you found in the sink. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We hope that this has not put you off a return stay with us again and we would love to have the opportunity to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: We booked a family studio and they gave us a queen bed room with two queen beds that was different from the photos of the room we booked in the booking web site and when we protest the said that they call this room a family studio and that booking missed up the photos
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us and bringing these issues to our attention. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.   Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: I LOVED THIS HOTEL, SO ALLERGY FRIENDLY :) and super close to Disney
Summary: This hotel was like a magic find!  The hotel appeared to be so small by it's lobby, but oh my, it was the best ever.  The attention for allergies was something I have Never seen.  They had wood floors, no yucky carpet to collect all those dust mites and I could go on and on.  The kids enjoyed the pool after all day at Disney, (which was a really short walk).  We generally had breakfast and dinner there.  Their meals were large and I must say fantastic.  People came in to eat, not just the ones who were staying there. although it's a small eating area.  I would for sure stay there again if we went to Disneyland.  I forgot to say the staff was fantastic and we loved the wash clothes made up to look like elephants.  What a treat.
Manager Response: Dear NenaOregon,  Thank you so much for your nice review on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay here with us. We always appreciate it when our guests point out our guest services and our foods at the restaurant. We hope that you may have a return visit to Anaheim very soon!

Summary: I stayed in one of the 2 queen bed family studio rooms, which as the title indicates has 2 queen beds plus a fold-out queen bed sofa.  What I had wanted when I made the reservation on the hotel's website was one of the suite rooms, which has a bedroom with 2 queen beds or 1 king bed, plus a living room area with a queen fold-out sofa.  The pictures in the "View Gallery" of the website are not labeled, adding to the confusion.  The room was clean and modern, the parking is free, the pool area is nice, the hot tub spa there is very warm, and the staff were friendly and helpful.  My only complaints are about the website not being well designed to show what the different room types offer and that if you view the room picture, you must start over to fill in the reservation info, and
Manager Response: Dear DenverHolly,  Hotel Indigo Anaheim would like to thank you for choosing us. We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor’s readers and travelers. We apologize that it does not have any description on the gallery on our brand web site. However, if you click “book now”, there will be detailed descriptions on each room type before you make a reservation.   Again, thank you very much for staying with us and we do believe that our duty is to create a memorable stay for our special guests.

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo for the first four nights of our California holiday. The hotel was really easy to find, had good parking facilities and the reception area was fresh and welcoming. We had a room with two Queen beds which had a view overlooking the pool and apparently gave views of the fireworks at Disneyland, although we were at the parks for the fireworks so couldn't put this to the test. The room was really spacious, clean and nicely decorated. We had a pizza from the bar on the first night which was nice, and we ate breakfast in the hotel one morning which was also good. The only slight moan I would have is that the WiFi wasn't particularly reliable or strong, which didn't go down well.with my two daughters! Other than that one small gripe, I woukd definitely
Manager Response: Dear ScottAshworth,  On behalf of the entire team at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, we would like to thank you for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. As we strive to provide personalized and caring service to all our guests, we are glad to hear you have enjoyed this experience. It is very rewarding when this has been achieved and our efforts are so kindly appreciated. Hope to welcome you back at Hotel Indigo Anaheim in the near future!

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for Disney Land and surrounding area
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights and we were really pleased with its location, price, cleanliness and room decor. The hotel is a 5 minute walk from the Disneyland front gate along a well lit and used roadway. The price was lower than other surrounding hotels. The hotel has either been recently renovated or the maintenance and cleaning staff are outstanding. Our room was clean, nothing looked shabby and the shower was not full of mildew and stains like most hotels. My wife lamented the fact that other hotels we stayed at during our vacation were not as nice or affordable. Well done!
Manager Response: Dear Paul N,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with everything in the hotel.   It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Free Parking, Reasonable Pet Fee
Summary: We stayed here to go to Disneyland. The room was pretty, though a little small, so we are returning and will get a suite! We were walking distance from Disneyland. The beds were comfortable and I slept well every night. The staff was friendly and helpful. The free parking and pet fees made this hotel more affordable than it appears.
Manager Response: Dear eliza5000,  Thank you for share your wonderful staying experience with us. We are glad to know that our attentive service and excellent location have made your stay a pleasant experience. We are very much looking forward to welcoming you back during your next trip in Anaheim!

Summary: My first time in a Hotel Indigo and I must say I would definitely recommend it  The room was great with modern decor and two queen beds etc I had a Disney view and watched the fireworks from our room at night  Staff were very friendly and went out of their way to make sure we had a great stay The hotel has a small bistro bar which has a bar menu and also serves breakfast  There is a laundry room and  computers to use if required Only downside was the size of the pool  Well located only 5 minutes walk from Disney  Dining out try Bubba Gumps and Cheesecake factory which are within five minutes walk  Enjoy !!
Manager Response: Dear amhs1959,  We thank you very much for your nice feedback. We are extremely delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We dare to hope shall you ever come back to Anaheim will choose to stay with us again!

Summary: My family regularly visits Disneyland (2-3 times a year) and as we are normal folks we stay somewhere outside the park.   This year we were looking for an upgrade to where we usually stay (more space, newer property, more amenities, same distance) and we selected the Indigo. It was a great decision.   We stayed in a suite to accommodate the number of people in our party. It was clean, extremely spacious, had a door between the living area and bedrooms, and the bathroom was large, clean, and updated. Despite the number of people we had, we never felt crowded. The hotel staff was friendly, accommodating, and pleasant to work with.   NOTE: My one comment is I wouldn't take their offer for transportation. The price quoted from the hotel differed from what we were actually charged -
Manager Response: Dear hoorayfarray,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to note that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We tried this hotel as an alternative to staying at Disney's Grand Californian, & I'm glad we did. The price, service, & cleanliness were great. We wanted to get to the park right away, so I was happy that the front desk quickly arranged to hold our luggage & gave us a key for parking. Later, when we returned from the park, our room was ready. There is a safe large enough to store a laptop in (see photo) in the closet. The bathroom has a spa shower with 2 shower heads  (1 handheld). The toiletries  (soaps, shampoo, conditioner, lotion, mouthwash) are Aveda. There is a Keurig with a good selection of coffee & tea, including herbal tea in case your throat is scratchy from a day at the park. The decor is sleek & modern, with dark laminate wood floors. The only problem was that we
Manager Response: Dear Christina S,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We apologize for the noise coming from outside the street. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: The location was very good, 5 minutes walk to the parks. The breakfast was a gem, very nice selections. The room was clean and comfortable. Spacious bathroom, the lighting was nice for doing makeup every morning.
Manager Response: Dear Zesi C,  Thank you for taking time to write a review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to hear that you have enjoyed your stay here with us. We aim to delight to provide all our guest with highest standards in service and hospitality and we are glad you had a great time in Hotel Indigo Anaheim!   We look forward to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Hotel Indigo
Summary: I have stayed at the Hotel Indigo last year for VidCon. This year, I chose to stay there again, even though there was a more affordable choice(s). I was willing to pay more because of the staff and knowing that the rooms were going to be up to my standards and that I would not have to worry about anything except enjoying the hotel when I was actually in the room. This hotel is solid and I will go back again when I am in the area. If you are reading this and are not sure if you should stay, let me make it pretty simple. Stay here. You won't be sorry.
Manager Response: Dear Josh Z,  Thank you very much for staying at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and for your kind comments posted on TripAdvisor and for recommending our hotel. We really appreciate your nice feedback on our guest services and room. Our team certainly looks forward to welcome you back, hopefully soon!

Summary: I'm a little torn about writing this review... I absolutely loved the room, bed, hospitality, and location, but don't want everyone to know!!!  Arthur at the front desk was incredible, super accommodating and friendly. This will be my hotel every time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jake B,  Hotel Indigo Anaheim would like to thank you for choosing us. We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor’s readers and travelers. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our guest services. We do believe that our duty is to create a memorable stay for our special guests.

Summary Heading: Family-friendly, and at a convenient distance to the theme parks
Summary: In a town with plenty of chain and family hotels, the Hotel Indigo seemed like a breath of fresh air.  We arrived after sunset after having been caught in weekend freeway traffic, and were glad for a comfortable room to rest.  Even though it's a  boutique hotel (I think), we didn't feel out of place as a family of four.  In fact, we actually felt that the vibrant colours and motifs used for the rooms were a nice contrast to the usual decor of most other hotels.  Our room also faced (albeit at a bit of an angle) the direction of the theme parks where the nightly fireworks display occurred.  Breakfast was a pleasant affair and it was nice to be able to take it as a leisurely pace.  A number of eating places were also found just round the corner - good for lunch or dinner, and it
Manager Response: Dear ianwyj,  Thank you so much for your detailed review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were satisfied with our property. It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at hotel indigo Anaheim
Summary: It was indeed a pleasant experience at hotel indigo. The twins bed suite was really great value for the money. Very clean and comfy beds. The staff were very helpful, nice and polite and to their utmost efforts to make our stay a home away from home. Many thanks to Arthur for his help and support. The location is really awesome and very close to Disney Land. It is also surrounded by restaurants and cafes. It is my second stay at indigo and I'd definetly come back again
Manager Response: Dear C6060TJahmedb,  It is both heartwarming and humbling to receive such accolades from you. We can’t tell you how much it means to each and every one of us. So thank you for your words of encouragement. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Continues to be a great option for area amusement parks
Summary: This is my second review of the Hotel Indigo, my family liked it so much we returned this year when we returned to Anaheim.  We stayed for three days and used Hotel Indigo as our base for both Disney’s California Adventure and Knott’s Berry Farm.  For starters this hotel is very reasonably priced, especially considering its proximity to Disneyland.  It is only a short 5-10 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, and having free parking makes it a much less cumbersome option to parking in the Disney lots.  Also the trip to Knott’s was a reasonable 15 minute drive away.  The rooms are clean with laminate floors and a rug at the beds.  The showers are great following a day at the park because they have a wand for giving the small kids a shower and are pretty good sized to be able
Manager Response: Dear iroamaround67801,  Many thanks for your recent feedback for our hotel. We are delighted that you found our services to be great. We appreciate your recognition and feedback and will be sure to pass this on to our team. We do hope we can be of service to you again, if and when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying for my birthday at this hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful, rooms were spacious and clean. The hotel is situated in a nice area within walking distance from Disneyland and several other things to do. Very modern and nice place to stay and highly recommend visiting if looking to visit Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Manuel S,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to note that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This was our first visit to the Hotel Indigo. A great Hotel, really friendly and helpful staff. We asked for a quiet room, we got room 131 at the back of the hotel. Not much of a view but it was really quiet. Rooms are very modern, clean and comfortable beds, and a great shower.   The hotel is situated within a 10 min walk away from Disney. Bubba Gumps restaurant is only a couple doors up from the hotel. Plenty of restaurants very close by. Pool is small but all you need to relax. Ask for the meal discount booklet for discounts at all the local restaurants.   Universal is approx 1 hour 15 mins away in busy traffic. Knots berry farm is approx 20 mins drive away. There is a Walmart approx 10 min drive away.   A great all round hotel in a nice neighbourhood.
