Manager Response: Dear Robert C,  Thank you for taking the time to share your great review with us on TripAdvisor. It has been our honor to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We certainly hope that we will be able to welcome you back again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Clean, modern, friendly, excellent Disney option
Summary: Excellent hotel.  In fact so nice, I expect everyone will discover it, and it'll be twice as expensive next year.  Room was spacious and very clean.  I'm so glad hotels are moving towards the wood floors, it feels so much cleaner than skanky hotel carpet.  Bathroom large and very modern, with large stall shower.   Staff was very nice, and helpful with directions.  Gave me an option of top floor room without fireworks view or third floor room with fireworks.  CVS across the street was very convenient for loading up on snacks for the next day.  A few things to consider if traveling with kids.  Not negatives, just something to consider....Bathroom just has shower, not bathtub, and the sink is one of those mod basin sinks that is a bit above the bathroom counter, so if you have
Manager Response: Dear damnedifyoudo,  Thank you for your review and compliments. We are sorry if you experienced any challenges concerning the air-conditioning. We are glad despite this experience you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will give us the opportunity of welcoming you back here next time you plan a trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I have stayed here twice in the past two years and i don't often review twice but felt this well worth the time too.  Another great stay if only even for one night. Hotel is clean tidy and has a good welcome feel to it and will it was brief stay i left thinking i wish i had another night.  Thank you all
Manager Response: Dear David T,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with everything in the hotel.   It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel!  Couldn't have asked for more.
Summary: I recently spent a week in Anaheim attending a conference at their convention center. My traveling companion and I chose this hotel even though it meant we had to walk a ways to the convention center. I love IHG hotels but this is my first time in a Hotel Indigo. I loved this hotel.   When we arrived we had an early flight so we got there before check-in. They did not have our rooms ready but offered to let us "pre-check in" so when we came back from lunch all we had to do was grab room keys. They stored my suitcase for me and were very cordial. My traveling companion unfortunately had a suitcase that did not arrive with us.   When we came back, the desk staff recognized us and even though there were several other people who had just arrived to check in, they pulled us to the
Manager Response: Dear Steve H,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our location, room, and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice option wishing walking range to Disney parks
Summary: I selected the hotel to use my frequent traveller points, and I was greatly surprised. First, the location is excellent. I takes 10/15 minutes to walk to the parks entrance. Rooms and the general set up of the hotel are great, everything convenient at a great price. Parking was free. There's no breakfast included in the rate, this was my single complaint.
Manager Response: Dear Argonza,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review following your recent visit. As much valued guests we are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Comments such as this provide great motivation for the team. Regards to the breakfast, we do sell vouchers at front desk if your reservation does not include breakfast.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is a small hotel. I really don't have an issue with that. It's nicely appointed, has adequate parking and is well kept. Our room and bathroom were spacious and clean. There is a small onsite restaurant. This hotel is located close to Disneyland, though they do not offer a shuttle to the park. I have a normal go to hotel for the Disneyland area but I wanted to try something different and I'm glad that I tried The Indigo. Next time I visit the area, I plan to stay again and I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear deedeeg123,  Hotel Indigo Anaheim would like to thank you for choosing us. We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor’s readers and travelers. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our guest services. We do believe that our duty is to create a memorable stay for our special guests.

Summary: Hotel is walking distance to Disneyland Resorts. We could park car in underground garage the day we drove to Anaheim even though we werent staying there until that evening. Sam thing at the end after we checked out but were still at Disneyland. The rooms are excellent-very upscale-comfortable beds, refrigerator, coffee maker, luxurious bathroom with shower. Staff was gracious and friendly. Large pool on site. We would stay there again. Price was very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Joan F,  We would like to thank you for choosing us for your trip to Anaheim. We appreciate the time you took to share your thoughts and write your lovely review. We are please you have enjoyed your stay, especially our room and guest services. We are grateful for your feedback as it will serve as a further source of inspiration for all of us to aim for even higher standards of hospitality excellence.   Thank you again for being our guest, we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Nice room, great shower.  View of the fireworks however was not really much of a view we could only see part of them over the wall of the parking garage.  Our reservation was messed up but they fixed it.  Happy hour is great and cheap. Bartenders very friendly.   Perfect for a trip to Disney, not many kids which was great as well.
Manager Response: Dear happysun16,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with our guest services in the hotel.   It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary: We have stayed at Hotel Indigo a few times in the past and have ALWAYS had a very enjoyable stay.  Our last visit was no exception.  We had five adults and our 18 month old granddaughter.  We had an excellent room (suite) and the housekeeping staff promptly satisfied our numerous request.  We love the location of this property.  It is walking distance to the Disney parks and has many nearby food options $-$$-$$$. Parking was included and very secure.  The front desk staff was always very cheerful and quick to assist us with any request we made. We would highly recommend this hotel if you are planning to stay in the area!
Manager Response: Dear Joe R,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our property and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here while visiting the Honda Center in Anaheim. Room was quiet and clean! Location was convenient to shops and restaurants as well. Would stay again and because of the experience look forward to finding another Hotel Indigo to enjoy
Manager Response: Dear james p,  Greeting from Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Thank you for staying with us and for the time you have taken to share your feedback and experience. Your compliment were extremely inspiring and we were delighted to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us!  We hope that we can welcome you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: Once again .great hotel . Great service. Great people.  Like always this is my favorite hotel. I ALWAYS RELAX in this hotel indigo. Is close to everything. Good staff .friendly front desk.  The rooms are nice and very clean. Housekeeping staff very helpfull and friendly always with a smile to help. Nice and clean. I love it. Keep it up hotel Indigo. And thank you ill be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Jhon T,  Thank you for commenting on Hotel Indigo Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to reach such a lovely review. We are glad to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Your positive words will definitely motive us to strive even harder to ensure you have an unforgettable experience with us in the future.  We look forward to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Great budget hotel within walking distance of Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed here for one night in August 2015.  Will be returning again in August 2016.    Rented the large family suite and it was very clean and quiet.  I think I was on the top floor IIRC so no one above us - or if there was someone we never heard them.  Wireless works spotty at the ends of the property but is good in the lobby.    We had breakfast included in our rate but they don't serve until 6:30 am which is tough if you want to get to the park in time for extra magic hour (our next nights were in a Disney property).  Kitchen had a snafu and it took them 28 minutes to make a breakfast burrito - which was what they said would be the fastest menu item.    Anyway, I think this is the best hotel near the parks if you want to spend less than $180 or so per night.  The nearby
Manager Response: Dear TravelF00I,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in August!

Summary: This is a complete re-do property and the :new" product is just fine.   Except for one thing.  And to me it's a big one.  I enjoy a fairly hot shower (warmer than warm but not really hot)...and they failed to deliver.  I took a shower at 830pm and again at 5am.  So if the hot water tank was depleted due to families using it in the evening that definitely was not a problem at 5am.  It takes a good 10 minutes for hot water to arrive to the 4th floor and even then it's not that hot.  Second, my bill arrived by email not that day or even the next but three days later.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce D,。  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay with us. We are truly concerned about your dissatisfaction regarding to the hot water issue and your bill arrived three days later. Please be assured that your feedback has been shared with our department head for investigation and follow up. Please do contact us directly if you would like to share more detailed with us.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff do not make a great stay.
Summary: I had reserved a Deluxe room which was extra. When I arrived, I was told they could not accommodate my reservation and gave me  a room with street view complete with sound effects. The first morning sounded like a gym was located above my room. The second morning, check out time was 11am but the "free Wi-Fi" had been turned off Adding insult to injury, the in-room coffee make was also turned off. But it does have a great location and a friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Ybarry45,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you are satisfied with our location and guest services. We apologize for the noise that came from the street. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: My family stayed 6 nights at this hotel in Anaheim recently. The property was very stylish upscale new looking, and clean. I was pleasantly surprised with the decor of the rooms and hotel. I suffer from allergies so it was nice to see hard wood floors in the rooms instead of carpet. The beds were very comfy too.  I would like to express my gratitude to Cleo the general manager for going out of her way and accommodating my family with a better room. She made us feel very welcome and was very sincere....something you don't see too often. On our last night the elevator went down (first occurrence) and we had to walk the stairs, the staff and management handled the situation nicely. So thank you Indigo for making our stay great. I also want to give a hand to the front girl who
Manager Response: Dear Mauka H,  Greeting from Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Thank you for staying us and for the time you have taken to share your feedback and experience. Your compliment were extremely inspiring and we were delighted to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us!  We hope that we can welcome you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: An absolutely excellent choice for anyone wanting to stay close to Disneyland.  The reception staff are super friendly & welcoming & the rooms are very clean & comfortable (we have just completed a 3 week tour of California staying in 6 hotels & the Indigo's beds were the most comfortable of all those we stayed in). Breakfast is good & served efficiently for anyone wanting to leave early to get to Disney.   Good restaurants all within a 5 minute walk also surround the property.  This hotel has a great vibe about it, offers excellent value & i highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear markatepsom,  Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: We chose this hotel on a last minute Disney trip.  we were there from 06/02-06/16.   We loved the fact that it had free parking and wifi and free breakfast if you upgrade to a suite.  if you want to save on breakfast then i suggest to buy this package ahead of time because they cannot do the change at the hotel.  BECOME A MEMBER AS WELL and you will get a better rate.  The beds were beyond comfy and the room was clean and the bathroom was modern.  our original room was 320 and it faced the hotel next door.  because we were there for 4 nights, justyn went out of her way to show us room 228 and moved us there so we can have the view of the fireworks at night.  the lot next door is still vacant but i'm sure in time this will change when a new hotel will be built in this site.  this
Manager Response: Dear hazel d,  We are taken aback by your superb detailed review of your recent stay. We are grateful for the wonderful things you have said about our property. Our team works daily with a professional and friendly attitude to give the best service as all the guests of each hotel deserve. Your valuable words make us so proud of what we do. We all look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay. Price was very reasonable (especially considering it's located across the street from Disneyland). Very clean and spacious room. And the staff were incredibly nice and helpful. The restaurant downstairs is reasonably priced  - the eggs Benedict were well prepared. Don't pass this one by.
Manager Response: Dear Rick D,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable, with a good location for Disney
Summary: Stayed here to attend a graduation in Orange, so wanted a hotel that was convenient to Disney, but didn't have to be RIGHT there, as we only planned for one day at the park.  After pouring over reviews for days, chose Indigo for its nice reviews, reasonable rates, and good location.  Any hotel this close to Disneyland is going to have lots of families with small children, but nevertheless the hotel was pleasant and quiet.  Both check in and check out were handled seamlessly - possibly the fastest check in I've ever experienced.  Although we didn't find the staff especially "smiley," they were helpful and efficient, which was appreciated after some long days sightseeing and shopping.  The rooms were very clean, pleasantly lit, and very comfortable.  Nothing particularly fancy,
Manager Response: Dear Gavin D,  Thank you very much for your detailed and nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Our team works daily with a professional and friendly attitude to give the best service as all the guest deserve. Your valuable words make us so proud of what we do. We all look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary Heading: Great customer service and HELLA cl
Summary: Absolutely enjoyed my stay here, the staff was super chill and attentive. I have a 2 year old son that I took to Disneyland for the first time and the front desk staff (Arturo and the girls ) were sooo nice. Helped out with the warming up the milk, directions, everything. You can tell that they prioritize in keeping everything spotless. The rooms were a bit on the small size but the level of comfort and how clean they kept everything made it bigger. Thank you all for making my stay so care free and pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear billayee,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for the time you have taken to share your comments. We are delighted to learn that your stay was enjoyable and we are grateful for your kind comments which we have shared with the entire team. We feel so proud to have you with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great and within walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: I was only here for one night but I was very impressed by the hotel!  We attempted to check in around 8:30am, but of course the room wasn't ready, which was totally fine since we were headed to Disney right away.  The front desk was SUPER friendly at check in. They also stored our luggage for us while we had fun at Disneyland.  When we returned they had keys ready for us and retrieved our luggage.    The room itself was very nice!  The beds were comfy and the large bathroom was great and had an excellent updated shower.  The walk to Disneyland is about 20 mins so the location is very convenient.  We were only in California for a quick trip but I did notice that the hotel was next to a few fast food restaurants and a pharmacy which is nice.  Very happy with our stay and really
Manager Response: Dear Lonsum55,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for the time you have taken to share your comments. We are delighted to learn that your stay was enjoyable and we are grateful for your kind comments which we have shared with the entire team. We feel so proud to have you with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a Disneyland visit.
Summary: The location of this hotel is close to Disneyland, restaurants/fast food and 24hr mini marts... making it very convenient during our stay. The staff was very helpful and accommodating, especially Arthur (the manager on duty) and Emily (the front desk clerk). Both were awesome. Our room was clean and comfortable, the bathroom was spacious and the shower was large. Mini fridge and coffee maker came in handy. Overall we had a wonderful experience at the Hotel Indigo.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear _dljkmms,  Greeting from Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Thank you for staying with us and for the time you have taken to share your feedback and experience. Your compliment were extremely inspiring and we were delighted to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us!  We hope that we can welcome you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: I chose this hotel for a recent Disney weekend for my daughter and I based on reviews, price, and location. Right around the corner from Disneyland. You could walk but we took a quick Uber. Room was clean, well decorated, Keurig and fridge in room. Staff very friendly, and parking in gated underground lot which was free, as well as Wi-fi. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear ksjr2007,  Many thanks for writing such a wonderful review following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are indeed grateful for your kind feedback and delighted your stay was enjoyable.   We hope to welcome you back anytime soon!

Summary: This is my third stay at the Hotel Indigo and it was a very pleasant stay, as usual. As a Royal Spire member of IHG hotels, they went out of their way to recognize me, but I noticed they also attended to all guests in the same manner.  So regardless of the importance of the guest, everyone receives above and beyond service.  I was there for business and the location was only a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: Dear Bennett C,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to note that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We have been here on 3 different occasions and I have to say that they keep improving when it comes to customer service  and the restaurant. I mean everyone just greets you and always asks how we are doing everyday. The restaurant's menu and quality of food improved tremendously since we first stayed here back in October ( we dined here every morning-- got the celebrate family package-- and also every night) ---and their staff was always checking on our table. I have to say that they really aim to please. The rooms are clean and modern and we love their spacious bathrooms with all the Aveda products (I hate small and old looking bathrooms that some hotels have). Parking is free and I like how you have to have a room key to be able to get in the gated underground parking--your
Manager Response: none

Summary: We researched for a long time, deciding which hotel to stay in and we were very pleased to have chosen this one. We got an upgrade to a suite with the view of the fireworks (we didn't actually leave Disneyland till after midnight every night so the view was left unviewed ;)) we even got a hand drawn card from the staff at front desk, as we were celebrating our one year wedding anniversary on this trip. The service was fantastic, in every department, they booked us taxis, gave great advice for dining out etc etc The hotel is a brisk 15 minute walk from the entrance to the Disney parks. Close by there are convenience stores and a few diners. Parking on site was available. The car rental places are close by so optimal location for all around. It was our second Indigo hotel in US
Manager Response: Dear BlondeBunny,  Many thanks for your recent feedback for our hotel. We are delighted that you found our services to be great. We appreciate your recognition and feedback and will be sure to pass this on to our team. We do hope we can be of service to you again, if and when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel Indigo is our new favorite when visiting Disneyland.  The customer service is outstanding and personable which is rare these days.  Our room was clean and quiet.  We stayed on the 4th floor.  The walk to the entrance of Disneyland takes about 15 minutes.  Price with a AAA discount was very reasonable.  Parking is tight, but who cares because it's free.  The hotel also let us stay parked on the last day of our visit.
Manager Response: Dear SAF714,  Thank you very much for your kind review on TripAdvisor. We are really grateful that you took the time to support us and really glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is really rewarding for us to know that you appreciated our personalized service. We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again in our property and in the meantime we wish you a lovely day!

Summary: Awesome hotel right next to Disneyland at a way more reasonable price. Beautifully remodeled with really neat finishes.  Amazing spa-like tiled shower (no tub, at least in our room) with Aveda toiletries.  Secure, gated, underground parking. Nice pool, hot tub and patio area. Restaurant/lounge area right off the lobby with wonderful and reasonably-priced meals. Within walking distance of many other restaurants and shops, as well as DISNEYLAND. Plus: the first 2-3 rooms on each floor facing the pool have a great view of the 9:30 PM Disney fireworks if you don't happen to be in the park that day. I will definitely stay here on my next trip to Anaheim. It would be cheaper and give us additional privacy to get two rooms with adjoining door for us and our three kids, rather than five
Manager Response: Dear Kelly B,  Thank you for commenting on Hotel Indigo Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to reach such a lovely review. We are glad to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Your positive words will definitely motive us to strive even harder to ensure you have an unforgettable experience with us in the future.   We look forward to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Rooms are modern, clean and very comfortable. Pool and hot tub are maintained and enjoyable to use. The staff are top notch!!!  The kitchen prepares excellent food!  We stayed there 2 years ago and Arthur remembered us from the last time we stayed there... They truly care about making your stay the best! There is a shuttle to and from Disney, but without it, it is a short walk, approximately 10 mins.
Manager Response: Dear Montgrand_Girls,  Hotel Indigo Anaheim would like to thank you for choosing us. We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor readers and travelers. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our guest services. We do believe that our duty is to create a memorable stay for our special guests.

Summary: I've stayed at the Indigo twice already and absolutely love it. It's by far one of the cleanest and most comfortable hotels I've stayed at on Disney property for a great price. Everybody is so friendly and welcoming! Great happy hour. Only a 15 min walk to Disneyland, and 5 to a variety of yummy restraunts at the Garden Walk.
Manager Response: Dear Sara S,  We would like to thank you for choosing us for your trip to Anaheim. We appreciate that time you took to share your thoughts and write your lovely review. We are pleased you have enjoyed your stay, especially our guest services, location, and foods. We are grateful for your feedback as it will serve as a further source of inspiration for all of us to aim for even higher standards of hospitality excellence.   Thank you again for being our guest, we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to the parks
Summary: This hotel is really nice and updated. There's a small bar and restaurant in the lobby and there is a pool and fitness center. This hotel has interior corridors which is unusual for hotels in this price range near Disneyland. We were in a room on the bottom floor with a fireworks view and when we first checked in I thought there was no way we would be able to see the fireworks because our view was of a wall and the entrance to the parking garage. We were surprised at what a great view we had of the fireworks, if you are lucky enough to get an upper floor fireworks view room the view would be even better. I was able to hear the people above us walking around since this hotel has "wood" floors. It was a pretty quick walk to the parks (less than a mile)
Manager Response: Dear sdchickie,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review following your recent visit. As much valued guests we are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Comments such as this provide great motivation for the team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Room was clean, staff were helpful and friendly. Bar food was tasty. Perfect walking distance to Disneyland for our weekend visit with the kids. Pool was small but nice and the kids loved it. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear sunsetseeker18,  We would like to thank you for choosing us for your trip to Anaheim. We appreciate the time you took to share your thoughts and write your lovely review. We are pleased you have enjoyed your stay, especially our guest services. We are grateful for your feedback as it will serve as a further source of inspiration for all of us to aim for even higher standards of hospitality excellence.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and guest room. Helpful & friendly staff. Housekeeping did an awesome job each day. Good food in the restaurant. Pool, spa  and grounds were well kept. This hotel was perfect for our week long stay in Anaheim.  Highly recommended!!
Manager Response: Dear Kelli C,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with our guest services, housekeeping, foods, and facilities in the hotel.   It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary: We've been so california couple times to bring our son to disneyland and we always try to get a nice affordable hotel but we always get a wrong one but finally we found Indigo hotel.its affordable price but even if  they are expensive I will still stay here because their staff is the most friendlist approachable staff we ever encounter. the service is magnificent! we will surely comeback again. thank you guys for making our stay so welcomed & memorable! its absolutely A+++ wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Small, hip, and modern hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff. It is a small and modern hotel very well located for near by restaurants. I would totally recommend staying at this hotel if you don't mind the 15 minutes walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Mani1810,  Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Our team works daily with a professional and friendly attitude to give the best service as all the guests of each hotel deserve. Your valuable words make us so proud of what we do. We all look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: We booked Indigo because we wanted a nice place near Disneyland. Walking distance but still quiet and private. Indigo was an excellent choice. The service was very good and the free parking helped a lot in this area. The gym is small but exists and the pool area is nice if you want to relax a bit. Nothing fancy though. The room is modern and clean. We liked the style very much and would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear opiarmus,  Greeting from Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Thank you for staying with us and for the time you have taken to share your feedback and experience. Your compliment were extremely inspiring and we were delighted to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us! We hope that we can welcome you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: We checked in last Friday with our twin 9yr olds for a weekend at Disney and would definitely stay here again. Room was a good size, loved that it was modern and very clean. Really appreciated the nice carpet-less floors and iPhone/clock station. Wifi was great and free-a special thanks for letting us keep our car in the lot after we checked out so we could finish our last day at the park. We used the pool and jacuzzi, and although small, modern and well done. We actually walked back for a couple hrs to swim and have dinner and then headed back for the night and it was fine. Had dinner the first night at CPK and it was great walking distance to Anaheim garden walk, nice to have the option if you want out of the parks. Would recommend coffee/tea for the lobby though.
Manager Response: Dear fushiamartini,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for the time you have taken to share your comments. We are delighted to learn that your stay was enjoyable and we are grateful for your kind comments which we have shared with the entire team. We feel so proud to have you with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very clean and modern small hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: The room was updated and very clean.  Very decent restaurant in the lobby for breakfast and lunch. Disneyland was a close 10 minute walk from the hotel.  A couple blocks away from Roy's of Hawaii for dinner!  Highly suggest giving that a try also.  Amazing seafood.  A number of other restaurant options close by.
Manager Response: Dear DonHutchins,  Thank you for the time you have taken to share your comments and for staying with us. We are glad to know that you liked our hotel and it is also great to know that you especially enjoyed food at our restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim in the near future.

Summary: Laura and Ivonne were amazing! The staff was so warm, friendly, and inviting.  The rooms were clean and relatively spacious. There is free underground parking - huge bonus! And it's within walking distance of Disneyland (about 3 blocks) and several restaurants. Also, if you want to eat at Hotel Indigo's restaurant, AAA members get a small discount. It's not a large restaurant, but they have breakfast, lunch, dinner, and happy hour drink specials. There is an outdoor pool with a hot tub, but it was too cold when I was there to use it. There's free wi-fi too.  Here's a hint: There are a couple of rooms in a space that is kind of separate from the rest of the other rooms. I didn't stay in one of those rooms because we would have had to walk up a flight of stairs with our luggage,
Manager Response: Dear Maureen P,  On behalf of the entire team at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, we would like to thank you for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. As we strive to provide personalized and caring service to all our guests, we are glad to hear you have enjoyed this experience. It is very rewarding when this has been achieved and our efforts are so kindly appreciated. Hope to welcome you back at Hotel Indigo Anaheim in the near future!

Summary Heading: New go to hotel for Disneyland
Summary: I think this is the best hotel near Disney I've been to. I'm an annual pass holder and I went up there for dapper day weekend this past weekend. Would've liked early check in but understandable since it was a busy weekend none available. It's not a super close hotel but def walking distance. I think for the style and comfortable beds it's worth it. The most comfortable bed in a hotel I've ever slept in. I must find out the mattress they use! Reasonable price with free underground secure parking and free wifi which most hotels DO NOT include. Everyone is very nice. will definitely stay here next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear Felicia C,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our property and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: My family with 2 kids (aged 6 and 9) stayed at Indigo for 3 nights. The hotel room was comfortable, and clean with 2 queen beds. They have a laundry on the first floor which we used. There are other hotels that are closer to Disneyland, but it is still worth walking to (10 - 15 min walk) as the queues for the parking at Disneyland is very long, and they have shuttles to take you to the park. The walk was pleasant. Breakfast at the cafe was as expected. There was a morning where i forgot about my laundry left in the dryer and left the hotel for the day and will not return until night time. I rang the hotel late morning when i realised to explain what had happened. The lady (i believe her name was Emily) said that she will pick up my laundry and leave it at the reception for me to
Manager Response: Dear Shan T,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with our guest services in the hotel.   It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary: Great hotel! It's super clean, no weird smells, excellent customer service, and location is awesome! It's about a block from Disneyland and has a cvs across the street. Breakfast is offered in the mornings as well. Much better than the photos online. I want to emphasize how great the costumer service was from all staff. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Azriel V,  We would like to thank you for choosing us for your trip to Anaheim. We appreciate the time you took to share your thoughts and write your lovely review. We are please you have enjoyed your stay, especially our guest services. We are grateful for your feedback as it will serve as a further source of inspiration for all of us to aim for even higher standards of hospitality excellence.  Thank you again for being our guest, we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: The room and beds were v comfortable, the space light and airy. Staff were friendly and it is in a 10 minute walk to Disneyland so very convenient if this is the purpose of your visit. A comfortable stay, can recommend and would come back.
Manager Response: Dear JToaster,  Hotel Indigo Anaheim would like to thank you for choosing us. We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor’s readers and travelers. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our guest services. We do believe that our duty is to create a memorable stay for our special guests.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 night while on business in the area.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Free parking in an underground garage area.  Nice clean common areas.  Room was also very clean and well appointed.  I did not eat at the restaurant during my stay.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark0076,  Thank you very much for this kind review, and for sharing your experience with others. We are delighted to read of your appreciation for our staff. We look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and the hotel and staff were great.  We arrived early, but the staff gracuiously stored our belongings and we sped off to Disneyland.  We reserved a 1 bedroom suite because we were traveling with my sister and she needed a separate sleeping area.  The room was bright and clean with comfy beds and a great shower.  They stock the bathrooms with Aveda products, which is awesome!  We sampled some of the food in the restaurant and it was good as well.  They have a happy hour with some good deals too.  The wifi was being upgraded during our stay and on the day we left, we noticed a huge difference in the speed.  Thanks for the upgrade!  We didn't spend much time at the pool as we really came for the theme parks.  It is a bit on the small size, but
Manager Response: Dear Kimflys,  Thank you very much for your detailed and nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Our team works daily with a professional and friendly attitude to give the best service as all the guests of each hotel deserve. Your valuable words make us so proud of what we do. We all look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: The hotel looks much nicer from the pictures on the Internet. The rooms are nice but the walls are thin you can hear everything going on outside and next door to your room. On the positive side it's a close walk to Disney so you could skip driving there.
Manager Response: Dear Wandering_Freee,  Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel and for having taken time to share with us your experience during your stay. We apologized for the noise from the wall. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We hope that this has not put you off a return stay with us again and we would love to have the opportunity to welcoming you back as our guest.

Summary: Stayed at Hotel Indigo for a weekend visit to Disneyland with family.  This property is perfect for location, location, location.  About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance, so no parking hassles.  You can also walk to several decent restaurants nearby... McCormick and Schmick, PF Chang, Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump.  Hotel also has free parking, a good restaurant for breakfast, comfortable beds, and an attentive staff.  I booked a 2 queen bed suite which is a mini suite with a small living room with sofa and TV.  It was great for three people.  The only complaint of the weekend is that the people in the room above us stomped around for about an hour after we went to bed one evening, so it was noisy for an hour.  The next evening was much quieter.  The living room has a
Manager Response: Dear Martha E,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We apologize for the noise from upper floor. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Just completed my first stay with Hotel Indigo and have to say it was great right from the start! Arthur was friendly at the front desk, our room was ready and we were able to check in a little early. The hotel is a quick walk from Disneyland and located close to several restaurants. The hotel had a breakfast plan available and it was a nice variety. The place was very clean, comfortable beds and friendly staff. Couldn't have asked for a better stay. The only thing that was lacking was a complimentary shuttle back from the park after a long day.
Manager Response: Dear cals503,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our property. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Comfortable Rooms and Close to Disneyland!
Summary: From the minute we arrived, the staff was awesome and friendly!  The rooms were comfortable and clean,  I will stay here again in the fall when I return! We asked for and received a late checkout and were able to leave our car parked there for the day.  Freshly remodeled....felt great to be welcomed!
Manager Response: Dear Eddie H,  Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel and restaurant staff are great. So helpful and hospitable.  The small bar and restaurant is good for breakfast and dinner. The whirlpool is perfect after along day at Disney with towels right there.  The walk to Disney is short going there and much longer on the return! Rooms are clean and nicely appointed. Extremely pleased with our 2 night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Micknjezz,  Thank you so much for your nice review on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay here with us. We always appreciate it when our guests point out our guest services. Thank you for considering their services are great. We hope that you may have a return visit to Anaheim very soon!

Summary: We generally don't stay near the attractions because the rooms show the high use, but we were pleasantly surprised. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The restaurant was terrific. The overall strength of this hotel is the professional, friendly, and extremely helpful staff. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Heidi H,   Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor, following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed the room, restaurant, and guest services. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for your future travels to Anaheim!

Summary: Indigo is more boutique-y compared to the remainder of the hotels in the vicinity. It's a short walk to Disney even if you have kids. They do not charge for parking or the resort fee! I was able to check in very early ( sign up for IHG thought their parent site). The young lady checking us in was extremely nice and made a recommendation for a room that's away from the main wing of the hotel and super quiet. Bf and I were very thankful since we didn't want to be surrounded by little ones. Hotel room was clean and beds comfy. Bathroom maybe could have been polished more, but their excellent front desk service made up for that. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear OD1717AL,  Thank you very much for your kind review on TripAdvisor . We are really grateful that you took the time to support us and really glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is really rewarding for us to know that you appreciated our personalized service and your room. We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again in our property and in the meantime we wish you a lovely day!

Summary: Had a fabulous stay here while I was there in April! When I checked in I was surprised with a upgrade being an IHG member - it had a fantastic view as it was facing the parks we got to watch the fireworks from the room. The room was very spacious and very clean. The pool area looked lovely (small, cute but adequate) although we did not use it. Great facilities in the room. Enjoyed the water show outside the hotel in the evening - something different to all other hotels. Very close to Disneyland and their resort hotel. Had such a great time here - if only we got to stay longer. A 2017 trip is on the cards and this hotel will be at the top of my list to stay in. Front desk staff are very friendly and helpful. Im only sorry I did not get the names of the staff members I spoke to.
Manager Response: Dear ABK1990,  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay here with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. WE sincerely hope to have an opportunity to welcome you again soon in our property.

Summary: Just returned from a 3 night stay here visiting Disneyland. I looked at so many hotels before booking this and most were motels with room entrance outside. So glad I booked this - it is an easy ten minute walk to Disney and close to plenty of shops and restaurants. We ate breakfast there every morning, the food and service were excellent. Laura checked us in and was fantastic, she gave us some great advice for Disney and found us a room where we could see the fireworks. The rooms here are a good size, nicely decorated, with a coffee machine and fridge and there was an ice machine in the corridor. The beds were so comfortable and although we didn't use the pool it looked nice and very clean. Thank you for a fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear EmmaQ,  We are absolutely delighted to read your feedback following your recent stay with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the guest services and amenities. We all hope that you will come and stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The staff here is amazing... the hotel is very clean and convenient! Arhtur the front desk supervisor is just beyond amazing, he has such a positive attitude about everything. He has the anything is possible attitude! Housekeeping is great as well. Food in the restaurant is very good and great service.
Manager Response: Dear mayrap49,  Thank you very much for your nice feedback about your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Thank you recognition of our staff Arthur in your review! Please do let us know should you decide to return as we would all look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, close to the parks
Summary: annot fault this place apart from the noise from the hard floors in the rooms, if you have night owls above - as we did. The staff really are excellent and very friendly, we asked for a high floor room but opted for 3rd floor rather than 4th so we could see the fireworks, which was well worth it actually as it was a good view and the kids loved it. Wouldn't change our choice even in hindsight with this in mind. It's a good price for what you get, does feel like value when compared to other options. The place is very clean, feels new and the rooms were well turned out, nice beds etc.   It's about a 10-15 min walk to the parks, which is fine - although we took uber one of the days to help tired little legs, a bargain at $5. They have a small pool and a hot tub which was nice to
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here whenever we venture down to visit the Disney Parks.  This hotel is clean and modern with included parking.  It is within walking distance to the park entrance and also to shops and restaurants.  The rooms are nicely furnished and a good size.  As with many hotels...they seem to be doing away with the bathtubs but the showers have glass doors and are very spacious.
Manager Response: Dear kona921,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to note that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel indigo Anaheim. Your feedback will only encourage our team to reach higher in our service delivery in order to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Spent two nights here while visiting Disneyland. The hotel is part of IHG. It was clean and comfortable. Bathroom was great with nice bath products. Coffee maker in room. We did not use pool but it looked nice.  All staff that we met were super friendly. I booked online and purchased the breakfast. I fully expected a buffet. I just did not want to be searching for food in the morning. Imagine my surprise when breakfast was anything that we wanted to order from the menu. The breakfast was fantastic and our waiter was lovely.  Free parking was awesome and the location can't be beat. It was less than 10 minute walk to Main Gate at Disneyland. We left the park close to midnight and felt perfectly safe walking back to the hotel.  Check in and out was a breeze. I would definitely
Manager Response: Dear Ortho3311,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and what is even better that you were very satisfied with everything in the hotel.  It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for you kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Hotel Indigo Anaheim anytime soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent family hotel for the price
Summary: Stayed in their 2-queen-bed room during peak Spring Break period for a very reasonable price. Room was clean and new-ish. Appreciated the Aveda amenities. A bit cramped for four but we could deal with it for two nights. Key to comfort in the hot summer months will be to leave the AC at 68 the entire time - once the room gets hot the AC has a hard time cooling it back down. Pool was sparking clean and well maintained (watched the pool guy doing his thing). Gym was clean and reasonably equipped. We didn't eat in the hotel place - tons of other eating places within two (longish) Anaheim blocks, suitable for both adults and kids. Disney main entrance about a half-mile walk away. Well-stocked CVS pharmacy half a block away, good fro grab & go breakfast or backpack snacks for
Manager Response: Dear Kathy A,  Thank you for your review and compliments. We are sorry if you experienced any challenges concerning the air-conditioning. We are glad despite this experience you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will give us the opportunity of welcoming you back here next time you plan a trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent, clean and tidy, lovely food and perfect location!
Summary: Lovely hotel, everyone was very friendly and the rooms and facilities spotless. We stayed her when visiting Disney and it is a perfect location to do this with just a short walk. Breakfast was an additional cost but really good choice and reasonable cost wise. Highly recommend to anyone visiting Disney, handy places to eat close by too!
Manager Response: Dear Slg25,  Thank you very much for staying at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and for your kind comments posted on TripAdvisor and for recommending our hotel. We really appreciate your nice feedback on our breakfast and location. Our team certainly looks forward to welcome you back, hopefully soon!

Summary: Very modern, clean & friendly staff. The room had wooden floors so it gets cleaned daily. The housekeeping staff were detail oriented and efficient. The bathroom is spacious and had a beautiful shower.  Keurig with not just coffee but great teas. The beds, covers & multiple pillows were Awesome!!The extra cushions were lovely. The Hotel had an excellent restaurant with the best breakfast ever!!! The best was the service given by all the staff. They were professional & friendly & very good at customer service. Laura at the front desk, Alfredo our waiter. The chef had everything tasting delicious with beautiful presentation. The pool and hot tub was very nice, great view of the Disney fireworks at 9:30. I loved that I got to do a load of laundry while on vacation. It had a nice
Manager Response: Dear jlesa83,  We really appreciate you taking the time to write such a lovely review on TripAdvisor following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Thank you very much for your suggestion, I will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future and wish you a very nice week!

Summary: Let's get down and dirty about this place: The beds are crazy comfy. The sheets and comforters are clean and WHITE (meaning they aren't trying to hide stains with printed sheets and blankets), They have a Keurig for coffee. The room was SPOTLESS. Parking is free. Free Wifi  Now for the experiences:  My husband wanted a drink after a long day in the park with the kids. By the time we got back to the hotel, the bar was closed 35 minutes but he was still cleaning up. Husband asked if they were open and they said no, but he would take care of him anyway. THAT made an impression with us.  Then front desk person was always helpful with hours, suggestions, and coupons to local food and fun.  Only negative: the free Wifi resets every 24 hours. We had ipads connected for wind down games
Manager Response: Dear kschofield75519,  Thank you for visiting and for sharing the specific details of your stay, which I will share with our team. We apologize for the wifi speed. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We also will bring your suggestions for the breakfast to our heads as well. We hope to welcome you back on a future visit!

Summary: Arrived early, so room wasn't really and the staff was great.  Gave me a parking card so I wouldn't have to fight the Disney lot crowds, and stored my son's insulin and ice pack in their fridge.  I can count on one hand the number of hotels that have been responsive to that.  Walked to Disneyland from the hotel, then took a break to come back and check in.  Very pleasant room with two queens.  The hotel has a "grab and go" fridge with drinks, plus some snacks.  The breakfasts we had were great, and the restaurant is open for dinner as well (but there are many other restaurants within walking distance if you want to leave).  There is also a full bar in the lobby.  There were a few noise issues in the hall, but that's to be expected where small kids are involved.   Would
Manager Response: Dear googlymoogly014,  Thank you very much for staying with us, and for taking the time to share your kind words. We are honored and delighted to be your choice in Anaheim, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We liked this hotel ... It's was very clean, large rooms, nice shower/bathroom, helpful staff and A+ for location for Disney and for an evening meal. It is a 10 min walk to Disney which was perfect ... close enough but far enough away from it all when the day is done. The 4 minute walk to a huge variety of restaurants for the evening meal was great. Arthur at front desk was a delight, such a warm personality who was very proud of his workplace.The hotels car service with Johnny was a bonus & made shopping super easy.
Manager Response: Dear Fran M,  Thank you so much for your kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Indigo when visiting Disneyland and Disney's California Adventure.  Our room was clean and we appreciated having two queen-sized beds.  The gated underground parking lot was a nice feature, too.  It is a simple walk to the parks.  Good, quick service at the front desk, too.
Manager Response: Dear rjletocha,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: One of the best hotels we have stayed in. We went through  TripAdvisor and got a great price. This hotel is walking distance to (about 3 blocks) Disneyland and about half a block from restaurants and other stores. Great room atmosphere, very clean and very confortable beds.  The only thing I didn't like is they don't provide a free continental breakfast, you have to pay extra if you want breakfast. At this point this is our preferred hotel when ever we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Marcos S,  We are taken aback by your superb detailed review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our property. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay! Great location with free parking
Summary: Highly recommend for family with 1~2 kids. Room is very clean. Can easily walk to Disney park. Free & gated underground parking is big plus. Staffs are very friendly. My family really enjoyed the stay. One tip I like to share is to remember bringing a stroller with you even if you kids are older than 5 - very handy when they fall asleep
Manager Response: Dear Yitiaodragon,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our property and thank you very much for your highly recommendation. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Great Staff, very friendly and willing to help!
Summary: Great hotel for the price. Clean room with Aveda products in bathroom. Staff super friendly and helpful. Easy walk to Disneyland(approx. 1/2 mile) Stayed 2 nights with our boys 8&10. Area around hotel felt safe. Walked to hotel from Disney after 11pm and felt safe. Pharmacy and restaurants close by. Car park in garage below was great. Every time we walked in to hotel staff always made a point to greet us. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Mylife16,  Thank you so much for your kind review of your recent stay! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with your stay with us. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: Front desk staff were extremely pleasant and helped in any way they could.  Upon check-in the person behind the desk came around and shook all of our hands and explained all the amenities of the hotel.  Gated parking underneath the hotel was nice.  Area and hotel were very clean.  Musical water fountain in front was cool.  Housekeeping never came to clean our room on our 2nd day of the stay.  You could hear a lot of noise from people in the hall and in the pool, but despite that, I slept extremely well on the beds.
Manager Response: Dear Patty P,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We are so sorry that you heard the noise from people in the hallway and the pool area. We will definitely bring this to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: The rate seemed a bit higher than the chains at first, but once you take into account what's included (parking alone is commonly $14/day, and the 2 breakfast vouchers per day add up quickly - and it's a REAL breakfast), you definitely come out ahead, and have a much nicer room with very comfortable beds.  You get very close proximity to Disneyland, in a hotel with the most friendly and helpful staff and a restaurant with great food at very reasonable prices.  And plenty of other dining options on the same block - we never even moved the car during the four days we were there.
Manager Response: Dear greenpdx,  Thank you so much for staying with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us another opportunity to take care of you!

Summary: I was one of those rare people staying in Anaheim and not going to Disney. I was on my way to Palm Springs and needed a place to stay close to friends in Orange County. This was a great choice! The rate was reasonable compared to the other Anaheim options. The hotel is new, clean and modern. I loved that the rooms had "hardwood" floor rather than carpet. It just felt cleaner. The pool area, while small, was welcoming. But the best was the staff. Upon check-in, I was greeted by the most accommodating staff and that continued throughout my short stay. I tend to stay in b&b's and inn's over hotels. For a hotel, this was very personable and quite hospitable making it a 4 star in my book.
Manager Response: Dear AmyRuth36,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a stylish little hotel with the high standard of service I've experienced at other Indigo hotels. This turned out to be important, since I left my passports behind in the room safe at the previous stop on our itinerary! I was able to enjoy a day at Disneyland, a 10 minute walk down the street, being confident that the Express Mail package with our passports would be well taken care of till I came back. Special shout-out to Omar, Justine -- who gave us a room with a view of the Disney fireworks -- and Julio. Overall great staff.
Manager Response: Dear juliej584,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: My wife,daughter and I stayed 3 days. Let's get the bad out of the way first. Cons; No water pressure! No bath tubs! I am in the dog house for that! Very Hot water, beware! One elevator! Dads make that family work on the move in and out! That's it! ;) The staff was great! The beds were Awesome and soft pillows 💤💤 The room was a bit cramped but everything needed was in the room. It was fourth floor 417 handicapped room, only one left. It was soooo  quiet. 👌🏻👌🏻👍 Short, safe walk to Disney, 15 min., with restaurants on the way.  We enjoyed our stay here and would stay again. We have stayed on Anaheim 20 times. You can trust this review.
Manager Response: Dear mnyking1,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay and willing to stay with us again. We apologize for the water pressure. We will definitely bring the issue to our department’s head. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and look forward to see you soon!

Summary: Nice hotel, plenty of our room for our family of 6.  Very nice and friendly staff.  Clean rooms.  Walking distance to Disneyland however we walked about 10 mile a day through the park so at the end of the day that half mile walk back to the hotel seemed a lot longer ;). Cons-small fridge if plan on storing anything in your room.  No breakfast provided but we did go to a Walmart and bought cereal, waffes and toaster.
Manager Response: Dear jaimees563  Thank you very much for your nice review. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon.

Summary: This is a very modern and smart hotel in a good location for Anaheim. Very good pool and hot tub as well. The reception staff were great too. Only possible downside is that the restaurant is outsourced and is slightly overpriced plus I had a hair in my food.
Manager Response: Dear Donavan E,   Thank you so much for your review of your stay with us. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that you found a hair in your food. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: This hotel is by far the cleanest and most updated we have stayed at while visiting Disneyland.  The beds are comfortable, the bathroom/shower is large and very modern.  It is just a little further from Disney, ( 10-15 minute walk) and the hotel does not offer a shuttle which would be nice at the end of a long day in the Park.  The parking was nice, it was free, and we parked the car in the garage and left it for the duration of our stay. The hotel staff were friendly at check in, and check-out.  Overall, a nice clean hotel, with modern finishes, that was a nice place to stay while visiting the Park.
Manager Response: Dear BeckiW,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such nice review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel indigo in December last year. The location of this hotel is perfect, It is only a short walk away from disneyland resort. The room was modern and stylish and the bathroom was beautifully finished. The small size of this hotel gave it a homely feel and the staff were friendly and welcoming. The restaurant also great, serving delicious breakfasts each morning. The only complaint I have is that the noise of the children in the room above us running around could be heard from our room. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear AUSTRAVELLER22,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your nice feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We would like to apologize of the noise from upper floor. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary Heading: Great hotel in walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was clean and comfortable and we loved the modern decor. The staff was friendly and attentive. The breakfast in the restaurant was good too. Disneyland was a short walk away (about 12 minutes).
Manager Response: Dear rubyina,  Thank you so much for taking time to writing such nice review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Our company goes to the Natural Products Expo every year in March and have stayed at Hotel Indigo Anaheim the past 3 years .............. and will be staying there next year again. The hotel is very conveniently located. It's very clean, the food is great. But most importantly .............. the staff is amazing. Incredible friendly and service minded. They make every stay a real join.
Manager Response: Dear phassing,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us! We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We booked this hotel after reading several reviews on Trip Advisor, however the warm and friendly welcome from Arthur, on reception and hotel ambience was way beyond our expectations. We checked in early and requested a room on the top floor, Disneyland side. The room Arthur assigned to meet our request wasn't available, however he called Housekeeping and advised it would be ready within 45 minutes. We left our luggage at the hotel and decided to go for lunch and during this, we received a phone call from Arthur to advise our room was ready.  Despite being part of the IHG chain, the hotel has a 'privately owned' feel to it. Every member of staff we encountered from Reception, those working in the Breakfast Bar and Housekeeping, greeted us in the same warm and friendly manner.
Manager Response: Dear HRHaggis,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice and detailed review on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. Please let us know when your next visit is and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advanced! Looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Modern/Urban Look with perfect distance from Disneyland
Summary: Walking distance from Disneyland, and lots of restaurants and fast-food around for easy access to food. The interior was well designed for hip colors that vibe well with the interior design of the hotel. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Only weird thing was that the bathroom door in my room opened in the same direction of the room entrance door, so if you tried to get in room with bathroom door open they always collided because the bathroom door wouldn't stay set it kept on swinging fully open.
Manager Response: Dear Akash K,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for the inconvenience the bathroom door caused you. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: Planned a single day Disneyland trip with my girlfriend and this was the perfect place to stay.  Great value considering the proximity to Disneyland - it's an easy 10 minute walk.  They let us check in early at like 9AM so we were able to drop off our stuff and go straight to the park.  Maybe we just got lucky, but it was very quiet and there were no kids at the hotel making it perfect for an adult couple.  Although I'm sure a family would like this place as well.  Free parking and wifi.  Has a bar and restaurant with decent food.  This is a hidden gem.  Would definitely stay here again next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Austin P,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your time here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back for more successful stays!

Summary: We looked extensively at all of the hotels near the park & this one met all of our criteria. It was safe, clean, inexpensive, & SO CLOSE to Disneyland. The walk wasn't bad at all! The modern hotel felt like a spa getaway. We loved the room & bathroom. The staff is so friendly here & helped us out with all of our needs. We really appreciated the free parking (before check-in hours so we could park for free while we went to the park) & they even supplied us with a crib for our baby. The next time we come to Disneyland we WILL stay here.
Manager Response: Dear bmasch06,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Really good - the reviews are true!
Summary: I had to write this because we were so pleased with the Hotel Indigo.  We stayed in December 2015 for a Disneyland trip. The staff at the reservation was very cheerful, and friendly. The pool area which was very clean with nice outdoor furniture..  I was surprised and liked tthe hardwood floors in the rooms. The bathrooms were large, nice showers and long vanity with a shelf underneath for plenty of items. Appreciated the Aveda toiletries.  Pleasing restaurant downstairs for bkfst  -good friendly service.  Beds were very comfy.  Get to front of Disneyland on the ART bus - convenient.
Manager Response: Dear glad2golf,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: First off the service we received from all staff members was outstanding!!! The rooms are very nice and clean. I would recommend a room away from the street as it's a bit loud. The restaurant was good and very convenient. We enjoyed the hot tub as It was not crowded. Great location and easy walk to Disneyland. Would definitely stay here again!!! :)
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer C,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your nice feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary Heading: Super location for Disney, Comfortable rooms
Summary: The hotel is about 15 minutes walk from Disneyland. The room had two King beds and a spacious shower room with Aveda toiletries. There's a little pool and hot tub on the deck. Parking is free, but first come first served and was busy. Lots of dining options nearby. Staff very friendly. Perfect base if you are touring the parks.
Manager Response: Dear skyfriendbrighton,  Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your stay here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.

Summary: This was my first stay at the Hotel Indigo but we have stayed at many many hotels on our trips to disney in the past and this was one of the nicest.    The staff was all very nice and helpful.  We arrived from San Diego at about 10:30 in the morning and were able to check in and leave our car so we could go to Disneyland that day.  They even upgraded us to a family deluxe room without asking with a view of Disneyland fireworks.  It is an easy 20 min walk to the front gates and saves you money by not having to pay for disney parking which is just as far from the front gates as this hotel.  The room was very clean and quiet we were on the top floor.  The only thing i would say that this hotel does not have is a bathtub it is only a shower and with little kids this could be a
Manager Response: Dear jenniferj884,  Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us.
