We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: Front desk was super helpful, upgraded us right away to a family suite where we could see the fireworks and have a little more room to spread out (needed with a double stroller and little kids).  The room had ample space, was clean and decor was modern.  Bathroom was great.  Only knock on this place is that there is no complimentary breakfast as there is over at the Candy Cane - although the room was overall better quality than the CC, and the beds were super comfortable.  Walk with a double stroller to the front gate of Disneyland was just under 15 minutes (depending on if you get caught at the long light signal at the corner of Harbor and Katella).   Our family would definitely stay here again.   Good value for the price.
Manager Response: Dear MiracleMax,  Thank you so much for your kind review of your recent stay! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with your stay with us. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary Heading: I would stay again in a second....
Summary: Nice location to be able to walk to restaurants and Disneyland! Rooms were modern and comfortable with huge showers!! Staff was very friendly and accommodating. The food at the restaurant was surprisingly good and affordable. I would stay agin in a second.
Manager Response: Dear Alyson S,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the foods at our restaurant. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: Great hotel, great attentive staff and awesome rooms. 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Heated pool and spa. Clean rooms no issues. Great restaurants and shops close by. Gated underground parking garage Plan to stay again when back in town...
Manager Response: Dear David S,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: Just completed my fourth stay at Hotel Indigo in Anaheim last week and still have not one bad word to say about them. I am a business traveler who can stay pretty much anywhere when in so. Cal. I choose Hotel Indigo because they are very consistent .The staff remembers my name from visit to visit, the food in the hotel is actually quite good and very reasonable. Let's not forget, it can't be all business. I walked to downtown Disney to meet clients and treat them to a night at the Magic Kingdom and walked back!! No parking headaches and my clients had a blast!!  Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the So. Cal Area.  K. Strange National Account Manager/QMI
Manager Response: Dear Kevin S,  Thank you so much for your kind reviews for your recent stay! We are glad that you satisfied your stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: My husband and I just checked out this morning after a six-day stay.   Parking is free, with plenty of space available in both above and underground parking lots. They offer free Wi-Fi, however the connection was relatively slow (I find this to be fairly normal for hotel Wi-Fi though, so no marks off for that.)  There are onsite laundry facilities, however they appear to be almost an afterthought, just two washers & dryers crammed in a little room. In spite of this, when we did need to do laundry, the machines were available.  There is a restaurant and bar on site, however we only ate there one morning. The breakfast (not complementary) we had at the restaurant was just above average - perfectly adequate, but not remarkable. We ordered espresso there on a couple of occasions,
Manager Response: Dear Theresa E,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such detailed and kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our property. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We apologized for the Wi-Fi speed and we did not replenish coffee pods during your stay. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: First impression count. Extremely helpful, friendly staff. Rooms clean and fresh. Breakfast of good quality and service, and for us returning from work in the early evening, a nice bar to get a beer, with again friendly helpful staff.  All round a good value for money hotel in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Alan R,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our room, breakfast, and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Staff is very friendly. Safe and easy walk to the convention center.  Shopping and restaurants within walking distance. Rooms are clean. Bathroom decor is modern. Shower nozzle in my room had a hole at the wall. I mostly fixed it myself.
Manager Response: Dear Bret S,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with the guest services, location, and cleanliness of our rooms. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We apologize that the shower nozzle in your room had a hole on the wall. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: The hotel itself is everything I was hoping/anticipating for. It's just far enough from Disneyland to avoid the herd of children but close enough that we had no problem walking there. I loved the modern layout of the room. The only negative I found about the hotel section is you can hear everything. Walking down the hallway you can hear everything going on in the rooms and while in your room you can hear everything going on in the hallway. While I like the wooden floors there is a reason people don't put them on higher floors. We stayed on the third floor and every time the guests in the room above us walked around it sounded like somebody was housing a Clydesdale up there.    The Chambers bar and bistro located in the hotel has its pros and cons. Their 3 course meal is a great
Manager Response: Dear Hazel O,  Thank you for your detailed objective feedback of your stay. We are truly concerned about your dissatisfaction regarding to the quality of the foods at our restaurant. Please be assured that your feedback has been shared with our food & beverage department for investigation and follow up. Please do contact us directly if you would like to share more details with us. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future.

Summary: The location was good for proximity to Disney and local restaurants. It was priced reasonably too. Those are the good points.   On the downside, the 'suite' we booked was simply a room with 2 twin beds and a pull out sofa. We were less than totally impressed with the breakfast as well. The oatmeal looked like prison quality, the menu failed to list bell peppers as an ingredient in the breakfast burrito (despite listing everything else) and the fruit bowls seemed to consist almost completely of melon.   Anyway, it was not dreadful but, neither was it 'awesome'...
Manager Response: Dear Lockmk,  Greetings from Hotel Indigo Anaheim and thanks for taking the time to share your experiences on TripAdvisor. We are very sorry to read that the quality of the foods at our restaurant did not meet your expectation. We have brought up the mentioned issues to our executive chef in order to rectify the issues. We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused and hope that you will give us another opportunity to welcome you back to show you our improvements next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: I Don't Want You To Stay Here Because It's So Awesome
Summary: This is my favorite hotel in Anaheim, hands down.  I've held off on reviewing it because I don't want you to know how awesome it is.  If you don't have kids and want to check out Disneyland this is the place to stay.  If you have kids and want a comfortable room, this is the place to stay.   The hotel is around the corner from Disneyland and about a 1/4 of a mile walk to the park.  There's a restaurant in the lobby that has a killer breakfast.  I usually alternate between the pancakes and omelet before a day of checking out the parks.    Parking is free and there's usually ample spaces beneath the hotel.  The rooms are modern with comfortable beds and nice tile showers.    The rooms are fairly quite, although I imagine in the height of summer the noise from the pool might change
Manager Response: Dear AirRaid98,  We are taken aback by your superb detailed review of your recent stay. We are glad you are satisfied with our property and thank you very much for your highly recommendation. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary: We loved staying at the Indigo! The hotel was very clean and close to many things. We walked to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. There is a CVS pharmacy on the corner if you forgot to pack anything. The hotel staff was so friendly and helpful. we will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear Qxtravel,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay and willing to stayed with us the entire trip! Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: decently clean and comfy beds, but lumpy sofabed
Summary: we've stayed here 2 different trips and have another trip coming up soon. we love the laminate floors, as we don't have to deal with unclean carpets. the beds are very comfy but the sofabed is terrible! You can feel the wires going across your back - good thing we were so tired that it didn't matter, however, it was bad. We had a 1 bdrm suite which was great for our family of 6, but in drawing the short straw, ouch- on the sofabed. The room overall was clean but we did find a couple of ants, i don't like bugs at all but will take an ant here and there over other critters! One of our rooms had a strong chemical odor, probably from spraying to keep the pests away, so I get it, but it would have been good to air the room out before we got there. We just slept with the windows open
Manager Response: Dear spontane0us_family,   Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We apologize for the comfort level of the sofa bed did not meet your standard and the room has strong chemical smells. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: We picked this hotel because it has hard wooden flooring and not the dreaded dusty carpets. Each morning we woke up refreshed, without that stuffy nose feeling. The room was lovely bright and clean, the bed and pillows were so comfortable. We had a room safe, an iron and board, coffee maker and good size fridge.  The bath room had plenty of space for two to get ready. The shower was easy to use, and powerful, we were left top brand AVEDA shampoo, conditioner, soap, and mouth wash. Plenty of fresh soft white towels, large mirrors, nice clean bright bath room.  We could sit in bed and watch the Disney fire works, you can also see them while sitting in the bar down stairs, in or outside. The staff are all amazing, Thank you to the lovely Kyheal,(sorry for spelling) for helping to
Manager Response: Dear Diana002, Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I recently attended the NAMM (National Association of Music Merchants) Show.  This hotel was rated very high on TripAdvisor, and since I'm also a fan of boutique hotels (and there was a NAMM discount), this was a no-brainer for me.  The distance from the Convention Center was only about two blocks.  The hotel was clean and contemporary. The staff are friendly and professional.  The rooms were spacious and the beds were comfortable.  The bathroom is spacious with a nice shower stall (no bath tub) with two shower heads, one hand-held.  Aveda bath products are used in the bathroom.  The hotel's restaurant/bar was excellent--be advised that they only serve breakfast and dinner, but they have a cooler for "grab and go" food and drink.  The prices were very reasonable.  They also have
Manager Response: Dear NuPwr319,  Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. We are thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our property. We also would like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience our music fountain show brought you. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel and staff and close to Disneyland
Summary: This was our first stay at Hotel Indigo and I would not hesitate to come back! The staff were wonderful and accommodated everything we needed including a late checkout and overall were very pleasant to speak too.  The room itself was very nice and clean- the bed was very comfortable! It took us just over 10 minutes to walk to Disneyland which was great for us.  My husband and I don't have any complaints about this hotel and look forward to staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear reneek22,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I was looking for a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.  All of the ones I looked at charged for either wi-fi, parking, or both.  While the room rate might be cheaper, when you factor in the other costs, you find it is not such a great value after all.  Add in the out-of-control kid factor and ... Bleah.   The Indigo is a beautiful hotel. Clean and quiet and an easy ten minute stroll to the park. Rooms are not huge but enough to comfortably accommodate four adults. I love the flooring. No carpet!!  No bathtub, which was fine by us. Instead a large shower stall.    The pool and spa area is lovely.  Gated parking. We didn't eat at the lobby bistro but it smelled wonderful and was reasonably priced.  The staff at the front desk always greeted us warmly during our three day
Manager Response: Dear gypsy_heart_and_soul,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: We stayed for about one week in this hotel (two adults and two children). We stayed in a large room (we were told it was the largest one in the hotel) where there was a separate living area, bathroom and a bedroom. The room number was 126. Our two kids slept in the living area, there was a foldable sofa that was sufficiently large for them (10 and 12 years old). There was a good size bed in the bedroom. The hot water run well in the shower. Although it was December-January, it was comfortably warm in the room even at night. The floors were wooden. Cleaning was very good. The sound insulation was also excellent.   There were some restaurants relatively close to the hotel as well as several fast food chains and a CVS. We had breakfast coupons and were quite ok with the breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Terhi C,  Thank you so much for such wonderful and detailed feedback of your stay. We are so happy to know that you found our staff welcoming. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Modern and clean room walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice place to stay for our 3-day Disneyland hopper trip with two young children. Fantastic staffs. If you are looking for a clean, comfortable and modern-furnished room after long walking days at Disneyland/Adventure Park (rather than grand lobby/entry), this hotel is the place to be. Solid good beds and deluxe beddings, capsule coffee machine (American style though, not espresso), modern shower and Aveda toiletries are real perks. Parking is a bliss.  It's around 10-15 min safe walk to Disneyland's entry. We found the corner CVS (for food and drinks, a bit more dear than regular supermarkets but expected tourist trap), the end of the street Chinese take-out and Denny's (for breakfast) very handy.  Everything we expected from all the 4-5 stars review online.
Manager Response: Dear Shambani,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Fantastic place to stay - Staff were great, nothing was too much trouble.
Summary: We loved our time at this hotel - it was clean, good quality with great staff who delivered great service. The location as a 10 min walk to Disneyland with enough bars/restaurants/pharmacies and convenience stores located within 5 mins walk to cater to everyone's needs.  The room was certainly spacious enough for 2 people with all the amenities you need. the free Wi-Fi was reliable and had good speed.  We would definitely stay again if we were visiting the area.
Manager Response: Dear shambani,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your review. Service is a top priority for us and your compliments will certainly be an added boost for our team members on your journey to service excellence. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Perfect place to stay. The staff worked hard to make our stay excellent. The decor is fresh and modern. The rooms are very clean. The location is great. Excellent restaurants are very close. We were able to walk to Disney. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear BettySue C,  Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your time here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are also pleased to note that our team members’ service standards met your expectations. Every employee at our property tries his or her best to meet or exceed guests’ expectation. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This place was AWESOME!!! It is a perfect location to walk to Disneyland.  The location is perfect for surrounding  restaurants.  The shuttle for Hollywood  tours picks you up right at the door. Our room was cleaned every night. Plenty  of toiletries and fresh towels. The lobby reception workers were very friendly  and helpful.  We ate breakfast there every morning and it was awesome.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend to anyone. For the price you can't  go wrong.
Manager Response: Dear haylee16,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We just returned from a six night stay at the Hotel Indigo and our stay was flawless. At check-in, we were upgraded to a room that faces Disney so we could hypothetically watch the fireworks from our room (we ended up either being in the hot tub, at the parks, or asleep each time the fireworks went off so we didn't actually watch them from our room).   The room was extremely clean, I loved the flooring in the room, and the shower was beautiful.  We were able to make use of the restaurant, hot tub, and pool several times during our stay. In addition to eating food at the restaurant, we also took our leftovers or purchased meals up to the Front Desk or over to the restaurant (when it was open) to have our food headed up.   Each Hotel Indigo has their own local story and the one
Manager Response: Dear disneygoober,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Our first, but not last, visit to Hotel Indigo
Summary: I was hesitant to like Hotel Indigo at first since the deposit we paid upon booking was our entire 3-night's stay -- ouch!  A tough financial hit just before Christmas.  But we were pleasantly surprised.  Close to Disneyland, easy to park (a plus for us), and a smaller hotel than some others we've stayed at.  Our room with 2 queen beds was large, clean, modern in decor, comfortable, and quiet.  At check in, the staff accidentally provided us breakfast vouchers that were included in our "package" but quickly called our room to explain they made a mistake & they weren't for us.  The girl was very apologetic and offered us small bags of bottled waters and snacks.  Overall I'd definitely stay here again and I've already recommended it to friends.
Manager Response: Dear Poohfan39,  Thank you so much for  your recommendation and share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear you are satisfied with our property. We apologize for our mistake in regards to the breakfast vouchers. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel to stay when visit Disney parks
Summary: We stayed at the hotel 1 night while visiting disney parks. The hotel is located about 15-20 min walk to the parks and offer free parking. On our second day we checked out early morning and asked to leave the car at the parking for another few hours till we come back from the parks and the were totally OK with that. The staff was very nice and welcoming and the rooms are quite large, modern and clean. Though you can't see the park from the room, the room we got had a view to night fireworks show which was very nice extra. The negative point of the room was the shower which had very weak ans slow water preasure. It was so bad that it was very hard to shower and took a lot of time for each one of us. The breakfast was Ok and in total it was a good stay and I would recommend this
Manager Response: Dear Avi,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such nice review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are sorry for the water pressure was lower than you expected. We will definitely bring this to our housekeeping head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: We stayed her for three nights for our Disneyland trip and it was the perfect location as Disneyland was only about a 10 minute walk from the hotel.  The room we stayed in was a standard with two queen beds, it was a little small, but comfortable and very clean. The rates were more than reasonable, especially since they offer free parking.   There was some street noise, but the hotel itself was very quiet, which is always a plus for light sleepers like myself.  The hotel staff really makes the hotel standout, they were very friendly and super helpful.  I left behind something in the room and they immediately called me to let me know, which was much appreciated.  We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Dear Tamara D,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most delighted to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us at our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Another great stay here for a Disney half marathon
Summary: This was our second time staying at the Hotel Indigo, the first was last May for the Tinkerbell Half; this time was for the Star Wars Half.  It's a terrific option.  The hotel is within walking distance to Downtown Disney and the parks.  I easily made it to the start line within 30 minutes (including the rerouting for the security checks); if going straight to the parks, it would probably be a 15 min walk.  The hotel is also right next to several chain restaurants (the restaurant selection in Anaheim is pretty dismal) - Roys, California Pizza Kitchen, PF Changs, etc - and a mall with a movie theater.  The mall was nearly empty of shops in May but I think it's filled in a bit since then.  A tip: if you're in a small group (couples), skip the bad restaurants with long waits and
Manager Response: Dear trvlr888,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind and detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our property. We would like to apologize for the noise from the hallway. We hope that did not affect your run the next day. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: The room is large, clean and comfortable. Wifi seems reliable, and a nice extra is that the clock radio can dock iphones so it is easy to charge them, and stream your music. Hotel is ideally placed for Disneyland and the convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Ducksraider,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our amenities and location. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Hotel Indigo is just a 10 minutes' walk to Disneyland. When we first entered our room, it was pretty big with 2 queen-sized beds. Interestingly, the beds are pretty high off the floor. Better to accommodate tall Americans maybe? The bathroom was clean and dry and there was a big sink area. However, the shower mixer was rather tricky to manoeuvre. Water pressure wasn't as good too.  Plus points? I would have to say that the free wifi was pretty great but it can only accommodate up to 4 devices. Service staff was great too. We had misplaced one of our hard disk drives and we were really in a panic over it as it contained quite a bit of important information. On the day that we checked out, we informed the reception to let us know if the hard disk is found after our departure. They
Manager Response: Dear Keqing,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. I would also like to apologize for the water pressure. Please be assured that your feedback has been shared with maintenance department for investigation and follow up. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: After reading through several reviews of several Anaheim hotels, my fiancé and I decided to call to inquire about the possibility of getting a top floor room in this hotel for our stay in Anaheim next month. The man on the phone was abrupt, told us it was not possible that it was first come first serve basis. I asked if everyone wanted a top floor room at all times and he responded with no but they are a very full hotel. When I said I'd look on Trip Advisor for another hotel he said that was fine and hung up. Most hotels we go to accept requests for top floor rooms, which we find necessary in order to sleep well.
Manager Response: Dear Carmelapplepie,  Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we take each and every piece of feedback very seriously and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you again for your valuable feedback. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue. Hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Really nice location near to the Disneyland parks, in which you can go walking aprox 10 min. Excellent service and hospitality. Nice amenities for IHG  group members. Not exactly need to have a car if you are visiting the parks. you can leave your car on the hotel and you can save 17USD per day in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Fabian_cr,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: From our first reception, to our few minor issues that we had caused ourselves the staff at the Hotel Indigo were on the spot to fix all of them.  10-15 min walking distance to Disneyland, this hotel is well appointed, very clean, convenient and has very helpful staff that I would recommend to all my friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Liam G,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Great Staff and Convenient to Disneyland
Summary: Let’s start with the positives: -Staff was friendly (eager to please), cheerful, and efficient; Arthur and Laura (Front Desk) were gracious hospitality hosts. Proactively explained and honored IHG Reward benefits.  -LOCATION: 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland (before going through security). CVS and a little strip mall with food is about 5 minutes away. -Parking is complimentary (at least for one car). -Reliable complimentary internet for up to four devices (not sure if this has to do with our IHG Rewards status). -Business Center with two computers and a printer to print out boarding passes and surf the web. -Aveda bath amenities -Plenty of bath towels in the room when we checked-in. -On-site swimming pool and hot tub; never saw anyone use it though. -In-room coffee maker and
Manager Response: Dear InstantNoodles,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We will definitely bring these suggestions to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here one night before a quick trip to Disneyland. The location is very convenient to shops, restaurants, Disneyland and the convention center. Check in and parking are easy and convenient. The fitness center is okay and is open 24 hours which was nice. Our only complaint was that we could hear the people walking in the room above us a lot, not sure if they were really heavy footed or if that is how it is all over the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear KCH143,  Thank you so much for staying with us! We would like to apologize for the noise level. We will definitely bring it to our department head’s attention. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: Disney hotel was full and quite pricey during christmas season when we visit there, so we decided to stay in hotel around disneyland instead.  10 minutes walking distance to disneyland, surrounded with dining options, hotel was really clean and spacious.  Breakfast was really good!! You should make booking inclusive the breakfast package, its really worth it.
Manager Response: Dear tukang_terbang,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Cleanliness and proximity were important to us. As other reviewers mentioned the walk is 10-12 mins to Maingate, another 5-10 mins to get through security and get in line for entrance to the park. It was an easy walk for us; stroller with 3yo and 4 yo. Pros: The room was pretty clean. It's nice to have floors that are not carpet. Bedding was clean and comfy. Bathroom was clean.   Cons: shower knob had to be tweaked to get the warm water instead of scorching water. One of our 2 beds was very squeaky. No microwave in room, but restaurant in lobby was more than happy to help warm up food for us. Only 1 elevator.   Overall a good stay. We would stay again and would love to stay in a family studio.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly concerned about your dissatisfaction regarding to the shower and bed. Please be assured that your feedback has been shared with housekeeping and maintenance department for investigation and follow up. Please do contact us directly if you would like to share more detailed with us.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, loved the room and location, easy walk to Disney and also access to normal shops and restaurants. The staff were all very courteous and helpful, had breakfast one day which was good. I had requested a quiet room on the top floor, which we got plus a view of the fireworks. We very much enjoyed our stay and would happily return.
Manager Response: Dear tallymacfly,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectation and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The location and atmosphere of this hotel was amazing! We walked to Disney everyday and it only took about 10-15 minutes. There are so many restaurant choices within walking distance we didn't need a car at all.  The food/service at the hotel was sub-par though. We ate dinner at the restaurant one night and the service was a joke! We sent back 2 menu items because they weren't made as the menu described, the server was new and didn't know any better. We definitely did not return. Our AC unit in the room also started to leak during the stay and after many calls was never fixed!
Manager Response: Dear Ashley_Godfrey,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and reviewing our property. We are very delighted to know that you satisfied with our location. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay and dine
Summary: My family and I have just returned from a month long holiday in the USA and the Hotel Indigo would have to be the best accommodation we stayed in on our entire trip.  The hotel was so clean, the staff were so friendly, and the meals were fantastic.  They had a special three course meal for dinner every evening for around $20 per person we had this on the first night of our stay, and we continued to eat there every night, I think this too would have to be the best meals of our trip.  It is so worth upgrading to a 1 bedroom suite with a separate living area we stayed for three nights and it certainly was well worth the money for the upgrade.  The stroll to Disneyland is around 10 to 15 minutes and a short drive to a large grocery store for all essential's.  Would highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear holidays255068,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: The staff was very courteous and helpful whenever I needed something.  The rooms were very nice and clean. My room had a view of the fireworks at Disneyland. The location is close to Disneyland, but also close to restaurants nearby. Definitely a great place to stay if your are visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear David T,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your review. Service is a top priority for us and your compliments will certainly be an added boost for our team members on our journey to service excellence. We certainly look forward to welcoming you to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo for 4 nights at the beginning of December 2015.  We arrived at the hotel at around 11am and was told our room was ready which was great for the time of day. The receptionist was really lovely and asked what we were doing during our stay in Anaheim and made sure we had maps of Disneyland.   The room was nicely decorated and quite big, we had 2 double beds. I liked the hardwood floors and the room and bathroom were really clean. I would say the bathroom was a little narrow so if we did stay here again I would check to see if there was a room with a larger bathroom and only the one bed.   There is enough storage space for a longer stay, the dresser had 4 drawers and there was room in the closet for a couple of suitcases. The safe was also big enough
Manager Response: Dear Tink1987,  Thank you so much for your nice review. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel... Awesome service... Great location
Summary: I love everything about this hotel. From the moment that we arrived, every staff member was kind, professional, and genuinely helpful. Gorgeous, hip rooms (with beautiful hardwood floors!) Location perfection. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Bartenders were fantastic. Guest service agents were so great and fully engaged! Hospitality at its finest.
Manager Response: Dear tcald,  Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We also thank you for your kind compliments on our team members’ service. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a great place to stay at when going to Disneyland.  Rooms are nice and clean staff was very helpful.  stayed here a few times over the years and will again.  It used to be a holiday inn express that had breakfast included.  That is all that is missing.
Manager Response: Dear pinheadsaz,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: One of the best near to Disneyland hotels
Summary: Multiple stays at this hotel.  Although it is not as fresh as when it first opened, it is still one of the best hotels outside of Disneyland.  The employees who work here are all fabulous, nice and very accommodating.  We were attending a convention at the Anaheim center and it was a close walk to both the center and Disneyland.  Great location.  And while the restaurant in the hotel is small, it is reasonably priced, very relaxing and good food.  Far superior to the surrounding chain restaurants and much quieter.  Free parking is a plus along with easy access to freeways.  The Hotel Indigo has a boutique hotel that is uncommon in this area and most appreciated by the two of us.
Manager Response: Dear luv2takepics,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our staffs, location, and amenities. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We had a great stay here for 4 nights. We had a one bedroom suite on the 4th floor, plenty of space, clean and a clear view of the Disney fireworks! Disney is a very easy walk (with two kids in tow) and there are also plenty of family friendly eating options nearby. Parking is free and there are plenty of underground spaces.  Staff are amazingly friendly and go out of their way to help you feel like a valued guest. The kids loved the breakfast in the restaurant downstairs (and I must say I loved my pancakes too).  No, there is not a bath. My kids love baths but part of the fun of travelling is adapting to new environments so not seen as a negative!   Finally, the noise issue. We couldn't hear other families through the walls, although if you spend your time standing in the
Manager Response: Dear Kylie C,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice and detailed review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Such a clean and convenient hotel! Walking distance to Disney, shopping and food. The cvs across the street came in clutch too!! Great stay and very friendly staff. Our room towel animals were the cutest too :). For the price, cleanliness, and great hospitality you can't go wrong staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Taylorw2016,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this wonderful feedback and we will look forward to sharing with the entire team. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim one night during the second week of December while visiting Disneyland.  We arrived at 9:00 from San Diego and were hoping we would be allowed to leave our car in the secured hotel parking lot until check in time.  Arthur not only allowed us to leave our car, he also gave us our room – six hours early!  I was extremely relieved – I was able to park our car once for the two day / one night visit!   The room was quite, clean and comfortable.   We had absolutely no complaints.  The walk to Disney’s main gate was an easy 10 to 15 minutes.  It was easy to see that Arthur genuinely cares about his customers – we will no doubt be staying there again during our next visit to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Bill H,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. What a pleasure it is for us to be able to receive your wonderful feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you are satisfied with guest services and room. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Very comfortable Hotel! We loved it
Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo for our trip to Disneyland during the Holidays this is our second year staying here and we loved it! After a long day at the parks it is really nice to come back to your hotel take a shower in the big/clean bathroom and sleeping in a comfy bed, a very easy walk to the parks and we didn't compromise the quality of our accommodations for staying closer to the parks in another hotel. We ate breakfast here and it was really good with fair prices our 2 year old was not into his breakfast he was getting a tantrum and one of the staff there was really nice offering him fruit and bagels and just being kind to him (speaking to him in Spanish).... thank you!!    This hotel has free parking and free wifi most of the other hotels charge you for this two. We are not
Manager Response: Dear KGLT,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This is a beautiful, modern hotel with clean rooms and excellent staff. It is pet-friendly and our dog loved it! It's about a 15 minute walk to the front gate at Disneyland, which was nice so we could walk our dog drop her off at the Disneyland Kennel. There's a nice restaurant in the hotel, but breakfast is not included. In-room coffee was great and there was a fridge as well. Covered parking under the hotel was a nice bonus. Beds were very comfortable. The shower was tricky to operate and our bathroom door wouldn't lock, but other than that we were quite happy!
Manager Response: Dear Lance G,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We are sorry to hear you had problem operating the shower during your stay. Please feel free to contact us directly if you would like to talk about it further. Thank you very much for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Double room comes with 2 queen sized beds
Summary: 1. Location was great. The hotel was easy to find on the main Katella Avenue. 20 minutes walk to Disneyland. 5 minutes walk to Anaheim GardenWalk where Cheese Factory, P F Chang and other fine dining restaurants are located. 7 minutes walk to Walgreens.  2. Double room comes with 2 queen sized beds enough for our family of 2 kids. As requested they provided 4 towels. As requested they provided a room with a view of fireworks next door ie Disneyland. All rooms have air conditioning ie blowing hot and cold air depending on the temperature you set. Bathroom was quite functional with spacious shower. There were plenty of electrical outlets to charge our smartphones and iPads. The only problem was the safe box which could be removed easily.   3. Car parking was free and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear kingdavid88,  Thank you so much for taking time to writing such detailed and nice review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: 8 and 10 year olds and an easy walk to DL
Summary: Our advice is, don't stay somewhere closer to Disneyland and compromise on the quality of your accommodation. Hotel Indigo ticks all the boxes.  Little restaurant on site, pool etc, close to shops, great view of fireworks, clean, new, lovely staff (Hannah in particular), affordable clothes washing service etc.  Join up to the IHG rewards club before booking to receive a little welcome gift on arrival.  No complaints here :)
Manager Response: Dear Dee02015,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights with family to go to Disneyland.  Great hospitality, great food in the restaurant with very reasonable pricing.  Guest laundry is very handy.  Walking distance to mall and Disneyland.  Easy access by car.
Manager Response: Dear Clarkey39,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our property and thank you very much for your highly recommendation. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim!

Summary: It was our first stay at an Indigo Hotel. We booked it as part of a vacation package with Southwest Airlines . We found the staff to be the kindest ever. We had some special needs to accommodate and they went out of their way to help us. The place was clean. The bed was by far the most comfortable hotel bed I have slept in. I have had 3 back surgeries in the last two years and comfort is very important to me. Arthur the manager made us feel like family. We had an awesome view of the Disneyland fireworks from our room and the main gate is only 2 blocks away. My husband loved the place too. The kids enjoyed the heated pool. Very close to nice restaurants. We would definitely stay here again. 😉
Manager Response: Dear Lee-Ann L,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Again and again, this hotel rocks!!! Staff is so warm and friendly, especially Emily.  The rooms make you feel you are a home.  The on-site restaurant has great food options.  Thank you for a wonderful stay again!
Manager Response: Dear tripsUSA,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great Hotel! I've stayed here before when it was the Holiday Inn Express but I like it better now! The best was the super comfortable beds and second was the walk-in showers with glass door. Ask for a room to view the park fireworks. 15 minute walk to the park's front gate and you'll pass some stores to pick up a sandwich or sundries. Very friendly staff, underground parking, and a bar and restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Mark C,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed here during a quick trip to Disneyland.  My room was huge and the bed was super comfy. The people who worked here were very nice and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again. It was only a short 10 minute walk to the park everyday and the price was affordable.
Manager Response: Dear melissabuck,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was walking distance from Disneyland and they have free parking.  Stayed here December 12-13 and arrived prior to check in time (around 930am).  We asked if we could park our car in the garage since you needed a key to get in.  Emily was very friendly and helpful and gave us a parking pass with no hassle.  The hotel lobby was brightly lit and the rooms were a bit small but very modern and clean.  We stayed on the first floor right next to the pool and we didn't really have any problems with noise or anything like that.  Overall a really great experience! This is going to be my hotel of choice whenever we take a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear ilokanoboi,  Thank you so much for staying with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us another opportunity to take care of you!

Summary: this hotel is easy to overlook as it's right next to anaheim garden walk. HOWEVER, it is DEFINITELY a little gem in the hub bub of it all and i'm SO HAPPY we discovered it! the overall look is very modern and artsy chic from the exterior to eeeeverything in the interior. bedding, bathroom… all of it was very clean. i especially liked that it's non-carpet flooring… makes it seem even cleaner somehow. :o). the beds are SPECTACULAR. SO comfy after an entire day spent at the park, my husband knocked right out after showering. :o)  if you need, they sell disney park tickets in the lobby so you don't have to stand in line to purchase any when you get to the park. they also have snack and drink machines, in case you want breakfast on the run or don't want to leave the hotel at night
Manager Response: Dear Kristie P,  Thank you for your wonderful detailed feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here with a group of 14. Very friendly. Great staff. Very clean. Pool was outside, but had warm water even in December. Food was good. Walking distance to out side restaurants, shopping & tickets to theme parks. Reasonable rates. The bathrooms were modern. The beds were very comfortable. Floors were not carpeted- and were tiled, which made it very clean. Lounge area was nice at night to relax, and they have a lot of beer & drink options. Breakfast available, and it was  fan-freaking-taztic!  Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Kjcmm,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us! We apologize the water was not hot enough for you. We will definitely bring it to our attention. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: Just stayed here December 12-14, 2015. Such a great hotel near Disneyland, convention center, Honda Center, and Angels Stadium! Also near several restaurants, Dennys, McDonald's and cvs pharmacy & grocery.   We booked 2 nights to visit Disneyland for Christmas, unfortunately I got injured at disney on the 2nd day so we had to leave early and did not get to use our 2nd night at the hotel and couldn't get a refund 😢 but we are annual pass holders and will definitely be staying at this hotel again in February!  PROS: super friendly staff, Omar and Arthur were wonderful! The lobby smelled so clean and fresh, loved it. The rooms were very clean and beautifully decorated. Refrigerator worked great in the room. We stayed in 312 which is a king bed room that faces the Disney fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey M,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice and detailed review on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. Please let us know when is your next visit and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advanced! Looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: This is the #1 hotel in Anaheim for me
Summary: I try to make it a point to try the different hotels at the Disneyland Resort and around disneyland.  So this trip started in the early summer. We decided to try the new Holiday Inn Express. Scheduled to be opened in late summer. I booked a room for the first week of December.  After being notified by IHG that the hotel would not be opened. I needed a room at the last minute around the holiday's. In comes Arthur, the front desk manager at Indigo.  After explaining my problems to him he took care of everything.  He talked with his general manager Cleo and they worked out all the details. This being my second trip to Indigo, I knew what to expect. I arrived and sure enough I was greeted with smiles from the front desk staff. The room was prefect just like last time, very clean and
Manager Response: Dear Tim L,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Hotel was clean, great employees everyone was very gracious.  We were happy with the room, however as other reviewers have said the walls are very thin you could here everything in the room next to us. We really liked the location was an easy walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear tmdaz,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our property. We also apologize for the noise coming from the room next to you. We will definitely bring this to our head’s attention. Again, thank you very much for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you next time!

Summary: Good location if you are going to Disneyland. Yes, it is a bit of a hike but not bad to the Disney entrance. Restaurants within walking distance and close to the 5 freeway.  Rooms are a bit small, no place to sit really. You can hear the rooms around you and if near the pool you can hear that too. No bathtub but I nice shower with a handheld sprayer option. Mini fridge in room. Staff was very nice anytime I talked with them. Good parking too.  I'm still looking for the hotel that does it for me when going to Disneyland. Nothing bad with this one but nothing that excites me either.
Manager Response: Dear Turdblossom,  Thank you for taking time to write a review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the noise during your stay with us. I have raised the issue with our team to prevent this further happening to other guest. We hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary Heading: Hip Vibe But Must Pay For Breakfast
Summary: Very contemporary hotel.  We arrived on a cool night and our room window was left open, so our room was very cold. Mostly tiled floors which I am sure are easier to keep clean, but felt cold on my feet in the morning even when the room was warm.  Also, there was an area rug that had a turned up corner that I kept tripping on.  Housekeeping was vacuuming the hall and opened the hall Windows across from my room and the cold air consumed the hallways.  This room was actually a few dollars higher than a few other new hotels in the area, and they did not charge an extra parking fee here.  The room was spotless and nicely appointed with Aveda products, but the extreme sparse contemporary style and lack of a breakfast would probably sway me to a different hotel the next time I am in
Manager Response: Dear G0G0Julie,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about the room was spotless and nicely appointed with Aveda products. We are so sorry to hear the room was cold due to the window was opened. We will definitely bring this to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary Heading: Easy location to Disneyland, great hotel
Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo with our family of four. The staff were very helpful as we had arrived early and exhausted from our 24hrs of flying. The room was adequate and clean. Pool and hot tub were great. Less than an easy ten minute walk to Disneyland. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Zaydah01,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Another nice stay at the Indigo
Summary: This is the second year in a row we've (family of 5, kids 14, 12 and 10) stayed at the Indigo around Thanksgiving (last year was the 4 days before, this year the 4 days after). Remains a good value for the money. I've seen a few reviews complain about this being the 2nd rated hotel in Anaheim. If you equate the rating to luxury, this might not be the place for you. From my perspective, the hotel earns its high rating due to the following:  Very friendly and helpful staff Free parking Price was very reasonable for a room that comfortably slept 5 (2 queen beds, pull out sofa) Only about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland--felt faster this year because the kids legs are longer :-) Clean Cool design and décor. Makes it stand out from all the cookie-cutter hotels Close to restaurants
Manager Response: Dear JSA-Seattle,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Had to find a place in short time for 12 family members. Staff was superb and very helpful. Rooms were nicely appointed and not over priced for the location. The pool facility was excellent. The restaurant was excellent food with great selection. Would have liked a  better pour on the glass of wine.
Manager Response: Dear deerfieldlake,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The front desk personnel were very accommodating and friendly.  The room was very nice and clean. Had refrigerator. We ate breakfast at the restaurant and the food was great!  Hotel within walking distance of Disneyland.  We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Robin S,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great for a trip to Disneyland!
Summary: I brought my mom, dad, and brother to Disneyland for my mom's 60th birthday and we had a great time at the Hotel Indigo. Clean and quiet with helpful and friendly staff. About a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. I would recommend asking to stay on the top floor so you get a better view of the Disneyland fireworks and you can avoid hearing noisy Disneyland-bound children stomping around on the wood flooring above you.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa Z,  Thank you or your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: We come to Disneyland every year and this time I figured I'd spend a little more money for a little more luxury. For being rated #2 on tripadvisor for best hotels near Disneyland; I give this hotel 3 stars. Rooms are very small. No room for extra rollaway. No upgrade was available all three nights we stayed. There is no microwave in the room but there is a safe you have to pay for. There are no vending machines on site which means you have to walk to the 7/11 or CVS down the street. When I saw free parking I thought wow! That's a deal but it's first come first serve and if there are no spots available you end up paying $24 a day in the parking structure my super 8 and walking your luggage to the hotel. For the price I payed I could have stayed across the street from Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Brittany M,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay with us. We are very sorry to read your comments and to know you were displeased with your overall stay. There are several things that we would like to clarify: First, due to the fire safety issue, we do not provide rollaway bed. Second, the safety deposit box in the guestroom is completely complimentary. There are two options for guests to open the safe by either creating 4 digit codes or by swiping your credit card as the password. Third, we do have a vending machine that on the first floor sells soda. We also have Grab and Go station in the lobby that sells beverages, foods, and snacks.   Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: My friends and I moved to this hotel after 2 consecutive sleepless nights at another hotel. It was very important for us to get some rest as we were running the Avengers 1/2 Marathon at Disneyland. The hotel is in a very convenient location to Disneyland - an easy 15-minute walk to the parks. We opted to drive as the Mickey and Friends parking garage is closer to the start/finish line of the race. There are plenty of options for food, including The Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump's, California Pizza Kitchen and more. Parking is available at the hotel, but it's very limited, and parking spots are very small.  Our room was located on the first floor, across from the outdoor pool (which we didn't use as it was too cold for us to use). Noise level was minimal despite our room's
Manager Response: Dear travelteamSDF,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is a great choice for visiting Disneyland.  A very short walk away from the park entrance.  The hotel has a very friendly and service minded staff.  They are quick to provide what you request such as extra towels for the room.  The room was very clean and quiet.   FREE PARKING!!!! The WiFi is a bit slow and difficult to connect to. However, it is free so no harm no foul. The hotel is family friendly. We were a party of six in one room.  Two adults, three teens, and a younger child. The room was big enough for our needs.  Comfy beds, cable TV, and a cool shower with a fixed shower head and a detachable one as well.  We enjoyed a delicious breakfast at their restaurant down stairs. I recommend the eggs Benedict.    In summary all went well. I do recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Dear Mega C,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Stayed at Hotel Indigo for two nights. Reception was friendly and helpful when checking in and out and the room was large, comfortable and clean. It was within walking distance of Disneyland and there were many restaurants nearby, making it very convenient. The only drawback was that the room wasn't very soundproof and I could hear the footsteps from those above.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An amazing hotel for kids and Disneyland
Summary: This clean and modern hotel is just 10 minutes from the main gate of Disneyland, and offers free parking.  The rooms were very nicely appointed, and the bathroom had a large shower.  Also liked that the TV allowed for AV inputs for your own devices.  Very happy with our stay, and with the staff!
Manager Response: Dear Nathan YQQ,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Not As Good As Previous Visit
Summary: We had a 5-Star visit last year on an annual family trip to Disneyland in 2014.  This year was disappointing.  The property was not nearly as clean and we had poor service from housekeeping as well as the Manager on Duty (MOD) when our room had not been cleaned despite being gone more than 8 hours.  When we arrived back at 3:30pm for a quick nap our room had not been serviced.  We called and asked the MOD if we could schedule service after 5:30pm so that we could rest.  We were told bluntly "No" - that the housekeeping staff would be gone by that time.  Then a few minutes later the MOD called back and said sure, no problem, our room would be serviced after 5:30pm.  Not 10 minutes later the cleaning staff knocked on the door and said they needed to clean the room right then if we
Manager Response: Dear Fullstack,  Thank you for taking time to write a review for Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly concerned about your dissatisfaction regarding to the housekeeping service. Please be assured that your feedback has been shared with housekeeping department for investigation and follow up. Please do contact us directly if you would like to share more detailed with us.

Summary: The reviews on here do not lie! The Indigo is a great deal if you are headed to Disneyland. Free parking and wifi. Great Keurig coffee maker in the room. The staff are really friendly and I was asked often how my stay was doing and if they could be of service. I requested a room to watch the fireworks and they did not disappoint! My room faced northwest and because it was tucked away in the corner I did not get any of the noise from the hallway. The breakfast (for an extra charge) was one of the best I've had in a hotel. I had the breakfast burrito which filled me till lunch at Disney. The only negative I can think of is that the water pressure isn't very strong in the shower, but otherwise we had a fantastic stay.
Manager Response: Dear Astroph,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and foods from our restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro. We would like to apologize for the water pressure in the shower was not very strong. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: This hotel has a very good location. The rooms are very comfortable and they have a decent TV and fridge. The barhroom is clean and there is an abundant amount of towels which are replaced frequently. The parking lot has a gate so it is safe. I definitely recommend this.
Manager Response: Dear Luis C,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our location and our amenities. Thank you for your recommendation as well. We certainly hope to have the pleasure to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: We stayed here before we checked into the Disney Hotel. We should of stayed here the entire trip. The only benefit staying at the Disney Hotel was the early entry. Hotel Indigo rooms were nice and the beds were really comfy. Thanks for the nice stay :)
Manager Response: Dear TingaCoffsHarbour,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and willing to stay here the entire trip. We hope we will see you in the near future!

Summary: I chose this hotel specifically because of its TripAdvisor rating. Had requested a "top floor quiet room" but was checked into a pool view on the second floor right next to the stairs. I was concerned about this but the pool closes in the evenings and it was chilly so not much pool usage was happening regardless. Fortunately it was possible to continuously run the fan on the A/C unit which drowned out 99% of any noise we would've heard. (I heard someone stomping down the stairs two mornings but we were already awake.)  Ultimately I was very pleased with the room. The beds were quite firm but plenty of pillows. The bathroom is huge and the shower wand was a nice touch. We did wake up one morning to no hot water; but that was resolved after a call to the front desk and a short
Manager Response: Dear spade7,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: One of our best experiences staying in a hotel! Very clean room, comfortable beds with fluffy duvets & pillows, spacious bathroom, lots of outlets, excellent location to Disney parks as well as many restaurants. The staff, Arthur in particular,  went above and beyond to make our stay extremely enjoyable. The on site restaurant has delicious hearty breakfasts and great happy hour food. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Snowboy7,  Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear you are satisfied with our amenities, location, guest services, and the restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: I'll start by saying this is a perfectly fine hotel and I really don't have any legitimate complaints.   I stayed here for 3 nights for a Disneyland trip with my son and husband. The rooms are definitely clean, simply and functional. The front desk service was totally fine.  Parking was super convenient. And it's an 15 minute walk to the park with a stroller. Probably a little quicker without.   There's a bar and cafe located off the lobby. One evening on our way back to Disneyland we decided to pop in for a couple cocktails since it was happy hour. I had 2 coffee w/ Baileys and my husband had 2 White Russians. The bill was $40 ($10/ea!!). Apparently,  these drinks were not part of the happy hour promotion. I'll file this under the category of 'my fault for not asking'. However,
Manager Response: Dear Sarah T,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are sorry for the price for the alcohol was higher than you expected. We will definitely bring this to our department head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: Instead of driving down each morning from LA for the Avengers Half-Marathon Weekend races, decided to make it a family trip. Hotel Indigo Anaheim certainly fit the bill with everything we were looking for - close to Disney, clean and safe.  We were into Disneyland after a 15 minute walk from the hotel and it was less than a 5 minute walk in the other direction for a handful of good restaurants. A 7-11 is on the corner, as is a CVS, which are both open 24 hours for snacks/drinks and any toiletries you may have forgotten.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful from check-in to housekeeping, always with a smile. Even when I was walking out of the hotel at 3:50a to head to the race was wished a "good luck." They gave us a great room in the back where we watched the fireworks
Manager Response: Dear thehups,  Thank you for taking the time to share such detailed feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. We apologize for the noise that coming from the upper floor and hallway. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent large modern clean rooms. Very nice bistro off the lobby
Summary: We stayed one night after a Disneyland visit.  It is walkable to the theme park but a bit farther than another hotel we stayed in the previous days.  This is a property that has been renovated and is very modern and clean in both the rooms and lobby.
