The room was very nice with a large shower and bathroom counter, plenty of towels, very comfortable bed and a Keurig coffee maker with small selection of teas and coffees.  The room was much nicer than the rather dated room at the closer hotel. There is a small pool with very nice looking patio furniture around it.  All the staff we had contact with were quite friendly.  The lobby had a bistro so we could buy our breakfast, and there was a menu sample in the room showing three course dinners for a very reasonable price.  We didn't
Manager Response: Dear Larry-Lynn,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Everything you expect and usually don't get
Summary: Wow.  We loved it here.  Everything you want from a mid range hotel, all done well and fuss free.  Very quick smooth check in.  Fresh clean room with modern but not bland décor.  Lovely big bathroom, great amenities, plenty of storage, no noise issues, good wifi, free safe, free and adequate parking.  Efficient and friendly staff, and an easy walk from Disney.  We had a problem with our wc, and while it wasn’t completely resolved, they still managed to keep us as happy contented customers.
Manager Response: Dear Sencybil,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: We had the most amazing stay at the hotel indigo for our trip to Disneyland. It was a very lovely, modern, clean room with a massive comfy bed, hard wood floors, great decor, huge bathroom and view of the fireworks. The staff were so accomodating and really friendly, and the food downstairs was also nice. Couldn't hear any noise of other guests, we also used the guest laundry which was good. They have a heated pool and spa which was awesome. Only a 3 minute walk in one direction to restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory, and a 5 minute walk in the other direction to Disneyland entrance and some other restaurants like IHOP. We loved our stay and recommend this to family's, couples, and all travelling to Disney. Thanks Hotel Indigo :)
Manager Response: Dear Melbourne,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us! We are glad to learn that you enjoyed your visit and that you enjoyed the hotel facilities. We certainly hope to have the pleasure to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Had a great 3 night stay for our visit to Disneyland.  Highly recommended for people who want clean, modern, safe, and aren't fussy.  The beds are super comfy and I had no trouble sleeping what-so-ever.  The walls are a little thin,  but what do you expect for less than $300 a night!?   Great prices, good breakfast downstairs, and nice, down-to-earth staff will definitely make me a return guest.  Also, just walk to the Disney parks...it's faster than any other way!
Manager Response: Dear Kristen C,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our room, food at Chambers Bar & Bistro, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: I have stayed in many of the hotels close to Disneyland but none compare to this hotel. I hate that this secret might get out and they would become to busy but this hotel is set apart by the other ones because of the way the staff is. They make you feel at home from the minute you walk in. It's not a high class lots of amenities hotel but rather a comfortable I am visiting Mom kind of hotel. The beds sleep amazing, it is very clean, they have Aveda products and the staff is real and friendly. We went for the exhausting weekend of. Halloween and it was so nice to have a hotel like this to recoup in. They also really got into Halloween which made it nice for people traveling and gave it another family touch. I will chose to stay at this hotel over and over.
Manager Response: Dear Angie R,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our bed, amenities, and guest services. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel indigo Anaheim.

Summary: So I was excited to stay here but in the end I feel like it was a big waste of money I always stay at the Ayres much better! I called ahead of time to make sure I could get 4th floor after reading the reviews that the walls are thin since I'm a very light sleeper. I did also tell the lady on the phone that I will be checking in early and was told that was okay. Well once I got there at 10:30 am I got checked into the 3rd floor with the room next to the elevator and next to the street! I barely slept my whole 2 night there. I went down my first night and asked to change rooms and they told me they can and will change me to the other side. Well, I never got the call to change . I also went down to my car and found tobacco spit all over the side of my car! They offered to have the
Manager Response: Dear Socalsara,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your recent visit to our hotel. We are sorry and disappointed to learn of your negative experience. We apologize that we could not able to accommodate you to the top floor since all of them were occupied during your stay. We also regret to learn that there was some tobacco spit on your new car.   Please do accept our apologies for any shortfalls you may have experienced during this visit and we do hope that the incident will not prevent you from returning to our hotel. Thank you again for your valuable feedback.

Summary: This was our first stay at this hotel.  We liked it though I don't quite understand the extremely high rating.  The hotel was fine but no better than any other mid-grade hotel, and without the free breakfast you would expect at comparable hotels.  It is good but overpriced.  The walk to Disneyland was reasonably short.  Count on 10-15 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear MOB67,  Thank you so much for staying with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: My parents, fiance, and I stayed at Hotel Indigo during our trip to Disneyland. Choosing a clean hotel was my top priority. The rooms were very clean and nicely decorated. I especially liked the laminate floors instead of carpet. Parking wasn't a problem and the staff was helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra B,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a wonderful boutique hotel! Clean! Nice Aveda products!! Close to park! Less than walking to the parking structure!! SO affordable!!  awesome staff! This is our 3rd stay here and are never disappointed! We like to give a shout out to Alfredo! Amazing service!! We will keep coming back!!
Manager Response: Dear jomom4kids,  Welcome back! Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: While this hotel was located very conveniently, there were a couple of issues for us. The room was furnished very sparsely. For a family of 5, which the room was supposed to accomodate, there was hardly any seating. One couch in the living area, no chairs, no table. There was definitely enough room for some kind of table so our kids could actually eat on a surface, but they chose not to include one for some reason.   There was a lot of construction on Katella and you could definitely hear it from the room. The hotel didn't offer free breakfast, or any perks at all. If you're looking for a clean place to sleep, Hotel Indigo will fit the bill; however, do not expect a shuttle, happy hour, a quiet air conditioner, or a shower head with good water pressure.
Manager Response: Dear Sharmet,   Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay with us. We understand that you were disappointed that we do not have enough table and chairs for your family. If we were acknowledged about the issue during your stay, we would definitely bring extra table and chair to your room. Our guests’ satisfaction is of paramount importance to us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, and we hope you consider accommodating with us again so that we can change your perception.

Summary: We stayed here during our honeymoon on our trip to Los Angeles late last year.  The hotel is nicely situated along the main road & is walking distance to everything. Restaurants & shops were all just a short walk away plus the best thing is that hotel is just a mere10-15 mins walk to Disneyland!!  The hotel was beautiful & clean. The rooms were spacious & comfortable.  The staffs were friendly & polite.   We enjoyed our 3 nights stay here very much.
Manager Response: Dear IskanderMohd,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Hotel Indigo is a modern clean small hotel. It has modern decor and tons of ammenities. It has safe convenient garage parking, hotel restaurant and bar, very close to convention center and Disneyland, free wifi, very friendly and helpful hotel staff,  pool and workout room. It is on the same block as Cheesecake Factory, what else do you want?? :) We also ate at Roy's restaurant and there is a PF Changs nearby.  Room cleaning could be done a little earlier that is the only negative comment. Everything else was great for our 4 night stay. We even had a great view of Disney fireworks at 9:30 pm most nights. So all in all I enjoyed our stay and commend the hotel on their cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear bulld0gm0m,  Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Thank you so much for your suggestion about the cleanliness of the guestroom. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: Great staff!!! It has everything you need or want.  Room service cleanliness spacious rooms.  We had a view of the fireworks.  If you can't stay at a Disney hotel because you think their ridiculously priced the hotel indigo is the nex best thing!!! Awesomeness
Manager Response: Dear Juless2985,  Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guestroom. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: I selected to stay here because it is newly renovated and I like boutique style hotels. Loved the modern decor! Wood laminate floors were something I've never seen in a hotel, I always see carpet in all other hotels.  FREE parking! Staff was very professional. Room was clean. Comfy beds. Good counter space in the bathroom. Shower had good pressure. Price was a good value.This is decent walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Center. There was a shuttle available to the Convention Center.   There is a restaurant onsite. (We went to Denny's for breakfast, which was around the corner on the way to Disneyland.)   I would stay here again on my next visit to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear azroxie,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: I would give 5 stars but only stayed 1 night so didn't experience a whole lot the hotel..however here is what I did experience..I was greeted by a friendly face who was very helpful and professional..the rooms were unique and clean. The bathrooms were big and roomy. Needs a bit more water pressure but all and all great. Requested a late checkout had no problems there. Breakfast at Indigo was outstanding..the breakfast burritos were huge and tasty and the service was impeccable..def would recommend this hotel..
Manager Response: Dear Troy S,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and breakfast at Chambers Bar & Bistro. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Clean and service is very consistant
Summary: This past visit was our second stay at this hotel. The rooms are updated, clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. My only minor issue is the sound proofing from the hallways into the rooms, luckily everyone seemed to settle down fairly early so we never had to complain.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca g,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize for the noise from hallway. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying iwht us and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Compulsory family trip: Disneyland. We looked plenty of reviews as we were looking for a hotel within walking distance to the park, not incredibly expensive and very clean  We definitely got a bull's eye with Indigo: Every single person at the hotel was simple charming. They took care of us since we arrived (late in the night). Breakfast was quite good and very very clean. Also, rooms were quite spacious  If we ever go back to Disneyland - which I hope we will not! - we will like to go back to this hotel  Fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear Miguel G,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very proud of our team members who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Loved this Joel, walking distance to Disneyland and well lit when walking back 11pm.  Very clean and private parking was perfect. We'll stay again for next visit. Can't comment on restaurant we did not eat there
Manager Response: Dear Zenay,  Thank you very much for your nice review about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo in early October 2015 for 10 days/9 nights with a group of 8- so we had 3 rooms.  2 standard rooms and 1 Family Room- an extra sofabed and had fireworks viewing! We watched the fireworks several times right from our room- perfect view.  It was nice to have the extra coffee table and sofa in our room- plenty of room for parking the stroller too.    The Hotel room was very clean- Loved the Hardwood floors.  The shower took some learning on how to wait for the hot water- glad it had a handheld shower in addition to the wall mount one to easily shower my young kids.  Love the Aveda toiletries!  Bed was very comfortable- we slept well every night.  Could have had less pillows- they were just decorations in the way for us.  Perfect small size fridge- we had
Manager Response: Dear Christine C,  We are taken aback by your superb detailed review of your recent stay. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Hotel Indigo was a great place to stay. We loved the free garage parking and short walk to Disneyland. The hotel is very modern and clean with all of the amenities you could ask for. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa W,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Check in was super smooth, and we were upgraded to a suite from our standard room at no charge. Free parking that you can come and go as you please. Had a few beverages and appies in the lounge, all of which were delicious. The pool was small, but it was still a nice place to relax . Didn't use the weight room or the hot tub. On site coin fed laundry was a convenient discovery. Close enough to walk to and from Disneyland. Next time I find myself in Anaheim I know I'll be staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Cory H,   What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Hotel Indigo was a really good choice.  Clean, modern, spacious, great bathroom and much nicer than a lot of the tired hotels in Anaheim.  We were greeted by Arthur and Hannah who made us all (2 families, 9 people all up) feel very welcome.   The restaurant down stairs was good for breakfast and it won't break the bank if you haven't had breakfast included in your package.  Indigo is only a short walk to Disneyland,  California Adventure and Downtown Disney and close to the Gardenwalk restaurants which gives you a lot of options for dining.  Arthur put us in contact with a driver service which made it easy for us to get around.  Much better than having to call cabs or get buses.  Some people have complained about noise levels at Indigo, but having stayed at a few Anaheim hotels
Manager Response: Dear TravellingGs,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very happy to read about your great comments on our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur and Hannah that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: A very different kind if hotel concept and I like it. The lobby is large and the checked in process is quick. The room is modern and decorated with natural photo wallpaper - the design is chick and modern. Bed is comfy and the bathroom is large. The hotel provide a swimming pool and a hot tub but I didnt use it. The Hotel also provide a Gym and a washing/drying machines. Parking is Free if you're a guest. Disneyland entrance is about 15 minutes walking distance and there is a huge Garden Mal next to the hotel. Wifi connection is fast. We look forward to come back to this property when we visit Orange County in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Leo H,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed on a recent trip to Disneyland. The hotel has been recently renovated with modern rooms, comfortable beds and friendly staff. With only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, it was the perfect location for visiting the parks.  The only complaint we had is with noise. Because you're close to Disneyland, there are a number of small children running/screaming in the hallways early in the morning. Not much the hotel can do, but something to consider. The hardwood floors in the room, while nice, also caused a lot of noise from the people upstairs.
Manager Response: Dear John G,  Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We apologize for the noise that coming from upstairs. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: Hotel Indigo was perfect for our short stay in Anaheim. This was our first time to the U.S. and after 23 hours of flying we were so glad the check in was fast and simple. Really close to Disneyland, very clean and the front desk staff were very helpful. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Hotel Indigo Anaheim was a wonderful surprise in a very crowded hotel market. The location, staff and rooms offered more than we expected. Close enough to walk to the parks yet none of the noise associated with them or the traffic. The free parking was a plus. The hotel offers food as well as a bar along with a pool. And their prepaid rate was a bargain. We highly recommend the Hotel Indigo Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear Kate W,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your positive feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: Anytime my husband and I travel, we look for an Indigo. It's quickly become my favorite place to stay and this hotel completely met my expectations. We arrived late and the service was excellent. Check-in was swift and I got all of the information I needed to have a great stay. Breakfast was also fantastic at the bar.  The rooms are always beautiful at Indigo. My favorite aspect of the room had to be the large, beautiful shower spa! Perfect start and finish of a great day in Southern California.   Special shout out to Justyn who helped me out months before my trip! She helped me with advanced billing and also made sure my husband and I got a king bed room with a great view of the fireworks! Thanks, Justyn! Great customer service.  Hotel Indigo is the best of the IHG brand. When
Manager Response: Dear HeyMrsJei,  Thank you so much for taking your time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services and room. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a very good value hotel which is spotlessly clean and has good quality soft furnishings.  The beds and pillows were extremely comfortable and the décor is very nice.  The restaurant is pleasant and well priced, as is room service, and the staff are helpful. Pool and fitness centre are small but readily accessible. The location is great: easy walking distance to the Disney parks; and situated among many restaurants and convenience stores.  Be aware though that the rooms are small - or, at least, ours was (two queens).  Just enough room for the beds; only one additional chair which was an office chair.  Hotel is highly recommended if it being used as a base, but rooms are likely to be too small to be comfortable for an extended stay within the confines of the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Jen B,   We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you taking the time to share your kind reviews about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo because of their good rating and how close they were to Disneyland and because they offered free parking.  Since we were there for our honeymoon they upgraded us to a suite with "fireworks view", but we couldn't see them from our room.  It was extra nice that because I am an IHG member that they gave us 2 cans of pop, 2 bottles of water, and a candy bar as a welcome gift.  The room was well kept, but very warm/humid when we got into it.  We turned the AC down as low as it would go and then made our way out to Disneyland (a 3 block walk from the hotel -- NO SHUTTLE AVAILABLE, but the front desk said you could buy tickets for the basic Anaheim shuttle from the Ramada next door.  Honestly, its not too bad of a walk even after standing and walking
Manager Response: Dear GrandMoffNoff,  We would like to sincerely thank you for coming to stay with us and for sharing your experiences about your stay. We always try our best to meet and exceed our guests’ expectation. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience the air conditioner caused. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue. At last, we would like to thank you again for your kind review and our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: We had a nice stay and the hotel seems to be renovated recently and the front desk staff were very nice.  The small cafe they have was so so.  The wait staff started out strong and then fell short.  The food was good for breakfast.  I would recommend if you are visiting Disney.  Its about a 10 minute walk to the gate.  Parking is free.
Manager Response: Dear nicoleGoodyear_Az,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: My family stayed at Indigo while visiting Disneyland.  The staff at Indigo were super friendly and obviously well trained.  We walked to disney which took about 10 to 15 minutes.  The hotel is clean and has safe underground parking.  There are good restaurants within a couple of blocks.  The hotel is decorated in a modern industrial fashion, it is different but fun.  There is a pool and a lounge, the happy hour had good prices for food and drinks.
Manager Response: Dear luv2trip2,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and food at Chambers Bar & Bistro. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This property is great all around: location, amenities, staff, and price, plus it is a smaller property so it is more quiet and less chaotic than others. You can walk to restaurants, shopping, and Disneyland. We appreciated the spa-like bathroom with the Aveda toiletry products, hardwood flooring in the room, as well as the friendly and helpful staff. There are so many small things to mention as well, the room safe, Keurig brewer, refrigerator, pool cabana, restaurant, and free wi-fi, to name a few. We did not even have the opportunity to use the fitness center, business center, laundry, or free parking but it is good to know they are there for future stays.
Manager Response: Dear Lori H,   We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our location, guest services, and amenities. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: The Hotel Indigo was clean and comfortable. The staff was very pleasant and always accommodating - calling cabs, cars to airport, taking care of luggage, room service requests, etc. Just a 8-10 minute walk to Disneyland/California Adventure.
Manager Response: Dear rhondat60,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I booked a triple room last minute at Hotel Indigo through IHG.  The booking process was smooth and hassle free.  As I was visiting Anaheim to go to Disneyland I tried my luck at requesting a room with view of the Disney fireworks.  Upon arrival, I was greeted by the lovely and very professional Khalil who checked my family and I in and granted our request for a room with a view.  During check-in, Arthur also greeted us and welcomed us to the hotel.  The staff at Hotel Indigo were the most helpful, friendliest and accommodating staff that we had experienced during our whole 5 week holiday.  Arthur went above and beyond in recommending places to visit and could not do enough to help.  Our room was a good size for 3 adults with a separate lounge area.  There is a bar fridge and
Manager Response: Dear schester,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This Indigo is a nicely done renovation.  It's very convenient to the Disneyland Resort area.   The rooms are typical for Indigo - with fun touches, unique layouts, etc.   The bathrooms are especially nice for this hotel.  The two negatives I had were: (1) the air conditioner wasn't installed properly, so it had a VERY loud rattle.  It woke me up a few times.  (2) House keeping was a bit spotty.  I left the room at 6:45am.  I came back for an hour between 1:00-2:00pm.  I then returned at 11:00pm, and housekeeping had not come by (or so I thought).  Beds were not made.  No toiletries replaced.  etc.  But, they came in to take towels I had left on the floor away.   If they could fix these issues, the review would be a 5-star rating.  But, it was concerning enough to reduce it a
Manager Response: Dear Toby B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your nice feedback with us. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room. We also would like to apologize for the noise from the air conditioner and the housekeeping service. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary: Family of 5 stayed here for 5 nights in early Oct and had a fabulous stay.  Hotel is like a boutique hotel, very clean and our room was very spacious for our family. Hotel staff couldn't have been more accommodating and helpful.  About 10 minute walk to Disneyland, would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Aussiemumnzj,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that liked our room, guest services, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: This place is great.  And really is within walking distance or a short Uber ride to all things Disney as well as the convention center.  Quiet room with a fireworks view.  Great bar and restaurant on site but also other options a short walk away like Bubba Gumps. Pool,os small and cozy with great comfy seating.  The staff here is at the top of their game.  I'm usually a Hilton guy, but I will be coming back here for sure.
Manager Response: Dear kennymagee1966,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our property. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: This hotel experience delivered and then some.  The rooms are well appointed,  clean, and the beds are very comfortable.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Unfortunately during my trip I got sick and needed to change rooms.  The manager made this transition easy for me and graciously gave me two bottles of water as I went to my room to rest.  Being ill when you travel is never a fun experience, but the folks at Hotel Indigo smoothed out the bumps on the journey and made me feel like I was at home.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Ann F,  We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you choosing to come and stay with us. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our property. We certainly hope that we will be able to welcome you back once again!

Summary: Disappointed! We solely based our hotel decision on Trip Advisor feedback. Either some of the previous feedback is fabricated or we had an excessive amount of bad luck with this hotel.  On our first night, I opened a blind and the whole thing came down on my head.  I used the iron and water leaked out all over my top, ironing board and floor. During our stay, we slept in four different rooms due to the noise, firstly the air con units in all rooms sound like a clothes dryer in your room but with a stop/start mechanism, it was so loud, irritating and difficult to sleep. We complained a few times and moved into a larger room, perhaps to an upgraded room, however the noise was worst as we were placed next to an ice machine which was used at all hours of the night.  You could hear
Manager Response: Dear KerriandKev,  Thank you for taking the time and giving us your feedback about your stay with us. It’s the continuous feedback that makes us strive for success.   We would like to express our most sincere apologies for the experiences that you have detailed. We can assure you that we have taken note of each area of concern and will dissect these issues thoroughly to address them.   Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue. At last, we would like the thank you again for your detailed review and hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: This hotel will not disappoint! Free covered parking, amazing food, the beds were heavenly, staff was great and the location is perfect! I choose to stay here every time I visit Anaheim and I will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Dear Madison C,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We thought Disneyland was supposed to be the happiest place on earth-  hmmm  so we picked this hotel because it was # 2 on trip advisor-  we are on our honeymoon and thought the last couple of days at Disney would be fun- we are  52 and 55 yrs old- we traveled for hours and checked in at 8:00 ish. I called earlier to let the folks know we would be late due to traffic- we are tired and exhausted and finally get here - we walked into this---- no hello no smile- we got credit card and ID I said what? Credit card and ID ,not a good start- the two girls at the desk were clearly not in a happy place - months ago when Dave booked this room all he asked for was a view of the fireworks, the rude girl explained that it was first come first pick of the rooms ? Hmmm ok-  she didn't even try
Manager Response: Dear Angela,  Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we take each and every piece of feedback very seriously and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.   We are sorry to read that your check-in experience was not a good one. We will definitely bring this to our attention. We welcome the opportunity to learn more about the details of your experience and may be reached at info@anaheim.hotelindigo.com   Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Recently stayed for three days and had a pleasant stay. We had a small issue where we were booked for four nights and needed to adjust our dates which was handled quickly by Emily at the front desk. The room itself was great and perfect for relaxing in after a day at Disneyland.  I loved the hardwood throughout the room!
Manager Response: Dear Brad W,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: My wife and I had the pleasure of staying here for a wedding recently. It was a quick one night stay and was very pleased with the experience. We were able to check in super early which was great because we had a afternoon wedding to get ready for.  Front desk staff was accommodating, kind and even funny.  The hotel reminds me of the Aloft brand of hotel. Modern and clean, very cool little place. You really would not expect this type of hotel in the middle of Disneyland country.   Room was nice and clean, bathroom was super nice. My wife really enjoyed the brand of bathroom amenities.  The bar staff was great as well. Dean help out our large wedding party with ease and had a smile on his face the whole time. The location is also great, walking distance to Disneyland and also the
Manager Response: Dear ledieff,  Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Indigo Anaheim! Disney Magical!
Summary: Me and my friend stayed at the Indigo whilst visiting the D23 expo at the Aneheim Convention Centre in August 2015.   We found the hotel to be very clean, welcoming and very convient for the expo, Disneyland Park, shops and an Ihop.  There is the Anaheim Gardenwalk literally less than 1 minute walk away from the hotel, we went on a Monday afternoon and most of the shops were shut but there is a fantastic shop called Geeky Mamas which sells all things geek! Also a Lush store and Bubba Gumps is right near it. Also a cheesecake factory, my favourite!   Check in and check out was simple, they kept out luggage for us after check out which was very helpful.  The room was great, beds were comfortable, the shower is amazing and there was no noise or disruptions during the night.  I
Manager Response: Dear CupcakeChan,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: This hotel is a good choice for people looking for a basic but clean place near Disney. The staff on reception were friendly but not very polished, whenever we walked in they would be nattering to each other and we were not acknowledged until we were right up next to them.  The room was big and clean and the beds were comfy, the aircon unit sounded like a jet engine but did produce cold air which was needed as it was 35 degrees!  Its a 10/15 min walk to the parks and there are loads of nice places to eat around the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear SydneyS_k,  Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. We apologize for the noise that coming from the air conditioner. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Boutique, where some big ones could learn a thing or two..
Summary: Arriving after our stay at the Wynn Las Vegas, Indigo was 'a breath of fresh air' (literally also).  Firstly, Emily(?) that checked us in was amazing, happy, helpful and welcoming.  The room was perfect for family, two doubles, bathroom and small lounge with TV.  Clean, comfortable and a view of the Disneyland fireworks from our back window.  Just the type of respite you need after a full day at Disney, quiet, comfy, modern and clean.  The walk to Disney is about 10min and within 2 min out to the right you have QVS grocer/pharmacy on one corner, 7Eleven on the other corner and Pizza joint on third corner.  Eating in was a pleasure and I didn't even care that the coffee machine broke down - as I was still elated that we had an opening window, laundry, little pool and spa.  Oh,
Manager Response: Dear LiLosAllowed,  We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us! We are very delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: Lovely hotel only 15 minutes walk from Disneyland and less than 5 minutes to restaurant strip. Nice bar and bistro downstairs and staff have been excellent. Room very comfortable with everything you could need - very spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Doug57_10,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and room. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: If you haven't had a chance to stay at a Hotel Indigo, I encourage you to give them a try.  Reasonable rates and great service are a given and you will experience one of the most unique decors you've seen.   This one plays off of the history of the area by incorporating the Walnut groves into the interior design that once graced this area.   Give them a try.   You won't regret it.
Manager Response: Dear Fourkidstwopets,   We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Great location near Disneyland and some food places down the block. Rooms were great modern. Great beds, good size room and good size tv, I kind of wish there was a tub but that's ok. The front desk was very nice especially the man at the front best. The hotel is not crazy big and had a pretty mellow vibe there. Overall I would check in again!
Manager Response: Dear lilymelville,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our room and guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was our first stay at Hotel Indigo and we absolutely loved it!  Staff were very friendly and helpful throughout our entire stay.  We arrived very early but they were able to accommodate us and made sure we signed up for the loyalty program so we did not need to pay for the early check in.  The room was decorated nicely and was very clean.  Location was great, about a 10 min walk from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Dana D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this wonderful feedback and we will look forward to sharing with the entire team. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Friendly staff, comfortable bed, clean room. Over all a great stay. The only complaints are that the hallways were SO hot, at least on the 4th floor. They didn't seem to be air-conditioned at all. Also, one day we came back from the parks and the door to our room was not completely closed. The door didn't always latch when it closed on its and apparently housekeeping didn't make sure it had latched. Nothing was missing, thankfully, but it was a bit disconcerting. We reported it to the front desk and theey had maintntenance come up and fix the door. Other than that, a perfect stay!
Manager Response: Dear Ellester43,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We apologize the hallways were so hot while you stayed with us. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Also we apologize for the door could completely closed; however, we are glad that our staff tried to resolve the problem at the first place. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. Once again, thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for our Disney trip. We have stayed in several hotels in our visits and this is definitely one of the better hotels. Ok distance from the parks but can be a bit far after a long day at Disney. We used uber several times which was cheap and helped.  We wished that there had been a microwave in the room but not a real deal breaker for us. Fridge was very cold!  Very updated and clean furnishings. Very comfortable beds and very quiet. Room temperature was perfect. Didn't buy the breakfast because it was a little pricey for us. I. do have two suggestions for the hotel. Update the sheets. They are not very good quality and you can tell by the feel.   2nd - Have your maids turn the shower adjustment back to shower mode after they are done cleaning. We struggled to change
Manager Response: Dear abeaty10,  Thank you for having taken time to review your experience with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you so much for your two suggestions. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. We will definitely bring these to our head’s attention. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland. Could see the fireworks from our room.
Summary: Friendly and helpful staff. The food was good and we were often given a free newspaper each morning with our breakfast. The room was very clean and comfortable.  Enjoyed the spa and pool area. The only one thing that was a bit of a problem was that the Wifi kept cutting out.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa542,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and room. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would like to apologize for the WiFi. We will definitely bring it to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here because it was close to Disney, and also close to shops/restaurants. No problems during check in, the staff were very helpful and friendly. The rooms are very modern and chic. I loved the hardwood floors, and everything about the bathroom!   Our room had a view of the fireworks from Disney! I loved the little seating area on the second floor. Didn't get a chance to make use of the pool/fitness area, but we did use the laundry room.   The staff went above and beyond by calling me after I had checked out to let me know that I had left my water bottle behind. They offered to have someone drop it off at another hotel I was staying at, or just ship it to me. It wasn't anything expensive, so I told them not to worry but I appreciated the offer.   If I ever make it back
Manager Response: Dear Lacey P,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Was more than impressed with Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Travelled down the west coast and stayed here for 2 nights, enjoyed the stay enough to return for another 2 nights to end the trip. As most have said, the Hotel is very close to Disneyland (10min walk), some really good restaurants in walking distance of the property, free parking and a nice clean outdoor swimming pool. Staff were fantastic, really helpful throughout the stay and the property was well decorated and spotless.
Manager Response: Dear Ricky F,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most delighted to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us at our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We had an excellent experience with this hotel. We arrived early and they were able to check us in to our room which was awesome! The room was very nice and the beds were so comfortable! It was nice an quiet at night. The location was within a 10 min walk of the park and many restaurants close like PF Changs, Cheesecake Factory, etc. The pool was so nice on a very hot day! When we checked out, they even offered us cold waters. We would stay here again! Thanks Arthur!
Manager Response: Dear Hulasista1,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our property. We always try our best to meet and exceed our guests’ expectation. Our team looks forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: We stayed one night at this hotel.  The staff was friendly and professional. The room was very clean, love the wood floor and the bathroom was spacious.  The price very reasonable.  Parking under the hotel was secure and convenient.  Great location for visiting Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Dear gingertoo,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. What a pleasure it is for use to be able to receive your wonderful feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and location. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights this week whilst travelling around California on hols.  Great hotel, easy to find, free underground parking, nice large room, big bathroom with walk in shower.  A 10/15 min walk to Disneyland/Downtown Disney.  Very friendly staff.  Not sure on some of the reviews where they state there is nothing to eat close by, as there is Garden Walk with a load of chain restaurants - PF Changs, California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factoryo name but a few!  Will deffo stay here when returning to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear andrew3233,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We chose the Hotel Indigo for the free parking and close proximity to Disneyland. My son asked if we could go see Mickey for his 5th birthday, so we did. I hadn't been since OJ was arrested....I was way overdue. So this hotel is what's called a "re-brand". Originally, it was a Holiday Inn Express. Both are part of the IHG family, so It made sense that they wanted to upgrade and move to a newer brand. The Hotel Indigo brand is a boutique hotel. Usually, this means it's just going to cost more, but you get more than what you pay for with Indigo. The more obvious difference between a boutique hotel like this one and other hotels like Holiday Inn, Candlewood, or even a majority of the Hilton and Marriott brands, is the décor. Each room is unique in it's own way, whether it's the
Manager Response: Dear Deeds4918,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing suck kind and detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our property. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience the elevator caused you. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: My colleague & I had a wonderful experience from the minute Arthur greeted us at the Front Desk. The rooms are spacious, staff is friendly, and amenities are 4 stars! And it was incredibly affordable.
Manager Response: Dear Jenn D,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: A quick "in and out" trip - one night only for business.   Had never been to this hotel before.   Could not have been happier!   Over the top friendly and helpful employees, sparkling modern room that was beyond comfy.   Slept like a baby.   Has all you need on site, even a small bar and restaurant, but the Garden Walk is only a couple blocks away with dining choices galore.    You can't go wrong with Hotel Indigo.   It will be my first choice whenever I have to be in Anaheim again for sure.    Thank you to the front desk employees who took such great care of me and my business needs and the packages we had to send.   And to the housekeeper who fixed my A/C issue right away without fuss!   Keep up the great work.
Manager Response: Dear Skyewiz,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are so glad that you are satisfied with the guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo for four nights starting on Labor Day. We were in town for Disneyland ( what else?!) and thought we would try this new "boutique style" hotel getting all the great reviews on Trip Advisor.   The rates were nice, and we originally booked a King sized bed, but had to switch to a two queens sized room when we decided to add an extra night to our stay. We were on the 2nd floor, which was quiet and close to the stairs and elevator. The room had no view, but that's okay as we hardly raised the blinds to notice. The TV was nice and big, with proper HD programming supplied. The rooms have Keurig coffee makers and were amply supplied each morning by housekeeping.   We ate in the restaurant, Chambers Bar & Bistro each night, basically because we were too
Manager Response: Dear wingsofgrace,  Thank you so much for your detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our property. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Such a great hotel with the friendliest staff. Clean, comfortable, and with great amenities. The restaurant is a very convenient for those early Disney mornings. Conveniently located near Disneyland, it's a little bit of a walk but close enough where a shuttle isn't necessary.
Manager Response: Dear jasonr3939,  Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Even though we didn't have time to visit Disneyland this trip, we chose to stay here because we had a chance to see the fireworks at night.  The well-trained staff welcomed us warmly and attended to our every need.  The room was large, beautifully appointed, clean, green, and had a luxuriously comfortable bed.  The location was close to a variety of restaurants, shopping, and everything we needed... Oh, yeah. And Disneyland.  We will return to this excellent hotel whenever we are in the area!
Manager Response: Dear TeamBrenna,   Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very happy to read about your great comments on our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: My wife and I were searching for a pet friendly hotel near Disneyland when we discovered Hotel Indigo. What we saw in the pictures and read in the reviews is exactly what we experienced when we arrived! The hotel's appearance is remarkable and the rooms are cozy and stylish. The pet fee is also unbeatable! This is our new hotel of choice when in the Anaheim/Disney area!
Manager Response: Dear Charles W,  What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our property. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo while celebrating a birthday in our family.  We traveled from Lincoln, NE.  The staff, especially Hannah and Arthur (name might be incorrect) were incredibly helpful.  Hannah even offered to move her own car when we couldn't find a parking spot.  The morning staff in the restaurant were very accommodating, too.  We were in a tremendous hurry, and they were able to get our food to us very quickly.  And it was delicious.  The rooms were very nice, and we liked the 'walnut' connection of Anaheim to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Deb C,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo for the night when visiting Disneyland Park. We had a great time. It was within walking distance to the park. The rooms were very tasteful, clean, wonderful beds and towels. It was nice to have a restaurant in the hotel to get a late dinner and breakfast. I definitely would stay there again. The staff was also very helpful and extremely courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Linda F,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon for another enjoyable stay!

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights whilst visiting Disneyland. Location was perfect - less than a mile from the front of hotel to Radiator Springs!  Was easy to walk back in the afternoon for a cool down and dip in the pool.  Would of liked the bar to stay open a little later as it was already closed when we got back from the parks each evening when a quick drink would of been appreciated.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear nycv,  Thank you so much for taking your time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you like our property. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: 8 Nights at the Hotel Indigo did not disappoint.  From the moment of our arrival the staff were engaging and helpful, nothing was too much trouble and the overall vibe was fantastic.  I chose this hotel based on location - and yes, TripAdvisor reviews, they've not let me down.  The main reason for our stay was to visit Disneyland - this hotel was less than 10 minutes walk from the main gates and each night we could see the fireworks from our room window.  My children are 9 & 12, I thought they may groan at the walk but the excitement of being where we were and where we were going gave them the adrenaline to get there and back (surprisingly) with no complaints!  Our room had two queen beds - which suited our family perfectly & they were extremely comfortable. There is an in-room
Manager Response: Dear Melissa T,   We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our location, guest services, and our breakfast. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary Heading: A serviceable hotel to access Disney.
Summary: A serviceable hotel with a friendly staff. Pros:  A friendly staff that aims to please.  Parking garage, In room safe for valuables and a coffee maker, mini fridge and microwave.  Free Wifi.   Within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure. Approx .3-4 blocks.  Fireworks are view-able from the property.  Cons:  No complimentary breakfast (not necessary, but appreciated).  small rooms, with doors that that crash into each other and tile floors in the rooms, that kids my slipped and fell on in socks.  Kids are fine, we ate cereal and enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Grayin88,   Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you are satisfied with our guest services and amenities. We are sorry for the trouble and hassle that the doors caused you and very sorry that floor was slippery during your stay. We will definitely bring this to our department’s head and make sure it will not happen again. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: Stayed just this past weekend with my family including two young daughters 6&7 yrs old.  Our family ran the Disneyland 5k. I ran the 10k & half marathon.  We also spent time at the parks. The hotel is close enough to walk to the parks or downtown disney.  Even better the hotel is served by 3-4 ART routes so it's quick n easy to get a ride! The hotel itself is new, clean and friendly.  Free wifi. Also parking is included in your hotel rate. No additional fee!  The only one drawback is when we ate in the hotel cafe/restaurant we inquired as to a coupon for meals but found out later from the front desk that we could have purchased a meal voucher.  That would have been nice to know! There's also a CVS practically next door and several restaurants too including PF Changs, Cheesecake
Manager Response: Dear eelokana,   We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our location and facilities. We would also like to apologize that we did not inform you about the breakfast voucher that sell at Front Desk when you checked in. We will definitely bring it to our attention. We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: The fam and I loved the Hotel to death. The place was immaculately clean. The rooms were huge, the living area was also big, and the bathroom was amazing as well. We obviously stayed here for Disneyland and it's close enough to walk. In fact the Hotel's customer service is pretty amazing as well. They let us check in early and park in their facility so we could get to the park first thing.   The place is somewhat close. We could walk but it was probably a 10-15 minute walk, which isn't terribly bad when you are arriving. However after having walked around the park for 8 - 10 hours, getting back is a little of a trek. Still though on the walk there we only passed a couple other hotels which were marginally closer. I think if you want to walk out the door and into the park your
Manager Response: Dear SoutherncaliTrojan,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback of your stay. We are happy to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very proud of our team members in ever department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Not exactly sure why or how this place is this good
Summary: This place was exceptional for the cost. Food, room service, staff, pool, location, and general vibe - really great for the price. My daughter and i had a great time. Huge thanks to your management and staff. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Gerald C,  We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our food, guest services, and location. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed on an Army Band performing trip. The hotel went above and beyond to accommodate us. The manager, Arthur was very friendly and always looking for a way to help out. The front desk staff was always smiling and great conversationalists. The pool area has a great free cabana and was spotless. The restaurant has a full bar with a good selection of wines and the food was high quality with a variety of selections, most of which were pretty healthy, which is hard to find. There is a water, music and light show nightly at their outdoor rock pond directly in front of the hotel. Many restaurants are in walking distance, within one block or less, and there is a Coffee Bean and CVS right across the street.  The hotel was very clean, the restaurant staff was very professional, the
Manager Response: Dear heatherachael1979,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services, the food at our restaurant, and cleanliness of the property. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay for a Disneyland visit
Summary: Very clean. Convenient parking. Staff was extremely friendly.  If you are going to Disneyland, this hotel is with walking distance (roughly 1/2 mile).  We only stayed one night, so did not get to experience amenities like the pool of restaurant, but the rooms and service were very good.
Manager Response: Dear lizipsu07,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied of our guest services and location. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming  you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Very nice stay, close to Disneyland, friendly staff
Summary: We loved the Hotel Indigo Anaheim. I have made the reservation due its proximity to the Disneyland, 10 min walking distance. Clean and very modern rooms, comfortable beds, etc. Everything was good. They also sell Disneyland tickets at the desk, very convenient but accept cash only or you can but online with a credit card and they will issue a ticket with the voucher.
Manager Response: Dear Ercan B,   Thank you so much for staying with us at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our property. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Let's start with the location... The hotel is near the maingate of Disneyland but still a good 20 minute walk. But its near amenities and restaurants in the Garden Walk mall.  The rooms are really quite well equipped. Ours came with a Keurig coffee maker which was supplied with both and tea capsules. (Wish I had proper creamer though)  Toiletries were from AVEDA. A premium brand. Rosemary Mint. Very nice touch Indigo.  We loved the FREE PARKING! Free WiFi is now almost the standard for most hotels so we won't mention it.  The staff were very attentive... One person to mention was Arthur... He's a gem. Met him over the 2 days we were here.. Always smiling and very polite. He also helped us with our check out.  I definitely recommend this hotel for your future stay in the Disney
Manager Response: Dear Klimax_SG,   Thank you so much for your detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Our room was clean and spacious.  The only thing I really didn't like was that the hotel Pool was a bit small and breakfast options were minimal.  Staff was friendly and courteous. I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Calypsosmom,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Regarding to the breakfast options, we will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: We stayed there for 2 nights.This was our first time (Family of 4) staying at this hotel. We loved it, modern look and feel to it. Parking is free. Nice business office, used it to print our boarding passes. Easy Check-in. Our room was on the 4th floor. Room as clean, good size, Room temperature was easy to adjust (thermostat control on wall). Beds were very comfortable. Had a mini Fridge, Keurig Coffee maker, Good size tv, Bathroom had shampoo, conditioner, hand, body soap, lotion, mouth wash, plenty of towels, hair dryer. Room came with a safe and ironing board located in the closet. We had breakfast the first morning we stayed there, Good food, just a bit over priced. They have a full bar and bistro. Overall we were very happy with this hotel. it was a 15 minute walk to the
Manager Response: Dear TheTruth415,  Thank you so much for your detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our property. Regarding the price for our breakfast, we will definitely bring your suggestion to our head’s attention. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: I would rate it 5 I'f they serve breakfast buffet  Comfortable bed  and shower  Clean and the corridor smells good  A close walk to disneyparks  Helpful and friendly staff  It's a great hotel and will definitely recommend to other traveler  Close to restaurants  Free parking and safe too
Manager Response: Dear Ginadeh,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you very much for your suggestion about breakfast buffet. We appreciate the time and effort you have spent to share you insightful comments, which will be seriously considered and adequately implemented. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. An easy walk to Disney or to the garden walk where there are tons of restaurants! The hotel was very clean and we stayed in room 233. The room overlooked the pool and was away from the road so overall it was fairly quiet. Now the only downside was the ac unit. I like my room COLD, and although the ac did the trick once it got to 67 degrees the unit would automatically turn off. So it would have to warm up in the room and then kicks back on. This is quite frustrating especially when it's 100 degrees outside!  There should be an option or a way to overwrite the auto shut off. Other then that we had a comfortable stay and would stay again if we were in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Dragonfly22ny,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments following your recent stay with us. We would like to apologize for the air conditioner. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: I absolutely recommend this hotel , check in was smooth and fast , the room was even better , I was able to see the fireworks , bathroom was remodeled which I loved , the bed was comfortable and very clean. Every time I left my room and came back I had new towels and my room was nicely fixed. The staff is welcoming, always checking If I needed anything. The WiFi was also a good , it wasn't slow. The good thing about this hotel is it's only 10 minutes away from Disneyland and 10 from the garden walk. So many places to explore because of its great location. it was clean from the moment i entered till the moment i left. Prices are also affordable. This is my fourth time staying here and I am never disapointed. I will definitely be staying here again ! Thank you for having an
Manager Response: Dear Esmeralda M,   Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you liked our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words and we look forward to see you next time!

Summary: Great staying great hotel .friendly people at the front desk and help in everything.room was great and very clean  i was stuning spotless good housekeeping service i was very hsppy and enjoy my staying in this great hotel indigo in anaheim .thank you all .
Manager Response: Dear Jhon T,   Thank you so much for your kind review for your recent stay! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with your guest services and room. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Nothing to say about this hotel, most reviewers already gave good comments and those are true fact. The hotel is modern, clean, spacious room, friendly staffs, free parking, reasonable price, walking distance to Disney theme park, restaurants also nearby. What else do you need ? Perfect choice.
Manager Response: Dear ytktdy,  Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We also thank you for your kind compliments on our team members’ service. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon.

Summary Heading: A Great Place for a Disneyland Visit
Summary: Got off the direct flight from Brisbane Australia at 6.00am. We were at the hotel by 8.30am thanks to SuperShuttle, an excellent way to commute in LA. We were staring at a wait in the lobby till checkin time of 3.00pm!! This was when the true value of the Hotel Indigo Anaheim became apparent. Melody at Reception ensured the cleaning crew turned around our room first so we were able to access it by midday, and get to bed by 12.15pm - fantastic! All the staff we met were happy, smiling and very helpful. It was an extremely pleasant hotel to stay at and only 10 mins walk from Disneyland/Disney California Park.  Rooms are clean, new and well maintained. Beds are soft and comfy. Didn't try the breakfast or dinner meals on offer, but Nadia at the bar did great work at Happy Hour from
Manager Response: Dear David S,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your positive feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: My husband and I along with our 2 young adult sons stayed a week. The room was big enough for all of us. It was a separated room and it was quite when separating door was closed.
