This is a great spot to stay if you are going to Disneyland, see an Angels game, the Outlets at Orange. It is also a short drive to Seal Beach. The staff is amazing. We had a medical issue and they were able to direct us to UC Irvine medical center and we used their walk in clinic. The staff was able to answer questions or get you an answer quick.  The property is in great shape and the staff work daily to keep it so.
Manager Response: Dear MmpayneAZ Bryan,   Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your time here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are also pleased to note that our team members’ service standards met your expectations. Every employee at our property tries his or her best to meet or exceed guests’ expectation. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: When you go to Disney stay here
Summary: We were going to Disney with our two kids, and wanted a hotel away from the park. Indigo is perfect, room was big, very comfortable and very clean. Disney entrance is 10 min walk. Staff were friendly and helpful. Most importantly when you are going to Disney it is amazing value. We have stayed in 20 hotels during a 7 week vacation, and the room at Hotel Indigo compared with some of the best we stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear Jesimmons,   Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, Comfy and Simply Wonderful Stay!
Summary: My wife and I stayed a week at the Hotel Indigo and had a truly wonderful experience. The property is very nicely maintained and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean, comfy and met our needs perfectly. We enjoyed breakfast several at the restaurant several mornings before heading out for the day and the food was very good. The hotel location was great! The Convention Center and Disneyland are close and the walks were enjoyable. Overall, our experience was very good and we recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear Greg S,   Thank you so much for your nice review and comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to note that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and location. We always try our best to meet and exceed guests’ expectation. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: We were looking for something fun and funky and we found it. The hotel is close to front entrance of Disney , with a chic funky upbeat vibe . The service was impeccable and attentive reminding one of a much higher star rated hotel . Price very reasonable and chic lobby and rooms made us more than happy. Free parking. No free breakfast was only downside. Would stay again
Manager Response: Dear DMWorld2See,   Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with guest services and rooms. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland Option - Especially for Adults!
Summary: Went to Disneyland just myself and my BF - we are both in our early 30's. Had looked at the other Disneyland hotel options, but they were all so family oriented and too motel-ish for our tastes.  Indigo turned out to be perfect for us - huge bathroom, modern rooms and only a 10min walk to the gates.  Definitely not as close to the park as some of the other hotels that are further up Harbor St., but we walk all the time and without kids, this distance seemed like nothing to us. Also free wifi and parking. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy to find and plenty of secure under hotel parking. Check in was easy and the hotel staff explained everything and were very helpful. Upgraded to a suite due to loyalty point status but unfortunately right by the ice machine which made it noisy at times. We had room 402 which we were told we could see the fireworks from the window though we were not in the room when they were on. The room was spacious clean had a good sized shower room with plenty of sockets and only  a 10 minute walk from the disney entrance and downtown Disney . With plenty of dining options in the local neighbourhood including my favourite Cheesecake Factory a five min walk away. We only used this as a base for visiting Disney as to far to travel into LA but I would have no issues with staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Paul R,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your review. Service is a top priority for us and your compliments will certainly be an added boost for our team members on our journey to service excellence. We would like to apologize for the noise coming from the ice machine. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: I was unfamiliar with this hotel brand,but based on the TripAdvisor reviews, I booked 4 nights for my wife and I. From the moment Kahlil greeted us upon arrival, everyone we encountered during our stay was absolutely cheerful, professional, and helpful. When she learned that friends of ours were also checking the same day, she made every effort to get our rooms near each other. They had a small dog, which are welcome at the hotel. As others have said, it's a short walk to Disneyland, and even shorter to the Anaheim Garden Walk, with multiple dining options. The rooms are  very nice and clean. Ours had a view of the fireworks at Disneyland. The breakfasts were very good. The free parking is in a secured underground garage. The only issue we had was a very loud squeaky box spring
Manager Response: Dear solanodoug,  We are pleased to note an overall enjoyable stay but was disappointed to learn the issue of the loud noise box spring on the bed. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention.  Please do let us know should you decide to return to Anaheim as we would look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo while visiting the Disneyland parks.  It was about a 15 minute walk to the park entrance.  The hotel was in pretty good shape.  The small pool and hot tub were well maintained and quiet.  The service was very good at the hotel, they really tried to make your stay a pleasant one.  As far as the decor, think Marriot Courtyards cooler younger brother.  The rooms had only a small window, but surprisingly the room seemed open and bright.  The bathroom was modern with a large walk in shower with 2 shower heads.  Oh, and they had  Aveda bath products, Rosemary mint, yum.  The restaurant was pretty consistent for breakfast.  The food was good and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear Familyloves2travel4, We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing Hotel Indigo Anaheim and taking time to share your positive feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary Heading: Nice place in the right location
Summary: We arrived via taxi and had a staff member help load our bags on a luggage cart.  Check-in was very easy and the staff worked very hard from the beginning to the end of our stay to make sure they were helpful.    The rooms are nicely decorated with several nice amenities.  The bathroom was large and it was easy to get all of our stuff in the room.  The bed was very comfortable.    Disneyland was only a 10 minute walk away.
Manager Response: Dear Shoots V, Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay at our hotel and delighted to read that our colleagues made a good impression on you. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Everything was great at the property.  Parking was good...check-in was good.  Room was super (very upscale).  The locations was great for the convention center.  Disneyland was very close.  Actually...I could see the Tower of Terror from my window.  Lots of places to eat all over the place.  Very relaxing....I will bring my family the next time.
Manager Response: Dear Castanza0! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you and your family real soon.    Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Stayed here recently on points after visiting a conference in town.  Walking distance to Mouse-land and the Anaheim convention center. Very friendly staff seemed to really want to please.  Room was very clean and fresh, and we got to see the Mouse-land fireworks from our window.  Pool was really nice.  Would have give it 5 stars because I thought the room came with a free breakfast (but later found out it was pay as  you go).  I would surely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear jimbo26,   Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest service. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: This hotel is ok if the price was better i would give it 4 stars. Rooms are updated with new furnishings. Bathroom has a sink style i've never seen before. We were able to see the fireworks from the room. Check-in was ok. However this hotel was very noisy we were on the 1st floor by the garage. All night I heard people coming up and down the stairs.  It's close to disneyland so that's probably why. Also the elevator to the garage takes a long time.
Manager Response: Dear Rich M,   Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize that the elevator was slow during your stay and the noise from the garage. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Good value for money for a comfortable hotel.
Summary: Nice and comfortable room, good location (both for people attending conferences at the Anaheim Convention center and for families heading to Disneyland). Fine facilities (gym, pool and whirlpool) as well as basic business center. Breakfast could be better "organized" (but the food itself is ok).
Manager Response: Dear raquelbd,  Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry to hear that your dining experience was not a positive one. We will definitely bring it to our attention. Thank you again for your feedback. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon.

Summary: Our recent stay at Hotel Indigo was amazing! It is so close to Disneyland - just a short walk. The staff is very kind and helpful. Breakfast options were great! Large portions, good food. Rooms are very comfortable. Thank God for the Kurig and a mini fridge. Kids enjoyed the pool. Being on the first floor it was a little loud from kids up stairs but with one call to front desk the situation was remedied. I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear Clairie24,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your time here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are also pleased to note that our team members’ service standards met your expectations. Every employee at our property tries his or her best to meet or exceed guests’ expectation. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Extraordinary Value With a Touch of Style in Anaheim
Summary: My teenage daughter and I stayed four nights at Hotel Indigo while attending VidCon and spending a few days at Disneyland.  The hotel is in a wonderful location - 10 minute walk to Disneyland and about the same to the convention center.  The staff is friendly and gracious.  They anticipated our needs without us even having to ask.  It was a real treat.  The room was stylish, relatively large and extremely comfortable.  Great beds, good lighting and NO noise even though the hotel was completely full.  We ate breakfast at the hotel several times and the food was great, service was QUICK and the prices reasonable.  Also, you can see the Disneyland fireworks from the pool area.
Manager Response: Dear Shelly S,  Thank you so much for your nice review. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your dining experiences at our restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon.

Summary: Great location, 10 min walk to Disneyland, 5mins to convenience stores / chemist.  Modernised hotel, comfortable beds, great shower and nice bathroom.  Friendly staff.  On sight restaurant, we bought takeaway fruit and granola. In room coffee / tea maker that uses supplied pods, fridge in room.
Manager Response: Dear AmandaandFraser,  Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back for more successful stays!

Summary: Stayed 2 nights, our first experience with Hotel Indigo.  Very reasonable priced, informative front desk and warm welcome.  Rooms very colorful and modern, we loved the fact the floors are not carpeted.  Could not hear neighbors on either side only above once in a while. Note, our room on the first floor, only had a nice shower no tub.  Has a refrigerator and good wifi.  Very clean and comfortable.  Has laundry on site and a nice pool and outdoor seating area along with off street parking. Lobby has a nice bar with daily drink and appetizer specials.  Also offers food and drink,  prices good considering in CA and were very good.  Location perfect, in comfortable walking distance (about 15 min tops)  to Disneyland/Downtown Disney.  Close to a few quick food places (subway, pizza,
Manager Response: Dear JLDSMD F,  Thank you for sharing your nice review with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your accommodations. We also thank you for your kind compliments on our team members’ service. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Loved this gem of a hotel!
Summary: Loved the quaintness of the hotel.  Location was within walking distance to Disneyland and many restaurants in surrounding areas.  Staff and management were very friendly and helpful; Emily was our favorite.  Our room was immaculate - very clean and stylishly appointed.  Bed was very comfy.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Linda C,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your review. Service is a top priority for us and your compliments will certainly be an added boost for our team members on our journey to service excellence. We certainly look forward to welcoming you to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again soon!

Summary: We were greeted by Victor at the front desk. He was very welcoming + accommodated our request to be on the 4th floor with an upgrade to a suite! Our room was immaculate and very modern! We even received a thoughtful anniversary card from the Hotel Indigo staff! From the wooden floors to the comfy beds to the cleanliness of their bathrooms..we will definitely book our next Disney trip there! (It's only a 5-10 minute walk away!) Thank you to Melody for making checking out such a breeze!
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary, Dear Jesfancy! Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their effort are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: NIce place 15-20 minute walk to Disney
Summary: This is a nice hotel with very friendly staff and management.  15-20 minute walk to Disney - nice if you don't want to deal with driving/parking.  Great happy hour meal deals in the hotel and nice breakfast avail for purchase. Rooms were a bit small, but nice and comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our property. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We spent two nights at this hotel.It's very convenient located near the parks and several restaurants.The room is very clean.The amenities were Avene ,excelent brand.Breakfast was included in my rate,which was a good plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our location, room, and amenities. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: An outstanding gem of a hotel. Customer service was nothing short of wonderful. Rooms were pleasant and the pool was nice as we watched the Disney fireworks from there every night. A shout out to the staff and management of the indigo for making our stay so carefree and enjoyable. If we make it back to Anaheim we will be making our way back to the indigo.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us! We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: Very much enjoyed our recent stay at this hotel for 12 nights. Beds were very comfortable; very large, modern bathroom; large, modern TV & free wifi (a little slow); no carpeting on the floors was great; loved the covered cabana area by the pool to relax out of the direct sun. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. There was no microwave in the room, so I asked the staff to microwave food for me at least once per day. They always took care of it happily without the slightest hint of it being an imposition. The hotel is located within easy walking distance of many restaurants and a pharmacy a block away. Given our long stay, we were very grateful for the homey, comfortable feel of this hotel which is attributable to its small size, great accommodations, and very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: So first I'm going to do all of the pros excellent beds, excellent air conditioning, great customer service and nice large TV.  Now we did not mind the parking at all I like parking in the underground it was a little crowded and the spaces are a little small and the elevator is very very slow but overall not a bad thing.  This hotel is perfect I feel for the younger more hipper crowd we are kind of old school and I like just the clean crisp rooms not so much with the murals and the wallpaper. The flooring after spending a long day at Disney I want a nice soft comfy carpeted floor.   The pool is very small and I just do not like it being open to the parking area but again that's just me and my old-school ways if I was young I probably like to sit out there and have a nice glass
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with the guest service and room. We would like to apologize that the elevator was slow during your stay. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Great location for a Disneyland vacation.  Also close to restaurants and shopping...all within walking distance.  The room and bathroom was quite clean.  We stayed just one night and have no complaints.  Loved the non-carpeted floor!
Manager Response: Dear ChicagoRaos! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Our hard wooden floors are the most beautiful hotel floors in Anaheim! Thank you for noticing. We know that you have many hotel options and we thank you for the opportunity to be of service. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is great! The location is excellent. About a 10 minute walk from Disneyland. The rooms were clean and super trendy. The first staff member we encountered (on arrival) definitely had an attitude and was rude, but everyone else was super nice and friendly. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Heidi! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Unfortunately, upon your arrival you encountered one of our staff members to be rude and with an attitude. This is certainly not our standards and is completely unacceptable on our part and my sincere apologies for this inconvenience. Is there a name that you can possibly share with me? or a description? We are honored to know that you would visit us again on your next trip to Anaheim and we would certainly await your arrival with open arms.  We hope to see you very soon.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Location wonderful, great stuff, well maintained and spacious rooms, good dining option in the hotel restaurant and even better in the immediate surrounding.  Price VERY reasonable !  In short... all was good except for the... free WiFi... Which was a real nightmare  ... and since we were with 4 teenagers for who Instagram and Facebook is a matter  of life and death...
Manager Response: Dear Moshe! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. It is also our pleasure to know that you enjoyed good dining in our Chambers Bar & Bistro! We are continuously upgrading our internet connection and react very quickly to any concerns that are reported to us. Our apologies for this inconvenience. Your comments are taken very seriously.  We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I have to say this is one of the nicest properties we have stayed at.  The  location and the staff are the excellent.   The rooms were modern and extremely clean.  The staff were very pleasant and helpful.  Disneyland entrance is a short walk away.  2 and 1/2 long blocks but is very doable.  Location safe and lots of people walking to and from Disney.  Parking at the time was included in room price and was under ground which kept the heat out.  I reviewed this property on Trip Advisor and chose the location because of the reviews.  The reviews where right on.  I would stay there again.  I didn't use the pool or restaurant so I can't give my opinion.
Manager Response: Dear Laura! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback.  We are honored to hear that our hotel property is one of the nicest hotels you have experienced. This means so very much to us! I think most importantly is that upon your research of our reviews on tripadvisor, the reviews were right on and we lived up to your expectations. We thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service! We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: This is an excellent hotel. The staff is very friendly are very accomodating  and their service to  their  their guests seroiusly. The rooms are clean and maintained well. The hotel itself is withing walking distance from everything including Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Victor! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Thank you for your kind words regarding the service that our staff provided to all of your family during your stay. Our number one priority is the cleanliness of our hotel both inside and out and we are so glad that we also lived up to your expectations in this area as well. Our location is so very convenient to stores, restaurants, etc...and of course as you mentioned a short walking distance to the Happiest Place On Earth!! We hope you will visit us again very soon.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Picked this hotel due to its walking proximity to Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel, loved the space in the room, location close to Disneyland parks and it had parking at a reasonable fee - although the parking was a tight location under the hotel structure. Would definitely go back again and/or send people
Manager Response: Dear Daisy! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. So nice to know that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and yes our location is perfect and a 10 to 15 minute walk to the happiest place on earth. Our secured/gated parking is always complimentary to all our hotel guests. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Very nice property close to theme parks. Great front desk. Friendly and very helpful with directions and restaurant choices. The hotel layout is a little weird and took some getting used to. Traveled with large family and everyone liked the hotel. Walk time to Disney was about 10 minutes. Rooms are large and clean. Everyone loved the Aveda toiletries in the room. Would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Rick! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We are honored to know that the entire family enjoyed their stay and also really loved our AVEDA toiletries! Our number one priority is the cleanliness of our beautiful hotel both inside and out, and we thank you for your acknowledgement in this area. We hope you will visit us again very soon.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Great hotel and amazing. Great personnel helpful  this is my first time in this hotel my friend recommended to me  and I'm satifying with the rooms nice staff great housekeeping  I love the figures with the towels housekeeping does  special the swangs I love the swangs everything very clean I like it. I love it.
Manager Response: Dear Carlos! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Thank you so very much for your compliments on our staff. Next to cleanliness as our number one priority, we pride ourselves in delivering the BEST customer service to all our hotel guests.  We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great base camp to explore Disneyland
Summary: Spent two nights here back in May.  This was a great place to stay within walking distance to Disneyland.  The hotel is fairly new with a modern feel and the front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.    On day two, we came back to the hotel around 2pm to let the kids enjoy the pool and take a nap.  We went back to the park at 6pm and kids stayed up until closing time at midnight.     I recommend walking to the park (15 min) and when done catch a taxi cab.  For about 9 dollars (including tip) you and your family can be back at the hotel in about 5 minutes.    At the time of our stay, this hotel had free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We had booked three nights at the Indigo, based on the reviews here, but left after the first night because it was so bad.  For the life of me, I can't figure out why so many people have rated it highly.  To begin with, this isn't a hotel but an old, small motel.  It has been re-done but the term "lipstick on a pig" comes to mind in regards to the updates.  There is no bell staff or any other "hotel" services.  The rooms have very low ceilings, paper-thin walls and a small window that looks at an alley or the hotel next door.  The pool is right on the driveway and is VERY small.  We had a suite but the pull-out bed in the living room was so miserably uncomfortable that my children couldn't sleep on it and ended up squished in the bed with us.  The bathroom reeked of mold!  The
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. We sincerely apologize to learn of your negative experience. We would like to apologize the AC levels and the pull-out sleeper in your room were not comfortable this visit. However, we will certainly use this example as a learning tool for the future. Despite this unfortunate situation we do hope that we shall have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future to restore your faith in our service.

Summary: I can´t say enough good things about Hotel Indigo. Staff was really friendly and accommodating, specially GM Edward and Victor,  and even helped us resolve a problem we had with our reservation because of our local trip agency. Hotel was really clean and with a modern decoration, bed and pillows were really comfortable. Shower was really nice and clean as well. We stayed at the fourth floor and had no issues with noise. Also the hotel was right next to Anaheim Garden Walk, so there are many good restaurants nearby. CVS is a block away, and most importantly Disney is at a 15 minute walk.   The most important things in this hotel are the kindness of their staff and the cleanliness. We have never stayed in a hotel were we have been treated as good as in Hotel Indigo. We wouldn´t
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with your stay with us. It so very important to us that our hotel is looking nice and clean both inside and out and when we recognized for our cleanliness, it really makes us feel very proud. Our next very important point if our customer service and we are happy to know that in this area we also met/exceeded your expectations. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place - walking distance to parks
Summary: For my daughters 18th birthday, 4 of us went to Disneyland.  We chose Hotel Indigo based on TripAdvisor ratings and we were not disappointed.  10 minute walk to the entrance of the parks and Downtown Disney.  Clean, nice small pool with lounges and towels.  Room Service + small breakfast and evening café.  Beer/wine :-) Room was good size and good value.  Aveda amenities.  Only complaints; hard pillows & auto WiFi drops that had us login each time – that’s it.  No problem returning – with my own pillow :-)
Manager Response: Happy 18th birthday to your daughters! Thank you for your nice review regarding your recent stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and would like to apologize that the pillows did not meet with your satisfaction. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. We appreciate you choosing to bring your family to Anaheim and giving us the opportunity to accommodate you. Looking forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great boutique hotel, easy walk to Disney parks
Summary: We chose this hotel based on the location and photos and we were very pleased.  All the staff we encountered during our 2-night stay was so friendly.  The front staff was fantastic - so personable, helpful, and accommodating.   The rooms were very clean and quite spacious enough for 2 of us (2 double beds).  The shower was really nice and actually better than many other hotels in this price range.  Beds were super comfy!    While waiting for coffee at the little café downstairs one morning, I saw the General Manager greeting every guest and I had a chance to have a nice chat with him.  I will definitely keep the Indigo brand in mind for another trip and would not hesitate to stay at this location again when in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest service. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: I don't normally write reviews but this place deserves one. Check in and out was a breeze. Staff were very informative and friendly. Hotel was really clean! Which was important to me because I have little kids . The beds were comfy,bathrooms were super clean,which is rare these days with hotels. I would say for a boutique hotel they provide 5 star hotel service and cleanliness! Would definitely recommend and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Again, thank you very much for staying with and we hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: My daughter and I recently stayed at the Hotel Indigo for an overnight trip to Disneyland. We were impressed the minute we stepped in the door and were greeted by a very friendly staff member. The hotel was a short and safe walk to Disneyland & California Adventure. The room was great, the bed and pillows were both very comfortable (and I'm hard to please), the room was quiet and I loved the Keurig coffee pot and large selection of coffee & tea. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay close to Disneyland. It was so nice to stay to see the fireworks and be able to walk back to our hotel. And to top it all of parking is free!
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest service, location, and room. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Clean, contemporary boutique hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Great staff, comfortable hotel and room. We stayed two nights and visited Disneyland on a Saturday.  The hotel was about a 15 minute walk to Disney.  I needed a break during a full day and night of the theme park, and it was no big deal at all to walk back to the hotel.    The pool is small with only four lounge chairs and a shade lounging area, but it always worked out that we could either be at the pool or in the nearby restaurant tables.  Great for a quick dip or a soak in the hot tub.  I'd stay here again and I recommend it.  The walnut motif is a little weird; feel like they could have found a more appealing image to use throughout the hotel to honor the areas walnut orchards.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with guest services, room, and location. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you for your suggestion about our walnut themed murals. We will definitely bring it to our attention. Again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed overnight at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim and absolutely loved it.  This hotel has hard wood floors and is very clean.  It is well within walking distance to Disneyland, across the street from a CVS Pharmacy, and down the road from Target.  I especially liked that the same elevator went from the parking garage to the room floor, you didn't have to take the time to walk through the lobby.  The staff was very friendly and got us what we needed quickly.  We had wished we were staying longer because the pool looked really fun for the kids - it would have been a great place for a break during the busiest time at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review about the stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are very happy to know that you are satisfied with the cleanliness of the hotel, location, and the convenience of the elevator. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being service to our hotel guest. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: This hotel was very nice. It was clean and the staff were very friendly. It is within walking distance to Disney Land which is great. It offers free wifi and the bar has daily happy hour deals. There was nothing I could fault. Definitely worth staying at especially if you want somewhere close to Disney Land.
Manager Response: Dear Tynnielle! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again. Thanks for staying with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim all the way from beautiful AUSTRALIA!!  See you next time!  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We stayed in this hotel in December 2014.  The hotel itself is lovely and the staff were very friendly.  The furnishings are very modern and the room size is very good.  There is parking downstairs.  It is very close to Disneyland and California Adventure and we could see the fireworks at night.   Overall it's a great hotel, however, the walls are very thin and it was rather noisy.  We could hear lots of noise from rooms upstairs and next door so that was a little frustrating.
Manager Response: Dear Nette! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. My sincerest apologies regarding the noise level you experienced, we try very hard to always maintain noise levels at a minimum with all our guests at all times and respond to any concerns quickly and efficiently. We appreciate your understanding and hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: My husband, parents and I stayed here while I ran the Tinkerbell Half Marathon at Disneyland, and I cannot say enough good things about it. It was about a 7 minute walk from Disneyland, so we avoided some of the traffic and crowds that you find at hotels closer to the park itself. Restaurants, CVS and other amenities are right next door, which was great for a quick bite or to pick up things we forgot.  When we booked, we requested a room on the fourth floor on the back side, as we were told it was quieter. This was definitely true; we never heard another person through the four nights we were there. We had a suite with a bedroom with two beds, and a pullout couch in the living area, which was perfect for the four of us. The staff was incredibly friendly and willing to go out of
Manager Response: Dear Kerry! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. CONGRATS to you on running the TINKERBELL HALF MARATHON! That is AWESOME! So glad to know that you found us to be conveniently located. I am happy to know that we fulfilled your request with a beautiful room on the fourth floor and that you enjoyed the quietness. Thank you for the opportunity to be of service in our Chambers Bar & Bistro....sounds like you really enjoyed our quality of food and service. Hope you will visit us again very soon!.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: It's one of the smaller hotels in the area. But one of its perks is its location. It's in the middle of everything. All the good restaurants are just close by. And Disney parks are just 15-20 min walk away.  We got a room at the ground level which is most convenient for us because our car is parked right outside. And we could easily get stuff in and out of the car without having to walk a long way to where our room is. Also it's near the pool. It's relatively cheaper than most of the hotels around the area so don't expect a meticulous service. There are no toothbrushes and toothpastes provided (which is typical in most american 3 star hotels anyway). And no bellhop to help you with your luggage.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Our location is PRIME and I am so happy to know that you found it to be very convenient all the way around. We offer very competitive rates all year round and take great pride in delivering impeccable service to all our guests. We have toothbrushes and toothpastes available to all our guests by simply calling our front desk for service. We also offer assistance at any time with your luggage upon request. We hope you will visit us again soon and we thank you for the opportunity to be of service.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Decent room. Good location. Friendly Staff.
Summary: Overall good room.  Room with beds was clean however the bathroom shower gave us some concern as there was mold in the grout in the shower as well as a strange substance growing from the ceiling in the shower.  We brought the up to the staff and they said there had been a water leak that they did not know reached this particular room and they sent someone up to fix the weird thing on the ceiling however the shower still showed mold.  As we were driving out of the parking lot on check out day a staff member stopped us and they did give us a discount on the room which was wonderful as we weren't expecting anything. Staff was great and I imagine they have fixed the issues in that room now that they were aware.   We even watched the Disneyland fireworks right from our room with a
Manager Response: Dear SirrustheVirus! Thank you so very much for your review regarding your stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. I am happy to know that you found our room and bed to be very clean, but unfortunately we came up a little short regarding our shower area. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel and we apologize for this inconvenience. Yes, you are correct by mentioning that this was fixed immediately. Our staff member who was able to flag you down before leaving property, did absolutely the right thing. Thank you for allowing us to do so! So glad to know that you enjoyed the Disney fireworks from the comfort of your own room. We hope that you will consider extending us another opportunity to be of service in the near future. Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disney Parks Visit
Summary: If you’re visiting Disneyland, you'll love the location of this hotel.  (10-15 minute walk to the entrance, depending on how fast you walk.)   The hotel has an underground gated parking, which is nice.  If you plan on eating breakfast at the hotel, you should get a voucher, which is a better deal.
Manager Response: Dear Nana! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. As you mentioned, our guests really love our underground secured/gated parking which is of course complimentary for all our guests staying at our hotel. We also have the BEST BREAKFAST in TOWN along with the best pricing. We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Dining at the Chambers Bar and Bistro
Summary: Within the Indigo Hotel, Chambers Bar and Bistro offers very good food at bargain prices. A limited menu, but outstanding service and daily specials. The setting is not fancy, but clean. The food is tasty. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Paso57! Thank you so much for your review of our CHAMBERS Bar & Bistro!  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our quality of food and also very important, that you experienced our outstanding service that we are so well known for. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: The hotel has a Keurig in the rooms, the bathrooms are nice and the staff are really great. We got an early check-in, late check out, and a room upgrade (Platinum IHG). They recently increased the number of points to stay here, so it's not as good of a deal as it was when I booked it, but it's so close to DL, it's definitely with checking out.
Manager Response: Dear Mark! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty as a Platinum Elite member. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Thank you for recognizing our staff and we are so happy to know that we made you feel welcomed. We hope you will visit us again very soon!  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: The staff was very nice since the check in. The very clean and the bed was comfortable,. This location was perfect for our Disneyland vacation as it's only a walk away from the park. You can also see the fireworks from disney from the hotel and avoid the disney crowds.Definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jose! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We believe that we have the most comfortable beds in ANAHEIM and your feedback only helps us confirm that we do. Thank you for that! Our views are beautiful regarding the Disney fireworks and your room #426 is exceptional! So glad you enjoyed. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Hotel looks very luxurious! This place had some very nice rooms ! I felt extremely welcomed by staff! Housekeeping kept my room cleaned and in a timely manner. Stayed for a couple of nights. This hotel is close to the convention center. Had a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Jakob! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We appreciate that you were very happy with our housekeeping services along with the timeliness. We hope you will visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here in June for our first trip to Disneyland. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. We loved that the hotel was 2.5 blocks from the main gate of Disneyland. It is a safe and well lit easy walk. However after walking about 10 miles all over Disney even a short walk can feel longer at the end of the day. We learned that there was a Disney bus system called ART that takes you from Disney to all of the local hotels. There are 2 bus stops for the #6 bus conveniently located on either side of the hotel. We decided to get passes ($5/day) from the Crowne Plaza next door.  We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Indigo so much that we stayed here again a week later. The front desk staff is great. They remembered us and made us feel very welcome even though
Manager Response: Dear Megs! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. It so very important to us that our hotel is looking nice and clean both inside and out and when we are recognized for our cleanliness, it really makes us feel very proud. Our next very important point is our CUSTOMER SERVICE and I am happy to know that in this area we also met/exceeded your expectations. Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your stay with us here at HOTEL INDIGO ANAHEIM and we hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Booked 3 nights based on the great reviews.  All the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Excellent location to Disney and super cute design. The breakfast at the restaurant was perfect and everything about this experience was just what I wanted. Rooms were clean, modern and comfy.  Highly recommended. Never felt crowded even though it was at capacity. Loved the underground secure parking.
Manager Response: Dear Drew! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback.  I am so glad that you allowed us an opportunity to be of service in our delicious Chambers Bar & Bistro as well....We gladly accept the rating of breakfast being PERFECT! :) Thank you for enjoying your overall stay with us! We hope you will visit us again.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Seriously, this was a great hotel. We were able to check in early without any issues. Parking was easy, underground and secure. The staff was so friendly, the manager was frequently walking around and remembered my sons name. The rooms were very modern and so clean. We even moved the bed against the wall so our daughter wouldn't fall off and under the bed was clean and not dusty, which was shocking to me. My only complaints would be the wood floor was noisy from the rooms above you but I would take wood floors over carpet any day. Disneyland was a casual 15 min walk, we timed it. Lots of restaurants and stores nearby. I would definitely recommend this to anyone and would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel property and we are so happy to receive your acknowledgement in this area. We are proud and humbled to have received your wonderful comments regarding your overall stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I went in needing a room for our family (5 people) last minute as the previous hotel we had stayed in for two nights was having issues with pests....yuck! The manager Edward and all the staff were wonderful, they got us a beautiful room, on the top floor so we could have a great view of the fireworks at Disneyland it was so quiet and spotless, which was a very welcome change from our last hotel! I loved the hardwood floors and the beds they were so comfortable, even the hide a bed was comfortable! They have a great pool area, nice enough to spend the whole day by pool with the kids, also the food there is very good! Their breakfast was unbeatable! It was such a pleasant experience and by far the best customer service we've ever had in a hotel. It was truly a home away from home,
Manager Response: Well hello Jill! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you and your lovely family enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. I recall very clearly, our conversation regarding the unfortunate experience you and your family encountered at another property. But more so, we are very delighted that you allowed us an opportunity to deliver our impeccable standards of service. Really happy to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful views from your room and were able to check out the awesome fireworks display that our friends from Disneyland demonstrate every evening for our guests. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our entire property and we are honored of your acknowledgement of just that, SPOTLESS! So happy to know that you found our HARDWOOD FLOORS to be lovely and our BEDS to be so COMFORTABLE. Thank you also for the opportunity to be of service in our beautiful CHAMBERS Bar & Bistro and really glad to know that you not only enjoyed our quality of food served, but to mention that it was by far the BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE YOU HAVE EVER HAD IN A HOTEL! We are humbled Jill! We certainly attempt to make all our guests that stay with us, feel right at home...we feel a sense of success that we accomplished this with your family and we thank you for sharing. In closing, I would also like to THANK YOU and YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY for your KINDNESS towards not only myself, but to our entire TEAM here at Hotel Indigo. You have a beautiful family! We hope you will visit us again.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Best Hotel of our stay in Southern California
Summary: My husband and I arrived at the Hotel Indigo for two nights before heading home to New Jersey. I picked this hotel because of it's high reviews and I couldn't be more satisfied with our stay. As another review indicated, we didn't move our car the entire stay! Everything is within walking distance- restaurants, shops, and of course, DISNEYLAND!   The bed was the most comfortable bed of our entire trip. Not good when you want to get up early to hit the park- I didn't want to get out of bed! :)   The one negative (and it's a small one), we are IHG reward members and I did see little goodie bags at the front desk that seemed to be for IHG members but we weren't offered one. Not sure what that was about.   Overall, I can't wait to come back to Anaheim and I can't wait to stay at the
Manager Response: Dear Gigi! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty as an IHG® Rewards Club member. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We are so happy to know that we lived up to your expectations here at HOTEL INDIGO ANAHEIM! We feel that we have THE MOST COMFORTABLE BEDS in ANAHEIM and we are certainly honored to know that you chose our BEDS to be just that, COMFORTABLE. Regarding the IHG Goodie Bags, IHG standards are that they are to be distributed to all IHG Gold and Platinum members and we must follow these standards. Although, if we are asked we really like to share. :) Thank you so much for your understanding. We also, can't wait for you to return to Anaheim and we really can't wait for you to stay with us here at HOTEL INDIGO once again. We are humbled! Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is clean and walking distance to Disney. We overlooked the rooftop of the adjacent building which was a bit depressing but didn't spend much time in the room. The room was small but recently renovated.  I guess it's a find for the price but any more than two days would be too much.  Pool is in the parking lot and other than leaving first thing thing in the morning and coming home late at night you wouldn't want to relax here. Just a very convenient, clean place to stay while visiting Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Angie! Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay with us here at HOTEL INDIGO ANAHEIM! Our number one priority here at hotel indigo Anaheim is the cleanliness of our entire hotel property both inside and out and we are certainly thankful and humbled that this was recognized on your part. My apologies that the location of your room was not to your satisfaction. Anytime this is brought to our attention by our guests once checked in, we will be more than happy to attempt and share the availability of other room options. This is our goal and standard and applies also to our room types, in case you are interested in a larger room. Although we have some parking spaces (IE, Handicaps, Van Accessible, which is required by law), on our top deck, our pool is completely secured with beautiful surroundings.  We appreciate your comments and we do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future. Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: All you need while visiting Disneyland
Summary: Staff were excellent. Rooms were fine although I imagine a little too small for the average family. I requested a room where we could view the fireworks at night and they gave us a great room to enjoy them during our stay. Most people go to Anaheim for Disney so as long as you have a great bed, which we did and a great shower, also at hand then you have found yourself a great spot to stay in between park visits. Restaurants a plenty along the road maybe a five minute walk away.
Manager Response: Dear Leithton! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We really appreciate your compliment regarding our staff and so happy that we were able to accommodate your family in one of our beautiful rooms with a Disneyland Fireworks view. (HOW FUN!) We feel we have the most comfortable beds along with a great shower and bathroom set up in all of Anaheim. Glad you agreed! We value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We booked another property and had to change hotels because the other was unfit for occupancy.  We were able to book the last room they had and the entire experience has been amazing.  What a wonderful staff, especially Hannah at the desk and Edward the GM.  The rooms are well appointed, clean and comfortable.  This is our Orange County hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Bill! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I recall very clearly your arrival and having the opportunity to meet your wonderful family. We thank you as well, for all your kindness towards us. Anytime we receive a review with the word AMAZING attached to it, we are certainly humbled and really feel that we have accomplished what we attempt to deliver to our guests every day. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Thank you for making us your Orange County hotel from this point forward. We would be honored to be of service once again!  Hope to see you soon Bill! Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Second time here and loved it once again! Our go to place when we go to Disneyland!  Stayed here earlier this month with my husband, toddler, and newborn. We stayed here for 3 nights and didn't move our car the whole entire time! Free parking a plus! Everything you pretty much need is in walking distance. So convenient when traveling with little ones because you don't need to take them in and out of the car and put together the million things you need to bring with you when out for the day in their stroller. Walked to Disneyland in the morning then made it back to hotel at night to watch the fireworks from our room (which we requested to have view of when booking). Rooms are clean and come with mini fridge and keurig. Bed is soooo comfy! Bathroom is spacious! Only gripe is you
Manager Response: Dear Joyful! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Yes, you are absolutely correct, COMPLIMENTARY PARKING all year round! We have the most beautiful views of Disney's fireworks and really happy to know that your family enjoyed. Thank you for noticing the cleanliness in our rooms and throughout our entire property.  It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you and your family again very soon!  Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: All hotel staff was phenomenal. Rooms are great with modern decor. Would rate 12 stars out of 10. Have never ran into customer service like they give. Great view of Disneyland fireworks. Overall outstanding visit.
Manager Response: Dear Guests! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Anytime we receive a compliment with the word PHENOMENAL, we are so humbled, and to receive 12 STARS out of 10 really makes us feel so proud. We hope you will visit us again and thank you for recommending our lovely hotel to friends and family! Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I stayed here between 27 - 30 May 2015. A small hotel but I feel that this provides more for the personal touches. All the staff were very friendly and accommodating to all our needs. The room was very clean and had excellent facilities, those kinds of facilities we paid a lot more for in other hotels on our trip. This is the ideal place to stay for a Disney visit. The only food we ate in the hotel was breakfast and every morning we had fruit parfait which was amazing and set us up nicely for the day. The receptionist was very helpful leading up to our last day and made our booking for the shuttle service back to the airport.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again if I came to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Thank you for your compliment regarding the friendliness of our staff, we certainly have very high impeccable standards that we expect to deliver to all our guests that stay with us. Cleanliness is our number one priority and I am so happy to know that this was very noticeable on your part. Glad you also enjoyed our Chambers Bar & Bistro! Thank you for recommending our hotel to friends and family!  We hope you will visit us again.  Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: This hotel had ultra modern decor, comfortable beds but I found the shower lacking pressure and couldn't get use to using it. When we checked in, staff gave us a room so we could see the fireworks of a night.   We had breakfast included in our four night stay. On the Saturday breakfast didn't start until 7am and our Disneyland tickets allowed us entry at 7am, so we were unable to eat before our visit which was the whole point of choosing the bed and breakfast rate. Other mornings we were able to have breakfast at the hotel and found there to be a great selection which included fresh fruit.  Disneyland was within walking distance but after doing 14 plus hour days at Disney I found my feet sore, so after the first day visit I asked staff if there was a shuttle that picked us up or
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed most of  your stay with us. We have always received great reviews regarding our water pressure and wanted to ask if by chance, this was reported in order for us to follow up and look into the concern for you? We certainly appreciate the feedback. So happy to know that we were able to accommodate a nice room with a nice view of Disneyland's fireworks. Our apologies that our restaurant was not open in time for breakfast on Saturday. Please let us know in the near future, that you would require breakfast to be served a little earlier and we would be more than happy to accommodate in any way possible. I was personally involved in the retrieval of your camera charger and I am so happy that we were able to contact the shuttle service and have your charger returned safely to you. Thank you for your compliments on the friendliness of our staff! It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again soon. Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Stayed in anaheim for 5 nights and was super happy with our accommodation here. Great location centre of anaheim! Staff are all lovely and make you feel welcome. The bathroom is my favourite cool shower and mirrors. Had breakfast and dinner here were both 10/10. Pool was beautiful and clean and the spa perfect to relax.
Manager Response: Dear Siska! Thank you so very much for your recent stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Our entire staff is delighted to know that you felt genuinely welcomed and with a touch of loveliness. We certainly take much pride in the set up of our rooms and so glad to know that you were very impressed with our bathroom, shower and mirrors. Our Food & Beverage manager Jesus D. and his team is certainly honored to have received a 10 for breakfast and a 10 for dinner! Thank you! Hope we have the opportunity again very soon to be of service. If I may be of assistance to you, please contact me at 714.772.7755 Sincerely, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great hotel walking distance from Disney. Clean spacious rooms and excellent service
Summary: Our favourite hotel in a recent 3 week trip around California with the family. Walking distance to the front gate at Disney and really nice bar and pool for relaxing after a long day on the rides. The rooms were large and we appreciated the sofa bed in the room which gave us an extra option for the kids.
Manager Response: Hello Dear Andy! Please allow me to introduce myself, my name is Edward Voysest General Manager here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and I wanted to personally thank you for not only your wonderful review on our hotel and services, but to also let you know that we are very humbled and honored to have been selected your favorite hotel during your recent 3 week trip around California with your family. This means so very much to our entire staff and we certainly do not ever take this for granted. Really happy to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful bar and were able to experience our pool with a relaxing ambiance. We look forward to your visit again to California and hope you will return to Hotel Indigo Anaheim as your #1 hotel. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I decided on a road trip with my son. We didn't make any reservations and decided we'd find a hotel when we got there. We spent almost 2 hours driving around to various hotels close to Disneyland. I finally decided to give the Indigo hotel a shot. I couldn't have made a better choice. I have stayed at the Hilton, which was nice but Indigo was more intimate. From now on, whenever we go to Disneyland, Indigo is where we'll stay. The hotel was quiet at night, the rooms were clean and the front desk, food servers and bartender couldn't have been friendlier. Great location. Great staff. I have absolutely no complaints at all. Thanks for helping to make our Disney experience FANTASTIC!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guests! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity to be of service and it looks like we met or possibly exceeded your expectations. I am glad to know that you found our beautiful hotel nice and quiet, clean and our staff very friendly. We strive everyday to deliver impeccable service to our guests. We are humbled to know that your stay with us was complaint free and we played a small part in making your Disney experience a FANTASTIC one! We are so happy and honored that when you visit Disneyland in the future, Hotel Indigo Anaheim will be your choice to stay.  It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again very soon! Very truly yours, Edward V. General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here one night before moving to the Disneyland Hotel the next day. Checking in was very smooth & the front desk staff were very friendly. The hotel is a short walk from Disneyland & there is a variety of places to eat on the block. The room was an adequate size for 3 adults and we didn't feel like we were on top,of each other. The bed was very comfortable, a little soft for me but I slept well. The parking is underground, gated & best of all free. This room was half of what we spent at the Disneyland Hotel & if it was up to me, I would have stayed here for our 4 nights in town. I read other reviews where they could hear the people above them. We were on the 2nd floor and did not experience any noise issues.
Manager Response: Hello Dear Guests! Thank you so very much for allowing us to be of service and staying with us before moving to the Disneyland Hotel the next day. We know you mentioned that you would have stayed with us for all 4 nights in town, and we certainly accept that as a very big compliment....Maybe next time, but again we thank you for your 1 evening with us! I am happy to hear that your check-in experience was very smooth, efficient and friendly. Our front desk team prides themselves in delivering these services on a consistent basis in order to live up to our impeccable standards. While other hotel properties charge for their parking on a daily basis, we here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim provide complimentary underground secured/gated parking for all our guests all year round.  Hope to see you again very soon and we were honored to have been given the opportunity to be of service! Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here with my family this weekend for 1 night n it was nice... Cleanliness, good customer service, comfy beds and I had a view for my child to check out the fireworks... The only downfall was that there is no complimentary breakfast, if they had that it would b awesome but overall it met all expectations for me and my family.
Manager Response: Dear Guests! Thank you very much for staying with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! I am so happy to know that you really enjoyed your stay and your observation of the cleanliness of our hotel is greatly appreciated!  I would like to share with you, that although our breakfast is not offered complimentary, our prices are very reasonable and our quality of food is top notch....Our very popular Chambers Bar & Bistro is very well know for our breakfast and dinner service in our beautiful neighborhood. We are certainly humbled to know that we met all of your expectations and we hope that you will again join us very soon. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: It's been half a year since we've last visited the Indigo, and their services are wonderful as ever! Friendly staff, compliant, fast service, and clean rooms. Nice bathroom (though my partner misses having a tub as we got a room with just the shower). Unfortunately, the ice maker machine was out, but we tried to get ice at 2 AM, so that might be why. My partner would give 5 stars, but only if the room came with a hot tub. Otherwise, a lovely hotel with a great location .
Manager Response: Hello Dear Guests! So nice to have you back as repeat guests here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! I am happy to know that you enjoyed our services rendered and that we were very efficient. We strive on a daily basis to not only meet, but exceed our guests expectations. Cleanliness is very important to us and is at the top of our list along with impeccable customer service standards.  All our bathrooms are equipped only with beautiful showers, so my apologies that we were not able to provide a hot tub in your room for your partner but, we do provide a very nice Jacuzzi hot tub poolside that we maintain at a very relaxing and comfortable 102 degrees all year round. My apologies for not being able to provide ice for you when you required it, this is unacceptable on our part and once again we apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for finding our hotel to be a lovely property and we certainly look forward to seeing you again very soon! Please feel free to contact me at 714.772.7755 the next time your travel plans bring you to Anaheim and I will personally handle your reservations. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I happened to share a room with my grandchildren's other grandmother and one of the grandchildren. The rooms are spacious to spread your stuff out and still have plenty of room. We spent time in the pool after visiting the Park and saw the fireworks from there!  The bar staff was friendly and the drinks fairly reasonable. We ate dinner there one night and the food was good, not great, but still worth staying in for. It is an easy walk to Disneyland and the hotel staff are wonderful. There is a CVS near by and several restaurants that look worth eating at. I think this hotel is a great price for its location and for its cleanliness.  Would definitely recommend or stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guests! My name is Edward Voysest, General Manager here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. So happy to know that you found our hotel rooms very spacious with plenty of room. Seems like you really enjoyed our pool, that is heated all year round at a very comfortable temperature of 82 degrees. You mentioned that you had dinner in our Chambers Bar & Bistro and that the food was good....not great. We continuously strive for greatness and perfection in all that we do. We also listen very closely to all our guests who either verbally or in written form share their comments on how we performed and how we can improve our operation. Please feel free to let me know any recommendations you might have on how we can improve regarding our restaurant cuisine. We would be happy to entertain your suggestions! (714.772.7755) The cleanliness of our hotel is so important to us and I thank you for acknowledging this and sharing it with us! Most importantly, we here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim thank you for your recommendations to friends and family! Kindly, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Friendly staff, very comfortable and modern room design.  Walking distance to Garden Walk and several restaurants - can probably walk to Disney as well.  Small parking lot makes for an adventure in traffic, but that's par for the course in this area.  I can't give it five stars because of temporary inconveniences like construction and maintenance, but I do recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest! I would like to thank you so very much for your recent stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. I am really happy to hear that you found our staff to be very friendly, our hotel very comfortable and that you enjoyed our beautiful modern room design. Disneyland is indeed only about a 10 minute walk from our hotel....VERY CONVENIENT AND SAFE! As well as our secured/gated basement parking, we also offer parking spaces up on lobby level areas providing adequate parking for all our hotel guests. We take great pride and initiative in maintaining our exterior as well as our interior of our entire property in order to keep it looking neat, clean, organized and professional for all our guests and repeat guests to experience. The challenge is that we of course are open 24 hours, 7 days a week and really there is never a good moment to perform upgrades, maintenance, etc...without a slight inconvenience to our guests, but we certainly post notices through out the hotel and in all rooms. My sincerest apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Although we would have certainly preferred a 5 star rating from a guest such as yourself, we greatly appreciate your recommendations to others! I hope that  you will grant us another opportunity to demonstrate to you that we are indeed a 5 star hotel property. Please feel free to contact me at 714.772.7755 the next time that your travel plans bring you to Anaheim and I will personally handle your reservation. Thanks again! Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We found this hotel via Amex booking website. We needed a hotel close proximity to Disneyland. This hotel is very close to the parks, and CVS. The hotel is EXTEMELY clean.
