You smell it as soon as you walk in the lobby it smelled fresh. The staff was friendly and inviting the room is large with modern finishings. They had Aveda products for the bathroom, and the shower was huge. The cleanest I ever felt on my vacation. I was staying on a Disney property hotel and let me tell you this place beats it 200%. They stored our scooters and charged them for us, gave us snacks and waters for our room. We were really treated well. I will highly recommend this hotel as it's cheaper than staying onsite and its within walking distance to the Disneyland Resort. The beds are very comfortable
Manager Response: Dear Guests! So glad to know that you located us via AMEX booking website! Our location is perfect and so close to Disneyland, CVS and many restaurant options to choose from. We take much pride in maintaining our beautiful property very clean, organized and fresh. Thank you for noticing! We are humbled. :) Our staff prides themselves in not only delivering outstanding customer service, but our goal is to deliver it in a friendly and inviting fashion. We are happy to know that we seemed to have met your expectations in this area as well. It is awesome to know that compared to a Disney property hotel you stayed at, we here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim out performs it by 200%. We are honored to receive this statement! Great to know that you were treated very well and that you would recommend our hotel to friends and family. Glad you were able to experience our beaufiful CHAMBERS Bar & Bistro along with our complimentary strong WIFI! Thank you again! Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at hotel indigo for 2 nights this June whilst we were visiting Disneyland. Our flight arrived very early in the morning at LAX so our room was not ready upon arrival at the hotel. But they gladly took our bags for us and let us freshen up in the hotel lobby bathrooms which was much needed after leaving brisbane probably 16 hours before hand. Hotel is a maximum 10 minute walk from Disney and has been done up beautifully. At the other end of the street is restaurants galore if you didn't want to have dinner inside Disney (we didn't). Room was very clean and all staff were nice and helpful. There was also a restaurant in the hotel lobby which looked very popular although we didn't use it. I would not hesitate to stay here again if we ever return to Disneyland and would
Manager Response: Hi Guests! Thank you very much for visiting and staying with us all the way from Brisbane, Australia! Due to your flight arriving very early at LAX, I realize that your room was not available for you at the moment of your arrival to Hotel Indigo Anaheim. I am very happy to hear that we offered to store your luggage safely and secured and you were able to freshen up a bit in our beautiful and comfortable lobby restrooms. This is what our impeccable standards are and I am very happy to hear that this was provided to you. Due to our fantastic location, you have many restaurant options that are very close to our hotel. Including our very own well known popular CHAMBERS Bar & Bistro! We sincerely appreciate your staying with us and ultimately your recommendation to friends and family! Kindly, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Having stayed at many IHG owned hotels at all ends of the scale I had the chance to stop over at this one recently while on a working trip. Number one if you are a family doing the Disney thing this palce is walkable and safe to the park so its a great location. If like me this trip was not for family then its still a great choice. Friendly staff including the manager who was in the lobby each morning just to say hello, nice chice of food items, good pool and spa and safe parking under ground. Rooms were fresh and reflected the style of the hotel and quiet and oh boy what a bed had a great nights sleep. Loads going for this place and the price.
Manager Response: Hello Dear Guest! I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for choosing to stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, but to also thank you for your wonderful comments. We are humbled! Yes, our location is very close to the happiest place on earth and very safe. All our friendly staff takes pride in delivering outstanding service to our guests with a smile. Thank you for acknowledging yours truly, in our lobby every morning to say hello and greet our guests. It is the favorite part of my responsibilities! Our Chambers Bar & Bistro is very popular and I am so happy to know that you enjoyed our selections. Our housekeepers work very hard in order to deliver our impeccable standards that we expect in each room. Very clean, organized, all in working condition and FRESH! We have the most comfortable beds and we are so proud when we hear all the great comments from all our guests, regarding their great night sleep! Please accept my gratitude and appreciation!  Hope to see you again here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Fantastic wallet-friendly, boutique hotel, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: As a former annual passholder at Disney I was used to staying "on property" at the resort when specials were available, so I never stayed outside of the Disney resort until this weekend.  My husband and I chose Hotel Indigo Anaheim as we'd had a very nice stay at Hotel Indigo in San Diego.  Not only was everything perfect -- the room, the rates, the staff, the little bar (great happy hour deals), the availability of breakfast and other meals -- but in particular the kitchen & bar staff and Victor at the front desk were incredible.  Really, everyone there was sincere in their commitment to great service.  I don't remember ever having such friendly and genuine service at a hotel.  I travel a great deal, as does my husband, and worldwide, too.  This was an excellent experience.  I
Manager Response: Hello dear Guests! Please allow me to introduce myself....My name is Edward Voysest, General Manager here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are so very happy as well as very humbled to have received your wonderful and genuine review/compliments on tripadvisor regarding your recent stay with us. Here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, our goal everyday is to not only meet the expectations of our guests, but to exceed the expectations with a WOW factor. It seems like we did just that regarding your stay. What makes your kind words regarding our service provided, that much more special is that you mentioned that you and your husband travel a great deal and WORLDWIDE as well. We are honored! Thank you so kindly for allowing us to be of service in our Chambers Bar & Bistro for drinks and quality food that we take much pride in serving our guests. I have shared your wonderful feedback with our Food & Beverage manager Jesus Diaz and he in turn has shared it with his staff. We also thank you for acknowledging one of our best at our front desk, VICTOR!! Although each of our staff members are unique in their own way, (that is what makes them so special)....they all are very sincere and genuine with one goal in mind, to deliver the best to our guests! (and sometimes a little more). We look forward to welcoming you and your family to Hotel Indigo Anaheim again very soon! Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Awesome, boutique, and convenient to Disneyland
Summary: Took my nephew to Disneyland and we stayed here for two nights. The beds were very comfortable with lots of pillows including two large noodle pillows that my nephew thought were hilarious. The shower was great because it had a regular shower head plus one on a hose that you could use to rinse hard to reach areas. The hotel has a restaurant, but we did not use it. McDonald's was our choice for breakfast, and there are two within a five minute drive. The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland. The glass elevator is a neat touch as you soar over Katella Avenue. The door locks use the new RFID card reading keys (where you just wave it in front of the door lock) instead of the credit card style keys that you insert in the lock and pull out. The parking garage requires your
Manager Response: Greetings Hotel Indigo Guest'! My name is Edward Voysest, General Manager here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim and just wanted to say thank you so very much for taking the time to share such a wonderful review on us on tripadvisor. We certainly thank you for your business and we thank you for your valued time. Sounds like your nephew really enjoyed our noodle pillows...How funny, that is so cool! We are very proud to offer our state of the art features in our bathrooms and showers and most importantly, we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed them as well. Although you were not able to experience our restaurant this time around for breakfast, I am very confident that you would not only find top quality in our food and impeccable service standards, but you will find our pricing is very, very reasonable....Won't you give us a try next time?? Hope so! Thank you for pointing out our new RFID card reading door locks and the requirement to use your hotel key to access our secured parking. All to ensure the security of our valued guests! Our pool is small but comfortable and very refreshing! Our pool temperature is set at 82' all year round and our spa is set at 102' - Really relaxing! Thank you again for your kind words and hope to see you the next time your journeys bring you to Anaheim! Kindly, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here with a friend in early January 2015. It was the perfect hotel to walk to & from Disneyland (10 minute walk) and retreat to at the end of the day. Room was a good size for 2 people, very clean with modern bathroom fixtures. The beds were heaven after a few full days of walking around. I would stay here & would recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Guest'! I wanted to personally thank you for your stay here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim....We realize that you have many choices! Thank you again for staying with us!! It is indeed a 10 to 15 minute walk to the happiest place on earth and very convenient in returning back to our hotel. So happy to know that you found our beds to be HEAVEN, as you mentioned....They certainly are!! We also have the most beautiful views towards Disneyland for the night time fireworks....But, those rooms must be reserved quickly, they fill up very fast! Hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim! Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, good location, friendly staff, and the price is right!
Summary: Our family of 4 had a good two nights here while visiting Disneyland. We didn't spend much time in the room other than to sleep, but the beds were comfy and the bathroom was spacious and clean. We had season passes one year and stayed 5 times at the Anaheim Plaza Inn around the corner. I sure wish I'd known about Hotel Indigo as it was definitely worth another $20 for more comfort and cleanliness. And it's pet friendly!
Manager Response: Greetings Hotel Indigo Guests! Thank you so very much for staying with us, we certainly appreciate your business and do not take it for granted....We know you have many choices! We realize that you mentioned that you did not spend to much time in our room, but the time that you did, was very pleasant. Our beds are the most comfortable and I am so happy to know that you also found our bathroom to be very spacious and very clean!  Thank you for allowing us an opportunity to serve you and we hope now that you have experienced our hotel and services, you will join us again very soon. Bye, bye for now! Kindly, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I stayed for 4 nights at the Hotel Indigo.  It was our first experience with this hotel and the company.  Check in was easy, the staff very friendly.  We had asked for a suite on the 4th floor, a quiet room and this was provided.  We had a bedroom with 2 queen beds and a queen hide-a-bed in the living area.  There was a safe in the room which we liked.  The room was quiet and we were able to see the Disneyland fireworks from the bedroom window.  The hotel was very clean, all staff friendly and courteous.  Any requests (i.e. burned out light bulb replacement) were followed up promptly.  It was a short walk to Disneyland but we were off the main noisy street.  We ate breakfast in the Hotel and the food choice was excellent, the service prompt,
Manager Response: Dear Guest'! I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for staying with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Your comments are full of compliments and we certainly do not take them for granted....I am so happy to know that we were able to fulfill your requests. We take pride in our customer service standards and set out to deliver them on a consistent basis with each of our guests. My apologies that you experienced unfortunately a burned out light bulb in your room, but glad to know that we reacted promptly. Thank you also for allowing us to serve you in our Chambers Bar & Bistro for breakfast...I have shared your compliments with our Food & Beverage Manager Jesus Diaz and his F&B staff as well. Our kindest regards to your entire family and we hope to be of service again in the near future. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Stayed at Indigo one night while visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is new and modern which I loved. Great location and small enough not to cater to large tour buses full of people. Although not family unfriendly,  the hotel is definitely for adults verses some of the other hotels in the area. Nice lobby, pool area and public spaces. Staff are friendly and customer service oriented.   The hotel is close to restaurants,  coffee, a great CVS and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest'! Thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your comments! We are certainly humbled to know that we lived up to your expectations and all the great reviews that came with it. We strive everyday to deliver outstanding customer service with friendliness attached to it....I am happy to know we delivered both in your opinion! Thank you for your compliments on our lobby, pool area and public spaces. We take much pride in the cleanliness and organization of our property and it certainly feels wonderful when that is acknowledged and recognized by our valued guests such as yourself. THANK YOU!! It would be our pleasure and honor to have you back on property very soon. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Clean friendly and very close to everything you may need, and walking distance to Disney Land. has all the great resturant next to it and lovely shopping area just around the corner. They need to work on breakfast. not good selections and over rated.
Manager Response: Greetings Guest'! We are thankful for receiving your comments on tripadvisor. Our cleanliness of our property and friendliness of our staff is so important to us and I thank you so much for allowing us to be acknowledged. We do believe that our location is #1 in being very close to all surrounding areas, shops, restaurants, etc...and of course the happiest place on earth! Thank you for sharing your thoughts regarding our breakfast menu and our selections. Although we continue to receive positive reviews regarding our F&B department, we constantly are looking for ways to improve every aspect of our operation and would invite all suggestions and recommendations from our valued guest' such as yourself. My apologies that you experienced the strong smell of cooking on our first floor. I would like to add that we do have installed state of the art cooking hoods/blowers in our kitchen and ventilation systems on each floor. Hope you will allow us another opportunity in the future to be of service. Please contact me directly and I will personally handle your reservation. Look forward to hearing from you soon! Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at this hotel with our 2 young girls (4&5) for our first family Disney visit. Before we even arrived the staff at this hotel provided excellent service. I had purchased a pram and had it shipped to the hotel and I received an email before we even got there to advise they had received it and were storing it for me. From check in, to advise on where to get the best tickets, the staff were friendly, helpful and courteous (without being overkill). Despite being an older building, the interiors were designed with a modern feel and the beds were very comfortable. I requested a back room so that my daughters could see the fireworks and we were granted this request. The pool, whilst small, was perfect for a cool down before or after our big Disney Days. We walked comfortably
Manager Response: Dear Guest'! We are very humbled and certainly very happy to have received your complementary review regarding your stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We certainly strive not only to meet our guest' expectations, but to exceed them is our goal. We feel that it's the little things that will make a difference, for example, reaching out to you to let you know that your pram had arrived and we were storing it safely for you, maybe just one less thing to worry about. We also feel that it is very important to be prepared with as much information to share with our guest' regarding the surrounding areas. So happy to know that we were able to accommodate a beautiful room with a fireworks view from Disneyland for you and your daughters! We share our reviews with our entire staff and for our staff to know that you had a wonderful time on our property and would stay with us in a heartbeat, just makes them glow! I want to thank you personally for recommending our property to your friends who are looking for accommodations near by. This is the highest of compliments that we can ever receive from a guest! We are humbled. Hope to see you soon! Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights in June 2014 a and it was great! Very close (5 ish minute walk) to Disneyland, and just down the block from a bunch of restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, PF Changs, etc.).  Our room was very clean and comfortable, and the glass elevator was cool! This hotel had everything we wanted except for a continental breakfast, but we just went to the grocery store and bought some breakfast foods. The pool looked ok, but we didn't have a chance to go in it. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for nicer accommodation around Disney, and willing to spend a bit extra.
Manager Response: Greetings from Hotel Indigo Anaheim! Thank you so very much for such a positive and complimentary review regarding your 6 night stay with us! So nice to know that you really enjoyed your very clean and very comfortable room.....We also receive so many nice and cool comments regarding our glass elevator, and we are so glad that you thought it was cool too! I did want to mention that we offer a Chambers Continental breakfast that includes a delicious Rossmoor muffin or croissant served with a bowl of seasonal fruit. Served with juice and your choice of coffee or hot tea.  I am so sorry that you were not able to enjoy our pool that is comfortably heated at 82 degrees all year round. Maybe next time! :) We also feel that we have the most beautiful accommodations around Disney and we thank you for your compliment! Hope to see you again in the near future.... Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Got a good rate and was not sure about hotel. But staff were very helpful and the position great. A 10 minute walk to Disneyland. So easy to come back to hotel if you want during the day. The happy hour and snacks were great at the bar and perfect for us since we had a late flight home. Rooms good value.
Manager Response: Dear Hotel Indigo Anaheim Guest! I am so happy to hear that you were very pleased with our staff! Our entire staff takes lots of pride in delivering our impeccable standards consistently. Just a hop, skip and a jump to Disneyland makes it very convenient as you mentioned, to return to our hotel, join us at our CHAMBERS Bar & Bistro for awesome drinks and delicious food or just take a nap, then head back out to the HAPPIEST PLACE ON EARTH. I am really glad to know that you enjoyed our HAPPY HOUR ( 5pm - 7pm 7 days a week and our snacks! I have let my Food & Beverage Manager Jesus Diaz, know of your compliment as well. Great to know that you were just as happy with your rate and good value!! Hope to see you very soon! Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: Stayed here for three nights while on our Disneyland vacation. The room was clean, cozy, and quiet. The chic decor of the hotel was awesome. Staff was polite and accommodating. We will always check here first anytime we visit Anaheim in the future!!!
Manager Response: Hello Dear Guest! My name is Edward Voysest, General Manager here at beautiful Hotel Indigo in Anaheim, CA. I wanted to thank you so much for choosing our property to stay for your Disneyland vacation! We are so happy to know that you really enjoyed our cleanliness of our rooms as well as the quietness. The chic decor of our property represents what Hotel Indigo is all about - VIBRANT, CURIOUS & Original!! Thank you for your compliment regarding our staff....Politeness is very important to us and we attempt to deliver the extra mile at all times. We appreciate you always inquiring with us first here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim when your travel plans include a visit to the HAPPIEST PLACE ON EARTH or to the city of ANAHEIM! We are honored! Please contact me at 714.772.7755 if I may be of service. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: This was my third staying in this luxury and wonderful hotel. Impeccable clean  friendly staff. I make my favorite this hotel. Clean ,good organized people .the one who clean my room  was friendly helpful good job .I think her name was if I remember, jannes ,Jane's or Janet . to all the staff you make me feel like home  good housekeeping  . I love the decoration. Keep the good work. All of you.
Manager Response: Dear Guest! I want to personally acknowledge and thank you so very much for not only choosing our beautiful hotel to stay, but to also let you know that we are so humbled to know and recognize that you continue to allow us to be of service time and time again! We are very thankful! We take great pride in the cleanliness and organization of our entire property both from the inside and out....We appreciate your kind words referencing our impeccable cleanliness! We have also shared with our wonderful and hardworking housekeeper (Janet), that you specifically mentioned her and how happy you were with her services. We are honored and do not take for granted, when we receive compliments signaling out a particular associate of ours....Janet and the entire team here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim THANKS YOU! Hope to see you again real soon! Please contact me at 714.772.7755 if I may be of service. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary: So I'd say this hotel deserves 3.5 stars, so I'm rounding up to 4.  It's a very solid, no frills type of property.  For folks that would use your hotel just for sleeping and spend most of the day at Disneyland, this is probably a perfect type of property.    Parking was easy.  There is a small check-in area where you can leave your car, and some spots that are usually taken.  But there is a good amount of underground secured parking, which was nice.    Check-in was a breeze, and the front desk associates were very polite.  I am a light sleeper, so I was concerned about the reviews that mentioned the stomping you can hear from the floor above you (due to the hardwood floors).  I requested a top floor room because of this, but they were not able to accommodate me, which was a tad
Manager Response: Dear Guest! Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay with us here at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We appreciate your compliment regarding our underground secured parking. I am glad to know that your check-in experience met your expectations and we were very polite in doing so. We strive everyday for perfection regarding our cleanliness in all areas, especially our sleeping rooms and I would like to share my apologies that unfortunately we came up a little short with your room. Great to know that you found your bed to be very comfortable, along with the sheets and pillows. Regarding our beautiful hardwood floors and the noise level that you experienced....We try very hard to share with all our guests, that they have compassion and respect for their neighbors in trying to control noise levels at all times. We receive daily compliments on our shower water pressure and regret that we came up short in not meeting your expectations in this area....I have followed up with your room. Thank you so very much on your compliment regarding our ANGEL SOFT toilet paper....That's AWESOME!! Look forward to your visit again to our property very soon we hope! Please do not hesitate to contact me directly at 714 772 7755 if I may be of assistance. Very truly yours, Edward Voysest General Manager Hotel Indigo Anaheim

Summary Heading: Cool place with little to complain about
Summary: Hotel Indigo is quickly earning its stripes in the industry. As we left, I promised the manager I would leave a good review on Trip Advisor. Why make such a promise? Because he personally took time to make sure our stay was enjoyable. Class act.  There's a lot to be said about making impressions on people, and the Indigo did just that. Local bar & restaurant, close to Disneyland, and nice rooms.  What the Indigo is not: a luxury resort. Don't expect it. What the Indigo does well is provide a little luxury in an economic package. The rooms have space and are equipped sparsely but not lacking. My only complaint to management (when asked) was the lack of air flow throughout the room. The air conditioners work great! However, with no adjustment capabilities the rooms get stuffy very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room, location, and our restaurant. We would like to sincerely apologize for the lack of air flow throughout the room. We will definitely bring the issue to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: The Staff are superb! I have never stayed at a friendlier and more hospitable hotel.  The room was clean and comfortable. For us the location to Disneyland was perfect, not to close for noise & congestion, but close enough to walk in 15 mins. Bonus: It was great to be able to see the fireworks from our room window one night.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us! We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary Heading: Good local hotel for walking to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great room on the top floor. Service was very good but the best thing is the hotel's proximity to Disneyland. It is a 10 minute walk . There are a lot of local reasonably priced restaurants also in walking distance from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such nice feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Clean - Great Service - Close to the Park
Summary: I booked this 1 night about 2 weeks out - based o n the TA reviews, location and the price.  I think the majority of the reviews were spot on.  Great location just off the freeway.  Outside the hotel, up one way was some chain restaurants and the other way was Disneyland.  DLand was about 15 min walk, easy enough.    The check in was full of smiles and information.  The room was your standard layout, very clean.  Some had found the hard floors (looks like wood flooring, but not) a little odd.  We really didn't comment on it, just that it was clean.  We didn't use the pool, but from our window it looked a little small, primarily because the hotel isn't on a big spot of land.  We did not use the restaurant either, but it did look busy each time we were by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the guestroom. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: All fo the staff we encountered were friendly and helpful.  We dinner and breakfast and the food was quite good.  The location was excellent, walking distance to Disneyland. We will definitely stay here the next time we go to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest service, food at our restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro, and our location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Super Place to Stay While Visiting DLR
Summary: We spent three very restful and satisfying nights here recently.  It appeared that an existing, older hotel had recently been given a modern and appealing facelift and our room, on the 3rd floor, was lovely, spacious, and nicely outfitted.  Everything in the room was in great working order and we loved the fact that, in addition to the quiet air conditioner, the window could be fully opened to catch the refreshing afternoon breezes.  Oh, and did I mention the incredible bed and bedding - pure heaven!    At check-in, I asked for a room "with a view" - meaning that I didn't want to overlook a parking lot, if avoidable, and you can imagine our pleasure at discovering that our room had a straight-on view of DL's nightly fireworks display (which is truly magical).  The hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, about 3/4 mi walk from Disneyland; CVS and Walgreen's nearby.  Would DEFINITELY stay here again.
Summary: This was my first stay at this hotel; it was recommended by a friend who has stayed here numerous times.  I did not take advantage of the restaurant/bar, nor did I use the pool or Jacuzzi.  Basically, it was a place to sleep.  Room was spacious.  A/C tended to be a little cold, so I just shut the fan off.  Really nice bathroom and shower with amenities, refrigerator and coffee maker in room (did not use the latter).  The location in relation to Disneyland is great; it's about 3/4 - 1 mile walk.  There are both CVS and Walgreen's drug stores nearby, as well as a wealth of restaurants, mostly inexpensive.  People are lovely, very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our room, location, and guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Indigo during a multi-day trip to Disneyland.   I am going to rate this location a A-.  This hotel is on Katella not too far from the corner with Harbor. With the exception of the hotel/motels directly across from Disneyland (and you will sacrifice cleanliness for distance) you are not going to get any closer to the parks. 10 minute walk at most to main gates.   PROS: Close to Disneyland and Convention Center.   We stayed in a room on the 4th floor with King Bed and could see the fireworks from our room..   There was a small desk area, mini-fridge, Keurig single-cup coffee maker and a soft chair and ottoman to put your feet up.  Bathroom had a nice big counter and large step-in shower.  Wi-Fi was solid and average 5 Mbps which is not blazing fast but
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location, room, and amenities. We would like to apologize for the noise from the air conditioner. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Great hotel find near Disneyland Resort that will "Wow!!!" you.
Summary: My wife and I just returned from a wonderful anniversary trip on which we stayed at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  I don't think you will ever be able to find another hotel with staff that is more caring and helpful, truly going above and beyond to assure each guest's complete satisfaction.  They were warm and sincere and kept asking if there was anything else that they could do, even after they had more than taken care of a minor issue that came up.  By the end of our five-night stay, we had made friends with various staff members, but it was Arthur who really stood out and even hugged us when we left.  Only one word is needed to sum up our experience... Wow!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: nice hotel. great location for disneyland. helpful and friendly staff.
Summary: This hotel was very close to perfect for us. For the price it is fantastic and in an awsome location with Disneyland as well as plenty of dining nearby.  The hotel facilities are good and the staff are really helpful.  The only downside to this hotek is the noise from the rooms above u. Being hard floors people walking above u is really loud and woke us several times.  Other than that a solid option. Get a top floor.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would like to apologize for the noise from the hardwood floor. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The exterior of the hotel was nice looking and check in was average with a helpful clerk providing a map and some of the areas of interest along with answering our Disneyland questions. Our room had a modern feel with fake wood floors and some nice touches to the room decor (Bathroom door, wood floor, wall decor). While I really liked the look of the floors I was immediately concerned how the noise level would be if we had an upstairs neighbor.   Our first of three nights at approximately 3 a.m. with our room window closed a group of drunk adults were in the outside lounge directly below our window (3 stories) being extremely loud for approximately 2 hours. Aside from those extremely inconsiderate individuals I was even more disappointed with the fact that management never even
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize for the noise from the hardwood floor. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We botched our booking with Hotel Indigo by accidentally booking the wrong dates, but didn't find out until we arrived after a very long drive. We were immediately placed in a terrific room at a very reasonable price. Our experience of the hotel was that it is very close to Disneyland, the service was exemplary, the food was good. Not only that, when we found that we'd left our Kindle and charger, the staff promptly organised for its safe return to us in Melbourne. Thank you to all the staff involved in looking out for us. We had a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location, guest service, and food at the restaurant. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I would like to thank the staff and management for the "outstanding customers service". My family and I are looking forward to staying with hotel Indigo again in the near future.  The morning manager by the name of "Arthur", really took the time to insure my family had a smooth check in. I am a United States Army Veteran and was really delighted to know that we were able to check in early and get situated prior to heading to Disneyland park. Once again Thank you hotel Indigo Anaheim and we look forward to staying with you soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary Heading: A terrific hotel for business or fun
Summary: Met at this hotel for a 4 day reunion of school friends.  It is a lovely facility.  The staff was friendly, helpful and professional.  There was a van made available to us one afternoon for a drop at a local shopping mall, offered when we asked about a cab.  The rooms were large and very comfortable, and the full service breakfast was terrific.  Would certainly stay there again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with guest services, room, and the breakfast at our restaurant. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Located within 5 minutes of Disney.  Upon entering the main entrance...a feeling of nostalgia rushes through. The hotel room is spacious, wooden floors...no carpet.  Great daylight, airy and non smoking is a definite plus. Room Service is available. Queen Sized Beds are cozy and comfortable.  Bathroom is open and spacious--non claustrophobic!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with the location and our guestroom. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: After a long flight and no sleep, what a relief to find such welcoming staff (thank you Arthur you are amazing at your job), my mother and I were able to have an early check in - beautiful quiet room (faced road but minimal traffic noise), super comfy (sleep was easy) bed, awesome hot showers choice of shower head and pressure).  We were able to rest, refresh and recharge.  Disney is an easy walk (even at a slow pace for my mum). Safe area, friendly people. Everything was so well presented and clean.  We would highly recommend this hotel! We will be staying again.   Again, thank you to Arthur for his friendly welcome to 2 jet lagged Aussies!  We so appreciated our time at hotel indigo !
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services, bed, shower, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Indigo for 3 nights in early May. We were upgraded to a King Suite upon check in, which was a real bonus. The Indigo is modern and clean and the staff were friendly and helpful. It is walking distance to Disney (10-15 min) and near restaurants, shops and a cinema. Our room also had an ok view of the Disney fireworks. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here from Thursday to Sunday. We loved how close it was to Disneyland and the look of the hotel was very modern and clean, which was nice. The free underground parking was a plus but it did get crowded on the weekend so spaces were very limited. The only negative thing about our stay was a little kid screaming through the hallways around 8am on both Saturday and Sunday morning. I understand kids will make noise and this is a family friendly hotel but I didn't appreciate the parents who let their kid run crazy so early in the morning and allow them to continue yelling for over half an hour. This wasn't just a little scream either, it was loud enough to annoy other guests because I was able to over hear someone asking them to quiet down. Other than that,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied of our location, cleanliness of the property, and complimentary self-parking service. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: The staff was so incredibly accommodating. Everyone from the manager to front desk to the cleaning staff were so kind.  Rooms were awesome and so clean. We had a great experience and would love to stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are gld that you are satisfied with our guest services and cleanliness of the room. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day.  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: One word - AMAZING!!!! I will without a doubt return to this hotel if I ever need a place to stay. You will not be disappointed with hotel indigo, it was clean, comfortable, stylish, and made me feel right at home. I was telling my fiancé that it almost felt like an upscale condo rather then a hotel. The service was top notch and couldn't have asked more from the kind, courteous, and overly welcoming staff!
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We booked two rooms for five nights using Expedia packaged with airfare.  Price is at least half of what you would pay for Disneyland hotel. It's about a 10-15 minute walk on major roads with busy pedestrian and road traffic (so it's safe).  CVS pharmacy just one block away and fridge in the rooms for you to store a jug of milk (if you have small kids and don't want to pay hotel or Disneyland prices).  Cheesecake Factory, Roy's, California Pizza Kitchen and a Johnny Rockets one block away as well.    We ate breakfast every morning at the hotel restaurant out of convenience and it's nothing fancy, but decent.  Edward, the manager, took the time to learn our names and was super hospitable.  We really liked him.  The staff did everything to make our stay pleasant.  They arranged a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. Every one of us always tries our best to help our guests and make their stay become more memorable. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: I am in the room right now, and it is as clean and comfortable as it was last time (this is my second visit).  The bathrooms are up-to-date, the bed is comfy (the Mrs. Is passed out on it right now), and I am relaxing in the reading chair.  This hotel has a contemporary feel, while still being down-to-earth.  Our kind of place for sure.  Thanks to Kahlil (hope I got that right) for the warm welcome, and getting us the King bed room that we had requested.  The staff here is great.    This is THE place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland/DCA.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with the room and guest services. Every one of our employees tries his or her best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was our first stop on a Californian holiday - and was  suitably impressed with the Hotel in general. We chose this spot as it was a short walk to Disneyland and close to restaurants, car rental, and other amenities. Top notch customer service every day a friendly smile, welcoming attitude, spotless rooms, spacious safe, very comfy beds and decent food to boot! What more could you want? I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I booked this hotel online on the strength of it's reviews,  and it pretty much lived up to them. We ended up with free breakfast each morning because of a mix-up on the site that I booked it through, and the meals were really good. Free parking was another bonus. They have very limited outdoor parking, but they have an underground garage with plenty of space. Disneyland is within walking distance, so it's nice to have your car stored in a cool spot for the day. The staff were extremely friendly, always calling out a hello or good bye to you. They seemed really eager to please. The room was very clean. I was kinda wary about the wood floors being dusty or just having crumbs or whatever on them, but I walked around with bare feet in our room and the floors felt great. Great
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you are satisfied with our foods at Chambers Bar & Bistro, complimentary self-parking service, location, guest services, and cleanliness of the room. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: We stayed here at the beginning of our 20th anniversary trip to go Disneyland. We weren't expecting anything over the top, just a decent place to spend the night close to the park. We were pleasantly surprised with the most accommodating and friendly staff! Art at the front desk was very helpful and let us choose from a couple of room options as well as check in early. The property manager, Edward, introduced himself as we walked in and made sure we knew they would do everything they could to make our stay top notch. The room was clean and we loved that they have wood floors and not dirty carpet. The bed was comfortable and the room was updated. Ladies.....the bathroom was clean!!! They had Aveda products, not some off the wall cheap brand. The details of folding the hand towels
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest service, room, and complimentary self-parking service. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I spent 9 nights with my wife and 2 kids . I use to travel a lots and slept in lots of different accommodation sometime luxury .  Indigo Hotel is an hidden gems in Anaheim . Very close to Disneyland 5 min by walk and 2 min from Anaheim Gardenwalk   This hotel is brand new  very well maintain .the restaurant is very good and affordable and the customers service is better than some 5 stars hotels with big names.  Mr Arthur was one  of the reception  employee and he took care of us from the first day to the last .  Do not hesitate to book this place for family stay or couple it’s a very good surprise especially in Anaheim where you can find so many accommodation sometime expensive and in bad shape .  Thank you to all the staff for Indingo hotel for our stay

Summary: I stayed here for 4 days, 3 nights. The location is perfect for those going to Disneyland; the walk is quick and easy. The hotel is a few min walk from the garden walk which has some great restaurants. Also, it's a short bus ride to the outlets at Orange as well as a quick shuttle ride to south coast plaza.  The staff members were very friendly and really go out of their way to help guests. The rooms were nice and clean. The beds were comfortable and the shower was relaxing.  There is also a refrigerator in the room which was great. I will definitely be returning when I am next in town!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the location, guest services, and cleanliness of the guestrooms. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 nights. We had 5 children split between 3 rooms. This hotel was great! Very accommodating and the staff is so friendly! The rooms are clean and the pool is awesome. Short walk to Disneyland and located next to plenty of restaurants and stores if you need anything. You can watch the fireworks from your room, the pool or their restaurant! We will stay here again for sure next time we go to Disney!

Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We had a perfect stay at this hotel. Every employee was helpful and friendly. Facilities were recently renovated so the rooms felt modern and comfortable, mattresses were very comfortable Bathrooms were very clean. Stay here, you won't regret it!

We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: The staff at this hotel definitely delivers the "WOW" factor! I have to give the entire staff huge kudos as they are on top of it. The staff at check in were very friendly with smiles on their faces as my family and I went back and forth from Disneyland. We were always greeted with a "welcome back" or "Hi how are you." The hotel is clean and the staff provides a welcoming atmosphere. The General Manager of the hotel was out every morning greeting guests and asking how our stay was. The Loyalty Champion of the hotel is awesome! The gentleman (forgive me for not knowing names) who checked us in on April 25th was welcoming and informative. I do appreciate the hskp department for putting up with our messy room as we had three younger boys to tend to :). I so apologize I forgot to
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of our property. We are delighted to hear that you like our guest services. Every one of our employees try our best to meet or exceed guests’ expectations. We are truly grateful to have them in our team to make our hotel unique and shine. Please do let us know when you come to visit again!

Summary: No hotel snob here, but I do need my room to be AT LEAST up to par to what I've left back at home.  Indigo was as clean and comfortable as my own house, but they also instilled a likable feeling of class and professionalism.   Staying in hotels can be tedious, indigo was a pleasant surprise. Clean, updated, comfortable, quiet and UPDATED.  Also, I don't know it was the manager of a Norma employee, but I saw a man walking around the windows, specifically checking the window seals for cleanliness. That same man was also seen helping a very needy family check-out. I don't know if he was the manager, but he was very professional.    Arthur helped us check in and check out and he was very nice and very helpful; a great representation for the hotel.   10/10 will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Spent 3 nights here in April on a family vacation. The hotel was very clean. Rooms fine, just a bit small though. The pool and hot tub although small were just fine. We did find it a little hard to find when driving to the hotel as it is a little tucked away and sign not obvious unless you knew what to look for. You may want to Google street view. This is not a complaint just trying to help other travellers. It is a short was to Disneyland, there are lots of restaurants close by as well. The resort shuttle pick up is very close, we used it to get to Angels stadium and back with ease. Room had a fridge and safe and was comfortable.  Free parking and Internet was a bonus these days. My only concern was the single elevator was slow. Overall a very good stay would recommend and stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms, location, and amenities. Again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here purely for visiting disneyland and it was a great choice. They have a carpark which is free and it is only a short ten minute walk to the disney parks, the room has newly been refurbished and is clean and tidy. The front of desk staff were friendly and so were staff working in the bar/restaurant. I would definately use this hotel again as it was a quiet convinient location

Summary: We own a similar hotel in St George Utah called the Inn on the Cliff. We love staying here and enjoying the decor and quality of the beds. I doubt we would ever stay anywhere else. Great staff and close to Disneyland what else could you want.

Summary: From the moment we walked into the Hotel Indigo Anaheim we were very happy with our experience. We met the front desk staff who could not have been nicer and more caring both at that moment and throughout our stay. The room was wonderfully clean, crisp, and modern as was the whole property. there were rooms with children all around us but once in the room were heard nothing from them. This was one of our most positive stays. Arthur at the front desk is a true gem...the man could not do enough for us!

Summary: We stayed just one night, I think the hotel is very modern and beautiful. I'm huge on cleanliness and this hotel passed my test. My only complaint which is why I only gave 4/5 was that you could hear EVERYTHING, people walking on the top floor, people walking past and the room didn't get too dark being that the door had some space that let a lot of light in. If you stay, go for the top floor. We had a great stay despite that. The underground and gated FREE parking was a plus as well as FREE WIFI! We walked about 1/2 mile to Disneyland and just a few blocks to food, within walking distant a there was a bubba Gino's, of change, Cheesecake Factory several sports bars and restaurants! The location  is prime and you can't beat the price!

Summary Heading: Close to convention center, disneyland and restaurants
Summary: we arrived at 1230pm and asked if we could check in. Arthur at the front desk said sure, just join our free rewards program. so we did, checked into an excellent quiet room overlooking the back parking lot area. we COULD hear the Disneyland fireworks, but otherwise it was very quiet and we couldn't hear traffic/people on Katella. the pool was great for relaxing after days at the star wars convention. the breakfast was quite tasty at their bistro and the service excellent. My sister arrived in the am to eat breakfast with me and Arthur again came to the rescue to find her a place in the parking lot - he really went above and beyond! I loved the hotel and the location - right in the center of things, but it really was an oasis when we needed to relax.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights. The staff are great - friendly and helpful. It is a good hotel for families. There are a number of family dining options close by and Disneyland is about a 10 minute walk.

Summary Heading: Nice room, great location and value. Ideal hotel for Disneyland visit.
Summary: Stayed at Hotel Indigo for 5 nights with my wife and 2 kids. What a great hotel and wonderful surprise. Walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants. Staff are very friendly and rooms are huge, clean and modern. Free wifi and underground parking. I have visited Disneyland twice and stayed in different hotels (e.g. Sheraton). Hotel Indigo is definitely the best hotel for Disneyland visit. Highly recommended and definitely stay at Hotel Indigo again in our future Disneyland visit.

Summary: We booked a Family suite with two doubles and a sofa bed. We didn't use the sofa bed, just wanted the extra room.   The room was on the top floor and faced the main road at the front of the hotel.  The road was quite loud during the evening but not a problem after about 11pm.  The room was in good repair with everything as it should be and we had no complaints.  The housekeeping did a good job of keeping on top of things, but as the floors are timber laminate, it probably wouldn't hurt to mop as well as vacuum as our socks got quite dirty underneath showing the floors needed a mop.  The reception staff at this hotel are fantastic.  Always smiling and inquiring how your day was and asking if there was anything we needed.  We only ate as the restaurant once but had a terrible

Summary: Great location within short walking distance to Disneyland. Fabulous front desk service, everyone was incredibly warm, friendly and professional. The room was very clean and nice sized, the beds were very comfortable and the shower was wonderful! (It did take a minute to figure it out.)  The restaurant for breakfast was fairly pricey for okay food but again the service was wonderful. Beyond that small complaint everything was terrific. We will definitely stay again.

Alex was at the front desk to assist me and greeted me as an IHG Platinum Member within 3 seconds of me giving my name. I was given a welcoming gift as well as a free room upgrade. This single day stay was a test to make sure the location and hotel was up to par for an upcoming trip. With our stay completed we will for sure be returning in late May for the 60th Anniversary celebration at Disneyland.

Summary: I've stayed here twice and had a wonderful stay. Being a Platinum IHG member, I was upgraded to a corner suite and given a small welcome gift as well as bonus points. The room was clean, bed was comfortable and WiFi worked well. The outside parking lot is quite small, but they do have a underground parking structure which connects directly to the elevator and parking is free.   Ideal location with ample restaurants around and Disneyland within walking distance. If I need to be in the area again, I'll definitely stay here.

Summary: Ok, it is "disneyland", but paper thin walls and screaming kids just doesn't make for a nice stay.  Staff was friendly, location quite good.  Unfortunately, as platinum elite guests, we really felt under appreciated.

Summary: We spent two nights during spring break at Hotel Indigo for our day at Disneyland.  This hotel was perfect. We could walk about 15 minutes to the combined entrance for Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventure. Going the other direction, there are lots of restaurants in the Anaheim Garden Walk (we greatly enjoyed a dinner at Fire + Ice). Not having to pay for Disney parking and not having to deal with park traffic was great.  There is also a large CVS a block away as well as a small shopping center with a Subway, pizza place, taco place and other options.  You could tell the bones of the building were older, but it had obviously been recently renovated with very modern touches and décor. The whole area used to be walnut farms, so the rooms are decorated with a walnut

Summary Heading: beware when you bring a pet 250.00 pet fee
Summary: we checked in with our 3 lb mini pom and at that time we were informed of the 250.00 fee. thats right folks 250.00.  that is not a deposit that is an actual fee.  we just game from an absolutely beautiful hotel in palm springs 4 stars and they charged a deposit of 50.00.  we then promptly at the desk without seeing our room asked for a refund which we were given and called the sheraton park inn which charged us 75 right there and took us in. we never got to see the inside of yhe indigo rooms so we cant evaluate there however the parking lot is tiny tiny tiny maybe fitting 6 cars then i believe theres a type of underground garage but it is very very tight. other then that the lobby was as expected and the desk staff as expected.

Summary: We stayed at this place for three nights at the end of March 2015. I was initially disappointed not to be able to stay in one of Disney's hotels, which were VERY expensive.   But as soon as we arrived, we enjoyed the Indigo Hotel. The place is modern and airy, the rooms are contemporary and very well appointed (with an Ipod station, a refrigerator, great furnitures, a comfortable bed, and a very nice bathroom that I'd like to have at home !) and there is a small swimming pool and a spa. Parking was easy and felt secure.  The hotel is a 10 minutes walk from Disneyland. you'll need to cross a road, but the place felt safe. You are 5 minutes from GardenWalk, where you'll find a cheesecake factory, a Bubba Gump, and all sorts of restaurants and bars if you need to get away from
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at a few Anaheim hotels and they all have one thing in common- they are tired and dated.  This hotel is fresh and appalling, it is well located near restaurants and a very short walk to Disneyland. You can stay In a Disney Hotel but they are overpriced and as far as we are concede d, do not provide the quality of this hotel. The staff is engaging and accommodating.

Summary Heading: Not A Boutique Hotel but Ok for Disney Visit
Summary: I travel a lot, averaging 7-10 trips annually.  With that said, I admit that my standards for service and accommodations are high.  My go-to hotel brands are Luxury Collection, Starwood, Kimpton, etc. I have Travel Connoisseur status on TripAdvisor and Expedia Gold+ membership.  I state this not to brag but to confirm my travel experience/knowledge.   When I planned a recent Spring Break trip to Anaheim to haunt the Disney Parks, I sought out accommodations that “on paper” met my standards.  I checked the Hotel Indigo’s reviews on both TripAdvisor and Expedia. I felt comfortable with my reservation.  Pros:  Location: The Hotel Indigo is located 3 blocks from the Disney Parks. No car is necessary if your primary purpose is to do Disneyland / California Adventure.  Katella Avenue
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such detailed review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We also have one bedroom suite which contains one king bed or two queen beds with a separate living room that has a sofa bed.  We would also like to sincerely apologize for the noise coming from next door of your room. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: It was close to disneyland but sleep quality not so good because it was loud in the hallways. The pool was really cold but refreshing after a day at disneyland I made a new "friend". There was a restaurant in the building so we didn't have to go out as much the food was pretty good.The staff were really nice.It was also really clean and looked very new.-Kiki age9

Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Arrived at the hotel to a friendly girl at the front desk. Easy check in. Room is very modern and clean. Room has a kuerig coffee maker. Floors are beautiful wood and Bathroom is very nice. My children (5&7) said that is was such a nice place. Free parking which is hard to find around Disneyland. My father and sister who live near Disneyland came to visit and they didn't make them pay for parking. The bar has a happy hour which we enjoyed for mine and my sisters birthday. They bar tender even treated us to a free desert. Hotel is about a 10-15 min. Walk to Disneyland. Beds are very comfortable. We ate breakfast at the restaurant in the morning with our food vouchers. Food was amazing! Manager greated us in the morning to make sure we enjoyed our stay. We only live an hour from
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here on our trip to Disneyland and we were not disappointed. The room is very modern both in decor and design. The small fridge was handy for leftovers from the restaurants we ate at (but you'll have to ask for a microwave hopefully at the restaurant). Wifi signal was decent (and complimentary). Parking underground was a huge plus and we could come and go with no extra fee or charge. Our window allowed us to see the fireworks (always at 9:25pm)  Service was very good. Front desk was very friendly, housekeeping gave us fresh coffee and cleaned the bed, and arranged the towels in those animal shapes in the bathroom.   The only minor issues I would mention are that the combination shower head and wand cannot be used simultaneously, it's just one or the other. Also, the

Summary: When we walked into the hotel, we knew that this was the perfect hotel. There's a parking lot for the hotel, but you need a room card first. You can eat breakfast at the Cheesecake factory which you can walk to, and you can arrive at Disneyland in a 10 minute walk. Breakfast is also served at the hotel, but I wanted to try the Cheesecake Factory. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. The staff was friendly and they would help anyone with anything. I recommend staying at this hotel if you want to go to Disneyland and definitely buy Disneyland tickets from the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great staff, great place to stay
Summary: From the moment we arrive, the personnel made us feel home, they were charming all stay long. The hotel is located 10 minutes from Disneyland by walk so quite easy and has plenty of restaurants around for eating of Disney property

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel, perfect location, perfect staff
Summary: Stayed here on a whirlwind trip to visit LA theme parks. We were here for 8 days, of which 4 wee spent at the two Disney parks - the hotel is a short easy walk to Disneyland each day. The location was exceptional, because it is placed partway between Disney and the local Restaurant precinct (not the Disney one). Our room was at the back giving us a view of the Disney fireworks. Staff were helpful, friendly and our room was excellent as a place to sleep - we didn't really spend a lot of time in there. Have and will recommend it to friends and family over the usual popular and more expensive hotels. In-house restaurant food was also good, we had snacks one night before heading to the Honda Center down the road for ice hockey (they also arranged a private car for this and the

Summary: The hotel we usually stay at was booked for our family trip to Disney. We where very pleased with how clean and updated the hotel was. Our stay did not start off very good with some loud neighbors walking around all night long. As soon as Edward, the General manager found out about our sleepless night he took care of the situation immediately to make th rest of our stay a great one. Summary Heading: One of my best stays ever!
Summary: just got back home and spent a long day in Disneyland I decided to stay here without checking TripAdvisor.   A risky move but wow did I hit the nail on the head!   This place is ranked #2 but it's my #1.   The staff at the front desk were so knowledgeable and very friendly.  As I went to my room, I'd pass by two employees that greeted me and asked how my day was.   The room was immaculate and smelled clean and fresh.   I couldn't hear any noise despite the hotel being pretty full - so it seemed that night.   The bed was comfortable and I stayed part of the morning to have breakfast.  I love this place!   I absolutely love this place and would recommend it to anyone going to Disney.   It's worth every penny!!!!!!!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay very much. Friendly, efficient staff, spacious rooms, bright bathrooms with glass shower doors. Non-carpeted floors. Good wifi. Only complaint is that there is only one elevator. During peak hours, you can wait quite a while for it.

Summary: I stayed here with my husband, our two year old, and our two month old. We stayed here for its proximity to Disneyland, as that is what the trip was all about.   The staff was very friendly and welcoming, my son appreciated the trail mix and I appreciated the bottled water. We parked in the upper lot while unloading the car and were given a key for the underground parking (which is free).   The room was very comfy. We always appreciate when you can actaully open a window, although because of exhaust we kept it closed more often than not. Our fist night there we were very tired and our toddler pooped out early so we ended up back in our rooms for a late dinner. The room service was very good.   The decor is fun. Summary: We have stayed at another Hotel Indigo before, and we are big fans of the chain. Very clean, easy parking, upgraded, friendly and helpful staff, quiet... Pretty much all you could ask for. You can walk to the park, or Uber easily (only costs us $4, cheaper than the Anaheim shuttle). The manager personally thanked us when we left. We will be back!

Summary: If you are looking for a clean, modern and convenient location when visiting Disneyland, look no further!  I booked directly with the hotel and arranged a corner room family suite at a really reasonable price.  Upon check in we were greeted by Khalil who couldn't have been more friendly or helpful in going though restaurant choices and getting around the area.  Nestled between restaurants you will have no difficulty in finding dining options and a breeze to walk to Disneyland as it will only take you 10-15mins.  Although some may want to stay a little closer to the park, we found this hotel to be the perfect option and would highly recommend it.
