Summary Heading: Perfect stay next to Disney- quiet night's rest
Summary: Not much more to add that hasn't already been stated about this wonderful boutique hotel.    Heavenly bed, great water pressure in the shower and spotless bathrooms.  Great views of the Disneyland skyline meant we could enjoy the fireworks from the comfort of our hotel room.    Pool and hot tub looked inviting but we didn't have enough time to take a dip.  The restaurant/bar was great. We were more than satisfied with our breakfasts each morning.  The staff is absolutely outstanding. Edward, the GM, was incredibly friendly and showed genuine care for our opinions.  We're Platinum elite members of IHG and I'd put this hotel up there with the best in chain.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that are satisfied with the room, amenities, foods, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: First time at this hotel - and Holiday Inn's new niche of 'boutique hotels'. Read the reviews below and must say that they are correct.  Newly refurbished and turned into a truly great place. Outstanding location, ease of access and parking, clean and upgraded room/bathroom amenities...and truly friendly and helpful staff.  Best hotel stay of many trips to Disneyland over the years...will definitely return - and try other Hotel Indigo properties.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location, the complimentary self-parking service and our room cleanliness. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent, excellent service! Will definitely stay again.
Summary: You can tell it's refurbished but they did a very good job of jazzing it up. The first staff member we met was Victor at Front Desk. We were 3 hours early and, as anticipated, our 1 bedroom suite was unavailable but Victor blocked off our room which was on the top floor with a view of the park. At 2:30, our room was ready. The two queen beds were quite comfy and the kids definitely wanted them as the sofa pullout was very uncomfortable. The washroom seemed to smell a little but keeping the bathroom fan on  eliminated that problem. The airconditioning was the only significant problem. It would cycle on and off when a certain temperature was reached. However, I could tell, looking at the thermostat, that the desired temperature had not been reached before it turned off. This was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest service. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We would like to apologize for the problem of the air conditioner. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I came to this hotel yesterday 3/16/15 and used rewards points to book it. It's a 10-15 minute walk to Disney Land which was so convenient instead of driving. The hotel employees that I encountered were friendly and professional. The room and the bathroom was clean and pretty (loved the hardwood floors). As for the pool and spa, I didn't get to use either, but I looked at them longingly because both looked quite clean and comfortable. Small workout room with treadmills an elliptical, cables, mats, yoga balls and a bicycle. Overall this was a very comfortable and pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the guest services, room, and amenities. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: This is a 5-Star Hotel in my book!
Summary: From the point of our arrival, we received excellent customer service from every staff member at the front desk and bistro. We arrived early, before our room was ready, and Omar and his team were quick to assure a room would be available for early check-in. However, rather than waiting for that to be done, he assisted us 100% in setting up a private guided tour of LA and surrounding cities which gave us the opportunity to make use of one of our down days and site see! When we arrived back, our room was ready as promised including being given a premium room with a view of the fireworks display at Disneyland. The hotel and room decor was fantastic and the room sizes were perfect. Did I mention the showers? All I can say is "wow"! I could keep on writing by, in a nutshell, this was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with customer service, room, and room décor. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: My new hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Within walking distance from the Parks, this hotel has the best staff I have encountered in any of my trips to Anaheim.  Walking in the door on the first day we were given FREE bottles of water (75-80 degrees that day).  Check in was quick and friendly.  We were greeted every morning when we came down for breakfast (add this to your stay as it is reasonably priced) and when we returned after our day in the Parks.  The general manager visited with us, even the 5- and 10-year olds in our group.  When we checked out today, everyone at the front desk and the restaurant said goodbye and have a great trip.  I strongly recommend the Hotel Indigo as a great place to "leave your luggage" when you visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that are satisfied with the location and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for family visit to LA
Summary: If you see the general manager constantly showing up in the lobby helping customer, you can rest assure this is a good hotel to stay. That was my first impression and guess what it is true!  I was taking my family to Disneyland in LA and stayed 3 nights at the hotel. The room is clean and the bed is amazing. The hotel is a bit small compared to other hotels. But the size limitation was not a big deal because less rooms mean less noisy people. There is a pool and laundry works perfect. The breakfast has many choices and quality is excellent. I learned from the restaurant manager they picked strawberry from nearby farms so they are always fresh. the hotel staff remember my name and was always courteous and helpful. also right next to the hotel are several restaurants including
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our room, amenities, breakfast, and guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Refreshingly and genuinely detail to service hotel
Summary: Refreshingly exceptional service, as soon as you walk in you are welcomed with a genuinely kind and polite staff. Throughout our stay this same treatment remained, from the professional management, front personnel, restaurant staff and housekeeping staff. Key to a successful all around great experience is that; they all work together to provide the guest with their best service. They each are knowledgeable in their jobs and provide it with a smile. The restaurant " Chambers" on premises serves up amazing meals Breakfast included is more like "breakfeast" . Provided with your breakfast vouchers upon check in these are truly $$ in your pocket. Consistency ; and what I believe is great management, work together and all are genuine in wanting your experience to be an exceptional
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, foods, and our location. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Indigo for business for 3 nights. This will be my first hotel choice when I am back in this area! Everyone is very helpful and friendly. The General Manager is often in the lobby welcoming and greeting guests, his leadership has rubbed off on his employees. The hotel is very modern and clean. I only ate breakfast at the hotel and the food was very good. The hotel has free parking and free wifi. The hotel is in a great location next to many restaurants and is a few blocks from Disneyland.  I travel a lot for business and this is the friendliest hotel I have ever stayed in.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with our property design, our foods, our complimentary self-parking service and Wifi, and our location. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: great service, easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: Great staff - they were super friendly and helpful.  Easy walk to Disneyland and to several restaurants.  Free parking and they even let us keep the car there for the afternoon on our check out date so that we could walk over to Disneyland and back.  The room was super clean and comfortable, but the beds were a smidgen too soft for my taste.  Everything else was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services and the room. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here with my husband for two nights when visiting family in anaheim.  for those with kids, it's very convenient to Disneyland.  The boutique design of building is great and liked the fact that there were hardwood floors in the rooms instead of dirty carpets.  The shower was fantastic and there were Aveda bath products.  For the price we paid this was a fantastic value.  The best part of the stay however was the fantastic staff at registration and the bar/restaurant in the lobby.  Couldn't be nicer.  would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to tons of food options and Disneyland
Summary: Just finished staying here and was so pleased with this hotel's great customer service, that I am writing a review. Every interaction with the hotel staff was outstanding which is so rare to find (unfortunately). Omar, Arthur and Hannah were exceptionally friendly and helpful during our stay.   List of pros from our stay:  - Close to Disneyland. This was huge as we walked there for 3 days with a toddler. It's an 8-10 minute walk (and you don't have to walk thru Downtown Disney). - Next door to Anaheim Riverwalk and all of its restaurants. We walked over to Cheesecake Factory and goy takeout twice after a long day at Disneyland and it was quick and yummy.  - We were fortunate enough to be upgraded as an IHG Platinum member to a family studio suite the first night and then a 1
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our guest services, location, complimentary self-parking service, and beds. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Omar, Arthur, and Hannah that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologized for the air conditioner and for the light that come through the room from the hallway. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: I work in a hotel so I am very particular about where I stay. I have to tell you this was the greatest Disney hotel we have stayed at. Clean, modern, awesome breakfast, comfy beds, and great staff. We will absolutely be back!  Hannah at the front desk was great in accommodating our adjoining rooms and totally sweet. The walk to Disney is not bad at all and there you can purchase the Disneyland tickets through the hotel.  None of us had kids so it was nice to not hear a bunch of kiddos running up and down the hallways like you would at some of the other places.  I would totally recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with the cleanliness of the room, breakfast, and our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Hannah that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: Clean, charming, friendly...what more can you ask for?
Summary: When we return to Anaheim we will look to stay here again! Hotel Indigo has wonderful customer service from their front desk to their restaurant. One evening we dined at the hotel restaurant and were quite pleased with the quality of the food and our waiter. Our room was very clean, very trendy and quiet. Beautiful grounds, beautiful hotel. If you arrive early you CAN check in early and get a parking pass for your car to leave on their grounds. It is a walk to Disneyland, probably 10 minutes down the road. The good thing about this area, even at night there are plenty of families out walking so you never feel unsafe.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, quality of our foods, cleanliness of the room, and our location. Every one of us always tries our best to help our guests and make their stay become more memorable. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary Heading: Boutique hotel vibe close to convention center.
Summary: I enjoyed my 3 night stay here while I was in town for a conference. Walking distance to the convention center, and the free parking was a great plus. Comfortable beds with a surplus of pillows. Staff were super nice. I had a problem with the coffee maker in my room, and the front desk offered me coffee from the cafe in the lobby, free of charge. The pool area is accessible at night. They have a nice cabana next to the jacuzzi where I enjoyed hanging out with some drinks. If I ever have to go back to Anaheim, I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind reviews! We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Let me say this was our first stay at an Indigo hotel.  The room seemed small and we missed the plush feeling we normally have due to not having carpet (just my opinion).  The staff was what made the stay pleasant.  Smaller hotel with a small restaurant but very close to several eating facilities.  Nice pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind reviews for your recent stay! We appreciate you choosing to bring your family to Anaheim and giving us the opportunity to accommodate you. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Every single staff member was amazing.  Absolutely friendly, helpful and they genuinely cared about your stay.  Arrived after a 14 hour flight from Australia and we were told that our room would be available by two friendly staff members (who also offered us chocolate - it was Halloween!).  The room is modern, clean and quite large (had a double double).  The bathroom is modern, bright and clean.  The shower heads are a little strange - pressure was up and down along with the temperature but a non issue.  They give you Aveda products which are just lovely, especially for a 3 star hotel, which by the way, never felt like a 3 star hotel.  We only heard our neighbours once and we were lucky enough to have a room facing the Disney fireworks so very happy.  Bed was firm and fine for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Parking is great, room is clean and nice.
Summary: I recently stayed here one night with my family so we could visit both Disney parks.  The staff was amazingly friendly and professional.  The free gated parking was key.  It's a short walk to the parks.  I loved the updated rooms with hardwood floors.  Beds were clean, comfortable and looked nice.  The bedroom area was on par with upscale hotels, like a W.  The bathroom was satisfactory -- it was clean, had Aveda products and plenty of towels, but obviously it's not as luxurious as a Ritz Carlton, but we didn't pay for that level of luxury so it's not to be expected.  I was least impressed by the white tile floor in the bathroom, but that's just my design aesthetic.  We did not eat at the hotel, so I cannot speak to that.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again the next time we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, complimentary self-parking service, location, and room. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: The location is great if you are going to disney with the kids
Summary: The hotel is within a 15 min walk to Disney. The rooms were nice. Staff were good. If you bring your keurig cups - bring em, for the room. Starbucks are located on the disney site. The Garden walk is a  5 min walk from the hotel with many restaurants. 20 mins to Orange Outlet mall. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the location, rooms, and guest services. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary Heading: Booked this hotel 3 times this year
Summary: I booked three stays at the Hotel Indigo for 2015 based solely on the fact that they were #1 on tripadvisor (at the time).  I was impressed at check-in with the look of the hotel.  It's very clean and modern looking.  The front desk staff was friendly and welcoming.  I'm an IHG rewards member and they offered a gift bag with water, treats, free wi-fi code, etc.  A man who identified himself as the manager thanked me for booking so many stays this year and said that we would be set up with a really nice room.  So far, so good.  Our room was on the second floor across from a the janitorial closet (not what I consider a good thing).  When we entered, we realized that we were on the street side and the noise from the open window was somewhat loud.  We closed the window and wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us and bringing these issues to our attention. We truly apologize for the issue you encountered on your recent stay with us. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: This was my second staying .was great like last time  .all of them employees friendly and helpful. Room was great and clean also everything organize  on its place. Close to stores and parks. Nice restaurant good pasta I love it. Good housekeeping friendly and helpful to our needs.thin walls but that don't bother us .all the hotels are like that also the Beverly hills hotel is like that. I will come back and stay here I won't change this hotel for now . is my first choice .and top of my hotel list. Also free WiFi.

Summary: We booked this excellent hotel for an expected 5 day stay during January. The location was great, an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and a few doors down from a range of restaurants including PF Changs, Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake Factory. We had a one bedroom suite that was modern and clean, and slept 3 adults and 3 kids easily. It was a comfortable place to come back to each night after long Disney days. The only downside we found were the wooden floorboards which resulted in lots of noise when our upstairs neighbours got up early each day.   Where this hotel really shines is the staff. When our baby got sick at 1am our last evening there, they helped us locate a Dr who could come to the hotel. At 3am a staff member helped me contact our travel insurance company. We
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you are satisfied with our location and guest services. Every one of us always tries our best to help our guests and make their stay become more memorable. We apologize for the noise that coming from the hardwood floor. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary: My sister Linda and I were visiting Anaheim for a sister weekend at Disneyland with friends and decided to stay at The Hotel Indigo. It is a comfortable, well-appointed, stylist mecca in the tourist atmosphere of Anaheim/Disneyland. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and a late dinner and serves delicious drinks (try the Moscow Mule) and food-I highly recommend the amazing grilled cheese sandwich.  The rooms are beautifully laid out with the crispest white sheets on the very comfortable beds. Unlike some other reviews, I found the hotel to be very quiet. The customer service is top-notch - the front desk staff being courteous without being stiff and the general manager Edward is the warmest nicest most welcoming presence. The hotel is about a 12 minute walk to the Main
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you  are satisfied with our food, guest services, and location. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: Let me preface with the customer service at this hotel is amazing!!!   With that said my wife and I stayed here on Valentine's Day and we were inundated by a cheer competition.  Kids were up late and loud.  Walls in the building are extremely thin.  Called manager and they took care of it and moved us the next day.  Hotel is clean and nice.  Just the internal noise.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services. We apologize for the noise that coming through the wall; however, we are glad that our staff tried to resolve the problem at the first place. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary: The Indigo Hotel was very clean updated and the staff was very friendly. There was underground parking. The hotel was within 2 minutes walking distance of the Garden walk shopping Center and a 10-15 minute walk from the Main Gate of the Disneyland parks/Downtown Disney. Overall experience was very good the only negative was that there was hardwood floors in the suites instead of carpets and as a result you could hear your neighbours beside and above moving around.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with the guest services, food, and cleanliness of the rooms. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We had a really great stay here at Hotel Indigo. The staff was super friendly the manager was always around making sure the ship ran well. I was really impressed with the food in the restaurant as well as the clean and comfortable room.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This little hotel is a great place to stay when going to Disneyland. It's only 10 minutes away from the front gate and if you go to DL on a weekend you'll most likely be there from 9-12am anyway. There is a pool and a hot tub for soaking your sore dogs at the end of the day. The rooms are very clean and very contemporary. You'd pay at least twice as much if it had a W on the outside. It's run by the Intercontinental group that manage Holiday Inn's, so they know their stuff. It's our go to now when going to DL.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location and rooms. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights at the beginning of February and it made for such a fantastic getaway.  All the staff were very friendly and accommodating and everything was very clean and comfortable.  The room had 2 queen beds and it was spacious and the beds were super comfortable.  There was a nice big new flat screen TV in the room and an iPod docking station that fit the latest iPhone model.  There was a refrigerator cold but empty for our use.  The AC worked great. The bathroom was spacious and clean.  The shower had good water pressure and instant hot water.  There were plenty of towels and the Aveda toiletries were very nice.  We ordered room service one night and it came very quickly and was hot and delicious and reasonably priced.  The breakfast downstairs is delicious and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, amenities, and our breakfast. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights in a two-queen room.  This hotel is in a great location, less than 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  The room was spotless, the bed was very comfortable, the bathroom and shower were great, plenty of really nice towels and counter space, and the best part of the room was a window that opened for fresh air.  I asked for a room on the 4th floor off the streets and the room was exceptionally quiet.  The staff at the front desk and restaurant were extremely helpful and professional.  Having secured parking for free was a real bonus.   Plenty of restaurants nearby if you didn't want to eat at the parks.  I'm buying a Keurig coffee maker after using the one in the room!  I will definitely will stay here on future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our room and guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Pleased I didn't go with the hotel the  large travel agent in Australia ( you know who) where trying to push down my throat. Went with the TripAdvisor reviews and they couldn't be more accurate. This is not a 5 star resort it is an excellent 3-4 star hotel  property. And only about 10 min stroll to Disneyland max.  contacted the hotel a couple of months before for a tip on transport from Beverly Hills to the hotel. They organised private driver and at a much lower price than any transport connection. Great start. Arrived and found out my booking was messed up. paid extra for a 2 bedroom for a bit extra comfort for the family after long Disney days. Automatically thinking it was the hotel they gave me the next best available room which was the Cnr room on floor (4) - ask for it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would like to apologize for the food quality from the restaurant. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a week and everything was perfect.   We had a family reunion and they upgraded all of the rooms to family suites (we are IHG reward members) and put us right next to each other.  The staff was so attentive and sincerely kind at every encounter.     The rooms were very clean.  I liked the wood floors.  I had a crawling baby and the wood floors seemed so much cleaner than carpet.  She crawled all around the floor and there was never a speck of dirt on her clothes.    The restaurant food was very tasty, we ate there every morning.  I wish they had room service.    The walk to Disneyland was 10-15 min.  Very clean, affordable hotel choice!  We will stay here next time we come!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here very much. We did have one incident with the adjoining room neighbor but was taken care of professionally by the front desk staff and we felt they genuinely took good care of us while we stayed there. The rooms are updated beautifully and the beds/pillows are very very comfortable. Everywhere in the hotel was super clean! The bathroom is updated too and the shower has good water pressure. Everyone we encountered at the hotel was super friendly and helpful including all of the front desk staff, Nadia the night bartender, and the housekeeping. I had requested a room on the top floor and asked for a quiet area of the hotel and was accommodated to just that. We did have an incident with our neighbor after the first night and then we were put in another room
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time to give us such nice feedback of your stay. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and food. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: I have never felt more pampered by hotel personnel. Every person I encountered, from the wait staff to the Director of Sales, was the epitome of courtesy and professionalism. They all made me feel like I was their sole client. My room was spacious and the bathroom looked and felt like a spa - right down to my towel folded origami style to resemble an elephant! From the location to the hotel décor, everything about Hotel Indigo is 5-Star!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the guest service, room, location, and décor. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary Heading: Big Suite Walking Distance to Convention
Summary: The older Holiday Inn has gone through complete renovation and now is called Indigo Anaheim. We stayed for business during Namm show for a week in a spacious suite sharing the bedroom and living room with my coligue. We bought the breakfast included deal and it was OK although there was not a buffet but a coupon ordering any plate from the menu (but one each time). The hotel was clean and the suite had 2 large plasma flat TVs plus coffee maker with etended selectiions of different coffee capsules. The hotel stuf was more than helpful, was very kind. Infact was really great and especially Arthour on the front desk and Esward in the restaurant. The only thing that could be better was the room rate. It was a convention period rate but I suppose it could be more affordable. In such
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our property. WE are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back next year during NAMM and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary: My husband, myself and 3 year old stayed here two weeks ago to visit Disneyland.  We wanted to stay in a decent hotel that wasn't old and run-down, etc.  This really surpassed my expectations (I'm the picky one).  The front desk was very pleasant and helpful.  The room was quite nice and modern (a little small but we didn't upgrade since we didn't expect to be in there a lot); definitely clean and we really loved the bathroom and shower.  We had breakfast several times at the hotel restaurant and were quite impressed (we also had breakfast early one morning and Ihop and were so disappointed, overpriced and just not that good) the breakfast at the hotel was better and more inexpensive.  The free parking is excellent and ample.  We only used our car once to visit relatives in LA;
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services, room, breakfast at our restaurant, complimentary self-parking service, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team member that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: The place you want to be!
Summary: First we are IHG members we have annual passes to Disneyland so we go a lot I have been to a lot of different hotels.  I would say the hotels closest to the park are yuck! This hotel was a great price.  I liked that it wasn't full of people. The parking lot was easy to access and all spots right by the elevator.  Easy access with the kids and lots of bags.  The loft lounge was fun to relax in the little water show to music out front kept my kids dancing and us relaxed for a good 30 minutes.  We arrived and went to Cheesecake factory basically next door.  The walk to Disneyland the next day was easy.  Honest we will park in the paid parking lot for $17 a day when we come up just for the day and take the bus in and I could walk there just as fast and easily. The hotel is in the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for such magnificent and detailed review of our property. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our location, design, and our location. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: My sister, girlfriend and I stayed at the hotel in two separate rooms, each of which had distinctive decor, each nicely furnished with great mattresses and wonderful bedding for a good night's sleep, especially after walking for miles in Disneyland.  Edward Voysest is one of the most engaging, service-oriented GM's I've ever met.  He and his staff provided exemplary service from check-in to meal service to housekeeping to check-out.  We felt secure at the hotel despite its central location and busy neighborhood.  It was surprisingly quiet and it had any number of amenities including a photo booth, cold bar, newspapers, business center and secured parking.  It's a great place for families too!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time to give us some feedback of your stay. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our service, the security of the property, and the amenities. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: My second stay at this hotel. I too came for the Disney half marathon-loads of fun btw- and found this hotel to be ultra convenient and affordable. Plenty of food options around and a cvs, abc store and 7-11 two minutes walk away. A friend stayed at the grand californian(?) and I was underwhelmed by food options at the hotel and at Downtown Disney. A comfortable and quiet hotel.rooms are actually quite large and I even have a soft spot for the little fountain out front, not sure why, but I do :) staff were extremely helpful as well giving me some tips on what to do on a trip to the packing house. Definitely a great option for a trip to Disney.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our location and staff service. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Family trip to Disneyland in December and stayed at Hotel Indigo due to pet-friendly policy. Two-room suite was nicely decorated and the hotel is well maintained. The hotel was not noisy like some can be in this neighborhood. And they had plenty of parking. Staff was friendly and our request for extra towels was quickly satisfied. We would definitely stay here again. Only negative is they only have just one elevator and we stayed on the top floor. But if you are not pushing a stroller, take the stairs. They are well like and conveniently located.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for such nice review of our property. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our staff service. We apologize for the inconvenience the elevator brings you. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: This is a gorgeous small hotel, close to Disneyland ( about a flat 15 minute walk) close to restaurants ( Cheesecake Factory literally next door) plus grade walk restaurants nearby. Very trendy, clean and well decorated. Friendly staff who want to please in every way. Easy parking with plenty of room to manoeuvre your car!!!! Close to 7 eleven shop and ABC store for essentials. Lovely Aveda toiletries!!! You will not be disappointed!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. I am thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our location, design, and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: Recently stayed to participate in the Disneyland Star Wars half marathon. Rooms were clean, great decor, super comfy beds, and very helpful staff.  About a 10 minute walk to Disney.  Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review of our property. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our staff service and our location. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: My daughter and I came to Anaheim from the East coast for the Disneyland Star Wars Half Marathon Weekend. I had never stayed at a Hotel Indigo before but I am an IHG Rewards member so we decided to try it based on the reviews. We were not disappointed! The staff was very friendly and the hotel was very clean. Our room was on the end of the hall on the second floor and was very quiet. Ask for a North facing room so you can see the fireworks from Disneyland on the weekend nights. There was ample hot water (not always a given at hotels) and the beds were comfortable. The hardwood floors were nice. The hotel is a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland. If you are coming for one of the races, the hotel is just a few short blocks from the half marathon starting line, making the early
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services, hardwood floor, and location. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: We had a great weekend stay at the Indigo in early January. Big shout out to Arthur at the front desk. He was so helpful and kind during our stay.  A true hospitality professional. We stayed in one of the king suites and it was great.  Well appointed amenities and nicely decorated.  The bed was comfy and the shower was perfect after a long day at the Disney Parks.   Looking back we really didn't need to book a suite as we were in town to experience the parks.  I had no idea how little time we would actually spend at the room.  My recommendation if you are in town to visit the parks, you really just need somewhere to catch a good night's sleep.   If you're used to staying in a bit of an upgrade from the value hotels I would recommend the Indigo.  It's a 10 minute walk from the
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and food. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel close to Disneyland!
Summary: I can't recommend this place highly enough! It's newly renovated so everything is squeaky clean and beautiful.  The service is absolutely top notch, Arthur is the most helpful, polite person and definitely made our stay so much better!!  It's a short (less then 10 minute) walk to the Disneyland parks with plenty of places to stop for food on the way- I recommend loading up on a big IHOP breakfast before going to the parks! There is also a bunch of restaurants around the corner, as well as a 7-11 and a CVS.  There is a jacuzzi and nice pool area to decompress after a big day walking around too.  Overall, a great stay. We would definitely return!
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team member that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: This hotel is clean and personnel with wonderful service. They are very sociable and kind, and the service is top of the line. Their restaurant is impeccable and the food is superb. We didn't need to go anywhere for breakfast. It's close to Maingate Disneyland and the Convention center; at a walking distance. Thank you for making our stay memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. I am thrilled to read your kind words about your times with us. We are very glad to know that you like our guest services, location, and the cleanliness of the property. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: I've been staying here for the last 4-5 years, HUGE Improvements. The staff (Victor) is Great. The location is even better, with the Garden Walk just down the road about 1-2 blocks lots of great places to eat without driving and parking, Downtown Disney is just a short drive away with lots of additional restaurants, the rooms have been fully updated, but could be cleaned better, I found several left over candy and food wrappers around the bed and hideaway bed, the AC worked perfect and the fridge was small and noisy but worked well for bottled waters. I would recommend though that before you hop into the shower you make sure the hand sprayer is NOT Pointed outward towards yourself or you could get that cold water in your face. I did not use the restaurant as the prices seemed
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and room. We apologized for the left over you found around the bed and the noise from the fridge. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: Hotel Indigo staff members goes above and beyond any standards. Arthur the front desk manager was very helpful with anything we needed (from checking us in to calling for a taxi). The hotel rooms were super clean and nice. Hotel Indigo is just walking distance from a few restaurants.  I loved my stay here and will return back again. Forget all the other hotels, this is the spot!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services, rooms, and location. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: From the moment we arrived at 9am, bleary eyed and wearing after a 15 hour flight from Melbourne, Australia, myself along with hubby, Miss 8 & Master 6 were welcomed with open arms. Arthur had a room ready for us (THANK YOU!!!!) and check in was quick and seamless. We were given a room on the 3rd floor with fireworks view and it was amazing to see the sky light up every night, the kids were thrilled! Our room was a 2 queen bed with one bathroom. Spotless, spotless, spotless. The decor is modern and amazing and everything smelled clean and fresh. The comfort of the beds and pillows felt like you were falling asleep on clouds. Noise from adjoining rooms was very minimal and no noise from room above, the floorboards are not an issue. We ordered food from the restaurant a number of
Manager Response: We very appreciate you taking the time to write such nice review about our property. We are glad that you are satisfied with our room, food, and guest services. Every one of us always try our best to help our guests and make their stay become more memorable. We look forward to your return visit in the near future!

Summary: My travel agent suggested a Disneyland Hotel but I found them overpriced so I chose Hotel Indigo instead based on its good reviews and reasonable rates. My son and I stayed for 4 nights between Christmas and New Year and we loved this hotel. It is 'around the corner' from Disneyland although this equates to a 15 minute stroll. Buses also go past the hotel if you don't want to walk. It is very close to Disney GardenWalk  so there are plenty of shops and restaurants in the vicinity.   The room was clean, the beds comfortable and the staff incredibly helpful. They answered all our questions and even confirmed onward bookings for us. The only problem we had was the (free) wifi signal in the room kept dropping out. We got around this by using the wifi in the lounge, which was a small
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our room, food, and guest services. We also would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused by the Wi-Fi speed. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary Heading: Go To Place for Disneyland Park
Summary: This is my second time staying at this Hotel.  I love this smaller scale hotel (4 floors only).  The staff is wonderful and always trying to go above and beyond for the guests.  The breakfast at the hotel is good and very convenient.  I didn't mind paying for breakfast when I wanted it because I was not paying a daily parking fee.  Parking is FREE.  The location of this hotel is perfect for everyone, walkers, scooters, etc. to the Disneyland parks.  You do not need to move your car once it's parked at the hotel. Details regarding my stay:  Brought along my mother for her 75th birthday.  I had an electric scooter dropped off on the day of our arrival and picked up on our departure day.  I used D&R Mobility (714)-883-8761.  They have quality electric scooters and reasonable
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay at a cute, modern hotel
Summary: We stayed for two nights in January 2015. We were debating whether or not to stay here or at the Grand Californian at Disney California Adventure. The Grand Californian was $150 more, so we opted to walk a little (about 10-15 minutes to Disneyland) and stay here. Check-in was a breeze and the hotel staff were all friendly and helpful.   The rooms have hardwood floors and I loved the style of room. Chic and modern. It was a little dusty on the floors and there were some dust bunnies rolling around, but other than that, the room was clean. The showers were great because they had a rain showerhead and a handheld showerhead also. There's no bathtub, just a shower, so the handheld showerhead really made a difference when it was time to bathe the children. (It's the little things!)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed and nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would like to apologize for the dust you found on the floor and the window blind could not go all the way down. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Indigo Anaheim  from Dec 30th to Jan 9th. We has originally planned to stay from the 30th to the 5th but enjoyed the hotel and disneyland so much we decided to extend out stay for a few extra days.   Check-In:   As soon as we entered the hotel the staff was very friendly. Everyone greeted us and made us feel welcomed. We arrived a bit early and were able to check into our room right away. We checked-in with Arthur who was very funny and friendly. He gave a nice run down of the place and answered all of our questions.   The Room:  We stayed on the 4th floor and our room was nothing short of amazing. The room and bathroom were very spacious, clean and modern. Our room even had a great view of the Disneyland Fireworks. There was nice selection of TV channels
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice and detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with room, food, and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel. Booked 2 queen bed room. The room still same as before, clean, spacious enough for 2A & 2K with 3 big luggages.   The front desk staff are still great as before, when I had a minor issue with the bathroom(water leaking) they moved us to another room immediately.  Free WI-FI.  The hotel has a coin laundry so it's good for a long term traveller.  From hotel to Disney Park can be reached 10-15 minutes by walking.  CVS Pharmacy,ABC stores, 7-11 , Chinese Buffet are  3-5 minutes by walking from the hotel. From the hotel ( left hand side) you will find Bubba Gump, California pizza and  Cheesecake Factory.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We apologize for the water leaking in the bathroom; however, we are glad that our staff tried to resolve the problem at the first place. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary Heading: Like the location, but details... details...
Summary: The place is a short 10 mins walk from the Disneyland gates. The underground parking was plentiful. The place is clean and modern. The service was good.  But... Why do the blinds only come down 80%, so there is a huge gap for the light to stream in? Why is there a strange knocking noise just outside our window all night?  We're gone in the park all day, so all I need from the room is a good night's rest, which we could not get.
Manager Response: Thank you for having taken time to review your experience with us. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the light that stream in due to the gap by the blinds and the noise level from outside of your window. We are working on solving this issue. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.

Summary: We were on a 3-day trip to Disneyland (Dec. 28 - Dec. 30, 2014) and had to find a hotel that reasonably priced and not too far, and Hotel Indigo Anaheim was a decent walk to Disneyland, about 15 minutes of leisure walking. The hotel staff was friendly and accommodating to us as well, and the room was comfortable. We were given the top floor, so no worries about anybody above us! Very clean and tidy. I'm disappointed that I didn't get to try out the Jacuzzi and pool during my stay, though. I'll definitely have to take it up next time I stay here!  One small detail I have to point out is the bathroom. Overall, it was generally clean, but the shower (wheel-chair accessible) was a bit dusty. Other than that, it was a great stay! I'll definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the location, room, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologize the shower was a bit dusty. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disney, clean friendly hotel
Summary: Our family stayed here in late August.  We had a corner suite which was clean and modern (remodeled.)  Appreciate the wood flooring (hate carpet in hotels, yuck!) Breakfast was delicious although not included.  Short walk to Disney although I think they also offer a shuttle. Pool was small but we never used it.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the hard wood floor and location. We also glad you enjoyed the foods at our restaurant Chambers Bar &Bistro. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: The staff was the friendliest hotel staff we have ever encountered - the only issues we had were with the room and some of the amenities -  complaints were that the floor of the room was really not clean at all - the closet smelled strongly of mildew - the bath towels were dirty and frayed - the safe did not work - all calls to the hotel front desk were met with a busy signal - the cleaning carts were left in the hallway every time we tried to exit our room we were forced to maneuver around the cleaning carts which smelled awful and there was a broom sticking out covered with hair - quite unnerving - the decor was nice and the staff was friendly - the location is central to a lot of restaurants and a short walk to disney parks - the parking was nice but almost impossible to
Manager Response: Thank you for having taken time to review your experience with us. We acknowledge our error and truly apologize for the issue you encountered on your recent stay with us. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights in December 2014 and chose this hotel based on the location and the reviews. I had hoped to stay in a Disneyland hotel but found that they were 6-7x's more expensive (ridiculous). I got a great deal with breakfast included (approx $15.00 value per person). With underground parking and wi-fi also at no charge, it was refreshing to have such a deal after spending, spending, spending all day at Disneyland. The staff and management were so great and even upgraded us to a room with a view of the fireworks to celebrate my friends birthday. The only negative thing I could come up with is that the walls are a bit thin - this is no different than most hotels near Disneyland as there are late nights and plenty of children around. A really great hotel with
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our property. We apologize for the noise from our guestroom. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us. Wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season!

Summary: Stayed in mid November. I couldn't be pressed to say anything negative about this hotel. 10 minute walk from main Disney gates. Restaurant is open early enough to get to park for opening. Nice breakfast of bacon eggs and fruit. The place was spotless and service excellent. Parking was underneath. You walk past a 7-11 and ABC store on the way so can pick up water etc as needed for the park. Jose at breakfast was very helpful
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this wonderful feedback and we will look forward to sharing with the entire team. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our location, breakfast, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to see you again in the near future and wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary: Full confession - I am usually a five-star hotel gal.  So when my husband and I decided to visit Disneyland, I was a little dismayed by the hotels in the immediate vicinity of the park.  Trusting the TripAdvisor reviews, I took the plunge and booked two nights at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim.  Thank goodness I relied on the reviews - we absolutely loved this hotel!  After parking our car in the secure, free parking area under the hotel, we were greeted by a friendly front desk employee.  We signed up for the Indigo hotel rewards program before we booked the room, which seemed to provide us with some perks.  We received a nice gift bag upon arrival with water and nuts, and also received a complimentary breakfast each morning.    We stayed in a king size room on the top floor, which
Manager Response: What an absolute pleasure to see your nice review on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled that you truly enjoyed your stay and satisfied with our guestroom, breakfast, and location. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary: The Hotel Indigo was a perfect choice for my husband and me. We were in a one bedroom suite with a view of the Disneyland fireworks. My husband was unfortunately sick over our two-night stay; if he had to be sick, the clean, comfortable, airy room was a great place to rest. The shower is fabulous, huge with great water pressure. Everything was immaculate and the beds were amazingly comfortable! There is a little place downstairs that serves breakfast that my husband went to and liked a lot, and they have basics like bottled water, juice, etc for sale right in the lobby. Very convenient! But even more than the facilities, the best features of this hotel are the fabulous employees. Everyone we encountered was friendly, efficient, and incredibly helpful. We asked for no
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our facilities and our guest services. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We are sorry you did not feel well while u stayed at our property and hoping for you to have a complete and quick recovery. Wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary: Straight A`s earned our daughter a trip to Disneyland. Our hotel stay at Indigo was wonderful. The rooms very super clean with bathroom towel design. Nothing was overlooked. The bed was so very comfortable and when I got back home I ordered the comforter for us to have at home. Forget the rest hotel indigo is the best! They too earned a straight A report  card!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very happy to read about your great comments on our property. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly staff, walking distance to disneyland
Summary: Pick this hotel for a recent trip to disneyland based on reviews from tripadvisor.    Clean, close to 7-eleven, 24 hour CVS pharmacy, next door to a selection of food places like Bubba Gump, California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factory.  10-15 min walk to disneyland  Free secure gated parking underground, free WiFi.  Would definitely go back to this hotel in the future
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very happy to read about your great comments on our location and our complimentary parking services and Wi-Fi services. In the meantime we wish you a very happy New Year and looking forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: the only negative feedback is there was no milk provided even tho a coffee machine n pods were provided. And also no spoons, other than that I would highly recommend it as a place to stay .... Close to Disneyland and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim and your highly recommendation. We are glad that you are satisfied with our property. We apologized that we do not sell milk and has no spoons at our restaurant. We will definitely bring this up to our department’s head. We hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to further discuss this matter with you. In the meantime we wish you and loved ones a very blessed Holiday season.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for a trip to Disneyland.  Hotel was within walking distance of the park, but far enough away that we got to feel like we were getting away from it all. Plenty of nearby dining as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future when your travels take you to Anaheim again. In the meantime we wish you and loved ones a very blessed Holiday season.

Summary Heading: No better value - just amazing in every way
Summary: I had a late check-in after midnight, but even the person at the front desk after hours was so friendly.  Oh, but wait, before that, yes they even have free parking!  The decor is so fresh and calming.  The wood floors throughout are gorgeous.  They sell large waters in the lobby for only a $1.00 each.  $1.00, that's all - unheard of in a SoCal hotel.  Did I mention the free parking?  The room was perfectly clean.  The restaurant is perfect for breakfast every morning and is not overpriced.  The walk to Disneyland is less than 10 minutes, and there's several chain restaurants within blocks from the hotel.  And then the front desk staff was always so friendly and accommodating.  I don't think I've ever stayed at a hotel that was this beautiful with really friendly staff and free
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for posting a review on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us. We are delighted to read that you are satisfied with our complimentary self-parking service, design of the property, restaurant, and guest services. We look forward to welcoming you back before long for another enjoyable stay and wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary: Staff were amazing and so accommodating (thanks Arthur!). They gave us cool money saving tips. Terrific location for Disneyland, about 10-15 min walk. Beautiful rooms.  We highly recommend this wonderful hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our location, guestroom, and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in ever department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Once again, thank you so much for your kind review and we hope to see you again in the near future! Wish you and loved ones a very happy Holiday season.

Summary: Right next to Disneyland but this place offers an oasis of calm. Easy parking, free WiFi. Bistro was ok. Location is convenient to Orange County and LA. Beaches are about 35 mins by car away. There is a small pool with hot tub that looked clean and inviting.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our complimentary self-parking service, complimentary Wi-Fi, and our location. Once again, thank you so much for your kind review and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We were recently in California for a medical convention. I arrived with my three children, one of which has special needs, and a service dog.  Everyone was friendly. Greeted us promptly and helped to our rooms. At dinner with the group we were attending with they offered me some help with my kids. The front desk even took our service dog out for a walk so I could attempt to eat. In our room or dog even had his own special treatment. The staff even accommodated my child's special needs and diet!!  I was a frazzled mess but it would have been worse had they not have been so amazing to not only us, but to the rest of the families with us!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We were lucky enough to stay at the Hotel Indigo for the Epilepsy Awareness Day at Disneyland. The staff greeted all of our families with kindness and graciousness. They were organized with our room assignments and checking us in quickly. The restaurant food was delicious and healthy. The building was clean and safe, and walking distance to Disney. On the way home at night there is a shuttle that goes right to the hotel. Our room was spacious, clean, and very welcoming for our stay. The staff was also very helpful with anything needed specifically, and provided a water to stay hydrated for our long hot day at Disney. Could nit have asked for a better experience and staff to assist with our stay! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you liked our guest services, restaurant foods, and the room. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: From the moment I arrived, I was taken aback by the gorgeous design scheme of the hotel, so much love was put into creating the atmosphere. Not only were all the rooms, community spaces, and amenities on point, but every employee I came into contact with was delightful and eager to make our stay as comfortable as possible-from the front desk to the bartender. They let us stay in the lounge area (which our 12 person party completely filled) after we had checked out so we could watch the football game before we left for the airport. Extremely generous of them! It was also a quick jaunt over to Disneyland and there were plenty of restaurants surrounding the hotel, so it is a prime location if that is your goal.

Nice pool and hot tub--great place to look at the stars at night.  Best part--super staff!  Each and everyone there has your best interest for a great stay at heart.  Love this hotel, super close to Disneyland and great restaurants and shopping--the perfect location.  I can't wait to stay there again!  Thanks Hotel Indigo for a great vacation!

Someone is doing something right here.  Value: We booked a nonrefundable trip more than 6 months ago and received an excellent rate. We had tickets that night for Mickey's Halloween party and the desk staff were very helpful in giving directions to food and to the park! There is a Bubba Gumps about 1 minute walk and then further up we saw a cheesecake factory, PF Changs etc, so plenty of food options very close by.  There's also a supermarket and other smaller food options in the other direction (towards Disney) The location is absolutely perfect, a very easy 10 min walk to the main gate of Disneyland/California adventure, we

Summary: This little boutique hotel is only a couple of blocks from the Disneyland entrance.  It accepts dogs, has a swimming pool and hot tub and a modern feel.  Shops, restaurants within a block on either side.  The rooms were spacious and clean.  The staff was attentive.  What more could you ask for?

Summary Heading: Nice stay with a few minor complaints
Summary: Recently had a chance to stay at the Indigo with my wife and 3 kids (13, 11, 9) for our trip to Disneyland and Universal Studios. Overall had a very nice stay. Good value for the money.   Pros: Very friendly and helpful staff Free parking Price was very reasonable for a room that comfortably slept 5 (2 queen beds, pull out sofa) Only about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland Clean Good breakfast in the restaurant onsite Close to restaurants  Cons: Had a very odd odor coming from the shower drain the first night. Staff responded quickly (poured something down the drain). Helped somewhat with the smell, but didn't fully make it go away. Walls are a little thin Room had two thermostats and air units. Were rather temperamental. One kept showing an error, and we struggled to find a

Summary Heading: Location, location, location and a really comfortable bed!! Wow!
Summary: Hotel Indigo was indeed a pleasant surprise. With so many well known chains all around Disneyland, I took a risk with Hotel Indigo because of the reviews I read on trip advisor and I (we) were not disappointed. Small compared to so many other hotels around it, the room seemed unimpressive at first, but with 2 adults, and 2 large teenagers, it fit our needs very well. Very clean, and the bathroom with a walk in shower and 2 types of shower heads was perfect for us. We got the Family suite which came as such a blessing because of the pull out sofa bed. Our boys were able to sleep in their own beds, and we did not have to hear them complain. Summary: I was skeptical when searching for a hotel near Disneyland of finding anything suitable for us without paying an arm and leg for it. Arriving at the Hotel Indigo was a breath of fresh air after a very tedious cruise disembarkation in Los Angeles.   Arthur was very warm and genuine in his welcome and we soon found out the other staff we came in contact with were equally as pleasant and eager to be of assistance. All the staff were super friendly.   The hotel has recently had a makeover and the facelift has a very contemporary, 'hip' vibe. I was glad to see the images on the website were a true representation of

Summary: We just stayed at the Hotel Indigo for 2 nights last week. The staff were very friendly and helpful at every turn. I booked 2 rooms separately, and they assigned us rooms together without me even having to ask--thank you!! Most of my family had never stayed in an Indigo before, but they loved the modern design, the wood floors & the comfy beds (and the kids loved the glass elevator). A few notes:  1) the walls are pretty thin. Our neighbors were in their twenties and got home from the park each night at about 10, to start drinking. We had to turn the TV on both nights to drown out their noise. We had 4 children under the age of 5 between our two rooms, so I'm sure they had the same complaint of us in the mornings :) 2) the walk to Disney is a little longer than I expected. It

Summary: Arthur and the team at Hotel Indigo are fantastic! We stayed at Hotel Indigo for four days after a very long flight from Perth, Western Australia. Summary Heading: Nice hotel to use as a SOCAL base!
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights and was well worth the price. Used it as our base for Disney and Visit to Sea World and the beaches. Good price for the one bedroom suite. The evening front desk person went out of her way to add more nights to our staff. We ate breakfast every morning which was good. The room was modern and clean. I would highly recomend.

Summary Heading: A very good experience for staying here!
Summary: It's not that closed to Disneyland, we walked around 20 mins to get there, but the price is good enough to cover this. There are a swimming pool, jacuzzi and gym inside this hotel, I love them very much! Room for five is a little bit small (2 queen beds and 1 sofa bed) but it's good enough for us like backpackers. Look for some brochures provided in the hotel, we even get the discount for the new launched McDonald's next to Disneyland.

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights and it was a great experience. Would definitely stay again. A short walk to Disney land and nearby markets which was very convenient.
