Summary: We had no complaints about our stay; I gave it 4 rather than 5 stars since, well, it's just not a 5 star hotel. The rooms are very clean, with laminate floors. The shower is a nice big walk in shower. There are Aveda bath products which I loved, since Aveda is one of the few companies that doesn't do cruel animal testing. Free parking! Staff was very friendly. It's a short walk to Disneyland, maybe 12 minutes--I thought it would be further than it was, but it's pretty close (half a normal city block) to the intersection with Harbor Blvd. Hotel Indigo is Holiday Inn's boutique brand, so don't expect a true stylish, hip boutique hotel--it's not the W or Ace (which you wouldn't find near Disneyland). Summary: We stayed here on the last night of our SoCal trip, having earlier stayed at the HoJo (both are highly rated on TripAdvisor.) If you were tossing up which hotel to choose for your Disneyland stay both have pros and and not many cons. The staff at both are phenomenal....I was especially grateful to the team at Hotel Indigo allowing our car to stay parked there after we checked out, as we had a flight at 10.50pm that night. Hotel Indigo was a little further away from Disneyland....but close to the Anaheim Gardenwalk, which has some good restaurants.  We booked a double queen room via Expedia which was large, modern, clean, bright and airy. We enjoyed our time there and would recommend it to anyone visiting Disneyland!

Summary: My family stayed here for 4 nights while we were visiting Disneyland -  The hotel is a short 10-15 walk from Disneyland and you pass a CVS pharmacy, 7-Eleven (carry some inexpensive souvenirs) and coffee shop (Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf).  You are also close to the Anaheim Gardenwalk; an outdoor lifestyle center offering dining, shopping, and a movie theater.  Dining spots include Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen, P.F. Chang's, Johnny Rockets and McCormick & Schmick's to name a few.  The hotel had a restaurant on site also, although we did not eat here we did utilize the bar.    Our room was on the 4th floor with a Disneyland fireworks view. Summary Heading: First class Hotel experience in a great location.
Summary: We stayed at the Hotel indigo for 6 nights at the end of October. The staff were all very helpful and happy to help where ever necessary (even offering me a bottle of water when I came to the desk with a sore throat, very considerate). The room was a good size with two double beds and a sofa on the 4th floor, it was surprisingly peaceful for such a busy town. The cleanliness of this hotel was outstanding (and I am a tough critic on cleanliness). The room and bathroom were spotless every time they were cleaned. A shower tiled with hundreds of tiny little tiles is always a good show of cleanliness, the grout was spotless not a mark of mould or discolouration and there was a lot of grout, and no strong cleaning odours either. Staff were great although they seem to struggle if you get mail sent to you at the hotel so make sure parcels etc have your name clearly marked that you are a guest. Otherwise great hotel.

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay in a beautiful hotel near Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon and the location was perfect for our visit to Disneyland which was only a 10 minute walk! Summary: We stayed 7 nights at Hotel Indigo in Anaheim California November 2014. The hotel is modern, clean and the staff are amazingly friendly as well as accommodating. They went out of their way to make our 30th and 60th Birthday Celebrations special. We ate breakfast at the restaurant each morning and it was very tasty! Most importantly the rooms are clean, the beds are heavenly and it's a very refreshing place to recharge after long days in Disney. Only a 5-10 minute walk to the Disney Entrance ( and $9.40 cab ride back after a long day!) The staff make a fantastic hotel even more phenomenal. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Summary: We were very happy with everything here.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The location is excellent, within walking distance to many restaurants and Disneyland.  The rooms are clean,spacious as was the bathroom.  We hope to stay here again.

Summary: I wanted a hotel in close proximity to Disneyland that cost less than a million dollars.  This hotel was great.  Lovely, new, clean rooms.  Friendly, helpful staff.  A small restaurant with good food.  The location is terrific. The parking is free.  Now, I know people say they can walk to Disneyland but if you do a full day there, do you really want to start out with a walk?  They do have a shuttle that will take you there.  There are good restaurants close by and a CVS for the blisters on your feet.  Overall, I would say that this will be my go-to hotel for future Disneyland visits.

Welcome change from the chain hotels/motels and huge convention hotels in the neighborhood.  Friendly staff, well appointed quiet rooms with hardwood floors, comfortable beds, and awesome bathrooms. I loved everything about this place and would stay here over the Disney hotels any day!

Summary Heading: Certainly one of the best in the area
Summary: We purposely chose this hotel due to its proximity to Disneyland and the positive reviews on TripAdvisor.  It certainly measured up to the hype.  The location is unbeatable.  Extremely easy access to the highway, walking distance to Disneyland, plenty of restaurants around.  Parking on the premises was convenient and plentiful.  The staff was always very helpful and smiling.  The entire property looked fresh and new (we learned they did a refresh in October 2013).  The rooms were extremely clean and had plenty of space.  While I did not ask for one (my own fault), I was surprised to see no luggage racks in the room. Summary: This hotel is located in a great location! It is seriously walking distance from disneyland. It is also not too far if you want to drive to LA to get some food.   The customer service was great as the front counter worked really hard to make sure we have parking even though this whole hotel is full parked.  Overall, I will be staying at this hotel again when I go down to LA

Summary: Save the money from the Disney hotels and book this place. No frills but nice rooms, service, and location. Right next door is California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factory, and a few other restaurants.  Good solid breakfast at the hotel with a go cup of coffee for the 3 block walk (1/2 mile)  An easy walk with crosswalks and wide sidewalks with lots of people walking. If you're doing Disneyland and don't want to pay gauging prices from Disney hotels, then book this place. Could also see the fireworks from my bed.

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights whilst visiting  Disneyland . The standard of service fantastic ,rooms well presented and clean. Beds fantastic. Requests met with outcome (amazing ). Surrounding area has shopping and dining but hotel breakfasts and eating in was great  and convenient . Easy walk to Disneyland. Special thanks to Omar , Arthur  at Front desk . Jose in the restaurant for making our stay so enjoyable . A lot of larger establishments should take note of this service model. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our room and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Omar, Arthur, and Jose that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary Heading: TWO AUSSIES AGED 60+ great stay 2 nights
Summary: Clean, roomy accommodation, staff very helpful. Close to Disneyland, 15 minute easy walk. Front desk can literally organise anything, including sightseeing, shopping and reliable transport. Basic but good cooked meals (Breakfast & Dinner) at very reasonable prices available in attached restaurant. We ate all our meals there, even though there is a little shopping centre eating place a 100+ metres away.Restaurant like the rest of hotel is clean and service great. Rooms could be a little noisy due to floor coverings, if you had a inconsiderate guest above you, This was not a problem on our stay. however prefer the floor coverings they have as you can see they are clean (spotless) Airconditioning was good and fully adjustable. Free WI FI. Better than most other 3 star hotels we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the room, guest services, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team member that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologize for the noise through the floors. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary: Very pleasant find on our first visit to DisneyLand. The hotel is cozy, and stylishly updated with modern decor touches, is clean, located a short walk to the parks, some rooms offer firework views. Price of stay was very reasonable, breakfast warm, and service prompt, helpful, and exceptionally friendly. It felt very comfortable and as a great "home base" for the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with the room and guest services. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Everything about our stay was fantastic.  The room was extremely clean and spacious, they accommodated our requests, the staff were very friendly and attentive and it was very conveniently located for a short 10 min walk to Disney.  Breakfast was hot and delicious, the service attentive.  The beds were extremely comfortable.  A short 2 min walk to Anaheim Gardens for lots of restaurants in the evening.  Can't fault this place, will highly recommend and definitely stay in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review and comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to note that you are satisfied with our room, guest services, food, and our location. Thank you so much for your highly recommendation and we always try our best to meet and exceed guests’ expectation. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Everything about this hotel was wonderful. From the little elephant made out of towels waiting for us in our bathroom to the friendly hello from staff every time we walked in the door. The rooms were clean, comfortable and modern, and the parking was very convenient. It was an excellent location to walk to and from the Disneyland parks, and was also near plenty of restaurants and shopping. If we ever visited the area again we would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your high rating about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with everything at our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: We had a two night stay in Anaheim and this hotel appealed as we didn’t have a car and didn’t particularly want to stay somewhere with lots of excited children. Hotel Indigo fitted the bill on both fronts; not too many children or big family groups, at least not when we were there mid-September.  It feels a much more grown up hotel than others nearby and was only a 10-15 minute walk to Disney’s entrance.  Our room was a bit unusual, being more long and narrow than square, which meant there was only one, not very big window for light and no view of any note (but I don’t think any of the rooms would have had much of a view.) The in-room lighting was good enough and the brightly coloured walls compensated.  I’d mistakenly booked a twin bedded room instead of a king and there was no
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind and detailed review of you stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with room, breakfast, and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest each day. We would also like to apologize for the odor from the bathroom. Thank you for bring it up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. We hope you will give us another chance and look forward to see you again.

Summary Heading: Super rooms and you can walk to parks!
Summary: We loved the clean modern rooms. Staff were kind and helpful. We were able to walk to the park in 10-15 minutes with two young children. Hotel is also very close to Garden Walk which has shops and restaurants. Would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services and location. We look forward to your return visit in the near future!

Summary: If you are looking for a hotel that is convenient for a Disneyland visit with clean large and modern rooms, is unpretentious  and has friendly helpful staff then this is the hotel for you. The  hotel is very well located, in one direction (5 minutes walk) there is the Garden walk with its range of restaurants, shops and cinema, and in the other (again a 5 minute walk) there is a range of take away restaurants, a seven eleven and a Pharmacy. Disneyland is an easy 10 minute walk away. Outlets at Orange are a $12 cab fare away for all of those brand name bargains. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful (thanks to Omar for the assistance with our reservation) and are happy to provide assistance with booking or recommending tours. Rooms are large, clean and modern, with
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our family to enjoy Disneyland from. The room itself was fresh, clean and modern and very spacious with very nice bathroom. Nearly next door was California Pizza and Cheese cake factory which were great for family dinners. Front reception friendly and very helpful. Disneyland a 10  minute walk away. There was also a cinema in the Anaheim Garden walk where the whole family watched Guardians of the galaxy one evening for $24 as it was a midweek special. It is wonderful to find a well priced, newly renovated , family friendly acommodation in one of the most touristy places in America. The money we saved from staying here instead of the  Disneyland hotel covered the cost of our disneyland pass ( which is not cheap).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The outside of the hotel is nothing special. The same is true for the lobby and hallways. The rooms are a very pleasant surprise however. This is why I pick a hotel and not the other things. The room was large, clean, and very modern. Nice bed and plenty of space for our things. The decor and hardwood floors are a nice touch and the bathroom is equally as stylish.   The hotel staff was great and very helpful. We were told to talk to a manager named Cleo about some questions that we had and she was very professional and helpful. This is a typical 'no frills' boutique style hotel so if you are looking for a fancy pool or fancy restaurant you might be disappointed. If you are looking for a very nice room, great service and a great location, this could be the place for you.  On that
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and location. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet or exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great location in Anaheim, short walk to Disneyland & Garden Walk shops & restaurants. Booking was made online, very simple process. Staff were very friendly upon check-in and our room was ready straight away. The room was spacious and very comfortable, we were located on the side of the hotel facing disney & we could see the fireworks from the window in the corridor, it also overlooked the pool. The bed was extremely comfortable which was fantastic after being on a 13 hour overnight flight the previous night. Parking was available under cover so to keep the car cool in the hot temperatures we had when we were there.. We had some noisy neighbours and as the room isnt very sound proof conversations could be heard but other than that everything was great! Would definitely stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our location, room, and guest services. We would like to apologize about our wall insulation. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further. We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: Nice, comfortable and quiet hotel a short walk to Disney. Available with breakfast option, we got the breakfast option but didn't use it every day and wouldn't again. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room clean and quiet.
Manager Response: It was a great pleasure for us to have you stay at our property. Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We look forward to your return visit in the near future!

Summary: Great service from Denise while booking, extremely helpful with our queries for our family of 8.  Great location, only 10 mins from Disney gates, with resturants right next door.  It is hard to find nice new hotel in this area, but this hotel is newer, plus looks to have been refurbished in very cool décor. Slight confusion on breakfast passes, but got sorted.  The guys on the front desk provided excellent service and advice.  The pool is small, but does the cool off job!.  Thanks for a great stay, Denise really provided a great start to our stay - thank you.
Manager Response: We would like to sincerely thank you for coming to stay with us and for sharing your experiences about your stay. We always try our best to meet and exceed our guests’ expectation. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Convenient to Disneyland and free parking!
Summary: All the staff were very welcoming and pleasant.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland and there are restaurants just down the street to suit all tastes (PF Changs, McCormick Schmicks, Roy's, Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gumps).  We had breakfast at the hotel which was very reasonably priced.  Service was good and always pleasant.  The fruit that accompanied the continental breakfast was a highlight.   It was not the usual pre-bagged stuff you get in hotels, but was freshly cut pineapple, melons, raspberries and blueberries.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  We went out to sit by the pool on our first night and watched the fireworks from Disneyland in the comfort of our hotel.  Parking is free, there are a few spots in the entrance area but the majority are
Manager Response: We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you taking the time to share your kind reviews about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience the elevator caused. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue. At last, we would like to thank you again for your kind review and hope to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Excellent home base for family Disneyland vacation!
Summary: We stayed at the hotel indigo for our family vacation to Disneyland. It was the perfect home base, and a short walk to the park gates (8-10 mins, or a short ART shuttle ride).  Rooms were surprisingly spacious, and we could even see the Disney fireworks from our window! Very modern styles, which carried all the way to the pool area and lobby.  Our daughter really enjoyed the pool, as well as the lovely fountain out front. We would definitely stay here again, and would recommend it for family travel in the Anaheim area!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our property. We always try our best to meet and exceed our guests’ expectation. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: excellent for Disney park and very well equiped
Summary: stayed with the family 3 nights last week as part of a 2 weeks vacation in the US. the location on the main road is very good and the high way exit is very close. took us 40 min in the morning to get to LAX the rooms are nicely decorated , clean and well equipped (incl a good coffee machine) the service is very good and the stuff is very welcoming. my only disappointment was the noise !!! ...seems the doors are doing a lot of noise while closing and it waked us a few times during the night when people returned to their rooms late. seems you can hear also the neighbors in the room on top walking in the room. but over all a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize for the noise from the hallway. Thank you so much for bringing it up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: This was my third time staying at this wonderful location. Omar & Arthur make you feel so welcomed. They both take good care of their guests and go that extra mile. I return every year & these two remember me. Ten minute walk to Disneyland main gate & close to lots of shops. You can not go wrong if you stay at this location. Added plus the onsite restaurant is amazing & the fountain out front is awesome. I look forward to seeing you two next year. Thank you for the wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our customer services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Hotel is fairly mediocre. The location is fine and the free parking is nice. The hotel is pretty small so is only one elevator, but wait times were very long. But the worst part was, when I checked out at the front desk in the morning, they asked me if I wanted a receipt, and I said yes. They printed me a receipt, and the room rate was far higher than the rate I had booked online on their website. The lady who was helping me claimed to be the manager but was extremely unorganized and confused. I had to show her my email confirmation on my phone and it took her a solid fifteen minutes until she charged me the correct rate. This just seems like a deceitful business practice, so I recommend double checking your receipt before leaving! Also, I tried to post this review on the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us and bringing these issues to our attention. We acknowledge our error and truly apologize for the issue you encountered on your recent stay with us. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: A centrally located Anaheim hotel, this place delivers! Arriving here after an extremely long and exhausting flight from Australia, the hotel staff warmly greeted us, and had our rooms ready to go! The rooms are nicely appointed with more than enough space for your own belongings, and the many you're sure to purchase at Disneyland - a short walk from the hotel.   Room amenities are fine and have everything that you'll need, and the bathroom is nice and bright!   Some good eateries are nearby, along with convenience stores should you require anything that the hotel can't provide!   Overall, this place is a great base to enjoy your time in Anaheim and I'll definitely be back again!
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with our amenities and customer service. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We stayed for 8 days at the hotel indigo for our honeymoon. It was great. I didn't notice the sound issue until midnight one night the next room over started yelling at each other and the kids in the halls running and screaming. But everything else made up for that. Hanna was great and helped me set up a surprise for my honeymoon as i had email a couple weeks before. everyone else at the front desk was great always able to answer questions. Next time i am in the area this is the hotel I WILL be staying at.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We would also like to apologize for the noise. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We found this hotel thanks to TripAdvisor.  It is extremely close to Disneyland, you can walk it in about 10 minutes.  There is no parking fee for the hotel. Yeah! The front desk staff was very helpful and courteous.  Our  room was very modern and clean. The overall décor of the hotel is modern and fun.  Wooden floors are beautiful, but if the person above your room has heels on, you will hear every step they take. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms and guest services. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: Hi guys,  We had a great time at the Hotel Indigo.  It is 10 minutes from Disneyland on foot, is surrounded by great places to eat and has a wonderful staff.  Everyone is helpful and willing to go out of their way for you.    The gym has everything you would need and the rooms are spacious.  Highly recommended when you are visiting the happiest place on Earth.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our location, fitness center, and our room. Thank you for highly recommendation and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Good location for Disney and Convention Center
Summary: I love that they dont charge for parking or Wi-FI. (a couple of my pet peaves)  The rooms were clean, and felt very modern and new.  Love no carpet in rooms.  The pool was small and the gym was a bit pitiful if you wanted to do any weight training but overall I thought the hotel was nice and a great value.  Watch closely booking if you expect free breakfast.  Not included under our booking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with rooms. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in mid September for Disneyland visit with our 6 year old daughter. Check in was easy, offered choice of the floors available and staff were polite and helpful. Easy walk to disneyland, very easy walk to a number of affordable family places to eat and seconds away from the seven eleven (buy water and snacks there to pack for Disneyland) and a minutes walk to a variety of take away (pizza and subway to name a couple)   Rooms were clean, modern and spacious. Housekeeping was excellent, they have a coin operated laundry for guests, pool was clean and well maintained with good opening hours)   Would highly recommend for families- and anybody for that matter! Great hotel in a great location!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad that you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and rooms. Thank you for your highly recommendation. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: A very good place to stay about 10 minutes walk to Disneyland. The rooms have obviously been recently decorated and are very clean and a good size if you are spending most of the day at the theme parks! The staff were very polite and helpful, with fast check-in and flexibility in finding us a room to suit our needs. We were on the top floor and it was very quiet. The only minor issue we had was the air-conditioning - it was a very hot few days and getting the right mix to keep the room comfortable was a bit of a struggle. Once we worked this out, we had a very good night's sleep!
Manager Response: We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you taking the time to share your nice comments about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Summary Heading: It's a great choice - book this hotel
Summary: We've been to Disney several times using Priceline and other booking sites to find a great deal. Often that meant a longer walk or renting a car or using a shuttle to get to the gates. This trip we were celebrating an important birthday and looked at Trip Advisor for suggestions for a hotel. The rating of this hotel intrigued us and was so much less than a in park hotel we decided to give it a try. We rented a two queen suite room. Our family of three plus a friend required two beds. We were happy the couch folded out to a bed but it wasn't a requirement. The beds were super comfortable, the room clean and modern. The bathroom very stylish and roomy, with Aveda products impressed the young ladies!! We received breakfast vouchers with our stay and that gets you a choice of the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms, location, and guest services. Summary: This Hotel is very Clean and the rooms are nice Size for Family! Staff are very very nice and Breakfast is pretty good and you even get a Coffee to go if you like ;).  Hotel its very close to Disney land ( 5 min with Car away). Parking is awesome also.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our service and room. Thank your for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: We searched far and wide to find a hotel that was clean, within walking distance of Disneyland and didn't charge for parking. We found all of this and more at Hotel Indigo!!  The front desk staff were warm and friendly. They were also helpful as well. The rooms were awesome and clean. The beds were so comfortable, which was great after a long day at the parks. The bathroom was spacious, the shower was also nice and clean. We didn't get a chance to check out the pool but it looked super inviting. The walk to Disneyland is a mere 10 mins, if that and it was safe at night. Lots of people also walked that direction. There were a lot of stores along the way, in case you forgot something. We planned on visiting the park on Tuesday the day of our checkout and Hotel Indigo allowed us to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your highly recommendation of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with the property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: This little boutique style hotel is 10 mins walk to Disneyland, 2 mins walk to a selection of restaurants such as The Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump's, California Pizza Kitchen, and McCormick & Schmick's Grille. There's also quick meals available as there's a Subway, Chinese restaurant, Mexican, pizza shop, and a burger shop all within a 3 min walk.  7-eleven is also 3 mins walk up the street. We found the hotel to be spacious and spotlessly clean, and the staff friendly and helpful. It was a nice gesture upon checkin the staff member noticed we had kids and gave us a room which we could view the Disney fireworks from. There's also a coin operated laundry on the 1st floor which was handy for us to get our clothes washed, as we had further travel to do. About 3 mins walk from the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful detailed review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly hoping to see you back once again so we can show you our warm and engaging hospitality.

Summary: Last minute discussion to go to Disneyland. Looked on tripadvisor for the cheapest hotel with the most stars and it led us to hotel indigo. How lucky we were. What a beautiful, small, clean hotel! Even without a reservation and late in the day, they honored the price on the website we were looking at.  The front desk person even put us in a top floor room so that we could see the fireworks. The beds, the pillows, the lighting, the wall murals and the fantastic bathroom with the walk in shower...... All incredible. Also, for an extra 9.99 (I think) a hearty, huge, delicious breakfast in their little restaurant to start your day at Disneyland. Great experience at this cute, clean, small hotel.
Manager Response: We would like to express our sincere appreciation for you choosing to come and stay with us during your time in Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our property. We certainly hope that we will be able to welcome you all back once again!

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a convention and not, like most others, to visit Disneyland. Indigo is a quick 10 min walk from the centre and ideal. Free parking and spacious rooms. Restaurant serves and OK breakfast. Not too noisy with sticky kids considering the proximity to DL. Cheaper than the convention hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Hotel is located near shopping and restuarants. There is a shuttle service to disney next door. Informed hotel that was celebrating my wife's birthday and they upgraded us to a junior suite. Free parking which is rare for a hotel near Disney. The room was very clean and so was the bathroom. Room was located on the second floor but minimal noise from the street. Hotel was very friendly and even provided free wifi!  Overall great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We really appreciate you taking your time to list everything you experienced. We are delighted to know that you liked our room and guest services. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals who willing to taking care of each guest every day. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: This hotel was incredible from the moment I stepped into the lobby. Not only is the property beautiful (which sets it apart from the other Disneyland hotels) but all of the interior is very modern. I checked in very early and they had a room ready for me. My room was beautiful and came stocked with a Keurig and coffee that I was able to make every morning. I even ordered room service on my last night which was so tasty! This hotel is certainly one of the best IHG properties I've stayed in and I definitely will be coming back in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our property. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disney!
Summary: Clean, good location, super friendly staff! Free parking, 10-15 min walk to Disney. Lots of restaurants & shops close by.  Nice pool area but small. Restaurant/ bar on site too. Would definately stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you are satisfied with the property. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Location, Style, Service and Comfort and PRICE!
Summary: Just returned from an amazing stay at this superior hotel. It may be rated as a 3 star hotel in the guidebooks, but we had a 5 star experience but payed a 3 star price.   We booked the King Suite and honestly, compared to our friend's room at the Grand Californian....the Hotel Indigo was much nicer for a fraction of the price. The King Suite has two good sized rooms. A nice sitting room with a couch and flat screen TV, bathroom in between, and then the main bedroom with yet another TV, desk, comfy chair and king bed. The room had a nice view of the fireworks at Disney as well.  This hotel has had a very stylish, hip (without being too cloying/boutique-y) upgrade. It's very appealing visually and the rooms and beds are super comfortable as well. Aveda products in the bath didn't
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We truly appreciate you taking your time to write down all of your experience at our property. Feedback such as this helps us make improvements and ultimately deliver ideal guest experiences. Hopefully we will have another chance to service you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great little hotel for Disneyland - Excellent quality and value
Summary: Stayed two nights on our way through LA to Vegas via Dysneyland. Excellent little hotel that is nothing super-flash but is quite pleasant and all the things you want in a hotel - clean, friendly staff, good parking, good pool, good breakfast, and very good location.   Easy to get to, and as others have said very handy for Disneyland. I don't have a lot to say as we were only there for the two nights, but it was great for the price range. Free Parking, Free Wifi.  Only thing to note: our room on level 2 was accessible only via stairs, there was no elevator. While this didn't bother us at all, it may be an issue for people with mobility issues. There is an elevator in the 'main' building, so you may want to check when you are booking if you will be able to access your room via
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our guest services, location, and amenities. Hopefully we will have another chance to service you again in the future!

Summary: My family and I love this hotel, it's hands down the best place we've ever stayed. Close to Disneyland , and Denny's . Excellent customer service, lovely rooms, very quiet and private . Complimentary breakfast was delicious they have a variety if choices for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to know you are satisfied with our guest services, rooms, and our location. Again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed at the Indigo for 5 days in September! What an absolute Jewel in the crown.  Beautifully appointed clean tidy spacious and what wonderful helpful staff!  The walk to Disney a mere 10 mins with lots of eating places near by.  Loved hotel Indigo San Diego adored hotel Indigo Anaheim!!!

Summary Heading: Excellent base if you are visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights at the beginning of September on trip to Disneyland - I've covered some of the points below that I would have liked clarification on before my trip!  The hotel is a short walk to Main Gate but it's only about $7 in a taxi if you don't want to walk back after a long day. The car park was great (I'd rented a big car and found it easy to park) and free:) Our room was clean, bright and very comfortable with a good amount of storage (we had 4 large suitcases as it was part of a longer trip and were able to store everything away). Free wifi was great (easy to connect and check emails) and there's an in room safe to lock valuables away. The hair dryer was good so no need to bring one. Staff were friendly, always smiling and very thoughtful - they even gave my
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your nice comments regarding to your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you liked the amenities and guest services. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: From before arriving when we talked on the phone until checking out, we cannot stress how amazing the service here was. Everyone was beyond friendly and helpful, especially Arthur and Omar at the front desk. Arthur even offered us water at checkout which was very thoughtful as it is super hot out today.  The rooms were very clean and it looks like the bathrooms were newly renovated as they looked new. The shower head pressure was perfect.   The bonus of staying here is... You can walk to Disneyland as it is super close! Also there are so many restaurants so close by.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to be close to Disneyland and have a great experience at the hotel. I stay at many hotels throughout the country for business and this would be rated one of the top
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our room, location, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Arthur and Omar that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights during Labor Day Weekend to go to Disney. We booked a double bed room.  Hotel is nice and very clean. Service was great. I absolutely love hotel rooms with hardwood floors. Wish more hotels would get rid of the dirty carpet. Although I thought the hotels room was a bit smaller than the usual Marriott and Hilton. But the tastefully decorated big bathroom made up for it. A very trendy looking bathroom.   This hotel is very conveiently located. You don't even to drive. Disney is a 15 min walk and theres a long strip of resturants a block away. CVS is like 2 min walk.  Buy the breakfast vocher, its worth it. Also they have a laundry facilities.   The pool is small but works. Not a big deal, since we were there to go Disney. The only thing I didn't like is the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write such wonderful review following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to read that you are satisfied with out property. We also would like to apologize for the inconvenience the air conditioning caused. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Finally found the hotel we'll stick to in the future!
Summary: The Indigo Anaheim hotel has nice service! It is very clean and they have spacious rooms. We love it! The hotel in general has style and not too boreing. It has modern updated class. And it's not too far from Disneyland :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This folks, is a hidden gem.  My wife and I recently stayed for 2 nights, and I was so impressed with this property I decided that when we returned I would definitely write this review to hopefully help others make the same choice we did.  This was our 5th trip to Disneyland, and our first time at the Indigo. We travel extensively, and this little hotel really stood out in all of our travels. The hotel is super clean, the staff are VERY accommodating and friendly, always making eye contact and acknowledging you with a smile.  The entire hotel is very clean, lobby, elevator, hallways and rooms - spotless.  The pool is very clean and private as well.  We ate breakfast in the restaurant, had room service once, and we also hit the lounge one night on our way back from dinner for a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you liked our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, very pleasant staff, near Disney
Summary: Stayed here for two nights. Hotel is about a 10 min brisk walk to Disney entrance, therefore good location. We had the two Queen bed/one double sofa bed suite for five of us, and it was fine. To boot we overlooked Disney firework display.  Staff were great, attentive and good meaning. Beds were good and comfortable, with good linens and plenty of towels.  Only slight downside, breakfast wasn't that great. That said, would use the hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Please accept our sincere apologies for the food quality of our restaurant. Rest assured the issue will be reviewed and appropriate actions taken to ensure similar situations do not occur again. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: I stayed in this Hotel from May 22 to May 26 and to give an honest review the Hotel property is beautiful , clean and looks newly renovated.  One thing I didn’t like about the property was noise in particular the mornings and late nights; the noise that I’m referring to are footsteps from the hallway and from upper floors. I don’t know if the noisy footsteps are from the laminate or hardwood floors throughout the Hotel property or just poor construction or poor sound barriers but the inside of my room just seemed to echo loud footstep noises, to be honest didn’t have great sleep quality; I want to specify that I stayed in room 228 located in a T section of the Hotel.  The positive side is that it is walking distance from the Disney’s main gate. It is also walking distance from a
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We really appreciate the kind words you said about the hotel and its service. I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with noise levels in the room. We are working on solving this issue and hopefully will be fix very soon  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. Thank you again and have a wonderful week.

Summary Heading: Really Great Little Property Close to Dinseyland
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights in August 2014 while we participated in the Disneyland ½ Marathon.  Easy walk to the parks and convenient access to restaurants, busses and transportation.  Rooms were clean and bright and common facilities were all in keeping with that theme.  Front desk and other staff were very pleasant and professional.  Of particular note, we had frequent contact with Arthur at the front desk and he could not have been more helpful and friendly.  All in all a great little property that stands out (for good reason!) in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our property. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: comfortable room, wonderful friendly staff, free parking and walking distance to Disneyland...  what more could you want?  The hotel is convenient location, close to dining, easy access and a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland gate.  The savings on parking or paying for a shuttle made the stay totally worthwhile, and the hotel is nice, clean, comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very grateful about your appreciation of our location, room, and guest services. We very much look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel!

Summary: Started with a booking hiccup and Arthur got it taken care of, the staff is amazing you can tell they really take pride in their hotel. We were in room 306 which has a fireworks view and of the pool. The bed was very comfortable, loved the hardwood floors. We ate on meal at Chambers which was very good. The only reason I can't give the 5th star is because of the crappy wifi, don't think it's just this hotel wifi was an issue the whole trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to learn about your appreciation of our guest services and hotel facilities. We also would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused by the Wi-Fi speed. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss more about the issue. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary Heading: New, pleasant and less than 20 minute to the ticket booth at Disneyland
Summary: Excellent service.  We arrived about an hour early and  we were upgraded to a room on the 4th floor.  Very clean. No parking fee, easy wireless Internet.  Staff is very pleasant.  Room is very nice and modern.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review and comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to note that you are satisfied with our guest services and room. We always try our best to meet and exceed guests’ expectation. Our team look forward to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Love this hotel.Front desk is great, pool,room, everything was so great......I am with another hotel and it felt so great to be on the other side of the counter and was given the best guest service and was so happy with my get away stay....I will be staying there more and more......Love it and hope everyone will give it a try.......
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your high rating about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted  that you are satisfied with our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo for 3 nights with our 2 kids (along with our aunt and uncle and their 11 year old). We spent ages looking for the right hotel for our Disneyland stay and were delighted with the Indigo. Rooms are clean and spacious and good value (we had a family studio which is really just a large double queen bedded room with a couch) - which was easily big enough for 4 of us. The style was nice too (it's not a cool hotel - but feels modern and bright - unlike so many US hotels). The staff were all very friendly and extremely helpful which made a big difference to our experience. Nice small pool. As for Disneyland, it's about a 10 minute walk to the main gate. Highly recommended especially if you prefer smaller places.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your kind comments following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Our team are very glad that your overall experience was such a success. Thank you for your highly recommendations and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.

Summary: Great Boutique Hotel located waling distance to Disney and so much more.  The rooms are very clean bathrooms are small but upgraded and well supplied with amenities and towels.  Linens the same as you get at Marriott.  I definitely recommend for price and location.  Also the parking is free since Disney charges $17.00 a day thats a bargain.  I stayed with three kids no free breakfast but fast food and buffets close by.  A hidden gem
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our rooms, facilities, and our location. Thank you so much for your feedback again! We are looking forward to see you soon!

Summary: The hotel Indigo provided my family and I and outstanding experience. We came to Anaheim to go to Disneyland and the Hotel is perfectly suited for this type of trip. Our room was ready for us when we arrived early and throughout our four days, service was awesome and the rooms were cleaned and ready for us upon our arrival back from Disneyland. I would highly recommend this Hotel. It is close to all the restaurants and is only about a half mile from the gates to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you liked our room. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: I stayed here with my husband, 3 'tween children, and my parents  checking in on Christmas Day for a quick holiday visit to DisneyLand. The staff couldn't have been more friendly, personable, or helpful. The decor was mod and fun, and the rooms were clean and a very comfortable size. My kids loved burning off steam after our long flight from NY in the outdoor pool. We were very lucky to have really warm, comfortable temps (when we visited Disney 3 years ago we were not so lucky). The hotel is an easy 10-15 minute walk to the Disney Parks and Downtown Disney so it was really nice not to have to rely on bus schedules or worry about parking. The only reason I am not giving Hotel Indigo 5 stars is because my husband's iPad mini was stolen out of our room - which was locked whenever
Manager Response: Thank you so much  for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We appreciate you giving us opportunity to accommodate you. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with guest services, room, location, and our food. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Very comfy room, super friendly staff & walking distance to lots of restaurants. The hotel was great all around. The beds & showers were awesome. We could even see the fireworks from Disney through our window.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with the room, guest services, and location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights and I thoroughly enjoyed it. I checked in early so my room was not yet ready. But the staff made sure that I was comfortable while waiting, offered me free bottled water and had me wait at the lounge overlooking the lobby. Arthur at the desk was very helpful and made sure everything is okay throughout my stay. The rooms has wooden floors which I love. The modern decor is so refreshing and the toiletries are top of the line (Aveda). I also thoroughly enjoyed the spacious shower and bathroom. My only gripe is that I'm a Platinum IHG member but was not upgraded (supposedly automatic) because I booked thru a 3rd party. Anyways, no big deal at that time. I'll be back this December and would be staying here again while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would also like to apologize that we did not upgrade the room for you since you booked through a third party. We will make sure that we will upgrade you for your next visit if we have room available. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us. Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Omar, King Arthur and the whole team there are amazing, we stayed for a week there for convention andbthe staff help us a lot. Rooms are nice and we willcome back there for sure. Close by disneyland, convention centet, and a garden walk. 50 metres from convenience store and 3 minutes walk from a food strip. Very very convenient, business and or holidays
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you are satisfied with our guest service, room, and location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests to make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: After a long day of driving, we arrived late in the evening to hotel indigo. The front desk gentleman was very helpful and cheery. Check in was easy, we parked underground and went to our room. (We got a AAA discount which was an added bonus!) Our king room was clean, modern, comfortable and relaxing. The Aveda shower products were a nice touch to such a nice shower set up! The bed was so amazing and the crisp white sheets reminded us of home. It was the absolute perfect way to wind down for a long day and get a restful and quiet night sleep! We woke up feeling rested and ready for an amazing day at Disney! I will recommend this to everyone I know going to Disney who is looking for hotel that doesn't give off the Disney madness vibe! Thank you Hotel Indigo we enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our guest services, room, and our amenities. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary Heading: Outsanding Hotel and Perfect Walk to Disneyland-
Summary: Hotel Indigo has an amazing staff willing to go above and beyond to accommodate you. Tucked in perfectly to mainstream restaurants and the Gardenview. The walk was a quick stroll to the park!Fabulous! The Hotel has a modern beautiful chic vibe with gorgeous finishings. Definitely will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our property. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: This is a great little hotel and we had a great room.  It was very affordable so we could use our money to do lots of fun stuff at Disney like the spa at the Grand Californian plus take taxis so it cut down on the walking.  Our room was like new, very clean, quiet and we had a great time.  It you are planning a vacation where you spend lots of time at the hotel, this might not be the spot but if you just need a clean, quiet and friendly place to sleep so you can get up and go the next day, this is the place for you.  Hotel staff was more that helpful and we just had a great time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our property. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary Heading: A new style of Hotel near Disneyland
Summary: Before travelling I read some reviews here mentioning the Hotel noise. It was not a problem. The rooms are beautiful with wooden floor and big and bright bathrooms. We loved the Coffee Machine, and the mattress was superb.Good wi fi and very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice comments about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know you are satisfied with our property. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words and we look forward to see you next time!

Summary Heading: Hotel property is great - staff is outstanding!
Summary: As others have noted, the rooms are clean, comfortable and stocked with Aveda products.  But what took our stay to another level is the staff. My daughter needed extra mobility assistance and we were really concerned to take on the 24 hours of Disney with the medical issues she has right now. The staff at the hotel swung into action and by the time we arrived everything we were worried about was taken care of. We had our best trip to Disneyland ever. And that included the time we stayed at a Disney property! Thank you again, to the staff at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim for making it a wonderful mother-daughter weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you liked our rooms, amenities, and our guest services. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals who willing to taking care of each guest every day. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: This hotel is located in a really good location. very close to Disneyland and all the nearby cities around Los Angeles area.   The hotel parking is very small so the smaller the car you have the better it is for finding a parking space. However, the staff is excellent and will provide valet service for you if there is no room.  The rooms were alright not that great compared to all the other hotels in Asia. However, for what we needed it was perfect.   They probably should hire more people for the front desk because I waited a very long time to get checked in. Almost an hour? and there was only 2 other guest in front of me.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you liked room and location. We would like to apologize for the long waiting at check in. Thank you so much for bring it up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. We hope you will give us another chance and look forward to see you again.

Summary: Stayed overnight here at the hotel. Hotel room was available and ready for me at 9am which was unexpected but great straight after a 14 hour flight. Even got a room upgrade and a free gift got being an IHA member. Nice touch. Wifi was great and free no problems there. A tiny bit of noise from outside and the rooms above but it didn't bother me even once, beds comfortable and staff friendly. If I ever come back to Anaheim I will happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our room and guest services. We do apologize for the noise by the wood floor and thank you so much to bring it to our attention. Please do let us know when you will visit again and we will definitely make your next stay even better!

Summary: I love this hotel, from the Keurig Coffee Machine to the Aveda products, Emily at the front desk is awesome. She went above and beyond to bring me real coffee cream and to take care of us to ensure us a wonderful stay. I also requested a high floor to watch the fireworks and so that it would be quiet. Emily came through on both request.   The only improvement I would suggest is to update the A/C unit because it seemed to struggle to keep the entire room cooled.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Emily that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologize for the air conditioner temperature. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further. Please give us another chance to make your next visit even better!

Summary: We have stayed at many Anaheim hotels over the past 30 years and this is one of the best stays we've had!  The staff was very friendly and accommodating during our entire stay.  The rooms were clean, the beds very comfortable and my family loved the decor.  I enjoy coffee while getting ready in the morning so the Keurig machine was a nice touch.  The walk to Disneyland takes about 10 minutes.  We loved our stay at Hotel Indigo and will be back at the end of this month!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and location. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: We were really impressed by this hotel; the room (two double beds) was large and clean and at the back of the hotel so we could watch the fireworks. Beautiful decor and friendly staff. The location was great, there were plenty of eating places nearby, a couple of convenience stores, and a small mall for shopping. The pool and spa were great; my kids would have spent all day in there and having towels available really was good. Also tried the gym, small but well equipped and always empty!! I can't find a fault and the parking was free ( a great advantage compared to other hotels we stayed in in California).
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such a wonderful review following your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very pleased to hear you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and amenities. We look forward to your return visit in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great stay for anyone! BUT BEWARE OF FRAUDULENT CALLS!!!
Summary: I stayed here over spring break to celebrate my anniversary and would honestly stay here again. After long days at Disneyland we were pleased with how comfortable the beds were, we woke up rejuvenated and ready to start another day at the happiest place on earth. Seriously, it felt as if sleeping on clouds! My boyfriend and I took breaks from the park and took the time to enjoy the shopping area down the block from this hotel as well as soak our tired bodies in the spa. The customer service was excellent and the staff was very welcoming from beginning to end. The rooms were clean and hotel very well kept. My only complaint is that when the hotel is pretty booked, parking can be scary for those who like to avoid car door dings to their vehicles, I had to park in an extremely
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to note that you are satisfied with the property. We always try our best to meet and exceed guests’ expectation. Please accept our sincere apologies for the fraudulent call. Rest assured the issue will be reviewed and appropriate actions taken to ensure similar situations do not occur again. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: We stayed there in April 2014 and the people were helpful,friendly and very accommodating, the facilities were clean and new. We particularly enjoyed the towel animals. Hotel close to shops and restaurants, walking distance to Disneyland (about 10 mins). Would highly recommend this hotel. Internet and parking was complimentary.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our location, guest services, and amenities. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: My girlfriend and I came to Anaheim to visit Disneyland and the hotel ended up being just as great as the park. The location was perfect as it was only about a 15 walk from Disneyland. The staff was always helpful and friendly and they were able to accommodate our requests for an early check in and a room on the top floor, which was very much appreciated. Hannah was particularly nice and helpful at our check in. The room was so great it was hard to leave it to go to Disneyland. The food from the restaurant was delicious and the room service was always fast and friendly. It was a very high quality stay for a very good price and we'll definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We truly appreciate you taking your time to write down all of your experience at our property. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our location, room, and the food. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great experience in a good location
Summary: The staff at this hotel are what makes it special.  The Indigo is well located, about 10-15 minutes walk to the Disney entrance, however the staff go the extra mile, are extremely helpful and made our stay special.  I could not be happier with the efforts of the team at Hotel Indigo and would stay there again if in the area.  Congratulations to the team at Hotel Indigo Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to know you liked the location, and guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: Came to visit Disneyland Park and absolutely loved the hotel! We have stayed at various hotels around the area and by far this was our favorite. The hotel was very clean and modern, everything seemed very new and nice. The parking was underground(which is free) and hotel rooms are inside rather than outside which I prefer because it feels safer. The staff was wonderful and very helpful, it was both an easy check in and check out. The hotel room itself was very comfortable and the beds were absolutely amazing, we did not want to get out of bed. The hotel is also a very short walk to Disneyland (about 10 minutes). We spent most of our day in Disneyland so it felt nice to come back to a comfortable place that was also decently priced. WiFi is also free which is a plus! Would
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to know you are satisfied with our room, guest services, and location. Again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: First, and foremost, the staff at Hotel Indigo is fantastic!  The front desk staff, manager included, greet you every time you are entering or leaving the hotel, or simply spending time in the lobby.  Arthur, the manager, went out of his way to ensure that we weren't in need of anything.  The cleaning staff always greeted us when passing in the hallway, and were accommodating whenever we needed anything for our room.  That said, the rooms, and the hotel decor in general, is phenomenal!  The mosaic glass tiles are supposed to be reminiscent of walnuts, if I remember correctly.  The rooms were very clean, and all the amenities were top notch.  The pool area was fantastic as well.  There is a cabana with a large couch and table for lounging.  Victor, our server in the dining area,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: not bad in a sketchy neighborhood
Summary: If you have to spend a night near Disneyland, it is not a bad choice. for us it was a compromise to overpriced hotels near Newport Beach. The room was comfortable, but in the corridors it is too hot and humid. The elevator is very slow considering that 4th floor is the highest. The restaurant is basic but provides decent breakfast as well as evening drinks. We stayed in 3 rooms over a span of one week. On had very marginal Wi-Fi, but in the other two there was not problem. The staff are polite, but could use better training.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, easy in and out, close to where you want to go
Summary: Even though Disneyland is just a short hop, skip, and a jump, away, we actually came for an Angels game.  It's easy to drive there and back, the hotel has a safe and secure underground parking facility, and rooms on the back of the hotel have a view of the nightly fireworks from Disneyland.  A pretty nice show!  The rooms are spacious and well laid out.  The rooms were clean.  The proximity to restaurants and even the Anaheim Garden walk make an easy walk. While the selection of walkable food choices isn't great, there is some variety.  We had really looked forward to the complimentary brunch, which sounded incredible, but seem to have misunderstood it's times.  We missed it, but did find nice places to eat within an easy drive.  May have been our favorite hotel on a two week
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland, this is the place to stay. First the staff...REMARKABLE!  The manager on duty (who never seems to leave) gives the best advice!  The entire staff was absolutely welcoming and superb!   You get to see the Disneyland fireworks show every night!  You can walk to Disneyland in 10 minutes or take numerous shuttles!   You have several chain restaurants right outside the door - Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump for example.   Plus the rooms are spacious, clean and a step above normal rooms.  HARDWOOD FLOORS! Keurig coffee makers and comfortable beds.   You have several choices around the area.  Big hotels that tower over this little treasure.  But if you want a great great stay..choose this one!  You won't regret it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff very friendly and welcoming; nice walking distance to Disneyland, loved the pool/lounge area - great place to spend the hot afternoon in between attractions at Disney!  Appreciated the free underground parking, also liked the hotel decor.  Liked the "dancing fountain" out front.  Overall a great stay, would definitely stay again, and would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Despite some minor issues on our first visit, we returned to the Hotel Indigo.   We checked in early and our room was ready. We stayed in a 1-bedroom suite with 2 queen beds. The room has a work desk, mini-fridge and a sofa bed. The location is close to Disneyland and the mall.   The staff is great. Wifi worked well. The two things we haven't experienced yet is the hotel restaurant and pool. Perhaps on our next visit, we'll get to do that.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My Family made a trip to Disneyland in Anaheim on 7-30-14 and 7-31-14. This Hotel have the 2 Big Cs for me:     First C- Clean. This hotel was Clean indeed. Room was awesome, sheets were all clean and ironed. The bathroom, as I may say was really trendy. I love the set up that I even want to have a similar style for my new bathroom. Floors are  not carpeted which i like very much, since most of the allergens like mites comes from carpets.    Second C - Comfort. This hotel is very comfortable, with us taking along a 4 year old, it was enough room and space for here to move around. Bed and pillows were fantastic. lots of pillows Seven at least.    Third C - Closeness. Really walking distance to Disneyland, just took us at least 7 minutes. An additional Exercise:) Also close
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in June for our first visit to Disneyland.  On arrival, we were greeted by name by the manager (she had known who we were as we had told them we would be arriving early) who was very welcoming and warm.   The front desk staff were also very warm and would always say a genuine hello.  The hotel is about 1km from the Disneyland entrance which was fine for us as we don't mind walking. Unlike other hotels in the area it is more like a regular hotel (i.e. does not resemble a castle) and is more up-to-date than most others.  The room - two queen beds - was a good size and the bathroom was very large with a very spacious shower. Manager Response: none

Summary: Free parking was very helpful. Plenty of space and good value. We are a family of 4 - 2 adults, one teenager and one almost teenager. A suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed in the "living room" worked well. A short walk from Disneyland. The (small) pool was great, after a day tramping round the theme parks. Front desk staff advised on best road through LA traffic - thanks!

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels in the Disneyland area, but this hotel was the best. Free parking was great as most hotes in the area charge a daily fee, Beds were very comfortable and having the wood floors in rooms was a nice change. Overall, our stay was the best we have had in many years. Prices were very affordable and definitely worth the money. From now on we will only stay here!

Summary: Myself and my husband stayed here as part of our honeymoon. The hotel surpassed our expectations- from our arrival the staff were so friendly and thoughtful. They had prepared a congratulations letter for us and a fruit plate to celebrate our honeymoon. They have their own free parking garage and the hotel is about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Since we had a great spot in the garage, we decided to take a cab to the ball game.  This was a mistake since parking next to the stadium is only $10 and we had to wait in various lines for quite a while for a cab back to the hotel.
