Summary Heading: Nice furnishings but cramped boxy rooms
Summary: This property has modern décor and furnishings, but the rooms are small. This is an old budget hotel that was redone with nice floor coverings and furnishings, but other things were not remodeled. The whole property is cramped and the nice décor doesn't make up for the cramped layout. The windows are old and do not keep out the sounds of heavy traffic from Katella Blvd and the busy commercial area. (Very loud and busy well past 2 am.) The air conditioner/heater is an old and noisy under-window unit. The pool and hot tub is small - hot tub is max 6 persons. There are only a very few deck chairs. The entire hotel has just one shaky cart for hauling luggage, no bellhop on staff. The location is perfect for Disneyland and there are excellent restaurants within a very short walk.

Summary: I had stayed at this hotel years ago when it was a Holiday Inn (I believe). The renos they have done and the new management were great! Hardwood floors in the rooms, spacious shower, nice tiling, very modern and clean. It was a pleasure to stay here. The beds were comfortable. Room had a nice big TV to watch. Had I known I would have brought a USB stick with some of my regular tv shows on it for the late mornings or in the evenings.  Close walking distance to a handful of restaurants. Not a far walk to Disneyland. Convenience stores are near as well. Free underground parking, free wifi. The only thing the hotel didn't have was free breakfast, but its easy enough to run to the grocery store for some pastries and fruits and keep them in the mini fridge.  Staff was VERY friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Met & exceeded all the details I look for in a hotel:  •Decor-perfectly executed, unique, fresh, inviting  •Well thought out space plan; plenty of storage & seating •Absolutely spotless from the lobby to the halls to the parking areas. •In-house restaurant •Friendliest, most helpful staff I have ever met anywhere. ALL of them. Just warm and friendly, not formal or pretentious. What a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Valerie C:  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We really enjoy your feedback. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim\ Disneyland area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, staff are really friendly!
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights in June. The staff were really welcoming and helpful. The hotel was very clean and fresh. It is located really close the Disneyland parks and restaurants are close by. I would definitely stop here again if I came back to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our staff service and our location. I do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Welcome, close to Disney but some minor flaws
Summary: This hotel was an excellent choice and was only a 10-15 walk to Disney. We were given a very warm welcome at the front desk and were instantly upgraded due to our Platinum status. The room was massive, nice bathroom, nice wooden, modern effect. The only issue was the noise coming from the ice maker outside our room and key cards not working. I would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to stay close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear you like our location and room. We would like to apologize for the noise coming from the ice maker and room keys did not work properly. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We found this hotel on trip advisor after we were disappointed at another hotel, we were so glad we chose this as it is the best hotel in Anaheim. We arrived at the hotel and were checked in by Arthur and Khalil who were really friendly and told us that we would leave as friends. They said if there was anything we needed to just ask and if we wanted a ball game booking they would help us do that too.  The hotel has 4 floors and we were on the fourth floor, it is quite a new hotel so everything looked nice and new and well decorated. There was a bar and restaurant area, a pool and jacuzzi, a small gym and spa room, and a business room to use the computer to print boarding passes off which we found useful.  On entering the room we had 2 comfy double beds,  a unit with the large TV
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed and kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Khalil, Arthur, Noe, and Emily that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel indigo when our previous hotel was not good and found this one on trip advisor. We stayed from the 9th June till the 13th June. From the moment we walked in the service was personal with very friendly staff. Arthur, Khalil and Emily at reception were very friendly, always saying hello and offering help with anything we needed. The bar/restaurant staff were also very friendly.   The hotel is fairly new so all the rooms are well equipped and immaculate. There was a normal fridge, not a fridge with a weighed surface in which you cannot use, which is helpful for storing food and drinks. The wood floor is good as you know it is getting mopped everyday and it's easier to push suitcases on. In the bathroom there is a handheld shower in addition to the normal
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you liked our location, room, and amenities. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Khalil, Arthur, and Emily that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: The great features of this hotel include: (1) An outstanding front desk staff. KHALIL and VICTOR acknowledged our platinum status and upgraded us to a beautiful family suite on the third floor.  The room was spotless and well organized. The room was quiet making for a restful night's sleep. (2) The location within a reasonable walking distance of Disneyland and fine restaurants was superb. Complimentary parking at the hotel was a big plus. KUDOS TO ALL!
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with out service and location. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Khalil and Victor that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: The rooms (even the toilet) are very clean and spacious enough for 3 adults and 3 kids.  It's a 10-15 minute walk to disneyland (because 1 block in anaheim is a huge block).  Staff at the hotel are very friendly and helpful.  After walking around the whole day in disneyland, we are just so happy to go back to our comfortable and big bed.  The hotel is also next to Garden Walk which has quite a few restaurants like our kids' favourite California Pizza Kitchen.  One thing though is the air conditioner.  I find it hard to set the temperature.  It can be really cold but when you turn the temperature up, it just shuts off.  Maybe I just didn't understand how to operate or it's that complicated.  But that's just a small glitch when compared to the overall experience.  I highly
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services and our location. We apologized for the inconvenience the air conditioner caused to you. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel has to be one of the most amazing hotels ! Very friendly service , rooms were clean ! You don't find a hotel like this very often! The elephant in the restroom was very cute ! My son loved it! The room service was delicious ! Perfect place ! Near restaurants, plus disney is just down the street! Everyone who works there is so friendly and caring ! I recommend this hotel !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Every one of our team members tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We also delighted to hear you like our room and our room service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: good and friendly people, close to Disneyland and restaurants the best service in that city. good quality . personnel help you on anything . they answer right of way. I recommend this hotel to every one and family trips  to stay in this luxury hotel I mean it. 100 per cent clean nice rooms . and nice decoration. I will stay in this hotel . every time I visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, location, and our rooms and decorations. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Hotel Indigo has a Great staff ! Rooms were very clean and stood up to my expectations. Front desk employees were nice and polite. Housekeeping did a great a job.Recommend this hotel for anyone. Will return. :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. I am thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our guest services and room. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: I stayed here based solely on it being good for a night while on business in Orange County. The location was very convenient with the mall next door, Angels stadium 3 miles east, and Disneyland gate 1.2 miles northwest. The room and bathroom was modern and clean with a Kureg coffee maker, blow dryer, iron, safe, large flat screen, iPhone Dock radio, and mini fridge. With all of the families staying there it was a little noisy in the hallways I the morning and the air conditioning was a little noisy. I slept fine though and enjoyed my stay. I would rather stay here for $150 per night than other options nearby. I may bring the family next time to spend a full day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our location, service, and room. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: I strongly recommend Hotel Indigo especially due to its location, 3 min to Disneyland by car, and 1 min walk to The Shops at Anaheim GardenWalk a nice place from where you can pick a restaurant to have dinner.  I can also mention the warm reception from front desk staff, the free parking and free internet connection. Staff was kind as has received and stored some packages that were shipped to me couple of days before my check in.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our service. Location, and complimentary self-parking service and Wi-Fi. Every one of our employees tries his or her best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: It's all about the location and this property is ideal.  Within walking distance to Disney and a short drive to Anaheim stadium and Interstate 5.  There is the Garden Walk which is close to the hotel that has a variety of restaurants to choose from.  The staff is extremely helpful and friendly.  For a newly renovated property though, I was a little disappointed.  The room is spacious but the card key to open the room door would not always work.  This was mentioned to the front but was not fixed during our stay.  The A/C in the room was not working upon check in and maintenance had to come to change out the batteries to the wall remote.  Amenities were not replaced/refilled even when written down on a note pad with a tip.  I'm not sure if this hotel just hired new staff and were
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear you liked our location and our guest services. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We apologized for the issues that happened during your stay including room door was not working properly, the air conditioner in the room, and the amenities were not replaced. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and hope you will give us another chance to serve you in the future.

Summary: First time at this hotel. Came with my family, staff was super friendly. Pool area was awesome. Very cool atmosphere. Room was clean and was only 15 minutes away from disneyland walking. Will stay again.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services, amenities, room, and location. We do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: Employee were real friendly had couple issues and they handled them.  Great place would recommend it to others.  Walking distance to disneyland with four little ones not one of them complained about the walk home so that tell you how close we were.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. We are thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our location and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights with my 3 kids and all of us were happy with the hotel.  Its about 10 min walk to Disney.  With a nice weather that's an easy walk.  Going back, if you're tired, you can take a cab.   Very accessible to dining restaurants nearby, cheesecake factory, bubba gump all within walking distance.   Aircon takes a little getting used to as it will turn off once it reaches that desired temp and takes a while to get on again. all rent a cars are nearby, National, Dollar and my fave Enterprise!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our location. Thank you so much again for choosing our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great location, great hotel, very friendly and helpful staff
Summary: Great value, great location.  From the time of check in to check out all personnel from the front desk to the housekeeping were very helpful and great,  and always very friendly. To be fully open the only negative I could say is that you can hear a lot of next door room. The room we had was next to a toddler who start running from one end of the room to the other on the hardwood floors. Starting at 5 to 8 am.  And at night from 9 to around midnight. It sounded like they were running at the foot of my bed
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our service and our location. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We apologized for the noise from next door. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Once again, than you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Very clean, comfortable, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed 6 nights for a Disneyland vacation May-June 2014.  We got to the hotel late and immediately got our room keys.  We didn't have any problem parking (and liked that it was free!).  We had a suite with 2 queen beds ad a pull-out.  Our room backed against the ice machine (shared a wall) which at first I thought could be an issue.  We could hear it a little, but it didn't bother us, and never woke any of the 5 of us up.  The shower had a nice shower head and also a hand-held which was good for washing the kids.  We loved that there were wood floors.  Some of us have allergies, and we had no issues at this hotel, which we often do at others.  The rooms were always clean.  We liked that housekeeping didn't put the pull-out away every day like other hotels we have stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our guest service, amenities, complimentary self-parking service, and our room. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again!

Summary: Our main goal with a 7 yr old and a 2.5 yr old is easy and convenient. No hassle, no extras, no typical add on fees. This hotel, and ALEX at the front desk in particular, delivered. We arrived earlier than we intended to driving up from San Diego for my older son's birthday weekend. Alex checked us in early since the room was ready. we were able to park, unload and freshen up before walking 10 minutes over to Disneyland. Everyone was very inviting and accommodating, the room was small but very fresh and new. We have stayed at Park Vue because of its proximity to Disneyland and i would pay $50 extra per night to stay here. If the management of Hotel Indigo reads this review please give Alex a high five and lunch for his professionalism. when i checked in I felt like I was at the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Alex that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We were given one of the bigger rooms with a lounge area. Rooms are beautiful. Clean and comfortable. Staff were very welcoming and helpful.  Breakfast, if included, is a choice of pancakes, eggs with bacon, porridge, fruit or continental.   Very close to Disneyland (15 min walk) so because of this you do get a bit of road noise and you can hear and see the fireworks (the rooms at the back of the hotel probably get less noise - but after a day of walking around the Parks, the noise didn't keep us up).  Only slight complaint would be the noisy air conditioners (which we also experienced at Hotel Indigo Gaslamp (San Diego).. It wasn't too hot for us so we just turned it off   Get a taxi to the newly opened Anaheim Packing House - awesome food court
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our rooms and guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would like to apologize for the noise from the air conditioner. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and hope to see you soon!

Summary: On one of our family multi-day trips to Disneyland, we decided to do something different than the usual Disney hotels.  After searching around, I found the Hotel Indigo.  The location is excellent for the theme parks, downtown Disney and several restaurants.  We decided to try this hotel and am I glad we did - I love this place.   To begin, the staff is excellent - very welcoming, friendly and helpful.  Cannot say enough about the professionalism of the staff.  We needed to ask for a couple of items and within a few minutes, we were taken care of. The hotel itself is extremely clean and the vibe is great - different than the usual hotel rooms.  Though we were on the street side, street noise was not an issue as we got into the room after 9:00pm each night.  I really liked the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our guest services. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. Regarding to the design of our property, it is about the neighborhood in the year past when the area is known for the walnut ranches. Please come to visit us again and we will show you the story behind all of the details you see in our property. Once again, than you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for a night after checking out of the Grand Californian as we decided to catch an Angels game.  Staff was great, quick check-in. Walking distance to the parks if heading there and many restaurants within walking distance.  As a platinum member wasn't offered an upgrade, but was going for a 1 br unit as we had our two little ones with us as well. We were only there a night so not a huge concern. Just not fully sure how upgrades work for Platinums through IHG, wish it was a little more clear.  Would think 50-80 paid nights would get me a little more then uncertainty and 500 bonus points or a bottle of water?  But I digress!  Would recommend for those staying for the Disney "magic". Everything is close by and there is lots of room for parking. Didn't try the in-house
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you liked the guest services and the location. IHG Platinum members will have complimentary room upgrade subject to availability. We apologize that we didn’t have any room available for upgrade at the day of your arrival and we did not clarify the reason why we did not upgrade you at check-in.  We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Ultra Comfortable and right around corner from Disneyland
Summary: I loved this hotel. The room was immaculate, the beds were very, very comfortable, and I loved the shower. The homey touches included throw pillows on the beds and the cleaning lady always arranged our Disney stuffies in different ways so my kids could 'discover' them when we came back to the room.   This is the only room I've stayed in that had wood floors. There is an area rug between the beds and underneath the pullout, but the rest is wood floor and it's amazing. It really makes it feel cleaner.   We had a family suite and we could see the fireworks from our room. One night we walked back from Disneyland and it took 15 minutes from the maingate to the door.   The pool has a cozy cabana area which is the perfect place to relax while the kids swim.   The front desk was always
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you liked our room, amenities, guest services, location, and the breakfast in our restaurant. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: Great location for Disneyland and California adventure. Not your typical DL hotel.  Very peaceful. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. They will book you a shuttle to John Wayne for very low cost and were more than happy to do so.  On evenings when we returned from the park they were always there with a warm smile and "how was your day".    Free parking and wifi are a plus. We tried several of the offerings at the hotel dining and were very pleased with the service and food choices.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this magnificent review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad and much appreciated that you are satisfied with our location to Disneyland Theme Park entrance, guest services, and our complimentary parking service and Wi-Fi. Thank you so much for your feedback again! We are looking forward to see you soon!

Summary: I had been looking forward to staying at Hotel Indigo since we noticed it on our previous visit to Anaheim. Upon first arriving at the hotel, I thought I may had found a new go to hotel when visiting Disneyland! The room was beautiful with a nice bathroom stocked with Aveda products. However, my impression of Hotel Indigo quickly changed.  When renovating the hotel they made an epic fail by installing thermostats that don't have an option to keep the fan running constantly. You could only set to heat or AC and have it cycle on and off. I don't understand why any hotel would do this, but luckily few hotels are this thoughtless in their planning.  Between the sound coming through the connecting doors and the thunderous noises coming from the room above caused by having wood
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us and bringing these issues to our attention. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: The hotel is within easy walking distance od Disneyland and stores. The staff at the front desk are very friendly and helpful. They are all genuine and go the extra mile to make sure you have everything you need for your stay. The pool is small but well heated. You can see the Disneyland firework show from most rooms. Parking is free! We (two people) stayed in a room with a king; which was extremely comfortable. Simple bathroom with sink and walk in shower. Desk, mini-fridge, comfy chair, flat screen TV available. The overall vibe of this place was great and added to a great trip to Anahiem.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very grateful about your appreciation of our location, room, amenities, and our high level of service. We very much look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel!

Summary Heading: Okay for Anaheim, but not one of the better Indigo Hotels
Summary: For two adults who weren't looking for a themed/cutesy hotel room in Anaheim, Indigo was an obvious choice. We've stayed at a few other Indigo Hotels, and this one definitely seemed a bit more like a random chain hotel with an Indigo "skin" or something. Lots of cheesy neon colors in the halls and bathroom, but maybe it's because of Disney visitors. In any case, it was fine.   Staff at the front desk was friendly. The room was clean, although we were missing any kind of soap on the first night and had to call the desk. Parking is ok, although the lot does seem to fill up quickly at night. No laundry facilities. They offer a laundry service M-F, but since we arrived on Friday night, that wasn't much help. If I had to stay in Anaheim again (not sure I would), I would be fine with
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services. We are truly grateful to have hotel team member that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Regarding to the design of our property, it is about the neighborhood in the year past when the area is known for the walnut ranches. Please come to visit us again and we will show you the story behind all of the details you see in our property. We are very sorry that we did not mention that we have 24/7 self-laundry service on the first floor at check-in. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience that caused. We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: This is a hotel I would recommend if you are happy to either walk to Disney or hop on a bus and save yourself from forking out a fortune on nearer hotels. The hotel is situated near some good restaurants which is handy. We had a double room which was fairly spacious and the room was very clean the only downside was a little bit of noise from other rooms. The staff were unobtrusive but helpful when asking for advice on activities. The children loved the outside pool which was mostly empty so they had it all to themselves. If you want to save some more money and are visiting the Orange outlet mall or Westfield Mall get the Art bus which is cheap and get a discount card at the information centres when you get there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel indigo Anaheim. We would like to apologize for the noise from other rooms. Thank you so much for bringing it up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: This hotel is super clean and fresh!  We were given a little goody bag when we arrived with some nice Aveda products and also a yummy trail mix snack.  The pool and hot tub seemed very well taken care of and kid friendly.  The lounge chairs were nice.  The rooms were on the small side but we just have one son so it was perfect for the three of us.  The floors are not carpeted which I appreciate as it just feels cleaner.  We did hear some noise from other rooms and hallway but it wasn't too bad.  10 minute walk to Disney Land.   The breakfast we ordered at the hotel restaurant was scrumptious!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review. We are delighted to hear that you liked our amenities, our room, our location, and the breakfast in our restaurant. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: First time to stay at a Hotel Indigo (used to be a Holiday Inn) and the new hotel was very clean-looking and color scheme pleasant to look at. We had a double room (2 full-size beds) and it was spacious enough. The beds' mattresses, pillows, sheets and blankets gave us a good night's rest after a full day at Disneyland. The bathroom was large and towels were replaced daily. The front staff were very friendly and helpful. Covered underground parking great for keeping the car from staying under the sun all day and saves on paying parking fee at Disneyland too. Less than 10-minute walk to Disneyland with places to grab a snack or drink along the walk. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of hotel Indigo Anaheim. We appreciate you giving us opportunity to accommodate you. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the room, guest service, and our underground parking lot. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Disneyland is walkable from the hotel; hotel offers onsite parking for nominal fee. Rooms are modern and very clean. Price in the $130-$150 range makes it a good value in my view for 2 queen beds. Hotel also has a small outdoor pool for the kids or a cool down
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know that you like our location, room, and amenities. Thank you for choosing our hotel and welcome to come back soon!

Summary Heading: Trip to see the Yankees play the Angels
Summary: I recommend staying at this hotel because of it's location whether your in Anahiem to see the Angels or visit Disneyland, this is a quality hotel. Located within walking distance of Disneyland and a short drive to Angels Stadium. Their are several restaurants also within walking distance of the hotel. If your going to go to the beach while there, it's an easy drive down Harbor Blvd. to the shore. It was my second stay at this property and the staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. The hotel has a European vibe and has a unique look about it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim and choosing our hotel again. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our location, guest services, and room. We are truly grateful to have hotel team member that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at Hotel indigo. The staff is very helpful and polite and the hotel is super clean. It is a short walk to Disneyland. This is the only place we will stay from now on when we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review and thank you for choosing our hotel again. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest service and our guestroom. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: The Front Desk staff were very helpful and friendly. The room was spacious with a modern styling. The beds were very comfortable and the more than sufficient amount of pillows were quite soft.   Coffee and refrigerator in the room were much appreciated. A microwave would have been nice, as we are travelling with kids. That being said, we were well aware of this shortcoming and we are happy to have stayed here.   The Walk: The walk to Disneyland is not too bad. We crossed Harbor on Katella, then headed North on Harbor. You have to cross at two lights, then the entrance to the park is on your left.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for you kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest service and our room amenities. We apologize that we do not have microwave in each guestroom, however, we are always willing to help you warming up your foods from our restaurant which is on the first floor. Thank you so much again for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed at the hotel from May 13th - 16th in a family studio suite. Upon check in everything was good, quick service very courteous staff. Checked into our room with ease and a bit early. As for the room it is okay 2 beds and pull-out sofa. Bathroom has only shower and sink is also in bathroom area which is not to convenient for getting four people ready in the morning. As for the decor the huge nut on the whole wall is kind of weird? They have an old style plug in the wall air conditioner which is noisey and keeps the one side cold and the other end of the room hot. Room was clean but had to ask for more toilet paper and towels one day as staff only left half a roll of toilet paper and no replacement and only 2 towels for 4 adults. Also we had prepaid for hot breakfast for 4
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback of your stay with us. Please accept our sincere apologies for the issues that you brought up especially the air conditioner noise and the complimentary breakfast. Rest assured these issues will be reviewed and appropriate actions taken to ensure similar situations do not occur again. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further. We do hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.   Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: We felt like VIP the whole time! Victor and the entire staff are great. We reserved our room online. This was not a user friendly site-call to make sure you get the room you want (we ended up with two double beds instead of a king). When we checked in I asked for a room facing Disney fireworks. They were very accommodating and gave us a nice room on the second floor, away from the noise.They were very apologetic about the confusion with the online reservation. The room was nicely decorated, soft pillows and comfy mattress. We had no problems with noise of any kind. The pool was a nice temperature, especially for such a warm evening. They even let us use the pool after hours since we were the only two in there. It was perfect for us, but some may find the pool a little on the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest service and location. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals like Victor who willing to taking care of each guest every day. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: My family just stayed here for an overnight trip to Disneyland. We checked in around 3, had a 3rd floor family studio room that easily fit the 3 adults/2 children with the 2 queen beds and pull out sofa bed.  After getting to our room, the front desk called to ask if everything was good and I requested the pull out sofa be made up into a bed while we were at Disney. I also left a note asking for more pillows. When returned after midnight both requests were fullfilled.  With the wood flooring, I was a bit skeptic of the noise but we never heard anything and we were very close to the elevator. Don't know the capacity of hotel though... Rooms have mini fridges, coffe makers with about 6 pods of coffee/tea, very convenient! Beds were super comfortable and linens all appeared very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know that you liked the room and bed and satisfied with our complimentary self-parking service. Thank you for choosing our hotel and welcome to come back soon!

Summary: To start off - I really wanted to love my stay here and was excited based on the positive reviews.  The location is great, easy walk to disneyland and restaurants. The front desk staff are very friendly and always happy to help and accommodate your requests. Now perhaps one of the problems was that before checking in here we had just left the most amazing hotel in vegas so our expectations were maybe a little high.. But on our first night we were in a room on the second floor and at 2am I was just about ready to pack my bags and leave. The sound from the rooms above was ridiculous! We got about 3 hours sleep because all we could hear was thumping from feet and items being dropped all night and then we were woken at 6 by the same noises.  We went to the front desk and requested a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the location and our guest services. We are very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. We would also like to apologize for the noise from upstairs. Thank you so much for bringing it up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.  Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: No power in room on arrival and super late cleaning schedule
Summary: To start this review I want to lay out that I'm an extreme business traveler.  I'm on the road to a different city at least 3-4 days every week.  Because of this I pride myself on knowing a good hotel.  I'm a bit torn with this review because it's based solely on their inability to deliver.  To start we arrived around 8pm and checked into our first room which was on the 4th floor.  We went into the room and turned on the main hall light and one lamp on TV side of the room and began to unpack.  Once we were unpacked I attempted to turn on one of the over the bed lights and nothing.  I then attempted to turn on another lamp in the corner and nothing.  I then realized the clock radio was dead.  I used my phone charger to check the outlets and verified that there was zero power to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us and bringing these issues to our attention. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies that your recent experience with us was not a positive one. Rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue further and hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.   Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland-Walking distance. Very attentive, helpful, friendly staff. Small but new clean building and rooms. Close to restaurants, seven eleven. I checked out this morning and I have nothing to complain. I don't use swimming pool, but if it's big on your list then you may not be happy. Everything else perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to hear you are satisfied with our location and our guest services. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Fantastic staff , great location, lovely hotel
Summary: I wanted everyone to know that the staff at this hotel go well beyond and above any hotel staff i have ever encountered. Omar and Arthur were absolutely fantastic when they found out that due to a severe illness my wife was being admitted to hospital in anaheim they did there very best to ensure that the hotel was the least of my worries and all the staff continued to ask after her every day. The location of the hotel for Disney and resteraunts is absolutely fantastic ( not that i got to enjoy this in the 25 days i stayed), for the price you cannot really get any better in the Sense of the quality of the rooms, free internet, free parking and in my case a guest laundrette ( life saver for me).  Once again i would suggest that if you are considering going to anaheim for any
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We do hope your wife is getting better and please give our regards to your wife. We are also very proud of our team members like Omar and Arthur in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Please come to visit us again in the near future!

Summary: As this hotel was a renovated Holiday Inn, I wasn't expecting a lot but this place was a great treat.  The staff was ultra-accommodating.  The rooms were quiet, wood flooring is a treat in a hotel (cleaner than carpet).  We had two, one bedroom suites booked and it worked out perfectly.  Short walk to Disneyland.  Have to really compliment the hotel on the cleanliness of the linens / towels.  Would stay there again in a heartbeat.  Beds were great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our staff service, our location, and our amenities. I do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary Heading: Good option close to convention center and Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was recently renovated and done in a boutique hotel style. The rooms were a good size for the area and the bathrooms were nice. The best part was the beds were super comfy and I slept awesome.  Se block and the Garden walk and many good restaurants. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your high recommendation! We are glad to know that you are satisfied with the room and the design. Our property is only two blocks away from the main gate of Disneyland Theme Park and Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for Vacay Stay, Not quite so much for business
Summary: I stayed here on business and the Hotel caters mainly to Disney visitors I suspect, so I want the readers to fully appreciate that my 4 star rating would probably be a 5 Star if the trip was personal instead.   Having said that here is my report:  We arrived just before noon in a large group (of 7 co-workers), and we had all requested King rooms which were not ready yet; which is not surprising since check-in is usually after noon.  They gave us the 2 rooms they had and allowed us to leave our bags with them while we went and got the essentials and surveyed the conference center about a quarter mile down the road.  When we got back, our rooms were ready and they apologized for delay (but they didn't need to).   The rooms are really quite nice.  It reminds me of a nice boutique
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We truly appreciate you taking your time to write down all of your experience at our property. Feedback such as this helps us make improvements and ultimately deliver ideal guest experiences. However, we are very concerned to read your comments about the noise that you mentioned and the Wifi speed. Please contact the hotel directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We hope you will give us another chance; we would love the opportunity to show you a true Hotel Indigo Anaheim experience!

Summary: Rooms were super clean, very cute contemporary decor, service was very friendly, free parking, close to Disney, comfortable bed, affordable, there is nothing wrong with this place. Will definitely stay here again. No question about it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our location, decoration, complimentary parking service, bed, and our guest service. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary: A very clean and modern respite at the end of a day at Disney.  Close enough (10-minuite walk) that we left the parks mid-day to freshen up and get back out for evening fun.  Slept soundly and comfortably in very fresh and cushy bedding.  Walk-in shower a nice touch.  Staff was SO friendly and accommodating (Victor & Hannah).  One worker even helped give my car a jump after I discovered my battery was dead.  Great value and worth every dime.  Yes, there are cheaper... but I doubt there is a better, cleaner value that close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb comments of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to know you liked the bedding and our location. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Victor and Hannah that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations. We look forward to your return visit with us!

Summary: The hotel was great. All the staffs were super nice from the beginning to the end. They provide excellent customer service. The hotel was nice and clean. Even though the room are not big but it is reasonable size. The walk to disneyland was only about 10 mins walking distance and the parking at the hotel was free. So we save on parking fee at the park. There are few choices of restaurants near the hotel such as cheesecake factory, bubba gump, Dennys, tony roma. 7-11 is only about 5 mins walking distance and target is just about 5 mins drive away from the hotel. I highly recommend this hotel to my friends and any people going to disneyland. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are pleased to know you are satisfied with our guest service and our location. Again, thank you so much for choosing our hotel and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We found this hotel looking for a close but nice option to DLR.  This is a newly remodeled hotel that used to be a Holiday Inn Express.  Nice fresh look and clean.  The hardwood floors are a little noisy, but most hotels with this proximity to DLR will have kids running around.  Service was prompt and friendly.  The east side higher floors have a view of the Fireworks, but they are loud if you have a sensitive sleeper.  All in all a great hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know you are satisfied with our guest service. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We also apologize for the noise. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss the issue further. Once again, thank you so much for your kind words and we look forward to see you next time!

Summary: My family of 4 stayed at Hotel Indigo April 21-24, 2014 for a trip to Disneyland. We booked this hotel for the sole purpose of getting a 1 bedroom suite and weren't disappointed. It was perfect for what we needed as we have 2 young children after a day at Disney we were able to come back and unwind in the living area while the kids went to bed. It was very clean and the beds were surprisingly one of the most comfortable beds I have slept in at a hotel, and this includes many 5 stars.    It is also only a quick 10 min walk to the Disney entrance which was great. I also liked the hardwood floors as cleaner than carpet however we could hear the kids above us running back and forth on them so that was very noisy but as were were barely in our room, it didn't bother us too much.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We apologize for the noise and the wifi speed. Thank you so much for bringing it up to our attention. We recently upgrade our internet speed. We are glad to hear you are satisfied with our guest service. We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This hotel was walking distance from restaurants, disney and the convention centre it was excellent service and value for money I would recommend it to anyone staying for a convention.  The breakfast was also very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice comments regarding to your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you liked the guest service, our location, and breakfast. Thank you so much for your recommendation! We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: The staff at the Hotel Indigo Anaheim is outstanding! They were helpful way beyond my expectations or experience at other hotels. The room was modern and had plenty of space for me to stretch out. The hotel is not so huge, though, that you feel lost in the crowd. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad you are satisfied with our guest service and the design of our property. Also thank you so much for your high recommendation! We look forward to see you again next time!

Summary: I stayed here with my family earlier in the week, and my husband and I agreed that we should return.  Highlights:  - Accommodating and efficient front desk staff (Thanks, Arthur and Omar!)  - Clean rooms with modern decor and comfortable beds - Good hot breakfast in the lobby restaurant (It was included in the room package I booked.) - Small, well-maintained swimming pool -- nice for a midday dip - A 10-minute walk to the Disney parks - What a treat to watch the Disneyland fireworks from our 4th floor room!  My husband thought the giant walnut photo in the room was kind of weird, but that's a really small criticism.  We were lucky to have a room far from the elevator, so it was nice and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We really appreciate you taking your time to list everything you experienced. We are delighted to know that you liked the décor and the beds in the room, the breakfast in the restaurant, and also our location and amenities. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals like Arthur and Omar who willing to taking care of each guest every day. Regarding to the wall murals that we chose, our hotel is about the neighborhood in the years past when the area was known for the walnut ranches. Please come to visit us again and we will show you the story behind all of the details you see in our property.

Summary Heading: A true GEM next to Disneyland!
Summary: A nice little boutique hotel with free parking and friendly staff always willing to help you with anything that you may need. It's not your typical hotel on the Disneyland strip with a "Castle" theme or what not. Very classy like.   My wife and my 1 year old daughter traveled from Burbank, CA (yeah really far!) to spend a couple days at Disneyland and we wanted to be close by. Only a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland gate (The walk back was longer with our weary legs.) and 5 minute walk to Garden Walk we were near all the restaurants and rides that we would ever need. We had a great time and would recommend to all our out of town friends to stay here.  If you have a young child, you may need to bring a portable bath tub because the suites seem to only have showers. We asked for a
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb comments of our property. We are delighted to hear you are satisfied with our self-parking service and guest services. We are truly grateful to have team members who enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: We stayed from 26 March to 3 April 2014. This hotel is comfortable, well furnished and very convenient to major areas especially the Disney park. Its about a 10 minute walk from the hotel to the main entrance. The staff was very nice esp. Arthur. The downside is that the hotel can be a little loud and one can easily hear through the walls:(. Another thing I did not like was the air freshener they use in the bathrooms...not too pleasant. However, you get accustomed to it after some time:(. There is free underground parking which is a bonus. We will be staying here again for sure
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments regarding your experience at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad to know you liked the location of our property. We are also delighted to know you are satisfied with our guest service. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals like Arthur who willing to taking care of each guest every day. We apologize for the noise through the wall and the air freshner. Thank you so much for bring them up to our attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about the issue further. We hope you will give us another chance and look forward to see you again.

Summary: I'm afraid that if the wrong people find out about this hotel my new Anaheim retreat will be ruined.  We booked a family suite for four of us for 6 nights.  We couldn't have been more happy.  The decor, hardwood floors and large bathroom for four females was perfect!  Hannah at the front desk was amazing.   The housekeepers were friendly (even if they only spoke Spanish (which let our teenage daughter practice), and the restaurant staff were so accommodating.  Unless the hotel changes, this is our new Anaheim hotel!  Arthur the manager was extremely helpful too!  One night my teenage daughter felt very ill.  The young guy at the front desk was so helpful.  He let me know the location of the local hospital and also that a doctor could be called to the hotel if needed.  He was so
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words of our property. We are glad to hear you liked the décor, hardwood floors, and the bathroom of our property. We are also delighted to know that you are satisfied with our guest services. The primary goal of all of us is to provide our guests with the best possible service and meet or exceed their expectations. We look forward to see you next time!

Summary: We stayed a couple of days here in April and it was really nice. We spent our days at Disneyland so when we got back to the room we were spent. Its about a 10 minute walk, if you talk your time, from the hotel to Disneyland's entrance. The staff were very, very nice. The breakfast was good, 30+tip for the two of us. We go to Disneyland quite a bit and this has probably been our favorite Anaheim hotel yet. It can be a little loud so if you are a light sleeper, ask for a fourth floor room. After a day at Disneyland, we slept like babies. Also free under ground parking and no resort fee. Most of the hotels in Anaheim will get you with a daily parking fee and some, like the Crowne Plaza, will get you with a daily resort fee on top of the parking. None of that crap here at the Hotel
Manager Response: We very much appreciate your kind words about Hotel Indigo Anaheim. It is wonderful to know you enjoyed your stay with us and satisfied with our guest services and the breakfast from our restaurant Chambers Bar and Bistro. We are glad that you are happy that we offer complimentary self-parking service. We are also delighted to know that our property has been your favorite hotel in Anaheim. We do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to Hotel Indigo Anaheim soon!

Summary: Stayed with my 18 year old daughter for 4 nights.  Hannah was fabulous when we checked in.  Since I had read the reviews, I asked for a room in back and on an upper floor, without a connecting door.    Since it was 8 pm, the only room available in back on the 4th floor was next to a woman with unruly children.  Hannah suggested a room in front, and it was fine.  The music from the fountains ends at 10, and we were out every night until after 11.  Not as convenient as the Grand Californian or other Disney hotels, but the room was very nice.  It was also less than one fourth the price of the Grand Californian, with no daily resort fee!  Not great for children because of the hardwood floors and high sink.  Also, the walk to the park goes past homeless people in the bus shelter on
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are delighted to know you are satisfied with out guest service. We are truly grateful to have team members like Hannah who enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: This is the place to stay when visiting Disneyland and beyond! The staff is SUPER great. They were very helpful in finding the best room for our family. The rooms were very clean and spacious. Breakfast was really good but pricey if you didn't purchase the coupons when you check in. It is really well located, and we were able to walk to Disneyland, walk back in the middle of the day for a break and go back in the evening. There are tons of places to eat close by. There is nothing bad about this place-an amazing value for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of our property. We are delighted to hear that our guest service met your expectation. Every one of our employees always do our best to meet or exceed guests’ needs. We apologize for the price of our breakfast. We do sell some discount breakfast voucher at front desk and guests are welcome to purchase it anytime of their staying. We do, however, hope the food did not make you disappointed. Please give us a second chance to make your stay better. We look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: We were a  family of 12 so we required 3 rooms, we got two one bedroom suites and one studio suite. The rooms were updated, clean, spacious and comfortable. The only thing I could say that could be a  negative to some was that the floors are handscraped laminate floors and doesn't have the sound buffer that carpet would but for cleanliness we would put up with the footstep noise rather than some dirty old carpet so not really a negative and it wasn't overly loud. The one bedroom suite have living room with pull out sofa and coffee tables, totally separate bedroom with two comfortable queen beds. The staff were extremely accommodating and friendly and their main goal was to ensure your stay was enjoyable. (I think the front desk fellows name was Arthur and he was awesome, but
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are glad that you are satisfied with our room and guest services. We are very fortunate to have team member like Arthur who enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We do apologize for the noise by the wood floor and thank you so much to bring it to our attention. Please do let us know when you will visit again and we will definitely make your next stay even better!

Summary: The staff was courteous and helpful.  The restaurant staff very nice and accommodating, food very good.  We only ate breakfast there. Loved the room very clean and bed very comfortable. Love the hard wood floors and bathroom was gorgeous. Parking very easy to be across the street from Disneyland. Will stay there again. Recommend if you are going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We very much appreciate your nice review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. It is wonderful to know how much you enjoyed our room. We are also delighted to hear that you found the team was courteous and helpful. We always try our best to meet or exceed our guests’ expectation. We very much look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I go to disneyland 3-4 times a year. We have stayed at many of the hotels around the area and have to say this hotel has been our favorite BY FAR! The location is walking distance to the park. The rooms are clean and the decor is very hip. The staff was absolutely the best we have ever come across. Very helpful and attentive and friendly. Will be staying here from now on and will be referring to all friends and family.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of our property. We are delighted to hear you like the rooms and our guest services. Thank you for your support of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney Resort
Summary: We prepaid for the room at a pretty good rate. Plan was to go to Disney for two days. We arrived at 9:30 am and they had the room ready so we set up shop. Left car in parking garage and walked to the park. Returned to a great shower and wonderful night's sleep. Beds were very comfy. Climate control was easy to operate and efficient.  Room was quite upscale. The parking is underground and spaces were ample. We were able to keep the car there for two complete days without any parking fee.   Since some reviewers said they could hear the footsteps above them we asked for a floor on the top level and had no problem. Could hear people in the hallway a few times, but no big deal. Usually excited kids...but it's Disney, after all. Didn't hear anyone next to us. Don't know if anyone was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of your recent stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are truly delighted to read all of your comments. And we appreciate your comments about our guest service and our rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back soon, please do let us know when you shall be returning.

Summary Heading: We're coming back here every year
Summary: Hotel Indigo is the perfect balance of quality and value with top notch staff.  It is new, clean, and modern - with nice linens, and other features typical of a nice boutique hotel.  Yet the price was reasonable and included a full breakfast (the real thing, not "continental" pastries and watery coffee).  But most importantly, the staff was the most accommodating and helpful of any hotel I have been in.  Kahlil and Victor checked us in late and were a joy to interact with after our long drive.  They anticipated our needs and accommodated our requests.  Most importantly, they went the extra step rather then settling for easy responses.  And every other front desk staff was happy and helpful.  The hotel is a 10 minute walk from the park entrances, allowing us to come home for an
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of our property. We are glad that you are satisfied with our guest services. We are very proud of our team of true hospitality professionals like Kahili and Victor who willing to taking care of each guest every day. Please do come to visit us again and we look forward to see you in the near future!

Summary: Super friendly staff, posh rooms, CLEAN facilities. They brought me more k-cups in a flash when I asked for them. We were able to walk to Disneyland and the Convention center. Also, I loved the AC. I know that's silly but I'm an AC snob. Did I mention the SUPER friendly staff??  Simply put, I loved my stay there and I most definitely will return for my next Disney trip.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of our property. We are delighted to hear that you like the room and facilities. Every one of our employees try our best to meet or exceed guests’ expectations. We are truly grateful to have them in our team to make our hotel unique and shine. Please do let us know when you come to visit again

Summary: We chose the Hotel Indigo Anaheim over an onsite Disney hotel or our previous pick - Hotel Menage. The hotel is a five to ten minute walk (depending on how tired your legs are!) to the front gates and just around the corner from the Garden Walk restaurants and shops, which includes a Bubba Gump's, California Pizza Kitchen, and a Cheesecake Factory. If you don't feel like walking, parking is FREE - although we had to park next door at the Ramada one night (also free) because the lot was full. The rooms and common areas are brand-new, clean, and very comfortable. Beds are cushy and blankets are soft, and the showers are oversized with great water pressure. The pool and jacuzzi are small, but clean, and offer great cushioned seating for sunbathing. We had breakfast in the lobby
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about your experience with us and your high recommendation of our property. We are fortunate to have Victor and Arthur on our team that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and meet your expectation while staying with us. Please do let us know when you shall be returning again!

Summary: We stayed overnight to go to Disneyland/DCA. I chose it for the price coupled with high ratings, and figured that being brand new it would be nice. The rooms are clean and modern and there were friendly people working there. We ordered room service that was super affordable and yummy. And, the pool and hot tub aren't much to speak of, but it was fun to have that available. Best of all they have FREE parking - unheard of around Disneyland! I would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice reviews. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room and our service. We also glad you enjoyed the foods at our restaurant Chambers Bar & Bistro. We would like to sincerely apologize for the pool and hot tub. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.

Summary: Shiny new hotel with everything we needed during our stay. If the employees are reading this, I'd suggest stocking a few of the popular phone chargers for customer use. But two different people at the front desk let me borrow their personal chargers so that was helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such gracious feedback from your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that even though we do not have any phone chargers in stock at front desk, our staffs tried to find another way to help our guests. We apologize for the inconvenience that caused and we definitely will bring this up to our management team head. Hopefully you will give us another chance to serve you in the future. We can’t wait to see you again next time!

Summary: From the moment we were welcomed by Omar and Arthur it was clear to us that Hotel Indigo was something special.  We were able to immediately (early check in) access one of our rooms - which was great.  All the staff were fantastic, providing advice on tours, shopping and accommodation options for the rest of our trip.  A relatively small hotel punching well above its weight.  Tip is book a fourth floor room at the back of the building to catch the Disney Fireworks every night (if you can't be at the park). The meal in the bar/ cafe was great.  Laundry facilities were also well serviced.  The hotel was very clean and the towel elephants were a lovely touch by housekeeping.  Service was 5+++++ The wifi speed was the only little bother.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us. We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Omar and Arthur that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We apologize for the Wi-Fi problem. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. I do hope to have the pleasure in welcoming you back in the near future and remain, with kindest regards.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel; great decor, value and location
Summary: We have stayed at numerous hotels near Disneyland and this one is our favorite. The front desk folks were very helpful and friendly. The small restaurant offered a small menu but all choices were delicious. Our waiter, Victor, gets an A+! Our modern and clean room (2 queens and a sofa bed) easily accomodated 2 adults and 2 teens. It was an easy walk to Disneyland. You can't go wrong at Hotel Indigo. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review of your recent stay with us. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations and we are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Victor that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We look forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I made the last minute decision to go to a convention in Anaheim. I was going to be arriving very early in the morning in Anaheim and wasn't sure if I would be able to check-in early. Unfortunately the Hotel was completely booked due to the convention but they allowed me to start my check-in process. Which saved me a lot of time later since I was at the convention until about 11:30 pm.   I only stayed one night but it was great. Beds were comfortable, everything is new and you could tell that they really took care in making sure you felt right at home. The staff is great and extremely friendly. If I go to the convention again next year, I will be staying here again for sure. Thats if it is not sold out. I have no doubt the word is getting out about this place.
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay with us. We are extremely happy that our room and our check in process meet your expectation. It is always our pleasure to do the pre check-in if the room is not available before the check in time, so the guests can save time afterwards. We are also delighted to hear you are satisfied with our guest service. We are truly grateful to have hotel team that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We look forward to see you again next year for your convention!

Summary: We were a little apprehensive about trying a new hotel for a family vacation but we were happy with our stay. We stayed for an entire week, during our spring break at the end of April. We were happy with the service we got from the manager, Arthur, and he even upgraded us when we checked in for free because that was the room they had available, but we didn't book that type of room. So nice! The rooms were nothing extra fancy but they were comfortable and did the job for us. The only thing we would change about this place is the hardwood flooring. It looked great, but when you stay underneath someone with heavy feet it gets annoying. We had to call the front desk because our upstairs neighbors were extremely loud at 11:45pm and they took it very seriously and told me they would
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind reviews for your recent stay! We appreciate you choosing to bring your family to Anaheim and giving us the opportunity to accommodate you. We are very glad to hear that you are satisfied with the room and guest service. We apologize for the noise from the top floor. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: I was a little apprehensive at first, old building, unusual art, modern furniture. I usually stay at chains like Sheraton or Hilton.   I must say after staying there for 4 days, the place grew on me. I found myself with only two complaints. Hot water took a while. Having a room above the magic fountain drove me to hate Michael Jackson "thriller"song.   Over all staff (everyone) was great. Beds and bathrooms clean and comfy. Great security camera system. Kids loved the pool. Easy walking to Disney world. I'd would stay there again and recommend it in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time to give us some feedback of your stay. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with our service, room, and location. And thank you so much for recommending our property to others. We apologized for the issues that happened during your stay including hot water and the music from water fountain show. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and hope you will give another chance to serve you in the future.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights for a weekend away. It is located very close to Disneyland, only walking distance. There is also a super shuttle service from LAX to the hotel. I also booked some local tours for Universal Studio and LA city tour. Tour companies such as Starline and VIP could pick you up from the hotel and drop you off here as well.  Hotel is very small but very efficient. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Check in and check out was great. Early check in and late check out are organised by front desk stuff. Hotel is very family friendly, a lot of families are visiting Disneyland staying here. So you will see a lot of kids and some dogs as well.   Room is very comfortable, bathroom is very impressive, bed is great and very comfortable. I love the green
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to writing such kind review of your stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very glad you are satisfied with our service and room. Every one of our employees tries their best to meet and exceed each guest’s expectation. They will be happy to know their efforts are paying off and have not gone unnoticed. We apologized for the internet. We will definitely bring it to our head’s attention. Please contact us directly if you would like to discuss about it further more. Once again, thank you so much for your review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel while visiting Disneyland. We were in a family suite, with two queen beds and a sofa bed. The room was very spacious, with plenty of sleeping space for the four of us. My daughters said the sofa bed was very comfortable, more so than the usual hotel sofa bed. We are IHC Gold Members and got upgraded to a corner room on the 4th floor, from which we were able to view the Disneyland fireworks. We arrived late in the evening, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. One night we had issues with noisy neighbors, and the manager took care of it immediately. We didn't hear them playing their music loudly again for the rest of our stay. We liked the wood floors it the room because it meant we weren't walking all over old, dirty carpet during our stay. The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the detailed review of your stay. We are grateful for the wonderful things you have said about the room and our musical water fountain show. We also thank you for the suggestion for the bathroom about the towel hooks and shelf by the vanity.  We will definitely bring it to our department head’s attention. Once again, thank you so much for kind words! We all look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at Hotel Indigo Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo in Anaheim for the reason that it was the only hotel that only had 4* and 5* on trip advisor and I wondered why. Well now I know. The taxi driver from Long Beach was not familiar with this hotel so you would be advised to have the actual address with you. On arrival we were greeted by very friendly check in offering local information, maps, services, etc etc. He was very amenable and knew the answers to all our questions.
