We had booked two rooms, a family room and a double queen. We were not able to get them connecting as the family rooms do not connect. This seems a misnoma to me as if you have small children you want the connecting room and not a family room. We had another room across the hall and as our kids are 11,15 18 this was not really a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for such magnificent and detailed review of our property. We are most grateful about your appreciation of our staff service and our amenities. I do hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property again soon!

Summary: Stayed here during a holiday to visit Disneyland. The location was great as it was within walking distance both there and back. The free parking added to the value of the price of the stay. The hotel was very clean, and the dancing light show at the entrance was delightful. The staff were extremely accommodating, friendly, sincere and always ready to be at service for any questions or inquiries. The rooms are nicely laid out, and the beds are very comfortable. Would absolutely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such wonderful feedback of your stay. I am thrilled to read your kind words about your time with us. We are very glad to know that you like our location, complimentary parking, and our unique musical water fountain show at front of the property. We are also very proud of our team members in every department who delight to taking care of each guest every day. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel with great staff- great location for disneyland trip
Summary: We went as a family of four to Disneyland and blocked this hotel after reading reviews. As everyone has said before, the staff, the location, the food (breakfast) are all just great. It is a little walk to the theme park but not bad at all and we didn't once take the shuttle. The free parking is great so we could drive out in the afternoon for some outside lunch if we wanted or just went to the next door mall for food at California PIzza Kitchen or PF Changs. the staff actually does help with warming up your food etc and that came real handy with my kids milk or some left overs. On the last day, we asked for a slightly late check out and they accommodated us plus let us keep our car parked there till end of day. We also used their laundry facility as we were heading to the beach
Manager Response: We are taken aback by your superb review of your recent stay. We are glad that you are satisfied with our staff, the location, and the food. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like Khalil and Victor that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. Due to the occupancy, we may extend the checkout time for our IHG rewards club members. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Stayed here for my family vacation with my husband and five and two year old for Disney land...the people working there were super nice and room very clean ..beds r great as well..loved the pool n always clean..me n the kids loved it so much we talked my husband into staying a extra night ..next time in Anaheim that will be where we stay..I'm not even going to check for another hotel..also next to many restraaunts and great walking distance from Disneyland! Very satisfied
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice reviews and wonderful compliments about our service, room, and amenities. We are not only trying to meet our guests’ needs, but also trying to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel for another fantastic experience!

Summary: This is a great hotel to bring the family. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are very nice and the bed is very comfortable. Plenty of places to sit and talk with comfortable seating. Disneyland entrance is within easy walking distance. Just a great all around vacation home.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words about our hotel. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We are also glad that you like our rooms and bed. We are fortunate to have a wonderful location that is only about 10 minutes of walking to Disneyland Theme Park. We are looking forward to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, walk to Disneyland, restaurants
Summary: Stayed here with my family (used Mileage Plus points) for our Spring Break Disneyland trip.  I had read the reviews here so I knew pretty much what to expect.  The rooms are a bit on the small side, but with new furnishings and comfortable beds.  We appreciate queen size beds - 4 adult sized people do not fit in double beds!  The bathroom is very contemporary and has lots of counter space.  Of course I would prefer a separate sink/mirror area - so someone can shower while someone else is getting ready, but we survived.  We ate breakfast once at the little dining space in the lobby (I wouldn't call it a  restaurant exactly) and it was fine but a little pricey. In fact ALL breakfast places in the area are very pricey!  4 of us had breakfast at the IHOP down the street and it was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments regarding to your recent stay. We are delighted to learn that you were satisfied with the beds and bathroom. However, we are concerned to learn that you feel our breakfast is a little pricey. We do sell vouchers for breakfast at front desk for some discount. You are also welcomed to book your room reservation on our official website with breakfast included. You will be able to receive even better deals on the site. Thank you so much for staying with us and look forward to having you as our guests on your next trip out to Anaheim!

Summary: Walking into the lobby,  we were pleasantly surprised.   New clean furniture and decor.   The staff were very friendly and went out of their way.   Got to our room on the first floor (131) which was at the ground floor exit,  the weight room,  and the parking lot.   Room was clean,  beds were comfortable,  but the noise was so bad that we had to call the front desk several times throughout the night.   There was noise from people coming in and out of the parking lot,  the pool and weight room,  the room next door who's door kept slamming shut,  but most importantly the room above us sounded like there was a lady walking back and forth in high heels for hours,  a man sounded like he walked as an drummer, and a toddler who ran a marathon.     The hotel is a great location,  but
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We truly appreciate your comments in helping us excel not only in customer service but aesthetically. Feedback such as this helps us make improvements and ultimately deliver ideal guest experiences. However, we are very concerned to read your comments about the noise that you mentioned around your room. Please contact the hotel directly if you would like to talk more about the issue. We hope you will give our hotel another chance; we would love the opportunity to show you a true Hotel Indigo Anaheim experience!

Summary: I recently stayed here - of course - while I was visiting Disney Parks.    First of all the location is fantastic.  You can park your car once and walk everywhere you want to go after that.  Disneyland and DCA are less than half a mile away.  The new Anaheim Garden Walk is just steps away.   The hotel is fresh and new and everything is in tip top shape.  The beds were very comfortable with high qualify crisp linens.  The bathroom was spa like with plenty of towels and the customary Aveda proucts.  The front desk staff was friendly and seemed sincerely eager to please.    The only critique I have is that the designer should have taken a clue from being in "Orange County" when selecting the wall murals that the Indigo brand is known for.  I would think that close up shots of
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and comments regarding your latest visit to Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We love that you enjoyed the hotel and our bedding and Aveda products. Regarding to the wall murals that we chose, our hotel is about the neighborhood in the years past when the area was known for the walnut ranches. Please come to visit us again and we will show you the story behind all of the details you see in our property.

Summary: The official convention hotels were sold out so I booked here based on TripAdvisor reviews.  The hotel is an upgraded Holiday Inn Express that was converted to an Indigo at the end of 2013.  It ended up being an ideal location for my trip.  See the map I am attaching to this review.  The Convention Center entrance (to Hall A) was an 8-10 minute walk, depending on how long it took to cross both Katella and Harbor (long lights!).  The 7-Eleven across Harbor was very convenient and the Alerto's Mexican Food around the corner made for a good late-night snack.  GardenWalk is next door with several great restaurants (chains).  And the entrance plaza to Disneyland/California Adventure was about a 15 minute walk up Harbor.  I did not drive but appreciated that the hotel offers free
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the detailed comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are glad that you are satisfied with our location to Disneyland Theme Park entrance and posted a detailed map of our property.  We also apologize for the Wi-Fi issue that you encountered during your stay and the inconvenience that caused. Please contact us directly if you would like to talk about the issue in further detail. We hope you will give another chance to make it up for your next stay.

Summary: The location is great. There are wonderful restaurants ( The Cheesecake Factory, Roy's, Bubba Shrimp, California Pizza Kitchen) next door and the Disney Resort is a 10 minute walk. The staff is friendly, efficient and helpful. I needed help with my car battery and a staff member immediately came to my aid. The room was very clean, modern, comfortable and quiet. Because of the laminate flooring (which I prefer) versus carpeting, I heard occasional footsteps from the room above me- next time I will request a room on the top floor. The beds are COMFORTABLE and the linen are good quality.  I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this magnificent review of Hotel Indigo Anaheim. We are very grateful about your appreciation of our high level of service, rooms, and the location. We sincerely welcome you to visit us again and try our restaurant Chamber Bar & Bistro next to the lobby that offers a variety of many selections based on our local neighborhood and vendors, such as our Chambers Burger and Herbed Salmon. We also apologize for the noise that comes from the top floor because of the wood floor and thank you so much for understanding. Your comments means a lot to us and will help us to improve! Meanwhile, we very much look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel!

Summary: I chose Hotel Indigo when my usual hotel near Disneyland had no availability.  The staff here are all very welcoming and friendly, from the front desk people to the restaurant staff to the housekeeping staff.  Parking is mostly underground in large, well lit spaces.  The rooms have hard flooring (wood or wood looking tile) and are clean.  The beds are soft, clean and comfortable.  There is a Keurig machine in each room with coffee, decaf and herbal tea choices.  The bathroom has a walk in shower (so if you have really little ones who need a bathtub, this may be something to consider). The restaurant in the lobby is inviting and the choices are decent and moderately priced.   The only down side to this hotel is the walk to Disneyland.  With a younger child, the distance may be a
Manager Response: We are very grateful that you chose our hotel for your vacation. We are delighted that you are satisfied with our service, room, and our facilities. Every team member of our property tries to provide the best service for our guests at every moment. There are about 10 to 15 minutes of walking distance from our property to Disneyland. The city also provides shuttle to the park entrance called the ART SHUTTLE. Thank you so much for your feedback again! We are looking forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing Service and have not stayed yet!
Summary: Our extended family have booked to stay at Hotel Indigo in October, and the service has been great just doing the booking.  Have been able to do direct emails to the Sales Team, and they have offered as much assistance as possible and super friendly.  Can't wait to stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comment of our service before your stay. Every team members of our property try so hard to make all of our guests enjoy their hotel experience. We are sure that we will not disappoint during your stay! Please contact us if you have any other concerns or questions. We are looking forward to see you in October!

Summary: Great stay at the Hotel Indigo.  Everything was clean and taken care of.  Easy FREE parking.  Rooms were nicely decorated.  Nearby food options were excellent as well with several choices within easy walking distance.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are very glad to hear that you liked the rooms and the Garden Walk of Anaheim next door that offering great dining and shopping selections. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a wonderful Monday.

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Indigo the night before the Disneyland Half Marathon in September 2013 right after the hotel finished remodeling.  The race started super early (5 am?) and the front desk packed very thoughtful to-go breakfasts for all the runners.  The hotel's new look is much hipper and nicer than the other hotels within walking distance to Disneyland.  I'd totally recommend the Hotel Indigo to anyone who wants a weekend at Disneyland in a room that's more geared toward grownups than little kids.  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay with us in September last year.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us this year and wish you a wonderful Monday.

Summary Heading: Best service and very kid friendly.
Summary: Top knotch hotel.  Very pleased with the service. We had a late check in and they were ready for us. William the front desk guy even helped me carry bags out of my car. Best hotel experience in a while. I would recommend it to every one. Lastly I left my ipad and mac book there when I checked out. They called me and asked to ship it to me. Had to be the most honest place ever!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members like William that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Tuesday.

Summary: We had a fantastic experience staying at this hotel. It was walking distance to Disney, close to many restaurants, has free parking, has an attractive decor, and a the room was very comfortable and spacious. All of the employee's were very helpful and friendly. We will definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Tuesday.

Summary Heading: No Reason to Stay Anywhere Else in Anaheim!
Summary: WOW...was this a nice hotel!  Despite a few small issues, I would give Indigo a full five stars for the combination of value, proximity to Disney parks, and the fantastic staff. Check in was painless; we had reserved a king suite.  For two people, it's almost too much space!  The living room and bedroom combo was almost as big as our own apartment  :)  I loved the hardwood floors and the super sophisticated bathroom with Aveda toiletries.   The pool and hot tub area looked nice and clean, and had a cool cabana area to relax in; unfortunately we did not have time to use it. We spent all of our time at Disneyland, which was a quick 10 minute walk down the street.  It's much quicker to walk from Indigo than to drive from elsewhere. The staff was all super friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. I truly regret that you experienced issues with noise during your stay and truly apologize for the negative experiences you had for the room service during your stay. We will use your comments to better refine our operation. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.  I look forward to speaking with you and wish you a terrific Tuesday.

Summary: I'm sure this is a wonderful hotel, but we will never know.  After spendinh hours looking for a family location, I was about to book a 5 night reservation on the hotel's website and had a question about the room.  I called the toll-free number and the agent convinced me that it would be easy for her to go ahead and complete the reservation.  Thinking that an actual person would be better than a machine (my bad, but I still prefer to read real books rather than ebooks) I went ahead and completed the booking.  When I reviewed the email confirmation, I noted that the reservations agent had booked only 1 night, not the 5 we needed.  By the time I called back, the room we had wanted was gone and the hotel was not able to do anything about it.  So, its back to the EMBASSY SUITES.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time for the feedback on the process of booking your reservations. I apologized for the inconvenience that caused. And I truly regret that you did not have a chance to experience the stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim. Please feel free to contact the hotel directly and we would be more than happy to discuss your booking experience with you if you would like.  We look forward to speaking with you and wish you a relaxing Thursday.

Summary: I chose this hotel because a friend stayed here and recommended it. It is close to the park, about 10 minutes away. Right next door is a nice mall with nice restaurants, such as Cheesecake Factory, as well as fast-food places, such as pizza, chinese, and Subway. The price is very reasonable compared to other hotels, which may have outdated decor and iffy service. This hotel was very modern, recently renovated. It had hard wood floors in the room, which was a nice change from carpet. Great bathroom with rock-tile shower, bowl sink and a bamboo-looking faucet, comfy beds with nice blankets, flat-screen TV, a small fridge, an alarm clock with an Iphone docking station. What I liked is that the blankets had duvet covers on them, not just a top sheet to protect you from a comforter
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate your compliments about our amenities and facilities. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and makes you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.  We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Tuesday.

Summary: My mother in-law booked this hotel for us, as I was PCSing from FT. Wainwright, AK to FT. Carson, CO, for our family vacation to Disneyland from 18-20 MAR 2014.  It was the best hotel of our whole trip.  Everything about them was awesome.  They were very courteous, always checking on us, and asking us what we needed, or if we needed anything.  They were just very awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.  We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Tuesday.

Summary: Awesome hotel!! Really close to Disney and a bunch of great restaurants (cheesecake factory /wink /wink ) . Amazing staff (que también habla español) And really clean and comfortable rooms. Super recomendado. <3333333333
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.  We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Tuesday.

Summary: Best breakfast with room we've ever had - fresh and large portions (enough to fill up two large teenage boys! ) .  We even went back the next morning and paid for it because it was better than anywhere else.  Super close to the Gardenwalk and only 2 blocks to the main entrance to Disneyland.   Hotel has been thoughtfully updated in a young funky style ( I'm an interior designer so I really appreciated it ).  Beds comfy and quiet.  Best of all,  staff was helpful and just very friendly.   Definitely a great place close to Disney - highly recommend for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Also, thank you for sharing your opinions about the updates to the hotel. Hearing that from an expert really means a lot. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a fantastic Friday.

Summary: The people at this hotel are amazing! Funky, comfortable accommodations super close to convention centre and Disney. Wonderful breakfast and helpful, friendly staff. Would stay again in a heartbeat!  Comfy beds and quiet environment. Steps away from Gardenwalk and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a terrific Thursday.

Summary Heading: Great Disney Land location and support!
Summary: This modern updated Hotel had all the necessary amenities, and the staff was always friendly.  The staff went out of their way to help with any information related to Disney and the local area.  Was really pleased with the experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Also, thank you for trying us out and giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a terrific Tuesday.

Summary Heading: Great bargain, great location, great STAFF
Summary: Great little hotel at a bargain price in a great location -- an easy half-mile walk to Disney or the Convention Center. About the friendliest staff ever: every chambermaid had a friendly hello, and the staff actually seemed to take a genuine like to our little dog.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are glad that you and your little companion enjoyed yourselves.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a terrific Tuesday.

Summary Heading: I had a very nice stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim
Summary: Hotel is very clean, staff goes out of their way to make sure your stay is very comfortable.  Everyone is very friendly.  Rooms are updated and really nice.  Restaurant - Chambers located in the hotel has great food.  I ate breakfast there every day and dinner 3 nights...always great.  I cannot say enough good things about this hotel.  I definitely recommend!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a terrific Thursday.

Summary: We stayed here for a big conference at the Anaheim Convention Center and were so pleased with the high level of hospitality.  While the corporate chain hotels where a little closer to the convention center, they were easily twice as much money and certainly were too big to have the personalized level of care offered by Hotel Indigo.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Anaheim on business or pleasure and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.  This was the first year that we have been able to host guests from that convention as a Hotel Indigo, so we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us.  We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.   We look forward to your return visit with us and wish you a wonderful Wednesday.

Summary: I recently had to attend a conference in Anaheim and this hotel was the perfect fit.  Very clean--hard wood floors in the room--I loved that. As someone who works in public heath for a living--it was so refreshing from nasty carpets.  Great location. Staff was very helpful and went out of their way to help. Definitely will return.

There is also a nice shopping center that is a short two-minute walk which has a PF Changs, Bubba Gump, and Cheesecake Factory.  The actual hotel was super clean and had on-site parking. The room was comfortable and had no problems. The staff here was not only nice, but very professional. I was greeted with a handshake and felt like I was receiving VIP treatment at the front desk. Summary Heading: Nice hotel close to Disney Attraction
Summary: The hotel is perfectly located near the Disney Attractions in Anaheim. It's close to the Interstate 5 which allows an easy Highway access direction North (L.A.) and south (San Diego). The check in went well and uncomplicated, the staff was friendly and helpful. I was upgraded to a suite and stayed on the top floor. From there you were able to see the Disney fire works at night. The bathroom was clean but not very spacecious. My recommendation is, exchange the bath tube with a standar shower cabine, this would be a real upgrade for the room. They are two blocks away and the walk takes approximately ten minutes.  It's therefore incredibly easy to nip back to the hotel for a break in the middle of the day. Room was clean, and the two-bed queen studio suite room that we were upgraded to could sleep six with a pull-out sofa.  There were a couple of small downsides. The first is noise. Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: We were really reluctant to book a hotel somewhere other than Disney's Grand Californian. The rates during the week we were going were very high so we decided to find a more affordable option. We came across Hotel Indigo and booked it because of the great reviews and affordable suite. We loved the room, the beds were very comfortable. The size of the room accommodated the 2 adults and 4 children in our party. The bedroom and living room both had flat screen TV's and the keurig coffee machine was a nice touch. The thing that really makes this hotel stand out is the customer service from the housekeeping to the manager the service is outstanding. We will definitely come back!!!!!

Summary: I work the largest music trade show every January in Anaheim,CA.  Our company normally put us up in the Hilton, but with trying to save some $$ this year, decided to use other properties in the area near the convention center.  This hotel was one of them, and I am so very happy that I was chosen to stay here instead of the other hotels used.  The rooms are very clean, there is a nice little bar/café, and the staff is very friendly and knowledgeable about the area.  They really went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed.  I will definitely recommend to any friends / family that are visiting and want to stay near Disneyland. The Anaheim Gardenwalk is a very short walk from here.  The Gardenwalk has some great restaurants, shopping, a movie

Summary: Trip Advisor reviews did not let me down about this place! We stayed here the night before a Disneyland race. The staff was extremely solicitous. They upgraded us to a room with a view of the fireworks and they let us park our car there the next day. The hotel is really clean, and the rooms were comfortable and cozy. There's a small fridge in the hotel room, and Aveda toiletries in the bathroom.  The location is great, too. The hotel is just a couple of blocks from Downtown Disney and the parks. There's a strip mall on the corner with eateries and a convenience store a block away, and a big outdoor mall-type complex next door with lots of chain restaurants.

We paid extra for a family suite and it was worth it to have the extra seating area.  The hotel is right on the main strip and 2 minutes walking distance to loads of restaurants - California Pizza Kitchen, Bubba Gump, McCormick and Schmicks - lots of choice. Summary Heading: Nice hotel but WiFi pretty much worthless
Summary: The hotel staff are very friendly... almost trying too much. Room nicely decorated and spotless... considering the proximity to Disney Land, I'm sure keeping a hotel this clean is a finely-orchestrated effort. The breakfast is also kind of chintzy--I got a voucher for breakfast and then was handed a menu. I assumed the voucher was good for what was on the menu. I was told I could only order the $10 "hearty breakfast" (not all that hearty TBH), but not the $7 pancakes????? Huh? Then one of the morning coffee and OJ was no problem. The next day, OJ was like an extra $3!   But my biggest complaint is the "Wi." Why just wi? Well, "WiFi" stands for "wireless fidelity." There *is* wireless, but I can't report much fidelity. It was basically worthless. Now look, hotels of the world:

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disney, Front Desk Needs Work
Summary: The Hotel Indigo is great! The location is perfect and hotel itself is up-to date and very clean. The rooms are nice (the giant walnuts a bit weird) and beds are amazing!!!   The only downside was that the woman that checked us in was not accommodating at all. She was very rude as if I was doing her a favor by staying there. Even when I followed up after our stay, the hotel management did not respond or care how we were treated.   Now this isn't to say that everyone is like this. The few times we called the front desk and the gentleman at check-out were great. So nice and helpful, almost made us forgot about how our trip started.

We enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub as well. We'd definitely stay here again, no doubt. Summary Heading: Excellent location, comfy beds. Better hope for quiet neighbours.
Summary: I enjoy staying at hotels that are fairly newly constructed or completely renovated as was the case with this Indigo. Our standard-sized room contained two queen-size beds. The beds, pillows and comforters were very comfortable. The wood floors add a nice touch.   The shower head had two settings and because of the low water pressure the choice was either a fine-mist shower or a shower with 6 thick strands of water slowly oozing out.   Very small detail: the clock was set at mountain time zone instead of pacific time zone.  Beware: the walls between the rooms are not at all sound-proofed. I clearly heard every cough my neighbour had at 11pm. As such, sleep quality can be anywhere from excellent to poor.

Summary: We chose Hotel Indigo based upon TripAdvisor reviews and overall hotel ranking in the area. We were not disaapointed.  The bed was very comfortable although a western king seemed slightly short for my 6 ft tall husband.  The room was extremely clean and modern - from the new hardwood floors to the finely detailed craftsmanship of the shower walls (custom stones within grouting).  The service at the counter and restaurant was very helpful and friendly. The breakfast option room upgrade was well worth it.  It included generous portions of eggs, bacon, toast, hash browns and beverage.  In addition, we were within a 10 minute walk to Disneyland properties which worked out perfectly for us.  We feel it it was a tremendous value and look forward to our next visit.  PS.  Be sure to

Summary Heading: Stayed one night and won't be back
Summary: Stayed a night. Paper thin walls.  Won't be back. You can hear every noise your neighbor makes. Not good!    Needs some soundproofing material for sure.   Beds are comfy though and service was okay.  Convenient to Disneyland and surrounding attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Ginger G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay. It is unfortunate the noise in the room prevented you from fully enjoying your time at the hotel. We were pleased to see your positive comments for the staff and the beds. We take all of the reviews we receive very seriously as they allow us to identify areas that may benefit from additional attention. We have shared your comments with the staff and we’re confident the necessary adjustments will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction. Summary Heading: Great stay for our family trip to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed in the family studio suite and it was the perfect size for the 5 of us. We watched the Disneyland fireworks from our window. Customer service at the counter, restaurant, and bar were wonderful. The hotel is clean, nicely decorated, and is in easy walking distance to Disneyland. We used a stroller for the kids, and grandma made the walk easily too. Free parking was a plus. Our package included hot breakfast for two each day, and the food selection was good and the meals were yummy.

Summary: Originally we had a 6 night stay at the Disneyland Hotel however due to unforeseen circumstances we were left scrambling just a month out to find alternative accommodations. We were able to get a great rate with breakfast and saved hundreds of dollars. We would not be disappointed.  Our requests were met - top floor room away from any elevator and actually were granted a fireworks view room which was such a nice surprise ! The room we had was a 2 queen studio suite. Summary Heading: Wonderful warm service - would be back!
Summary: We came for a quick two night stay and were pleasantly surprised.  Newly remodelled (and name changed from Holiday Inn) it had great modern decor, and WONDERFUL service (thanks Victor in the restaurant, Jessica in the bar, and Alex in the front desk).  Great location a few km from Disney, and they gave us a free hot breakfast both mornings for all 4 of us --- and not a continental one - a full service bacon and egg one.  Only drawback was some noise in the morning with doors slamming etc as people got ready to leave, but we would be back.  They were great with arranging a city tour, a chute yo the airport, and let us hang out in a separate lounge for awhile to wait for our shuttle even though we were already checked out.

Summary Heading: Better than my stay at Paradise Pier Hotel.
Summary: I selected this hotel not only because of its proximity to Disneyland (15 minute walk to main gate) but because of the TripAdvisor reviews of the bed (i.e. so comfortable you'll need a wakeup call to get out of it). They weren't kidding! I loved our stay in this room. From the earthy color-scheme to the cushy-plus bed to the comfy corner chair with ottoman to the spa-like bathroom to the accessible HDMI port on the TV (love me some Netflix on the big screen when I travel) - hotel excellence. There are some great eateries on the same block, as well as a nearby Subway for a little after-park evening meal. We were the first customers to breakfast in their restaurant; delish. The breakfast burrito was tasty and filling. I will 100% stay here the next time we come to Disneyland. On

Summary Heading: Not quite living up to the Hotel Indigo name
Summary: I am torn about this property...many things to like and yet many disappointments as well. The service is excellent, all staff very friendly and wanting to help in whatever way they can. The rooms are spacious and newly decorated in an eco-chic palette with furniture and fixtures of a higher quality than a regular HI or HIE. The beds are very comfy and plush. Proximity to Disney, Convention Center, and Garden Walk make it an ideal location. Property is clean and well-maintained.  That said, no one seemed to have a whole lot of experience at what they do...check-in was slow, so was service at the restaurant, and it took a solid 10 minutes to get a glass of wine and a beer at the bar (it wasn't crowded; the bartender didn't know the difference between a Chardonnay and a Cabernet,
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I truly apologize for the negative experiences you had during your stay.  At this hotel we believe in delivering an excellence guest experience and it is clear that we were not able to deliver that to you.  With that said, I did want to clarify a couple of things.  As stated even here on Tripadvisor we are a 3 Star Hotel.  While we are on the upper end of 3 Star, that is what we are.  I apologize if we did something to give you a different perception.  Also, all Hotel Indigo hotels have hardwood floors.  Again, I truly apologize that they were not to your liking.  Our goal is to deliver an upscale experience to our guests.  We aim to give a personalize level of service to all of our guests. I truly hope if you are in the area again you will give us another opportunity to wow you.  Have a terrific Tuesday.

Summary: Our family of 4 adults just did a one nighter before a day at Disneyland. The rooms were outrageously nice and big. Big fluffy beds, lots of room, huge bathroom with large shower. We had a great view of the Disney fireworks so you might ask for that when making reservations since all rooms do not offer the same view. The small restaurant downstairs was cozy, modern, and a very good breakfast. They offer dinner but we did not take advantage of that. The people were extremely friendly. It was like they were an extension of the Disney family. This will be our place to go in the future and will recommend it to everyone. It also has a good size pool and hot tube. Just go there, you'll love it.

Summary: Recently stayed here for a 5-day visit to Disneyland & California Adventure.  Fabulous location; cleaner than clean; beds to die for; and top-notch service from all.  Just  mention your need, it is met.   Hotel General Manager Thomas Long is the epitome of Customer Service.  He is there first thing in the morning and last thing at night.  He is constantly monitoring the guests' needs to be certain they are met.  I asked for information on their mattresses; came back later and he had 4 pages of photocopied information for me!  My friend needed a Sharps container for insulin syringes; it was at the front desk immediately.  The service staff in the restaurant were always checking on you to be sure you had what you needed (coffee, water, anything else)  When we asked for 2% milk for

Summary: It's one of those smaller hotels, but it was beautiful, clean and well-kept.  The hotel room we had was a 2 Queen Bed/Studio (with a pull-out sofa). Sleeps 6 people.  The bathroom was very modern, and clean, I liked how the room had a refrigirator, but would have been great if there was also a mini microwave since we had a lot of left overs from outside food we wanted to eat warm. The beds and sheets were soft, and mattress was SO comfortable.  The only thing was probably the noise level, we heard loud voices, and footsteps, from outside the hallway during the night -- sounds creepy..but really the doors and walls are thin enough to hear the guests in the rooms next door and outside the door. Other than that..customer service was superb. VERY friendly staff, things you needed

We had 1 large spoonful of cold potatoes,  bacon,  a couple of spoonfuls of scrambled eggs and 1 small strawberry/1 smaill orange slice (garnish-not a fruit side!!). Maybe we had the leftovers from a shift change as the peopke sitting next to us had double the ammount on there plates or maybe because ours was free??  This would have been $10.50 per person.  I saw the chef (maybe he's in training) at the front desk and he asked how we enjoyed our breakfast-I shared with

Summary Heading: Beautiful Update to the Holiday Inn Express
Summary: I had stayed here many years ago when it was a Holiday Inn Express.  The change to Indigo is fantastic!    We arrived at midnight the night before Thanksgiving and the staff was waiting for us with our room ready.  My family we going to spend the next four days at Disneyland.  At check-in they let us know that Thanksgiving dinner would be offered in the restaurant and we reserved our space.  A little worried that it wouldn't be good (we were very wrong to be worried.)  We had breakfast twice and dinner once during our stay. It was all great!  Try the Chiliquilles in the morning.    The room was well appointed and very comfortable and I had only one gripe.  The noise through the connecting door was very loud.  We could hear everything in the room next door and they could here us.

I was also pleased with the very accomodating staff (I was going to book only two rooms and slam everyone into those but found that we needed the extra space and the hotel grouped us all together and gave us a great rate on the third room. Breakfast was included in the rate and was decent quality. Very close to restaurants for late night snacking and close to Denny's/IHOp for the morning before the park which is a very short

Summary: My family of four (2 adults and 2 teens, ages 16 & 17) stayed for two nights on 11/15 & 11/16 of 2013.  I wish I remembered the names of all the wonderful and hard-working staff members to commend them individually.  Everyone (front desk, restaurant, housekeeping) was professional, kind and went out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable. Our family was impressed indeed!  The hotel has been under construction and so far it has been successful in my opinion.  Hotel was very clean and our room was great.  Beds super comfortable, plenty of space, floor instead of carpet.  Parking included was a plus.  We had made previous arrangements to stay at the Peacock Suites nearby for our last two days so sadly we had to move.  But Hotel Indigo blew them out of the water!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights thanksgiving weekend. The staff was polite, friendly, and helpful. The rooms were amazing. They had pretty hardwood floor in the rooms and tiled showers...very upscale... never saw hardwood hotel floors but makes more sense than carpet and looked great.  only thing missing was complimentary breakfast...there was a restaurant on site...but we were on budget so we opted for the McDonalds across from Disney....  Great stay  the park is a 5 min walk or so from main gate.

Breakfast was good and the service was top notch. We would stay here again without a doubt. What we really appreciated was the detail to customer service. So many places have lost that touch and it makes a huge difference. Book here and you won't be disappointed. Loved it!!!!

Service-wise, this is a 5-star hotel.  They wrote my son a birthday card and gave us one of the rooms with a view of the nightly fireworks.  The room was very clean and comfortable. Summary: My friend and I stayed one night for a conference nearby and we were delighted by the new decor, the extremely friendly and helpful staff, and the perfect location. The rooms are modern and well designed. The shower even had a hand-held unit and a riverrock floor! Beds were very comfortable and lush.   And there's a fountain out front that lights up and squirts to music! I was entertained! Very nice surprise since I originally reserved with Holiday Inn Express points months ago and they updated to Hotel Indigo and still honored my reservation.   We walked to Cheesecake Factory for dinner and to the Anaheim Convention Center, then to IHOP for breakfast the next morning. I could see the hotel restaurant was nice, but had my taste set for IHOP. The area is upscale, clean and safe.

Summary: Wow as soon as we walked in the staff were ready to help and extremely friendly. The next morning we had breakfast which was offered for only $10 for 4 people when we booked the hotel. While sitting at breakfast we had my almost 2 year old daughter throwing fits and they were so friendly about it. They started giving us free stuff to help her stop crying like crackers and a muffin and juice. Each one of the staff members would come up to us and ask if everything was ok, not just our waiter. The only downfall was that our room got very hot at night and for some strange reason it felt very humid even with the air turned on. I don't really know why it felt so humid! But the friendly customer service made it all worth it. The room was also very clean and very modern and up to date!

Summary: We booked our room last minute and it was pricey for the long weekend and major conventions happening in the Anaheim area. The location did not disappoint us! Quick walk -2 blocks- take you to the main gate of Disneyland. They have free parking and wifi which helps offset parking at the magic kingdom! If you're looking for class - the rooms are beautiful- hard wood floors, soft linens, Aveda bath products! We had a two queen suite which was perfect - the door to the bedroom shuts and the outside living  room sofa bed pulls out ! Great front desk staff - they really try to help you out! There's a breakfast place - but if you're in a hurry this is not the place for you - it's a sit down dining room. The kitchen was overwhelmed when we visited. If youve got time The property has a

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn, Anaheim (now known as Hotel Indigo) on October 28th, 2013 and were pleasantly surprised.  The hotel was fully renovated at the beginning of October and has all the mod cons.  The bed was super comfy, the bathroom newly tiled and was overall a very spacious room.  The staff here were very friendly and accommodating.  The hotel is very close to Disneyland, within 10 mins walking distance.  It's also within walking distance to The Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump Shrimp, Tony Roma's, Subway, ABC and a 7Eleven for amenities.  Great value for $$. We would def stay here again.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay, great staff and location
Summary: We spent 3 nights here while touring California. This stay was mainly to visit disneyland. From the moment we checked in we were impressed. Hotel had just been completely refurbished and they were still finishing minor things (although you wouldn't have noticed if you didn't know they were!). Only thing that wasn't up and running was restaurant and bar (although they gave us an excellent free breakfast to compensate and if breakfast was anything to go by food will be great I'm sure). There were lots of restaurants in area and this didn't affect out stay at all. Room was fantastic, big, lots of storage, comfortable beds and we had a view of Disney fireworks and pool area of hotel. Summary: I recently spent three nights here while traveling for business. from the moment I checked in I knew I selected the right hotel for this trip. Upon my arrival I was greeted by Victor who had all paperwork completed quickly and provided an overview of the property.  My room was in a great location overlooking the pool ( which provided that vacation feel even though I was in town for meetings) although it was a bit of a walk from the elevator it was worth the extra steps. The room was bright and fresh and very welcoming. It was obvious everything was brand new on this property. The staff of this hotel is amazing, they were friendly, knowledgable and always willing to assist. Summary Heading: Great Hotel, great location, great staff
Summary: I last stopped here 7 years ago, on vacation from the UK when it was a Holiday Inn Express and that is what it was badged as on the IHG website when I booked this time. In the meantime it has been done over as part of the Indigo brand and it looks great. Our room was perfect, with a clear view of the Disney fireworks. You are a 10 minute walk from the Disney Park itself, lots of places even closer to eat, drink and shop. Also the Angels Stadium (Baseball) and Honda Center (Ice Hockey) are just 10 minutes drive away. The staff were all really friendly and helpful. There is secure underground car parking. The WiFi did not seem to work in our room, a poor signal but it was fine in the lobby & lounge areas so not really an issue. Recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  I truly apologize for the experience you had with your Wi-Fi signal. Summary Heading: A pleasant surprise and lovely hotel!
Summary: I have followed the reviews prior to visiting and was worried the hotel would not be up to standard, thankfully we were pleasantly surprised and found the rooms to be very well appointed! The decor was very modern and  the beds extremely comfortable. We had two adjoining rooms for our family and each day they were cleaned to a very high standard. The breakfast was not the best as the hotel was in the closing stages of renovation but we could see that in the next few weeks all will be finished and the dining area will be very pleasant, that aside the breakfast that was offered was nice and the staff in dining area were extremely pleasant.
